1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gar skad du/An sum+b+hi tam t+ta/dobyAh+mat+tha/pa'i nga
1b2(dkon brtsegs): che nA ma mA hA yA na smr-i tA/bode skad du/'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rlab
1b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam pa dang po/
1b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//
2a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis badrug gas sa ng+yas gtsugs/com ldan sa rgyal po na/
2a2(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/
2a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa dgra bcom pa sha stag dang /'jam dpal dang /seng ge'i tog la sogs pa
2a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
2a5(dkon brtsegs): skyon ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /mthu chen thob dang /spobs pa brtsegs dang /gzungs skye
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang drug rgyal ba dang /snun pa brtsegs dang /ldan po'i rgyul mtshon dang /rab tu m+b+has dang /don rab sems pa/legs
2b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sem pa sems dang /sems dpa'i ba nga/sems kyi blu gas pa/sem nga po dang /nor bu brtsegs dang /
2b3(dkon brtsegs): 'joms rgyal po dang /phag na rin po che dang /sems dpa' rin po che dang /lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /rtag tu lag bteg
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dadrang /rtog tu lag brkyang dang /rtag tu lag brtson dang /sems can sgrol dang /brtson 'grus mos dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin
2b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la gnas pa dang /smon lam 'phags pa dang /lag na sgron mi dang /sems mnyam pa da /ngan song spong dang /mya ngan
2b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /brtson pa mi gtong nyi ma'i snying po dang /rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang /mtha' yas
3a1(dkon brtsegs): narnam par gno dang/dpag myed rnam par gtsun dang /migaso gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang /
3a2(dkon brtsegs): zla'od dang /zla ba'i rtag dang /'od kyi tog dang /'od pe la dang /snang bye thob pa rnam par gnon dang /seng ge ltar rnam par
3a3(dkon brtsegs): ginon pas mngon par bsgre gas pa'i sgra dang /stobs pa thogs med dang spobs pa bzhed pa dang /sgrubs pa dpa' ba dang /rnam
3a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gnon pa dang /nyi zla'i 'od zer mogo mog por byed pa'i 'od dang /dmigs med dang /blo gros dpe med dang /rtag tu bzhed
3a5(dkon brtsegs): dges dbang po dnganor bun bu dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /bud med rnam bsgyur go cha dang /rab tu snang
3b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par snang byed dang /mes byin dang /tshogs can+da rab mchog rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad zab po dang /de
3b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la sogs pa bying chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /de dag dang gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs gcigo/lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /lha'i bu
3b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshams bzangs dang /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang /de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la
3b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs gcig go/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang /de dag
3b6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go/klu'i rgyal po ma dros
3b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang /klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yid dag par zhugs
4a1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ya mamam ma.agamams mamams mamamamanyam thas mam thas mamam tshamamaman ma ya yas ma las ya masas yas sa sa ya sa yam thas masa.a
4a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs gcig go//de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
4a3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding dang /mi 'amo ci dang lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag dang /
4a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig ste/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to//de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon
4a5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug pa gcig pu dben pa na 'dug pa/nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/sems med cing sems dang
4a6(dkon brtsegs): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so//'jam dpal
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pi dgA rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa
4a8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge'i dzin de las langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/'di lta ste dper na/u dum pa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya
4b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/brtag tu med pa/rtog ge dang bral ba/zab pa shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya
4b3(dkon brtsegs): la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do//chos mnyan pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas bdag de bzhin
4b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang /byang
4b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang //sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs
4b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags che ba/zhe sdang che ba/gti mug che ba/dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/
4b7(dkon brtsegs): glen pa/blun pa/mi gus pa/sangs rgyas dang bral ba/chos dang bral ba/dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas/ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas shes rab kyi
5a1(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhub cu'o snyam mo//de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi phyogs bcu'i byang chub
5a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang /gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mong po dag kyang bsdu bar
5a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam mo//de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa kun du spang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so//'jam dpal gzhon nur
5a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa kun du snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas de'i mod la/shar phyogs dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
5a5(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed dag mnyam pa/'jam pa/rnam par dag pa/'od gsal ba/dri ma med pa/yongs su dgo pa'i 'od chen pos khyab par gyur to//'od de dang
5a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba des/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nA/'jig rten gyi bya gyi mun pa mun nag dang /ri'i rtse mo dang /shing ljon pa dang /ri dang /khor yug dang /btang bzung dang /
5a7(dkon brtsegs): bting bzung chen po dang /gangs dang /ri rab dang /lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to//de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
5b1(dkon brtsegs): ma\u0f7fsa a nathamasama.a \u0f7fthas maHShas mthamaHma yasaH ma
5b2(dkon brtsegs): rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos
5b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ba'i 'od 'di lta bu yid du mchi ba/'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di/bcom ldan 'das rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang legs/
5b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cag sems dang ba dang /lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing /sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dag kyang kun du mi
5b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung lags na/bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/'di su'i byin gyis brlabs lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
5b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur te//sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten+da na lha'i sgra dang /klu'i sgra dang /gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang /lha ma yin gyi
5b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang /na mkha' lding gi sgra dang /dri za'i sgra dang /mi 'am ci'i sgra dang /lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang /mi'i sgra dang /mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang /bya'i sgra dang /ri dregs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa
5b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to//rlung gi sgra dang /chu'i phung po'i sgra dang /rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /klu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag
6a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/dga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing thams cad zhi ba dang /rab tu ni byar gyur to//yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsten
6a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to//skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
6a3(dkon brtsegs): spyan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkyo zhing /des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthul pa bshad du gsol/de nas
6a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag gis ng+yas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas/gsung gi phrin las
6a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod de/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ci lci ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung zhing /de dag gis gsung gi phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba
6a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ba/'a stsal te//sngangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa des/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du gang bar gyur te/lha dang mir bcas pa'i som spyan 'drim phrag sa
6a7(dkon brtsegs): po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing /rol mo'i sgra dge kyang ma bkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to//rol mo'i sgra de dag les mi brtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag meng pa dang /
6b1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa'i sgra 'byu shing stong pa nyid kyi sku mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang /rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang /de bzhin
6b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi sgra dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang /sbyin pa'i sgra dang /tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /bzod pa'i sgra dang /brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang /bsam gtun gyis+thA dang /shes rab kyi sku dang /des
6b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dang /phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /gtang snyoms kyi sgra dag dang /de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi sgra 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung
6b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to//sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa/grangs med pa dge bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /nyan thos nyid dang
6b5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /brgya byin nyid dang /tshangs po nyid dang /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
6b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dge 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la ci zhig byas thong shig/'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
6b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongasu
7a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyang ba byas pa yin te/'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no//gal te de bzhin gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na
7a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro//'od 'di ni byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /gtang snyoms thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas
7a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/skal pa 'am/skal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no//rigs kyi bu
7a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag de lta mod kyi/'on kyang legs par nyon le rab tu yid la zung zhig dang khyed la bshad par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gi lan gnyis lan gsum du
7a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/bcom ldan
7a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag 'jig
7a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde ba
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dngas la sa myog sa pa 'dum la ba shA /rdzun na ba smra nga mnas napas sa na nas na ngas rdzun sa// nang nas pa na pa snam spyong cu
7b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang gau ti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus pa//dbang po brtul ba/ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa dang bral ba/nyon mongs pa ce
7b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston to//rigs kyi bu dag bcom
7b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
7b5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu che ba/shes rab che ba/brtson 'grus che nga/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
7b6(dkon brtsegs): bai/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go 'byed pa/byang
7b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sem dpa' rnams kyi ma'i go 'byed pa/chos thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/thogs pa med pa'i
8a1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang ldan pa/gzungs thob pa/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pad/'di lta ste sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i
8a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
8a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu bzhu bar 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des/byang chub
8a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir/'od 'di ba kyi ste/rigs kyi bu dgra
8a5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di rgyu ni de yin/rkyen ni de yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad
8a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsal te//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'di 'di lta nu 'gyed lags/bka' stsal pa/ting dzin
8a7(dkon brtsegs): kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpa' gnon srung ba de ting 'dzini de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
8b1(dkon brtsegs): mamamaHsa a nathamasama.a thaHtha.a mthathas mama
8b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/'di ltar rnam par dag pa/'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad lags so//
8b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro//de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
8b4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dog na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrig phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med
8b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste/lhogs nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos
8b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang snang ba 'di lta bu dang /
8b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba 'di dag ga las mchis/su'i 'od lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//
8b8(dkon brtsegs): rig kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
9a1(dkon brtsegs): te/'tshan shA na stsal chos ca smanata//de na byung chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'jug pa des 'di lta skye/phyogs bcu'i byung rlung
9a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'ad bkyi'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gosa'i
9a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /phyag rgya
9a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /lung zhu bu bgyi ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang /de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blto ba'i slad
9a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o//bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu drug de'i dus la bab par shes ni/deng shig/de na sa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems
9a6(dkon brtsegs): dpe' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yul tsam de nyid la/'dIb+d+ha ste dper na mo stabs po che'i
9a7(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bskum po las brkyang ba 'am/brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par
9b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
9b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba der lhag so//la la dag ni phye ma dang /byug pa dang /me tog phreng dang /spros kyi char dge dang /me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /
9b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam pa ka dang /a ti mug ta ka dang /sgyu snang dang /d+hA nu sa ri dang /sna ma'i me tog dang /b+hA ra shI ka dang /b+hA ra shrI ka chen po dang /mnad ra ba dang /man de ra ba chen po dang /ba ru shak+Sha/
9b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /ba ru sha ka chen po dang /zla mdog dang /zla mdog chen po dang /zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang /spos kyi char dag dang /phreng ba'i/
9b5(dkon brtsegs): char dag dang /phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so///
9b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing bcom ldan 'das de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so//byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong che'i 'jig rten gyi ba
10a1(dkon brtsegs): rnamasu sgra skad kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
10a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhag so//byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' de/
10a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa
10a4(dkon brtsegs): dedri dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to//sems can glang la yang 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med/zhe sdang gis ma yin/gti mug gis ma yin/nga rgyal gyis ma yin/phrag dog
10a5(dkon brtsegs): gis ma yin/ser snas ma yin/'chab pas ma yin/khro bas ma yin/yongasu gdungs pas ma yin te/sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /mchog tu dga'
10a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de
10a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gA la bder dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
10b1(dkon brtsegs): dang rdzogs pa'i sa sa shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa
10b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krungs bcas te 'dug par gyur
10b3(dkon brtsegs): te/de nas gnas brtan 'od bsrung chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang /me tog gi char dang /spos kyi char dang /phye ma'i char de dag dang /sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po
10b4(dkon brtsegs): skye 'byin pa de dag dang /snang ba chen po de yang mthong /gling chen po bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa yang mthong /'khor dal po
10b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /dge sbyong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen
10b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo //de nas gnas brten 'od bsrung chen po stan las langs te/chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nus pus ma
10b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha ngas btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin
11a1(dkon brtsegs): tu dri ma med pa'i zhal//mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa//bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po//sa b+hA lha yul rnam par
11a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis//bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad//bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis//bzod stobs/
11a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa//yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol//sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam
11a4(dkon brtsegs): spyad kyang //skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis bsnyes//sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang //sbyin dgyes thams cad btong ba bdag gi the tshom
11a5(dkon brtsegs): gosal du gsol//khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chud stsal//gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang //thub pas zhal zas gtsang nan de bzhin pho brang dkor/
11a6(dkon brtsegs): yang stsal//sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyed la zhu//stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsnyen zhing thugs la legs dgongs pas//rdul bral sku lus brngubs kyang sdug bsngal
11a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa mi mnga' zhing //gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi//yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu bar 'tshal//'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis
11b1(dkon brtsegs): rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris lnga//bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni//thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa//dpa'o lam rab ston
11b2(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyed ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'//spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes//bdag dang sems/
11b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnam par bshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson//shin tu dri ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi btsom khum//khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang //bsam
11b4(dkon brtsegs): gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten//khyod kyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin//'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs
11b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/rdul bral khyod kyi sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni//srang la btsal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag grol ma lus par//sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma
11b6(dkon brtsegs): btang //rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tsom bcad du gsol//lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yon shing dgung ni rdi bA gyur lo//lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas na la rgyu mtsha
11b7(dkon brtsegs): bas gyur cig/mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang //rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni logs pa'i tshig mi gsung //de nas gnas brtan 'od bsrung chen pos
12a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshogasu bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du
12a2(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
12a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig byas thong shig/'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no//
12a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslad par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshen
12a5(dkon brtsegs): pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po la 'di
12a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to//'od bsrung de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o//gnas brtan 'od bsrung chen pos bcom ldan 'das lagaso zhes bcom
12a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od bsrung 'di na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting
12b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs te//de'i mthus phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba
12b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs mod/bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskul te/'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir lhags nas/de dag gis da bzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo ngas
12b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas te/ngal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/steng gi bar snang la ta la srid tsam ni pad+ma dag la 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
12b4(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthus/me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dge dang /phye ma'i cha re 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la sil snyan 'bum
12b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus/me tog gi char
12b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing sgra'i tshor dag dang /phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab laM/sil snyan 'dum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin no//gsal pa/bcom ldan
12b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi ganga'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus//
13a1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang byams pa chen po gang dang phan par 'dod pa gang /
13a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /spyod pa gang la gnas po dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab gang la gnas pa
13a3(dkon brtsegs): de la mi gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' gang la spyod pa'i bsam po de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya/
13a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzigs pa kho nar zad do//'od
13a5(dkon brtsegs): srung rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re shig mi mthong na/nyan thos
13a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad
13a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang /spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus thams
13b1(dkon brtsegs): /da par ga pa dab par 'thur lags/bcom ldan 'das skyes pa//'astsal pa/dang spyang byung chub sems dpa' ches bcu dang ldan na/byung chub sems dpa'i ng+ge ngas nas thams
13b2(dkon brtsegs): cang rnam par 'jig pa thob pa 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/lhag pa'i bsam pa 'i yang dag par 'jog pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /snyi chen po yongasu rdzogs
13b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
13b4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yong su tshol ba dang /lus dang srog kyang yongasu gtong na dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /chogs
13b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa yong su 'dzin cing /tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dpag tu
13b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yong su rdzogs par byed cing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang /bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la bkod nas/phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du
13b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus thams cad
14a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
14a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsung pa
14a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba ni/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos
14a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci 'tshal lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de lta bas na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
14a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug par mi nus te/ting 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la
14a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu
14a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/'ongs kyi bar du khyod re shig sdod cig dang /
14b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro//'od srung de lta mod kyi khyod nyid ting 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis/byang chub sems dpa' de
14b2(dkon brtsegs): dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas par rtags shig/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lamo ji lta bus gnas pa
14b3(dkon brtsegs): blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
14b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba yang ma shes de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes/ci byed pa dang /ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyis thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo //de nas bcom
14b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong
14b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so//bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lagaso//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
14b7(dkon brtsegs): thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shwa thob padag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan
15a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das rigs kyi bu dang /rigs bum su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi bskyed/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chubs sgra
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go chang tshal bar bgyid pa de ni/go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yong su btang
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin
15a4(dkon brtsegs): na/sems can gzhan dge gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu
15a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yin gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam//de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta
15a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ting 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing /rnam par langs kyang de dag gis mtshan ma yang shes par ma nuso//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te//
15a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag blta bar bya'o snyam//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi stobs
15b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas/ting 'dzin pa ni khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi 'ong ba dang /'gro ba yang ma shes/'greng ba yang ma mthong /'chag pa yang ma mthong /'dug pa yang ma
15b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong nyal ba yang ma mthong ste/de dag blta bar ma nus//de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
15b3(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan te/bdag zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnams thob pa lag pas/bcom
15b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri rnga tho che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs
15b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyur la/der mi la la zhig skyes nas der ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/bdag ti nge 'dzin la snyomapa zhugs ma thag tu mdun du mchis nas/sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal
15b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang /bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnams thob pa
15b7(dkon brtsegs): la re shig bskal pa 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gis rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na/des ting 'dzin de las spangs pa lta smos
16a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci 'tshal te/de ni gnas ma mchis lags na/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas/byang
16a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' nga dag blta ba'i slad du ting 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag mthong ste/de dag gi gnas kyang mi 'tshal lag so//bcom ldan 'das
16a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes de lta bu tshol ba na/sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par gyur kyang
16a4(dkon brtsegs): spro bar bgyi zhing /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongasu btang bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchi/
16a5(dkon brtsegs): par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing /de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongasu spong bar mi bgyid do//de
16a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa leg so leg so//rab 'byor gal te phung
16a7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag nyis kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bor ma gyur du zin na/khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du jug cing /bla na med pa
16b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyuraro//rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam
16b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang lag so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nan gyis dper byas te/gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge
16b3(dkon brtsegs): slong rab 'byor dang /shA ri'i bu dang /'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i
16b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nuso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos
16b5(dkon brtsegs): gogang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad tsog nas ma yin//bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni/lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams
16b6(dkon brtsegs): las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas 'di nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/byang
16b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/bdag gis lho 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snya mo//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/
17a1(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas/pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/sdod bu ni dbus/snying po ni rin po che pal gyi snying po/
17a2(dkon brtsegs): ze ba ni bai dUr+ya las byas pa/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bani mngon par sprul cing /pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
17a3(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/dpal dang ldan pa/kha dog dang ldan pa/gzi brjid dang ldan pa/'od gsal ba dag pa pad+ma'i snying po dgi dbus na skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs
17a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang mngon par sprul to//de nas pad+ma de dge rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'tha' bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phru
17a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs 'khor dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge
17a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya/snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha'i ris
17a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar dang /de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas/'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs
17b1(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji skyed pa thams cad du 'dod zhing sgra sgrogs par byed/dbyangs brjod par byed/yang dag par bskul bar byed de/byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsuM
17b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe/tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso//sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams//'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung //u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar//
17b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon//shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste//sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i//chos ni yang dag de ston mdzad//lha yi 'dod pa yi dga' la
17b4(dkon brtsegs): ji srid yun rings spyad byas la//gang du tshor ba myong gyur pa'i//ngan song rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur//ji srid 'dod pa rnams bstan pa//sred pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel//khams gsum 'khor ba'i
17b5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags la//bde ba yod pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang //khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni//gang dag bdag med mi rtogs pa//de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur//sangs
17b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas blta ba'i phyir dang la//chos kyi dam mnyan par gyis//'jig rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu//phyis dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing //'jigs tshan bdud kyi zhags
17b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//bag med spyod par byed rnams la//thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur/da ni 'di skad smra bar bya//bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang //sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i///
18a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos//gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i//'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtags par//sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med//
18a2(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin//skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis//tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//bskul ba bye ba spyad mdzad nas//ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni//gang la sems
18a3(dkon brtsegs): can mi dmigs shing //srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i//chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang //mthong bar dka' ba rab tu ston//rtag pa dang ni de bzhin du//chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing //mtshan
18a4(dkon brtsegs): ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos//srog chags rnams la ston par mdzad//gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i//stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang //smin pa byed pa ma yin pa'i//yang dag mtha'
18a5(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu ston//rtags med mtshan ma yod min zhing //skye med 'byung ba med pa dang //'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i//chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad//zag med 'byung ba yod min zhing ///
18a6(dkon brtsegs): rab bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang //bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa//ston dang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'//sems can gang yang skye med cing //'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin//
18a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa'ang gang yang med//sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin//skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang //skad la brten pa yod min ning //yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos//mi yi
18b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa ston par mdzad//gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing //chu dang ma yang mi dmigs la//sar yang rtog pa med pa'i chos//spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad//gdugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
18b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni//stong zhing phung po lnga po dag/dngos po med pa ston par mdzad//mig dang rna ba sna dang ni//lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid//rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang //
18b3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa de myang dmigasu med//gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang //ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba//de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed//rtag pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin//de ltar sangs rgyas skyobs pa
18b4(dkon brtsegs): ni//srog chags rnams la chos ston gyis//gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa//de dag rnams 'dren drung du gshegs//de nos byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong tshan
18b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigasu bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lho'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la
18b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rje su thob po/lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu sems skyeso//
18b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis/lha'i bu gang dag
19a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzal mamaH/a sha caHsa.a ma thams masam/a na thaH tha sa natha Sha sa namathamamamam Than/maya ya tha kham mamaH ya ma.aH ma yamaH tham pasam
19a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bskul ba de dag las/lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
19a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
19a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dekar po dang /man dar ba dang /man da ra ba chen po dang /phye ma dang /spos
19a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dbyug pa dag gis de bzhin gshugs pa la mngon par gtor te//steng gi bar snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to//de'i tshe yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i
19a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/gzi brjid tsha ba drag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtod tsam yang med pa de skad kyi lha'i bu
19a7(dkon brtsegs): dgra 'dus par gyur cing //gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to//de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /
19a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang /lha'i bu dri med dang /lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag
19b1(dkon brtsegs): ba shugs pa ga stag gis yongs bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyir ba nas 'an
19b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun bskor ba byas te/me tog man de ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab po//me tig man dar ba'i char de dag gis/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnasu me tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag tshad ba
19b3(dkon brtsegs): bkun nas gnas par gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs/ci lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis brlabs byin gyis brlabs pas
19b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i stang gi bar snang lo me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to//me tog gi 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
19b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste smon lam las byung ba'i stan la 'dug go//de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
19b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa gnyi la gtugs so//lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so///bam po gnyis pa/
19b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /shes
20a1(dkon brtsegs): par da//'a ba'i gzhi rnams dang /gnas pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /spros pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams dang /brjod du med pa'i
20a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang /brtan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang /bden po'i gzhi rnams dang /chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /mi phyed pa'i gzhi rnams dang /
20a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang /mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang
20a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang /mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang /chos
20a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhi rnams dang /dge 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang /ye shes yong su rdzogs pa 'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang /khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang /chos thams
20a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mi dmigs pa'i gzhi rnams dang /chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang /seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang /dpa' bo gzhi rnams dang /gzhi med pa'i
20a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi de dag bstan pa na snod du gyur pa ni su yod snyamo//de na yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag
20b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' pa maHsa sa mthamasamam a nathaH thas mthathathas mamatham thamamayammam
20b2(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa/zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyamo//de nas 'jam
20b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smraso//lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
20b4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo dang lhan cig tu dI ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces skyeso//'jam dpal
20b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te khyod gsung bar mi mdzad/brjod par mi mdzad/'don par yang mi mdzad/yi ge yang mi brjod/sgra yang mi bsan pa lta na/bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o//'jam
20b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/'dzin par mi byed/'chang bar mi byed/kun chub par mi byed/sems par mi byed/rig par mi byed/rnam par rig
20b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/len par mi byed/gtong bar mi byed cing /thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na/kho bos kyang de bzhin du bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i
20b8(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ga med pa/sems med pa/sems dang bral ba ste/gang gis ming brjod cing /ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'i phyiraro//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal
21a1(dkon brtsegs): /lha'i bu 'di dag ni/khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyis/sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi bka' mchis gsungs shig/'jam dpal
21a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod
21a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur la/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /srog tu 'dzin par dang /gang zag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de na/
21a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o//bdag ni nyan pa'o//'di ni bshad par bya'o//snyam du sems pas/de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/gsum gang zhe na/bdag
21a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dmigs pa dang /sems can du dmigs pa dang /chos dmigs pa'o//lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yong su dag pas chos ston par
21a6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/rnam par rtog par mi byed/sems par mi byed/rlom semasu mi byed do//de la 'khor gsum yong su dag pa gang zhe na/bdag tu dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed/rlom
21a7(dkon brtsegs): sem su mi byed/sems par mi byed pa dang /chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed/rlom semasu mi byed sems par mi byed pa dang /tshes dmigs pa med cing rnam
21b1(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par mi byed rlom semasu mi byed sems par mi byed pa ste/lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/mi mnyam pa ma yin no//lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis
21b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa lags legasaso//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu ci rung rnam parami rtog shig/byang chub sems dpa
21b3(dkon brtsegs): gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/byang chub kyang dmigasu med do//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal gang las ldog/'jam dpal gyis smras pa//
21b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go/zhe sdang las ldog go/gti mug las ldog go/sred pa las ldog go/ma rig pa las ldog go/'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis
21b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar las ldog go/rgyu las ldog go/lta ba las ldog go/ming las ldog go/gzugs las ldog go/'dod pa'i khams las ldog go/gzugs kyi khams las ldog/
21b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go/nyan thos kyi spyod pa las ldog go/rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldog go/rtog pa las ldog go/'dzin pa las ldog go/mtshan ma las
21b7(dkon brtsegs): ldog go/dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go/chad par lta ba las ldog go/rtag par lta ba las ldog go/blang ba las ldog go/dor ba las ldog go/bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go//
22a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma\u0f7fsa a na thamasamam/a mthaHthas mthas ma ma
22a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go//sgrog tu 'du shes pa las ldog go//gang zag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go//yid la byed pa dag las ldog go//chags pa dag la
22a3(dkon brtsegs): ldog go/phyin ci log dag las ldog go/'jig tshog lnga ldog gogro/'jig tshogs la lta ba las ldeg go/'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis lnga ldog go//sbring pa
22a4(dkon brtsegs): dge las ldog go/phung po lngar 'dzin pa las ldog go//phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams cad las ldog go//khams rnams las ldog go/sangs rgyasu 'ju shes pa las ldog go/
22a5(dkon brtsegs): cho su 'du shes pa las ldog go/dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog go/bdag sangs rgyasu 'gyur//bdag chos bston par 'gyuro//bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyuraro//
22a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro//bdag ye shes thob par 'gyuraro snyam pa'i 'du shes de dag las ldog go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do//sangs rgyas kyi
22a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do//dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do//mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi byed do///
22a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do//nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/lha'i bu de ltar byang
22b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal gang las mi ldog go/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog /
22b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid las mi ldog go/mtshan ma med pa lde mi ldog go/smon pa med pa las mi ldog go//de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go/chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go//yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog/
22b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yong su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa des
22b4(dkon brtsegs): na ldog pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/'on ta ma mchis pa zhig gam/'on ta mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/'on
22b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa yang ma lags ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa zhig legs/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin/med pa yang ma
22b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin/yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa pa ma/lce'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'on gang las ldog/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu/
22b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/yongasu gtong bar mi byed/mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i
23a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ldog pa zhes byas te/de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/med par yang bstan par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog
23a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/de ni skyon du gyur pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na rtag par 'gyur la/med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir
23a3(dkon brtsegs): ro//de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtog pa'i phyir yang ma yin//
23a4(dkon brtsegs): chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no//lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o//zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongasu shes par zad kyi/de la
23a5(dkon brtsegs): ni chud pa yong med/rtag yang med/lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas
23a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blto ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi
23a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /zhu ba dang zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegaso//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu rnam par rtogs ma spyod cig/de
23b1(dkon brtsegs): byizhon ga shegs pa don kha bos blangs zin no//lha'i zlas smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang nu bzhugs/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu da ni kho ba'i mngon na ban+d+ha/
23b2(dkon brtsegs): so//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de mi gda'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na/des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//
23b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci slad du de skad ces/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin te/de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhug so zhes gsung /'jam dpal gyis smras pa
23b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/kho bo'i mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal na mkha'i khams lag so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu
23b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/nu mkha'i khams yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir na mkha' ji lta bu yin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa
23b6(dkon brtsegs): yang de lta bu yin pas/na mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyisu med de gnyisu byar med pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bu de lte bas na/khyod de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod na/mtha'
23b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di khong du chud par bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par rtag par mi bya'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ka ba bzhi pa che mnyam pa
24a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'byes pa/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis stong mngon par sprul to//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam shing las
24a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing /khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lu sa gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to//de na
24a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ci lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs nas/'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis brlabs pos/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
24a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spyod pa'i pad+ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
24a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing /phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do//
24a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas pad+ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang khang pa brtsegs pa dag nA 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad
24a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyings mthun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//gang 'ga' bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod
24b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod//byang chub mchog gi spyod pa btsal mdzad pas//de slad myi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags//thub pa mtshan gyis yongasu spras gyur pa//sku mchog srid pa gsum na
24b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ste//'dren pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni//gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston//rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad//bzod dang btsun 'grus de bzhin bsam
24b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan bsten//khyod kyis shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'//ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshalo//gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i//'jig rten 'dren pa
24b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing //stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa yi//mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur//gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang //gang dag phyogs rnams
24b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag/de dag gis ni mtshan med stong pa'i chos//rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgom sde//'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni//skye
24b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chi ba dmigasu ma mchis shing //'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te//chos rnams thams cad na mkha' ji bzhin no//ci ltar mi yis sgyu mu brtan gyur pa//snang/
24b7(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar//de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang //rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan//gang zag la las gaN+DI'i bye snyed kyi//'jig
25a1(dkon brtsegs): /rten khams rnams 'dir ni skyon byas dang //'dus byas spyod par bzod pa gang lags pa//bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags//byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
25a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yis//bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du//me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas//gang gis gang la ming dang srog dang ni//
25a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag/thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod thob pa//de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags//gang la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis//skal pa bya
25a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mang por zas skom dang //shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyid kyang //des ni 'gro ba grol bar mi thob po//mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang //de dag gis kyang sems can ma
25a5(dkon brtsegs): bkrol ba//mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi//chos rnams da ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol//sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang //de bzhin bstan
25a6(dkon brtsegs): la dad pa thob pa dka'//mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par bka' bas na//rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis//mi lom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing //khom pa/
25a7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum rnyed dka' thob 'gyur la//bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i//mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor sbyong //sgra la 'tshal zhing 'dug par ma byed par
25b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis//khyed kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas brten la//des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos//chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin bsten gyis la//sdig pa'i
25b2(dkon brtsegs): phrogs la lan 'ga'ang ma bstan cig/sems can kun lnga sems ni mnyam gyis la/sems can de la nam yang ma rlom shig/tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la//rtag tu phyag
25b3(dkon brtsegs): dang khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod//g.yel ba med par shing drung bsten gyis la//bskus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig/'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min//mtshan nyid/
25b4(dkon brtsegs): cig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yi//dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la//myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis//phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos//nang gi skye mched drug
25b5(dkon brtsegs): dang phyi yi drug/de dag grong stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na//de la nam yang bsten par ma byed cig/'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid//gti mug nga rgyal yongasu rtog pas
25b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed//rtog pa de yang ma byung 'byung med par//de ltar shis na 'dren pa rnamasu 'gyur//de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshig su bcad pa de dag smras pa na/'khor de las srog chags te/
25b7(dkon brtsegs): khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo//dge slong sum brgya ni chos
26a1(dkon brtsegs): /rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//dge sbyong ma sum stong yang chus rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par
26a2(dkon brtsegs): dag go/dge bsnyen 'dun stong dang /dge bsnyen ma stong dang /lha'i bu'i khri bdun stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par drag go/byang chub
26a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/g.yos rab
26a4(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yoso/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i
26a5(dkon brtsegs): bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
26a6(dkon brtsegs): lus gzugs padra ma dag dang /khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang /'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab par
26a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang /lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
26b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ma.ams samathasamama.a mtham thas mas mthas tham yas \u0f7f
26b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'dri dag kun du snang ngo //da
26b3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong su bsgrub
26b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu zhing zhu blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom
26b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khob tu rin mi goda'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA
26b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu khyod re shig sdod cig dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/de'u re bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang /bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon
26b7(dkon brtsegs): cing /bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'a khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
26b8(dkon brtsegs): tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas
26'a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mob mog por gyur to//bdud
26'a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khog par gyur nas/lag pa 'khar ba la brtan cing 'gro bar gyur to//de dag gis lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing
26'a3(dkon brtsegs): btugs la 'khogs par gyur pa dang /rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang rnyings shing rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa mthong ngo //de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag
26'a4(dkon brtsegs): cing bsdangs la yi chud cing sgyid lug ste/spu'i khung pu zing zhes byed par gyur nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gan
26'a5(dkon brtsegs): skabasu gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/rkyen ni gang yin/bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa 'am/gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snya mo//bdud de dag gis rnam par rtog
26'a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu de skyes ma thag tu/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do//de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag
26'a7(dkon brtsegs): gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur chung zhes bya ba de da ltar bdud kyi dkyil
26'b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/khyed la 'tshe ba gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis ma skrag shig lha'i bu sprul
26'b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis smra de yang thos//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas yang rgya cher bsdangs shing
26'b3(dkon brtsegs): skrag ste/bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos//de nus bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa dI dag la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag yongasu skyobs
26'b4(dkon brtsegs): shig/de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di tsas smras//grogs po dag yongasu ma'i shes shig/khyed cag deng laM bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs
26'b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song shig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams
26'b6(dkon brtsegs): la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad de//de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te//de na dud sdig can 'khor bdud rtsi/na 'bum phrag thar 'bum
26'b7(dkon brtsegs): du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs shing leg pa 'khar ba la brten bzhinani du 'do zhing skad cig tha~Mng cig yud tsam cig le/bcom ldan 'das de
27a1(dkon brtsegs): mngatha' ya mamam maHsa sa na thamasamama.a mthaH thas maHthas mamatham thamamaya yas thamayam maHma shas/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): /bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lkugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad 'dun
27a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di dag las yongasu bskyab tu gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyabs du gsol/
27a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa ni mi mngon legs kyi/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lag so//de
27a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur pa'i ming thos na bdag cag 'jigs shing sngangs la skrag par gyur te/'chi 'phro ba snyam du 'tshal cing ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam
27a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bdud sdig can dag de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/
27a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongasu smin pa dang /rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang /byed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
27a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas/de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming yongasu bsgrags pa de ltar/sangs rgyas bye ba
27b1(dkon brtsegs): drag 'bum gyi mtshan yongasu bsgrags pas ni khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
27b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag 'di lta bu'i lus 'kho shos pa 'dis nyam thag cing ngo tsha lags pas/bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lag so///
27b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig 'di nyid du sdod cig dang /des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongasu thar par
27b4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te stan las langs nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phyug du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du
27b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dar/lce'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /me 'am ci dang /lto 'bye min po 'bum phrag du me sil snyan 'bul
27b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po dag rab tu bsil zhing /me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stog gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te
27b7(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa chen po dang /rnam par rtse ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la
28a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan ga/mya bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'jug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'ja
28a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
28a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das snyoms par 'jug lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/khyod
28a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ting 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ji srid cig loni/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bo dag gis ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos shing /bad
28a5(dkon brtsegs): gis ting 'dzin de bsgribs pa de'i tshe na/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam
28a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyis gang las ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de 'i tshan ci/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das
28a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus skal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i tshe/de'i dus na/de bzhin
28b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khru lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi
28b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/de ting 'dzin bsgrubs pa de gsung bar gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
28b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos lagasaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal bsgrubs pa de dag gang yin/'jam dpal gyis
28b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan nA bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting 'dzin de thob ste/nyi shu gang zhe na/
28b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam pare 'jig cing 'dod chags kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /zhe sdang rnam par 'jig cing zhe sdang gi/
28b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /gti mug rnam par 'jig cing gti mug gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /phrag dog rnam par 'jig cing phrag dog gi sems rnam
28b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /nga rgyal rnam par 'jig cing nga rgyal gyi sems rna 'jig par bgyid pa dang /'chab pa rnam par 'jig cing 'chab pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid
29a1(dkon brtsegs): padang /zhwa rnam nga gang na pa'i smon pa rnam par 'dug par rjod pa dang /yo sngag du rnam par gro/rlung yangs gang du ba'i sgoms na dru /
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par bgyid pa dang /'du shes rnam par 'jig cing 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /lha ba rnam par 'jig cing lta ba'i sems rna ga par bgyid
29a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /rtog pa rnam par 'jig cing rtag pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /len pa rnam par 'jig cing len pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par babyed pa dang /
29a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa rnam par 'jug cing 'dzin pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing mtshan ma'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /
29a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnam par 'jig cing skyid pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /rtag pa rnam par 'jig cing rtag pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /chad pa
29a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig cing chud pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /phung po rnam par 'jig cing phung po'i sems rnam par 'jog par bgyid pa dang /khams rnam par
29a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig cing khams kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /skye mched rnam par 'jig cing skye mched kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /khams gsum pa
29b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig cing khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin/
29b2(dkon brtsegs): de thob po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
29b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ma mchis pa dang /zab pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob po//
29b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de thob skye/bzhi gang zhe na/slu ba ma mchis pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gis dam 'cha' ba
29b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /'du shes kyi dbang gi spyod yul ma lags pa dang /chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de
29b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob po//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thib ste/bzhi gang zhe na/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /sdig
29b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po spong ba dang /sbyangs pa dang tshul khrims dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa dang /'du 'ji ma mchis par spyod pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
30a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob bo//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na//
30a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /tshul khrims ma ral pa dang /tshul khrims mi brten pa dang /tshul khrims nag nog ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
30a3(dkon brtsegs): chu zhi po de dag dang ldan na ting 'dzin 'thob bo//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob ste/bzhi do na ni/nyan thos kyi
30a4(dkon brtsegs): sems yong su spong ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la lhag par mi dmigs pa dang /bzod pa la gnas pa dang /sem can la rlom sems ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das
30a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ti nge 'dzin de 'thob bo//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 'dzin de 'thob ste/bzhi
