59b2(dkon brtsegs): bong ba yang ma yin/dbyug pa yang thogs par mi byed pa de ltar na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs
59b3(dkon brtsegs): te de skad ston/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sems can sems can zhes bya ba ci yin par shes/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sems can sems can zhes bgyi
59b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'di lta ste ming tsam dang /'dzin pa'i 'du shes tsam lag so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de lta bas ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o//sems
59b5(dkon brtsegs): can du 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o//srog tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o//gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i 'du shes gsad par bya'o//ming du 'dzin pa'i 'du
59b6(dkon brtsegs): shes gsad par bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal cis dgum par bgyi/'dzom dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu shes rab kyi mtshon gyi gsad par bya ste/shes
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mtshon des kyang /ci nas kyang 'dzin pa med pa dang /gcod pa med pa de ltar gzung bar bya zhing /de ltar gsad par bya'o//lha'i bu rnam grangs des ni khyod kyis 'di
60a1(dkon brtsegs): lhar gang gis bdag gi 'du shes pa dang /sems can gyi 'du shes gsad bya des/sems can thams cad gsad pa yin par rog par byad/
60a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smraso//lha'i bu gal te khyod mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag
60a3(dkon brtsegs): par blangs te 'jug cing /nag po'i phyogs thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na/kho bo khyod
60a4(dkon brtsegs): dang tshangs pa btsun par spyod 'dod do//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad ston/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu nag po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa
60a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa des de mnyam par nyed yin pas/mnyam pa nyid du 'jug par de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod do//lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/nag
60a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyogs kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin snyam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal bya ba ma mchis pa dang /lhag par bya ba mi bgyid pa lagaso//'jam dpal gyis smras
60a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs shes bya ba gang yin snyam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /rnam
60b1(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste/de ni dkar po'i phyogs lpags s+ho//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyis sgrub par nus sam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal dran
60b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de'i phyir kha bo ni de las bsams nas/de skad ces gol te khyod nig po'i phyogs thams cad kyi minyam pa nyid kyis dkar po'i
60b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs thams cad yang dag par blangs te 'jug par byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros
60b4(dkon brtsegs): rib gnas la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smra so//lha'i bu gal te khyed bsad pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo lo mtshan gyis 'debs par byed pa de lta na kho bo khyed dang tshangs pa mtshungs
60b5(dkon brtsegs): par spyod 'dong ngo //lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs nas de skad stan/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gsang shan shes bya ba de god zhe na/lha'i bu 'dod chags
60b6(dkon brtsegs): ni bsod pa zhes bya'o//zhe sdang dang /gti mug ni gsod pa zhes bya'o//nga rgyal dang /khro ba dang /'chab pa dang /phrag dog dang /sgra dang /g.yo dang /ser sna dang /lhag par
60b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang /mtshan ma dang /nye bar len pa dang /'du shes dang /tshor bo ni gsad pa zhes bya ste/lha'i bu de dag ni bsad pa yin par gsungs//lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pa
61a1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed de/zhi bar byed /rab tu zhi bar byed pa de la ni myong bar snang bas mi sdug pa la 'jug par mi byeng par sems/
61a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ga la skyes/gang du 'gag/yul gangs chagos par 'gyur/gang gis chags par 'gyur zhes 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid kyi 'byung ba dang /'jig pa la so sor rtog
61a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do//de de ltar so sor rtog par byed pa na/'dod chags kyang mi dmigs/gang la chags par 'gyur ba dang /glang gis chags par 'gyur ba de yang mi dmigaso///
61a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe mi dmigs pa de'i tshe mi len to//gang gi tshe mi len pa de'i tshe mi 'dor ro//gang gi tshe mi 'dor ba de'i tshe mi 'dzin mi spong ste de ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o//
61a5(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /khro ba dang /'chab pa dang /phrag drog dang /sgyu dang /g.yo dang /ser sna dang /lhag par 'dzin pa dang /mtshan ma dang /nye bor len pa
61a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /'du shes dang /tshar po'i sems la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/lha'i bu gang ga sad pa de lta bu skyes ma thig tu gsod par byed pa de ni gasrung pa dang po phyir byung ba de'i mgo
61a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshon gyis 'debs pa zhes bya ste/de'i phyir kho bo ni de la sa bsams nas de skad ces ston to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la gzhan
61b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di skad ces smras//lha'i bu gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed/chos mnyes par mi byed/dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang 'tshangs pa mtshungs
61b2(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod 'dod do//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpol ci las dgongs te de skad ston/'jam dpol gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba ci zhig yin pa
61b3(dkon brtsegs): shas/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings lag so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du semaso//de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi
61b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings mnyes par byar nus snyam mam/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lagaso//'jam dpal gyis smos pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces
61b5(dkon brtsegs): gal te khyod sangs rgyas mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to//lha'i bu chos chos shes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/lha'i bus
61b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /chos nyid lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'dod chags
61b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba nyid dang /chos nyid mnyes par byar nus snyam 'am/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lagaso//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni de las
62a1(dkon brtsegs): /bsams nas de skad ces/grul te khyad chos mnyes par mi byed ba de lta na khog khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dong nga nas ston to//lha'i bu dge 'dun du/
62a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par shes/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni 'dus ma bgyis kyis rab tu phye ba legs pas bcom ldan 'das
62a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'dus ma bgyis lags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'dus ma byas mnyes par nus snyam 'gre/lha'i
62a4(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma lag so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces/gal te khyod dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de
62a5(dkon brtsegs): lta na kho bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to//lha'i bu gzha nga shang sangs rgyas dmigs pa de ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed do//grang cho su dmig
62a6(dkon brtsegs): pade ni chos mnyes par byed do//gang dge 'dun du dmigs pa de ni dge 'dun mnyes par byed//lha'i bu gang sangs rgyasu mi dmigs pa dang /chos su mi dmigs po de
62a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun du mi dmigs pa des ni sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/des ni chos mnyes par ma byas/des ni dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa kho na yon//de ci'i phyir zhe na
62b1(dkon brtsegs): de de dag ma dmigs pas na/des mnyas par ma byas pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang dag spangs rgyas la chags pa dang /chos la cha gras pa dang /dge 'dun la chags pa de/
62b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par byas/chos mnyos par byos/dge 'dun mnyes par byas pa yin no//gang dag gis sangs rgyas ma dmyigs pa de dag ni sangs rgyasar+b+ba 'a
62b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gis sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas ga stan no//gang dag gis chos ma dmigs pa de dag na chos la chags pa med pas de dag gis chos mnyes par mi byas pa yin no//
62b4(dkon brtsegs): gong gis dge 'dun ma dmigs pa de dag ni dge 'dun la chags pa med pas de dag gis dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa yin no//lha'i bu mnyes par ma byas pa mo nyes ba ma
62b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa zhes bya ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas yin no//da ni kun du sbyor ba dang bral ba'i gnas yin no//de ni rnam par bshigs pa'i gnos yin no//de ni
62b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang bral ba'i gnas yid//de ni ma byung ba'i gnas sbyini//de ni rnam par nges pa'i gnas yin/de ni yid byung bar mthus pa'i gnas yin pas dang phyir
62b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par ma byas pa zhes bya ste/lha'i bu de'i phyir khe bo ni de las bsams nas de skad ces/gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang /che sa dang /dge 'dun mnyes par mi byed pa de lta na
63a1(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 'dod do zhes ston to//de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
63a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal 'di ltar ji tsam du zab mo'i gnas dgo ston par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/bdag cag gis khyod la bgyis pa bzo bar bgyi'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
63a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khyod byas pa bzo bar ma byed cig/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'o na ci bgyis pa mi bzo bar bgyi 'am/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu de de bzhin
63a4(dkon brtsegs): te/lha'i bu khyod byas pa mi bzo bar byos la byas pa bzo bar ma byed cig/lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci khyod bgyis pa mi bzo lags sam/'jam dpal
63a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa//lha'i bu de de bzhin to/kho bo ni byas pa mi bzo bo yin gyi byas pa bzo ba ma yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las dgongs te de skad
63a6(dkon brtsegs): ston/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu byis pa rnams ni rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pas na/byis pa rnams ni gzhan dang gzhan dag gis byed pa po ste/gang
63a7(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa bzo ba zhes bya'o//lha'i bu yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dag ni bya ba 'am mi bya ba
63b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi byed de/gang gi tshe mi byed pa de'i phyir de dag ni byas pa mi bzo ba zhes bya'o//ji skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni bya ba med
63b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/byed pa med pa/lhag par byed pa med pa ste/mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' la gzhan len par yang mi byed/bya ba gzhan yang mi byed pas mnyam pa nyid yino zhes
63b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas na/de'i phyir byas pa mi bzo ba zhes bya'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod bzod pa 'am/'on te chos nyid dam/gang la gnas te de skad ston/
63b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu bzod pa la yang ma yin/chos nyid la yang ma yin no//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal 'o na khyod gang las gnas te de skad ston
63b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas pa la'o//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus gang la gnas/'jam
63b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus ni de bzhin nyid gang la gnas pa de la gnas so//lha'i bu gzhan yi de de skad ces khyod bzod pa 'am/'on te chos
63b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dam/gang la gnas te de skad ston ces zer ba ni/lha'i bu bzod pa zhes bya ba ni ming ste/ming la ni gnas par mi nus//chos nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rtog pa med
64a1(dkon brtsegs): /ste/de la yang gnas med do//lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad gang la gnas te ston par byed pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te ston par
64a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te ston la/sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ste/sems can thams
64a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyisu med pa'i phyir ro//de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis
64a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi na/ji tsam gyis ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bgyi/'jam dpal
64a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams la
64a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi chags/gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi chags pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra zhing /lha'i bu gang mig las mi 'dzag/rna ba las
64a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzag/sna las mi 'dzag/lce las mi 'dzag/lus las mi 'dzag/yid las mi 'jog pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo/smra la/lha'i bu gang la gnas
64b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing gnas par gdags pa med pa dang /kun du gnas med cing kun du gnas par grangagus pa med pa de ni dge sbyong yino zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir dang /lha'i bu gang las kyang ma 'o//
64b2(dkon brtsegs): glagang du yang mi 'gro la/rma med cing rma dang bral ba de ni bram ze yin zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir//gang dag dge sbyong yong ma yin/bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang bram ze
64b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig de bstan pa de ni de yin no//de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa/mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa
64b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag de dung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/gnas shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/byang chub sems dpa' di dag gis sngon pha gsad pa dang //
64b5(dkon brtsegs): ma gsad pa dang /dgra bcom pa gsad pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran cing /de dag la lam gyi rnam par smin pa de'i las kyi lhag ma yod pas/de dag sems yongasu gdung pa des chos
64b6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo dag la mi bzod cing /bdag nyid la brten te rnam par rtog pa kho nar byed de/de dag gi 'di lta ste chos la bzod pa ma thob pas kun nas ldang ba de rnam par gnon par mi nus//
64b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems bsdu bar mdzad//de nas 'jam dpal
65a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa spyan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas lag pa g.yas pas ral gri blangs te legs par bdar nus/bcom ldan 'dra/
65a2(dkon brtsegs): ga la bde log su brgyug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to//'jam dpal nga ni gsang zin cing legs par
65a3(dkon brtsegs): bsad zin gyis thong shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal skyes bu gang zagagis gang gi tshe bsod snyam po'i sems bskyed par byed pa'i sems skyes pas/yun
65a4(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas bsad pa'i phyir//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga dag 'di snyam du sems te/chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/'di la bdag gam/sems can nam/
65a5(dkon brtsegs): srog gam/gang zag gAm/shed las skyes sam/shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do//'di la pha yang med/ma yang med/sangs rgyas kyang med/chos kyang med/
65a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun yang med/'di la gang mtshams mod par byed par 'gyur ba yang 'ga' yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa
65a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzangs pa yid bzhungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa zab mo la bzod pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag meng pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
65b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ci lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/yang dag par smra ba/de bzhin gshegs pa//
65b2(dkon brtsegs): le gus pa dang bcas pa yin no//de mtshan rnon po thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der rgyug cing /de bzhin gshegs pa yang de skad ces 'jam dpal nga ni gsad zin//
65b3(dkon brtsegs): cing nye par dgas zin gyis zong gi ga sde gsungs pa'i phyir te/gal te 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang /chos re shes bya ba dang /dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang /pa zhes bya ba dang /ma zhes bya ba dang /
65b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba'i chos ther zug tu gnas pa 'ga' zhig yongasu 'grub par 'gyur na ni mtshams med par 'dzin pa de la nges par 'byung ba yang yod par mi 'gyur
65b5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig na/gang gis phyir chos de dag ni med la/log pa yang dag pa ma yin par bzung ba/stong pa sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir/'di la gang byed par 'gyur ba'am
65b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do snyam//byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gis de ltar shes pas/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/
65b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dgo' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/mngon par 'phags naso bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa
66a1(dkon brtsegs): /'di dag gis mngon par bstod de//chas kun sgyu mu lta bu ste//yongs rtog pa kun nas bskyed//'di la grub pa ma mchis te//chos 'di thams cad stong pa lags//
66a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu 'du shes rmongs pa rnams//log par yangs rtog par bgyi//sngon gyi mthar ni mi bzad pa'i//sug las bgyis pa de yang dran//tshe rabs snga ma rnamasu ni//pha ma
66a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas bkum gyur cing //dge slong dgra bcom bkum pa yi//sug las shin tu mi bzad bgyis//sug las daM yi rnam smin gyis//sdug bsngal tshe rab myong gyur zhing //
66a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa skyes par gyur pa ni/chos thos pas na rnam dag gyur//grags chen zug rngu 'byin pa yis//bdag cag 'gyod pa gsal mdzad pas//gang la nyon mongs ma ma
66a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i//chos dbyings rjesu rtogs par gyur//sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa ste//thub pa thabs kyi mkhyen pa mnga'//thabs des sems can thams cad kyi//'gyod/
66a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni rnam par gsal//chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na//'di la sangs rgyas chos dang yang //dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di la ni//pha ma ma mchis dgra bcom min
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te//'gum pa 'ga' yang mchis ma lags//mnyam nyid ci bzhin 'byung ba ste//de ni chos rnams mtshan nyid lags//'jam dbyangs shes
66b1(dkon brtsegs): rab chen po pa//chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis//mtshan ma rnon pa thogs nas ni//sangs rgyas gal bzhugs par brgyugs//sangs rgyas ci bzhin mtshan de bzhin//de dag gnyis
66b2(dkon brtsegs): glu mtshan nyid gcig/mi skye 'byung ba ma mchis te//'di la 'gum pa 'ga' ma mchis//mtshon thogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na phyugs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
66b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma stod dag rnam pa drug tu rab g.yos shing /sa chen po g.yos pa yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te//de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khyams kyi sangs
66b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag la rang ring gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das gang gis
66b5(dkon brtsegs): dog sa chen po g.yos pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams
66b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba chos ston to//'jig rten gyi khams mi mang
66b7(dkon brtsegs): der byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa cig 'jug pa des/'di lta ste/byang chub
67a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir shes rab kyi ra la grwa'i mtshan rnon pa thags te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshek+kas b+had+d+hashA thub myu //
67a2(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de log su brgyug so//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ci nas kyang sems can dpag tu mang po dag mig rnam
67a3(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa dang /sems rnam par grol ba dang /bzod pa skyes pa dang /byang chub la zhugs par gyur po de lta de ltar chos bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis can
67a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khor de na sems can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa mang ba gang dag 'khong pa de dag gis mtshan de mi mthong zhing /chos bstan pa de yang mi
67a5(dkon brtsegs): zos pa de ltar byin gyis brlab so//de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so//'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa bgrongs pa'i
67a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtul ba'i las mi bzad pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyod la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun po shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ji skad
67a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin te/kho bos las mi bzad pa de lta bu ni byas ni/de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas ni mi shes//btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar mod kyi sgyu ma'i skyes
67b1(dkon brtsegs): las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//de ni'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa sha ri'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/chos tha ma
67b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir//btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar/de btsun pa nyid la dris/khyod ci ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig/btsun pa mtshon dmigasu yod dam/
67b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin no//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa las dmig su yod dam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal po na ma yin no//
67b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa rnam par smin pa dmigasu yod dam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yino//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i
67b5(dkon brtsegs): du mtshon yang med/las kyang med/rnam par smin pa yang med na/'o na las de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/shA ri'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyi bsams pa des
67b6(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa ltar na/las de ni gang du yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad las med pa/rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir//de nas bcom
67b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pa
68a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu mchi zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu chos ston par 'gyur ba de ltar thugs brtse bas spro bar mdzad du gas
68a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu dag khyod cag bye rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu ltos shig/de na
68a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu blta so//bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas 'jam
68a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan pa yang thos/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug cing /lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi
68a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dri dam chos ston pa dang /de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de snying dang /lha'i bu 'dus pa de snyan kyang mthong ngo /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal
68a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kyang mi g.yo la/thams cad du yang de bzhin nye bar ston pa ni ngo mtshar to//ngo mtshar to snyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to///
68a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma shin tu bslangs pa'i phyir
68b1(dkon brtsegs): stan las kyang mi g.yo la gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par bslabs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'i chos
68b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji skad du de bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyed du sbrul po da/sprul tha yod/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom
68b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'jom dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa
68b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
68b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang 'dra'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yod ches pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang
68b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni 'dra ba yin no//'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin lags te/de na stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba la bAs//de ni mtshon ma ma mchis pa
68b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags//nga ni smon pa ma mchis pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so//de ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de lta ma 'dre ba lan so//de ni chos kyi dbyis ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag
69a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so//de ni mnyam pa nyid ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags//da ni rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags//ngan/
69a2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa ci lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'dul 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ci nas kyang
69a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par 'gyur zhing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab
69a4(dkon brtsegs): tu gsol/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed pa de thams cad gri bkrol bar sgra grag cing /shing ldan
69a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs dag rab tu rgyas la lhags par gyur to//rdzing bu dag nas kyang pad+ma mang po rab tu 'thon par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
69a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to//lha bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang /
69a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas me tog gi tshor dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing /phye ma dang /spos dang /me tokau phreng dang /byug pa'i char dag
69b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu 'beb so//sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsal zhing lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag kyang bsgrags nas thams cad kyi thal mo sbyar ba btud de/kha mthun par tshig 'di skad ces/a
69b2(dkon brtsegs): la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa'i chos/a la la chos/'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba yang mthong ngo //sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs
69b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos pa dang /thos nas kyang mos pa de dag ni/dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma yin no//gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par ma 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal
69b4(dkon brtsegs): ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos
69b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snga ltas byung ba 'di dag byung ba las na/'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyod par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal
69b6(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir snga ltas byung ba 'di dag yin no//'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring
69b7(dkon brtsegs): du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
70a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang /badren pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na
70a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par gyur cig/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma mchis pa dang /sems can ma mchis pa dang /srog ma
70a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang /gang zag ma mchis pa dang /shed las skyes ma mchis pa dang /shad bu ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis
70a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
70a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang /zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang /gti mug ma mchis pa dang /ming ma mchis pa dang /gzugase ma mchis pa dang /rgyu ma mchis pa dang /lta ba
70a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang /srid pa ma mchis pa dang /srid pa yongasasu 'tshal ba ma mchis pa dang /lus ma mchis pa dang /lusu gdags pa ma mchis pa dang /sems ma mchis
70a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sems su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang /dran pa ma mchis pa dang /dran par bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag ma mchis pa dang /gzhag pa
70b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang /nye bar gzhag pa ma mchis pa dang /gzugs ma mchis pa dang /tshor ba ma mchis pa dang /'ang shes ma mchis pa dang /'du byed ma mchis pa dang /rnam par shes pa
70b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang /mig ma mchis pa dang /gzugs ma mchis pa dang /rna ba ma mchis pa dang /sgra ma mchis pa dang /sna ma mchis pa dang /dri ma mchis pa dang /lci ma mchis pa dang /
70b3(dkon brtsegs): ro ma mchis pa dang /lus ma mchis pa dang /rag bya ma mchis pa dang /yid ma mchis pa dang /chos ma mchis pa dang /'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang /gzugs kyi khams ma
70b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang /gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang /'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang /chad pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
70b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du bzhugs pa ma mchis pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
70b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma
70b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang /dgra bcom po ma mchis pa dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /rang sangs rgyas ma mchis pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis
71a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang /stobs rnams mu mchis pa dang /mi 'jigs
71a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ma mchis pa dang /ye shes ma mchis pa dang /rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang /stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis
71a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ma mchis pa dang /rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang /'thob pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /mngon par rtogs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang /rigs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang /'gram ma mchis pa dang /pha rol ma mchis pa dang /tshu rol ma mchis pa dang /thar
71a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa dang /ming ma mchis pa dang /ming du gdags pa ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na
71a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar ma grol/mi sbyor/mi grol ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshe
71a7(dkon brtsegs): des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na spyad par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsa
71b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma bkrol/yongasu mya ngan las ma bzlas/de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma brnyes/ma bshig/chos 'dra//
71b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma bskyed/ma bkag/rnam par ma bshig/ma bskyod pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang grwal
71b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur/yongasu mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang brnyes par mi 'gyur/'jig par mi 'gyur/chos 'ga' bskyed par mi 'gyur/'gog par mi
71b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur/bskyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga'
71b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'grol/yongasu mya ngan las mi bzlo/de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi brnyes/mi 'jig/chos 'ga' yang mi bskyed/mi 'gog/rnam par mi 'jig/mi bskyod pa'i
71b6(dkon brtsegs): badren pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha min spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bston pa
71b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la chung zad kyang ma smras ma brjod/ma bshad ma bstan/ma brtags/mi bsgragaso/ma bsnyad ma smos ma bzlas shing /chos bstan pa 'di la yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod
72a1(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang ma mnyan/'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/'ga' yang rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam
72a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di la tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang /tshul
72a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi nas ma mchis pa dang /shes rab ma mchis pa dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ma mchis pa dang /rnam
72a4(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba ma mchis pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma na 'dzam+bu'i
72a5(dkon brtsegs): glirmizi pyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/tshul khrims bsrung bar mi bgyid/bzod pa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs par mi bgyid/brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid/bsam gtan rnams bsgom par mi bgyod/shes rab spyod par mi bgyid/byang chub don du gnyer bar mi bgyid//
72a7(dkon brtsegs): yong dag pa la 'jug par mi bgyid/byang chub thob par mi bgyid/stobs rnams thob par mi bgyid/mi 'jig so pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/dbang po rnams thob par
72b1(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi 'gyid/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi bgyid/sems can grol bar mi bgyid/smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des
72b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par gyur cig/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
72b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang
72b4(dkon brtsegs): lags/rkyen ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i
72b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na ma legs kyis thong shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
72b6(dkon brtsegs): to/bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams
72b7(dkon brtsegs): pachos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa bzhis bstan te/thams cad du yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lho'i durma
73a1(dkon brtsegs): gros rab gnas kyis zhus//byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jam pal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis rnam grangs 'di zos
73a2(dkon brtsegs): nas ji srid cig lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis skal pa grangs med pa phrag 'bum 'das pa nas/de bzhin gshegs pa kun
73a3(dkon brtsegs): nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa sang+ge'i rtsal gyi yon tan phung po zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sems can gang+gA'i
73a4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso//de'i nyis bsgyur snyed kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob po/de'i nyis bsgyur snyed ni chos rnams
73a5(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lha'i
73a6(dkon brtsegs): ba blo gros rab gnas dang /de ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha'i bu de dag dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /lha dang /mi dang /
73a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
73b1(dkon brtsegs): blangs lan ts+tshang byu brgyub las sgra bun b+h+yas ra gnas su smras pa zhes bya ba y-iSh+Ta/'dus pa sam+b+ha r+thA DU d+hAH b+h+yaHnas////rgyag dgyim khan pa su na dab du dang /blang m+bu/
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha bzhong ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/bam po ba ni shi lo ka steng nyes brgya//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya sid d+ha pa ra~M bIng
73b3(dkon brtsegs): ts+tsha nA ma ma hA ya na smr-i tra/bod skad du/'phags pa seng+ges zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di
73b4(dkon brtsegs): snyistong bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'dus rgyal po'i khab nA byA rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis bid+ma lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
73b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//rgyal ba gleng zags mtshungs pa med//rgyal ba
73b6(dkon brtsegs): mA skyes dgra yi bu//seng ge zhes ni grags pa cig/tshong dpon bu me lnga brgya yis//mdun du bdar ti lhan cig tu//rgyal po'i khabo nas de byung nas//rgyal po'i 'byor po chen
73b7(dkon brtsegs): yis//gser las byas pa'i gdugs thogs te/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gon song ras//zhibs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//lnga brgya po'i gdugs do dag/tshang por thub pa che
74a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga phul//kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yis ni//de dag mi 'jigs skyes gyur nas//seng ges thul mo sbyar byas te//
74a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la zhus pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang //de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs//gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags//gang gis brdzus te skye bar 'gyu
74a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur//thub pa chen po lung ba ston gsol//de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis//mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa//byang chub sems dpo'i spyod
74a4(dkon brtsegs): gong zhes//khyod kyis dris pa de bstan te//bzod pa yis ni mdzes par 'gyur//tshangs par spyad pas brdzus te skye//chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran//gzhon nu de ltar shes par
74a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis//gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang //gser 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing //de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur//sbyin pa kun gyi mam
74a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur//byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang //sems can kun la sems mnyam pas//rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur//gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur//gang
74a7(dkon brtsegs): gos ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags//gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur//thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol//chos la bzod pas gzungs rnams thob//sems bsgom/
74b1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni ting 'dzin skye//kyal pa'i tshig rnam snang byas na//gzung bar ltos pa'i tshig tu 'gyur//dran dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur//thub pas ji ltar blo gros ldan//ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur//
74b2(dkon brtsegs): bya lags//skyes bu dam pa mkhas ces 'gyur//pA yo med pas ni ngan ldan 'gyur//don la sems pa blo gros wAn/gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur//chos kyi mtshan da
74b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa mkhaso//'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni//las gang gis na skye bar 'gyur//'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du//zhu ba zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur//gang gis chos kyi sbyin
74b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la//nam yang bar chad mi byed pa//du ni ngas ni myur rab tu//'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur//gang gis mi khom song bar 'gyur//gang gis bzang 'gror mchi 'gyur lags//
74b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba kun du skye ba na//bag mtshos par ni ji ltar 'gyur//dad pas mi khom spong bar 'gyur//tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro/stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas na//rtag tu bag dang ldan
74b6(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur//thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams//ji ltar lus rnam dgra par 'gyur//ji ltar bdun myi sa mi thog+sas//ji ltar chos kyis yo ste 'gyur spong //rnam par grol bas
74b7(dkon brtsegs): las rnams dka/brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur//ci sgras de bzhin byed pas ni//chos kyis phongs pa spong bar 'gyur//ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang //tshangs pa'i dbyangs
75a1(dkon brtsegs): 'drar ji ltar 'gyur//thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyis//sems can rnams ni gang gis dga'//bden par smra bas tshungs pa'i dbyangs//ngag rtsub spangs pas//
75a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan 'gyur//kyal pa'i tshig dang phra ma rnams//spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur//ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags//bro nang nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur//rnam par 'dren/
75a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis na//g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur//bsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur//mi 'tshe bas ni nad nyung 'gyur//mi mthun bdan sdum byas na//g.yog 'khor rnams ni
75a4(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed 'gyur//don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags//gang gis longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur//gang dang gang du skye ba der//dbang cher grags par ji ltar 'gyur//chags pa med
75a5(dkon brtsegs): pas don rnams 'grub//ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel//gang dang gang du skye ba der//phrag dog med pas dbong cher grags//ji ltar lha yi mig thob 'gyur//lha yi rna pa
75a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thog/sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag/'dron pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur//mar me byin pas mig thob 'gyur//rol mo'i sgra yi rna ba dag/'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes
75a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis//de bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur//'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi//zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur//tshe rabs snga dron ci 'gyur lags//rdzu 'phrul ci yis
75b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur//gzhon pa byin pas rdzu phrul thog/dran pa bsgoms pas rjesu dran//mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs byas na//zag pa zad par reg par 'gyur//gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs//
75b2(dkon brtsegs): cis na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs//gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur//gang gis phyogs bcur lhang nger gda'//smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing //bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum//
75b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs//'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas//phyogs bcur lhang snang bar 'gyur//chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni//chos gang gis ni 'thob par 'gyur//gang dang gang du skye ba der//
75b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dgal 'thob//sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir//byang chub don du sems btud pa//des na chos rnams bsdu ba'ang thob//des ni dga' ba'ang 'thob par
75b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//bslab pa ci 'drar bslabs pa dang /sems ni ci 'drar bsgoms pa yis//thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i//ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur//sems can ma lus
75b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la//mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang /mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na//thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar 'gyur//skye ba kun du byang chub sems//
75b7(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na yang sems de ni//'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe//smos ci 'tshal ba gang gis 'gyur//grong dang grong khyer rnamasu 'am//gang du gnas pa'i yul rnamaso//byang chub la ni
76a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'dzud//ngan sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro//gang dang ga du skye bar yang //ji lta stobs ni cher 'gyur dang //rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang //bdud rnam
76a2(dkon brtsegs): bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur//'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing //sgeg la mi 'jigs byin na ni//gang dang gang du skye bar yang //des na stobs ni cher 'gyur te//rtag tu mthu yis 'pha
76a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang //bdud rnams bye bas mi tshug so//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de//'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du//lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su//seng ge yid ni dga'
76a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur//seng ge grogs dang lhan cig tu//'di skad kyi ni tshig smras te//spyod pa brtan pa 'di la ni//bdag cag rjesu bslad par bgyi//de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de//
76a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas//ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la//ji zhig slang du 'dzum mdzad pa//thub chen lung bstan grasal zhes nus//de skad zhu ba nus pa dang //
76a6(dkon brtsegs): ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyis//'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to//gang gis phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa//ma pham nga las 'dir nyan cig/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu dang //gzhan//
76a7(dkon brtsegs): yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la//byang chub don du 'dus nas ni//mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/mar mi mdzad pa tshun chad du//
76b1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khyi'u 'di dag rnams//nga yis yongasu smin par byas//snang ba chen zhes bya ba yi//skal pa chen por 'byung 'gyur te//de dag skal pa gcig de la//rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste/
76b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shos tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes//'jig rten 'dren pa rnam su 'gyur//'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar//de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur//byams pa nas ni bzung nas su//skal pa suM
76b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya tshang bar ni//de yi bar du dus kun du//rtag tu sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur//'di dag byang chub thob pa yi//ming ni gang su thos pa rnams//de dag thams cad 'jig rten du//kun
76b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur//gang zhig lung bstan 'di thos nas//mos pa skyed par byed pa ni//'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na//de dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med//
76b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis skal pa drug stong du//sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du//rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas//byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas//gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs
76b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di//thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na//sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis//grangs dang chur yang mi phod do//chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni//'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis
76b7(dkon brtsegs): ni//lha rnams me tog tshor pa 'bebs//stong gsum po yang g.yos par gyur//sang+ge grogs dang bcas pa yis//mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas//nyin bdun par du mchod byas
77a1(dkon brtsegs): te//bstan pa la ni rab tu byung //de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'thab//zad mi shes kyi gzungs kyang 'thob//sems can rnams kyi don byed de//sangs rgyas chos la
77a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzud par byed//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa ni sems can bye ba phyag brgyad cu byang chub mchog le zhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/san
77a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
77a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa seng ges zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun pa
77a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so///rgyu ltar gyi mkhan ba dA na shI la dang /mun war ma dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang
77a6(dkon brtsegs): btsos nas btan la phab pa'o///sho lo ke drug cu'o///6//rgya gar skad du/oMt+ma sarba bud d+hA ra ta s+yo pA ye ko shau l+yA dz+nyA nod ta ra bo d+hi satwA/pa r-I drid ts+tsha pa ri brta nA
77a7(dkon brtsegs): ma ma hA ya na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang tshon thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' yo shis dam pa'i zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba
77b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod/
77b2(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag ra na/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
77b3(dkon brtsegs): dpo' chen po khri drug stong thad kya mngon pa shwe pra mngon par shes pas gzungs thob pa/spobs pa thog pa med pa/mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
77b4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa//yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma red kyi dus kyi tshe/nang du yang dag
77b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jog las bzhengs nas ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yangasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang ba yang dag par ston to//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
77b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po ye shes dmapa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa
78a1(dkon brtsegs): /stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
78a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
78a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lagaso//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
78a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi
78a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di/
78a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa zhes bgyi na/thabs la
78a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de gang lags/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
78b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi skye ba mang po la
78b2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha rnams dang mi nams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /phan pa dang bde ba dang /da ltar dang mo 'ongs pa'i byang
78b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjesu yongasu bzung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /'das pa dang ma byon pa dang ngo
78b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
78b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas payongasasu 'dri bar sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod lagaso//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang /ngas byang chub sem
78b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol
78b7(dkon brtsegs): te/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa
79a1(dkon brtsegs): ni zan kham cig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
79a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ni gang gis tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa la zun kham cig tsom sbyin par byung na yang /de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing //dge
79a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs par bya bar yongasu bsngo ba'i phyiraro//de rgyu gnyis kyis ni sems chen thams cad la yongasu bsngo bar byed de/
79a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mtha
79a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no//rigs kyi gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa la rje su yid rang bar byed
79a6(dkon brtsegs): cing /rje su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad la yongasu bsngo zhing btang ste yongasu bsngo bar byed do//de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi
79a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnan por byed la/len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed de/rigs
79b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu
79b2(dkon brtsegs): dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /spos kyi shing ljon pa dang /me tog phreng dang /spos dang /phye ma dang /byug bdag gir ma byas shing yongasu ma bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam
79b3(dkon brtsegs): pas yongasu bzung zhing yongasu bsdus nas/sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/yongasu btang nas kyang thams
79b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen panyid du yong su bsngo bar byed do//phyogs bcu dag na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /spos kyi shing ljon pa dang /me tog dang me tog phreng dang /spos dang /phye ma dang byug
79b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongasu bzung ba dang bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab pa'i dang de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams
79b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'bul bar byed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do//de thams cad
79b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa des tshul khrims dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu
80a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa thob par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems/
80a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshe rab myong bar 'gyur ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la byang chub
80a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus tI 'chags par byed cing /'di ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal
80a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gis lus la 'bab par 'gyur zhing /sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go cha gyon par yang byed do//phyogs bcu kun
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams dag na/sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te/rje su yi rang
80a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing rjesu yi rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/thams cad
80a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar byed do//de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpe
80b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/bkur/
80b2(dkon brtsegs): bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas/bsnyen bkur byas nas/'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nger par d+hu
80b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /tshul khrims gcig pa dang /tinge 'dzin gcig pa dang /shes rab gcig pa dang /rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang /ye shes
80b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang /rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do//des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/bkur bstir
80b5(dkon brtsegs): byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas/bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang /bkur bstir byas pa dang /bla mar byas pa dang /ri
80b6(dkon brtsegs): mor byas pa dang /mchod pa byas pa dang /bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur snyam du shes par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
80b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongasu bzung nas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar byed de/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub
81a1(dkon brtsegs): /sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thab la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe/
81a2(dkon brtsegs): rtul bar gyur na yang de bdag nyid khang du gsod par mi byed cing /zhum par mi byed par/de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogasu bcad pa gcig tsam la yang mi 'jug par mi byed cing /de 'di ltar sa
81a3(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog par byed de/tshig bzhi po'i tshog su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de ni/gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do//des te
81a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas/zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang grags pa 'dod pa med pas/grong
81a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa de rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing /'di
81a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/sems can gang su dag gi dkris chag bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
81a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do//de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga'o ltar mang du thos
81b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang/
81b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul por gyur na yang /nges tha na gzhan gyi las kyang bya te/kha zas nal ze gang tsam
81b3(dkon brtsegs): yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do//phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen
81b4(dkon brtsegs): pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na/'di ltar bdag gi sbyin par byed pa'i chos 'di ni chung mod kyi/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis byin pas dpag tu med
81b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyuraro snyam du so sor rtog par byed//de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas nal ze gang tsam po de sbyin par byed cing /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag
81b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste dbar na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i
81b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing /lag ni rin po che 'grub par gyur cig ces yongasu bsgo bar byed do//de dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa des/byang
82a1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems dang babral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
82a2(dkon brtsegs): ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur/lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
82a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/gal te nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos kyi thegs pa pa rnams dang lhan ci
82a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur kyang de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing /gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/
82a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang de rgyu gnyi gyi bdag la rtog par byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
82a6(dkon brtsegs): yin la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges 'byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams yin//sbram du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing /de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/'di/
82a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin du mchog shin du gtso ba yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin//'di dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po la yongasu spyo
82b1(dkon brtsegs): mngatsha yamam ma mthamaN/sas mamathas mtham/a mkhatha.a naHthas mamamam khamamams tham thas samams yam lam maca thams pam yamaya yams am
82b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yin pas/bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do//des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems paskyes pa des/
82b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la bla snyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun tu 'dzin par
82b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa lta bu'i rjesu 'chags pa dang /khong khro bo spangs pa thob par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu
82b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed//ji ltar yong su rdzogs par
82b6(dkon brtsegs): byed ce na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slong mo ba mthong na de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs te/sor sna'i sems tshar gcod par
82b7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing /gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la/sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing
82b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang /sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa byin nas/'di ltar bla da med pa
83a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin mo//byams pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /mu/
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i sems dang /mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang /le lo med pa'i sems dang /rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i
83a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bldag pa dang /myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par grub par byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang /lus kyis zhal ta byed
83a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang /ldang ba dang /'gro ba dang /'ong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//sbyin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig
83a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang /dga' ba dang yid bde ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//sbyin pa sbyin nas chos
83a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rje su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/sus byin su la byin/ci zhig byin/'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes nyid kyi rje su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing /des de ltar
83a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu btsal nas kyang gang gis byin pa dang /gang la byin pa dang /ci zhig byin pa dang /de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed po'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs pa gang yang yin pa nga ni de'i shes
83b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yong su rdzogs par
83b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems
83b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas/sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongasu 'dzin par bgyid la/sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
83b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang yong su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pas de ni ngo mtshar lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
83b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu nga de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/thabs la mkhas pa dang //thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
83b6(dkon brtsegs): pas sbyin pa chung yang chen por byed la/chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang /grangs med par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi
83b7(dkon brtsegs): shes dom pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te rgyal rgya lam na/sdig pa'i grogs po'i
84a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ngam/snrums can dur+m+ma byas nas pargyug+sa yad/'dag sa spyor sgrub s+ho//guts+tsha ba ga phyung pa dang //khams dang /mtshad 'dadag nyid sa pa /
84a2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni dri ltar ni bdag gis yongasu gdung bar bya dgas par 'gyur bas/bdag gis 'di ltar gau cha bag bar bya te/bdag sems can rnams yongasu sgyu
84a3(dkon brtsegs): blor bya ba'i phyir/phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/'jigs par me bya/sems skrag par mi b+h+ya/yongs gdung ba
84a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya zhing /ci lha myur 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta ltar sems can yod skye skyed par bya ba dang /nus pa 'di yang chos bzhin du prI b+ha zhing /phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung
84a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba dang /bdag gis sems can thams cad kya nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes gi rgya ston par byed de//rigs kyi bu ya su brtag pa nye bar bcud ni/
84a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi pa thams cad byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byung ni/rigs kyi bla ni byang chub sems
84a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe la nyes pa med ces smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'dis la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di na ciso gas pa/
84b1(dkon brtsegs): ma na sa nanan chub sems da 'ams pa dang sa pa gas sa na sa sgyu/ da nga chub sams smra /
84b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrib pa la bsred par byed pa na/sprul pa 'bum kI Sh+Ta du na bdud 'bras bu za bar byed cing /sems spyan thams cad kyis lags par smras pa dang/nyas pad+ma smras cig pa du par

84b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di na gyis zag pa pa'i gang gartsa ba'i nyes po byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang /khams dang /skyematshan dad/nyid kyis yangs mya ngan las 'ang nga
84b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshegs ma spangs kyi bor du/zlar med pa yang dag par rdza
84b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chud rmya bar 'gyur ba'i sprul pa myed cing /sangs rgyas kyis thob par 'gyur ba'i skal pa med de ni gnas med//de nas bcom ldan 'das
84b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/mi mkhyen pa'ang
85a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'azigs pa 'am/thug su ma chud pa 'am/mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dag rla//
85a2(dkon brtsegs): gi nyes pa byung ba mthong na/bcab par mi bya bar tshangs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smos shig ces bka' sbrul lags pas/btsun pa bcom ldan

85a6(dkon brtsegs): can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa

85b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzaba' yamatshamam ma sa mtha ba Tha/sas mkhasam tham/a maTha thas namaHShas mamatham mamam tham thams mtham am kas bcam yang thamamal bsam yamaH la mamam ams

85b4(dkon brtsegs): bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongasu glengs pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par

86a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i gsum gang zhe na/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor
86a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyiraro//kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba
86a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtsa ba dang dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang po lnga dang

86b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong nas/bA nas ngan lan gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems bskyod par gyur te/gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal
86b2(dkon brtsegs): po bdag dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyang bar bya'o snyam//de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs

87a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'byor zhing /des byang chub 'thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dran yang sems can mi dge ba'i dun
87a7(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to//kun dga' bo rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na log par lung
87b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cho su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la

88a2(dkon brtsegs): /dede'i tshe de'i dus nabra ma ze'i phyi'u skad ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ngas lo bzhi khri nyis skyong gi bor du nags mang ba dab tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa
88a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhug so//de grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshang dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khyi ru ga rigs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pade mthong nas//
88a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas/bkris pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khyi'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la btug so//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khyi'u skar me des bu mo la
88a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so//snying mo khyod ci 'dod/des de la 'di skad ces smraso//bram ze'i khye'u kho mo ni khyod 'tshalo//des de la 'di skad ces smras so//sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du

88a7(dkon brtsegs): so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/deng brtul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul du
88b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa ma yin no//snyam nas/des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang /dgom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas/'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig s+ho//
88b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang /bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa de bzod par bya zhing /bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor
88b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chag snya mo//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung nas/de la 'di skad ces smraso//bzang mo longs shig dang /kho bos khyod ci la da pa
88b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bya'o//de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar mdo lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/yang mngon par byung ste/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas/de nas shi 'phos ma thab tu tshangs pa'i/
88b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o///
