88b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang skal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil zhing spangs par gyur to//rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal
89a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa tshungs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
89a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa yin
89a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ni/dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin
89a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur te/de dgron pa'i phug cig la gnas/
89a5(dkon brtsegs): de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba nu drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/de'i tshu na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po bab par gyur to//de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar
89a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis chur ba de bsgrub pa'i phyir/dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug du zhugs te/phug de nas phyir byung ba dang /drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis bud med gaN+DI
89a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/kye ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ma tshangs par spyod pa
89b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyams nas tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyed par gyur to//de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes na/de'i tshe steng gi bar snang gi/
89b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni
89b3(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nuso zhes 'byung snyam nas/de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas btuDa tI nyes pa la nyes pa la nye bar gshag so///
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de'i tshe steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen
89b5(dkon brtsegs): por lhung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis
89b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya ba der gyur te//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge
89b7(dkon brtsegs): slong shA ri'i bu dang /mo dgal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar la
90a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang rang
90a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpyir na smad 'tshong ma skye rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'o
90a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang /ji srid du skyes bu des las 'dod pa don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams
90a4(dkon brtsegs): cad spo bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar de gnas par byed do//de nas dron bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu de la mi lta mo sems par spong bar byed cing /de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam
90a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongasu smin par bya'o zhes bya bar
90a6(dkon brtsegs): shes te/rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed do//sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga'
90a7(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag nyid kyang yongasu gtong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no//gong gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur pa dag ste/'di dag gis phyir yong/
90b1(dkon brtsegs): su nyams par byed mi nus par shes nas ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te/'gre zhing de de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed do//rigs kyi
90b2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste dper na mes yongasu gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongasu nyams par med kyang /myu gu 'byung ba'i skal ba ni med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs///
90b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /bdag med pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongasu
90b4(dkon brtsegs): spong par byed kyang /log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongasu 'dzin par mi byed la/sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongasu nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
90b5(dkon brtsegs): dper na/dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba'i srog chags bud ba ni me tog thams cad las dri sdom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang /gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par mi byed/gnas kyi sred
90b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed par mi byed cing /de dag las dri dang /'dab ma dang /sdod bu dang /me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems
90b7(dkon brtsegs): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongasu 'o//spyod par byed kyang /de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/gnas kyi sred pa bskyed par
91a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed la/bdag kyang smras par mi 'gyur/gzhan yang smras par mi 'gyur bar byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nya ba shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srad bu gcig
91a2(dkon brtsegs): la gzan ma btags te/mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro//de srang bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par
91a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /bdag med pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
91a4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par btang pas/'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems lags/
91a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsrungs pa des/gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu rig sngags sngags dang
91a6(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis gzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rog sngags dang gsang sngags kyi
91a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas/gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
91b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs ya yams maN kam thamaHas sa mamamasamathama.a mkhatha.a naHtham mamamam thamathams tham sa mkhas yam kas man nga mas bamams yama.a ya as as sa
91b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pa dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dre bar gnas par byed kyang /de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na sra/
91b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/
91b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te/
91b5(dkon brtsegs): mgron po mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje che ba dang /brnyas pa'i 'du shes
91b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed cing //tshigs 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/ral gri yang med dong pa yang med/'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'gro ba 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi
91b7(dkon brtsegs): nuso na/'gron po thams cad bsgral ba dang /chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya bar lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/de nas
91b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song ste/chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na/mda' gzhu thogs te/go cha sra ba bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te/chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs
92a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing /des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang bral nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa
92a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/thobs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang rtse ba dang /
92a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgur spyod par de ni/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dag pa dang snying rje bskyed par byed
92a4(dkon brtsegs): cing /tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing /bdud kyi sde
92a5(dkon brtsegs): pham par byed pa lta ga la 'gyur te/de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyu ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang /shes rab
92a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis legs par yongasu zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad bral zhing rab tu btubasdu nas/shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs
92a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang /'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yong su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do//gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
92b1(dkon brtsegs): rnon po dga' bar byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyong pa na/tshong dpon zhig gis khyim du
92b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang /tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyag tshong zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des/dge slong de'i skad thos nas bsod snyoms thogs te/
92b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo //de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems
92b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dpe byad las byung bzhin dang /sgra skad dang /kha dog gi mtshan ma bzung ba dang /de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang /'dod chags kyis kun nas bskrad pa'i sems dang /
92b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis yongasu gtugs pa'i sems dang /'dod chags kyis yongasu gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas/lus rdul bar gyur nas/'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur
92b6(dkon brtsegs): to//byang chub sems dbang byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes
92b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/yud tsam zhig nang la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/chos gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ci mig mig la chags sam/mig ni chags pa
93a1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' mam mas mtha baH/sas mkhasamama.a mkhatha sa nathaHthas mamatha thamamamam yam sa thams ma/am am
93a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/g.yo ba med pa/byed pa med pa/sems pa med pa/'dus byas pa rim pa 'dun pa/shi'i lu yin te/mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/sems/
93a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/tshor bar mi byed do//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /lpags pa dang /mdog dang /sha yang de dang 'dra ste/des rkang 'thil yan chad glad pa man chad kyi bar

93a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur cing /des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la
93a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par gyur to//de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po lan bdun/
93a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas na mkha' de nyid nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo ///bam po gnyis pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis
93a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las dang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
93b1(dkon brtsegs): bol bka' stsal pa/kun dag po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong bar mthong ngam/kun dga'
93b2(dkon brtsegs): bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed 'dis ni 'dod chags
93b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la brten te/chos thams cad yongasu brtsal bas/bdud kyi sde brtul cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to//de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas na bud med kyi lus
93b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes so//skyes ma thag tu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
93b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to//de'i mod la ngas bdag gis wa
93b6(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang /de 'di snyam du gyur te/bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las/de na bdag
93b7(dkon brtsegs): gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la bltas pa dang /bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i
94a1(dkon brtsegs): dus byas nas bud med kyi lus brjes te/bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing /bdag la 'byor pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/
94a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi las rje su dran po'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to//de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na/
94a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang
94a4(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod cing /bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyis/bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /byang chub sems
94a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snya mo//de nas lha'i bu des 'khor lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang /spros dang /me tog phreng dang /
94a6(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dag thogs te/bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la be der song nas/kha dog shin tu 'phags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i
94a7(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/bcom ldan
94b1(dkon brtsegs): mngan ma ma sa sa mthasam tham/a mkhathas maHthas mam ma yam yas/ ya
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la yang man
94b3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thol mo phug phug por sbyar nas/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//sangs
94b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/bang gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab/grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam
94b5(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab//gnyen yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur//tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi//mdzes shing thog mar phyug chung gyur pa lags//pha ma'i glo bar mtsho zhing rab tu byams
94b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa//mthe chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang lags pa//bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe//de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis//skad snyan
94b7(dkon brtsegs): yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas//bdag chags sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags pa//dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par
94b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis//mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang //ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te//gal te ji ltar bsams bzhin ma mjal na//srog la mi lta dgum pa
95a1(dkon brtsegs): dus bgyi snyam//tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas//de la bka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang //bsod snyoms sgrol ba'i rngo yang mtho nas//rtul/
95a2(dkon brtsegs): byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe//skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te//shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas//bdag gis
95a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob//rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi//gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing //bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha'i bu mo ni//khri dang bzhi stong
95a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'ang byung bar gyur//bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyu ra pa ni//sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba//rje su dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid//chags bcas sems kyi
95a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin 'di 'dra ste//dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la//chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas//sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des//dran bu gzi
95a6(dkon brtsegs): brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas//chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na//gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te//gang la bde sa/shegs mkhyen pa 'jug gyur pa//de ni nyan thos rang
95a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sa ma lags//ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang //bskal pa yang gA'i bya snyad spyad par bgyi//bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni/
95b1(dkon brtsegs): spang mi bgyi//dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la//chos kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi//gang dag byang chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par//gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mo/
95b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni//bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas//de kun 'jigs med skyes pa thob 'gyur bar//byang chub spyad mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi//lus
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rdul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni//bu mo'i pha mcho nges 'debs byed cing //dge sbyong de yis byad sde mas byas snyam ste//ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod//sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi//
95b4(dkon brtsegs): bu de ni//song nas pha ma dag la chis smras pa/dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed//yun ring sdug bsngal 'grub par mi byed cig/bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de//sum cu rtsa gsum skal
95b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam gyur cing //des ni bud med lus kyang spang byas te//de ni lha yi bu pho 'od gsal gyur//bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar khyed deng la//khro ba'i sems kyis nyes pa 'di shogs shig/
95b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs par//sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med//'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas//pha ma gnyis kyis sa ng+yas
95b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra thos nas//nye du'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te//shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dang bar gyur//mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te//khro bo'i sems kyis nyes pa bshags byas
96a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzal yamam ma mthar tsaTha/sa sa mkhasam tham/a maThatha.a naHShas namatham mamam tham thams mam yamags tshanayang thamam/ma/yamamamal tham yams sa
96a2(dkon brtsegs): /nas//de bzhin gshegs la gus dang banas byas te//bdag shegs rang 'byung la ni zhu nus pas//ji tsam gyis na 'dran pa mchod par 'gyur//chos dang dge 'dun rdu lta
96a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa lags//zhus pa de yi lan ni sbrul du gsol//thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags//rgyal bas de dgu bsam pa dag mkhyen nas//'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad
96a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa//de yis brten par byang chub sems bskyed cig/bu mo'i pa dang ma dang nye du ni//lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas//
96a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos nas//byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed//rgyal bas kun dgo' bzang la bka' stsal pa//kun dga' ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig/byang
96a6(dkon brtsegs): rlob sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas te//shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no//dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa//bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni//
96a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas//de dag myur du skyes bu 'jigs med shog/bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te//bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams//gang dag
96a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa//de dag thams cad shi 'phos skyes par gyur//kun dga' 'dod chags bskyod pa gang gis ni//sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba//
96b1(dkon brtsegs): de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing //sems par gyur pa'i yon tan de 'dra ltos//lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te//gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa//des ni
96b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas//rgyal ba blta na mdzes shes bya bar 'gyur//lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa//de dag mi mchog rnamasu 'byung 'gyur bas//gang la dad byas
96b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba bsam yas pa'i//'jig rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed//gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bang byin na//gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa//grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu yis///
96b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su sdang bskyed//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na//
96b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am//dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la
96b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis ni//de dag thams cad 'di lta ste gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can rab tu
96b7(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/dang ba'i sems dang ldan 'am/chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am//chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sem
97a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis nas de dag thams cad 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi 'dag tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/btsun pa bcom
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'dra bar 'dzin lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs chen po
97a3(dkon brtsegs): blte mdzes shes bgyi ba mchis te/sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis thebs pa gang la la ngag gis
97a4(dkon brtsegs): da mthong na/de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/dang ba'i
97a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa dag/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams
97a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/legaso leg so//zhes
97a7(dkon brtsegs): legaso zhes bya ba byin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems
97b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod par khams na yang kun du gda'
97b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/nyan thos dang /rang
97b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang /snying rje chen po yang kun du bskyed par bgyid la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/
97b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de mtshar legs te/bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan
97b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad bsrung bar bgyis de/'di lta ste gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya chags pa dge
97b6(dkon brtsegs): la spyod par bgyid kyang /de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byung
97b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/dpe 'ga' zhig brjod par spobs lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa spobs lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
98a1(dkon brtsegs): /bka' stsal pa 'od srung chen po spobs par gyis shig/'od srung chen pos gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na 'brog dgon pa chen
98a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig mchi bar gyur la/'brog dgon pa chen po de yang srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par gyur cing /'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig
98a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur la/'brog dgon pa chen po de la yang cha bsgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing /'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer chen po 'byor ba
98a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa/btsang ba lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos kun du ltam pa/nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis pa gyur la/grong khyer chen po de yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par
98a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing /gang dag grong khyer chen po der zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni dga' ba dang mgu ba ma mchis par gyur la/grong khyer chen po de na yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin
98a6(dkon brtsegs): tu dog cing nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing /de'i g.yas g.yon na/khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po dag kyang mchis par gyur la/de nas 'brog dgon pa che no de'i
98a7(dkon brtsegs): dbus nas sems can mkhas pa zhi ba/glo ba bzhugs pa/sems can thams cad la don du gyur par 'tshal pa/sman par 'tshal ba/bde bar 'tshal ba/grub pa dang /
98b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'tshal ba/sman par 'tshal ba/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/de 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces/kye grogs po dag kho bo ni khyed kyi yongasu skyob pa yin to//
98b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brog dgon pa chen po 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/bde ba lo legs pa/nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de ni rga ba med pa dang 'chi
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ba med par 'gyur zhing /sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par yang 'gyur bas/sems can
98b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan pa dag tshur shig/grong khyer chen po der 'dong ngo zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i
98b5(dkon brtsegs): bas pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjesu bstan pa de yang 'tshal la bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong khyer de na mchis
98b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur cig ces mchis lag so//sems can rgya chen po la mo pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer dar/
98b7(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o//zhes mchi lag so//sems can bsod nams chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid cing /skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de'i
99a1(dkon brtsegs): slad bzhin du mchi bar mi babye lags te/de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba dang /des shul de yang mthong bar gyur
99a2(dkon brtsegs): des mtho gang tsam gyi shul shin du dog cing nyam da ba de yab mthong bar gyur/shul de'i g.yas g.yon na/khru 'bum tsam mchis pa g.yang sa chen po de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/des ga
99a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yon gyi g.yang sa chen po de dag rtsig pa dang /spang leb kyis bkum ste/rkang lag bzhis 'phya zhing shul de las 'da' bar bgyid la/g.yas g.yon du yang mi blta bar spang bzhin du phyir/
99a4(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang slar yang mi blta la/skyo zhing yid byung ba yang ma mchis par shul deng mche bar 'gyur ba dang /ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de
99a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang /'jigasu rung ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing /grong khyer dar zhugs na
99a6(dkon brtsegs): rga ba dang /'gum pa dang /bron nad ma mchis par 'gyur la/sems can de dag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /bro 'tshal ba dang /'gum pa las
99a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par bgyid pa zhig mchis na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni 'khor ba'i dgen pa'i tshig bla dwags la
99b1(dkon brtsegs): so/srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa dang /srid pa'i tshig bla dwags lagaso//'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): la zhes bgyi ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshon zla dwags lag so//'breg dgon pa chen po de la yang chab sgra ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing zhes babya ba de ji lta ba de bzhin
99b3(dkon brtsegs): du bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bor bgyi lag so//skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta
99b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi lag so//sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las kyang mi g.ye lo/grong khyer gyi yon tan yang 'tshal ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin
99b5(dkon brtsegs): du ni nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi lag so//sems can rgya chen po la mos pa tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lagaso
99b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta bar bgyi lag so//sems can bsod nams chung sgra de nyan cing thos na
99b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang kun du rgyu de dag gi tshig bla dwags lag so//'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba zhes
100a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar bgyi lagaso//mtho brang tsam rgya
100a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba bzhin du ni chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lagaso//de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba
100a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar rnams blta bar bgyi lagaso//g.yas g.yon gyi g.yang sa de dag rtsig pa dang spang leb kyis bkum ste zhes bgyi
100a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lags so//rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid la/zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams sdud cing yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid pa dag
100a6(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bgyi lag so//slad bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
100a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang blta bar bgyi la/de bzhin du sems can sdig pa la mngon par zhan pa yongasu nyon mongs pa can gyi las kun du spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
100b1(dkon brtsegs): mngaca ya mams maH Na/sa sa mkhasamanam/a naTha a mthaHSha sa namatham tham/ma ma mayam kam ban/ thamam/ma ya yam
100b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phya ba dang smod par bgyid pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi lag so//slar yang mi lta la zhes bgyi ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa'i tshig bla dwag so///
100b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon du yang mi blta bar zhes bgyi ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags la go so//grong khyer chen pa
100b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi tshig bla dwags lagaso//ji lta ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin
100b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bsnyen pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig bla dwags dang /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /ye shes nges
100b6(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par bgyid pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dwags lag so//ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'ji
100b7(dkon brtsegs): bya dang /'jig su rung ba thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur zhing zhes bgyi ba de ni/sems can thams cad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing the tsom dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dwags la/
100b8(dkon brtsegs): so//grong khyer der zhugs na/rga ba dang /'gum pa dang /bro nang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing /sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyi la/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /bro na dang
101a1(dkon brtsegs): /'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par yang bgyid ces bgyi ba de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
101a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig bla dwags lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ye shes dang ldan lags te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub
101a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/'od srung lags//
101a4(dkon brtsegs): leg so//'od srung khyod kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lnga spro ba bskyed pa ni yang khyod legs te/'od srung khyod kyis dpe brjod pa des lha dang mi
101a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi skye rgu las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
101a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni thobs la mkhas pa legs par bslabs pa/yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/'od srung byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gis
101a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las mi byed cing /tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig kyang
101b1(dkon brtsegs): mi smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
101b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' tshig gang gri bdage dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du byung
101b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
101b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la 'di skad ces/dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang
101b5(dkon brtsegs): chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te/gsungs lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
101b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
101b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshad rab tu rnam par dbye bas khyod ci bya thong shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bas
102a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can yongasu smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi
102a2(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang /thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
102a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bya'o//ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad du//
102a4(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa gang yin pa de dag las phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
102a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bar der byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrug
102a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang ca tse med pa dang brjed pa med pa dang sems rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /shes rab nyams pa med pa yin te/rigs kyi bu mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
102a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na zhags bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur/'dod na bskal pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
102b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/'dod na bskal pa brgyas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/'dod na bskal pa stong gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/'dod//
102b2(dkon brtsegs): na bskal pa 'bum gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can rnams yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/'dod na bsams
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du srid pa la len cing 'gro bar yang byed do//de ni thabs la mkhas pa dang shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
102b4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing /'dod na phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa brgya phrag mang por yang yid yongasu skyo ba med par gnas par byed de/de ni byang
102b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang zhi ba'i tingange 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug la byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge
102b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi/de'i lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyuraro//nyan thos ni bdag nyid yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba
102b7(dkon brtsegs): kho nar shes par byed kyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi
103a1(dkon brtsegs): gcod cing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can yongasu smin par byed la/sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa na snying rje chen po bskyed par yang byed do//
103a2(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan ying byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par
103a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang byed nus mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/'dzam bu'i gling pa'i
103a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnasu 'dzeg par mi nus la lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab par nu so snyam nas/de'i
103a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs lha mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan
103a6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas ma'i mngal du ma zhugs shing /mngal gyi dri mas ma rig pa kho nar de'i sgra cig de nyid la byang chub
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus mod kyi/de la sems can kha cig 'di snyam du 'di lha 'amaN+Da klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am//
103b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mam ma sa a mkhasam ma.a mthasamathas natha mamyam mama ya
103b2(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa zhog gam/'dog las 'ongs pa zhig snyam du nam nur dang /yid gnyis dang the tshom smra bur 'gyur te/dang ga nom nur dang yid gnyis dang thatshom skye bar gyur pa ni nyon mongs pa
103b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par mi byed/shes par mi byed brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpas mad pa'i gnas pa bstan pa'i rgyu yin rkyen de yi'o//
103b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi gnas zhugs sum na khyod kyis de ltar mi bzlog/de ci'i phyir zhen/byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dri ma med pan+de
103b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod de/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas bzhin du de snyoms par zhugs shing yongasu bstun nas/ting 'dzin las ma langs bzhin du dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid
103b6(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug mod kyi/dgra' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de na de ma mthong bas byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin las lang so snyam du shes par zad ngo //byang chub sems
103b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang /skye ba dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun du ston par byed de/deng /
103b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun tu bstan pa yin na//de ci'i phyir na na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni kun spyod pa gcing ba yin pas/nga
104a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gan su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang po che thal kar du bsgyur te ma'i mang lnga
104a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa ston par byed ce na/de ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshig bla dwags yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin
104a3(dkon brtsegs): pas na/des ni ci nas kyang lha 'am/mi gzhan gang la yang med pa de lta bu kho nar mngal du 'jug par bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
104a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas shing dgur ma yin zhe na/sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/kye ma gzhon nu 'di mngang
104a5(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i dus yongasu ma rdzogs pas dbang po ma tshang bar ma 'gyur to snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang /mngal gyi dus dang dbang po yongasu
104a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i chungal na gnas kyi dgur ni ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na
104a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal
104b1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rin po che bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas/lha'i bu sA yA phrag gnyis
104b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /bzhi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub
104b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ma'i mtshan rtol te/mngal gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed ce na/sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pha dang ma'i mer mer po las
104b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa yin gyi/brdzus te skyes pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag the tshom bcad pa'i phyir me'i mtshan tol te mngal gyi gnas na 'byung ba kun du bstan to//byung
104b5(dkon brtsegs): mo thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lus la yang rma med cing sgros med la/byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi bde ba mong bar gyur pa gang
104b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de lta bu'i bde po ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing sngon na me yang ma myong ba ste/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
104b7(dkon brtsegs): dgon par bcas shing grong du ma yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /dben pa la dga' ba dang /kun spyod pa gtsang ba
105a1(dkon brtsegs): grong du banas na m+b+ha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang /spos dang /me tog dang /byug pa dang /me tog dag gis shin tu 'phags pa'i mdzad /
105a2(dkon brtsegs): byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rgyags pa dang brag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/gag phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon
105a3(dkon brtsegs): por btsas shing grong du ma yin po'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpe'i yum gyis shing blag sha'i yal ga la bzung ste/bad mA la ma byed par byang
105a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bcas par byas shrI na/sems can gang dag 'di snyam du yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni ci lta bur bud med gzhan dgra bzhin du sprog bsngal gyis tsho rlobs reg cing
105a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' btsa so snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag the tshom bcod pa dang bde bar btsas pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/yum lha mi sgyu 'phrul gyis shing blang//
105a6(dkon brtsegs): sha'i yal gA la bzung ste/brang ma la ma bcas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byaso//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dbu ma'i mtshan g.yas pa bai rtol te/dran pa
105a7(dkon brtsegs): dang shes bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas nas byung zhing skye gnas nas kyang ma yin lus kyi phyogs gzhan dag kyang ma yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni kun spyod pa gtsang ma
105b1(dkon brtsegs): da /'jig rten gsum thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/des na ji ltar sems can dman pa gzhan dag bzhin du
105b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du brten cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang /btsas pa ma yin pa de ltar skye ba bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/des ni byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan g.yas pa brtol te/dran pa dang
105b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin gyi gnas nas byung zhing /byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi mtshan yang rma med cing sgros med par gyur te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mtha
105b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis be bzung la mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar
105b5(dkon brtsegs): bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gos rin po ches bzung bar bya'o zhes sngon smon lam btab pa'i phyir/de na
105b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mabyas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsos ma thug
105b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yongasu ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/drug kyang ma yin/brgyad kyang ma yino zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni ji ltar gzhan sus kyang sngon ma bsten pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stob/
106a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi brtson 'grus chen po dang /skyes du dam pa'i rnal gdon mi za bar kun du bstan par bya dgos pa dang /gom pa bdun byor bas sems can gang dag gi don gom pa drug gis kyang //
106a2(dkon brtsegs): mitshig la/brgyad ni lhag par 'gyur bas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu yong su ma bzung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed la/drug kyang ma yin/brgyad kyang ma yin
106a3(dkon brtsegs): te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun 'dor ba ni/tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin te/skye ba dang /
106a4(dkon brtsegs): rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba mthar du byung bar bya'o zhes brjod par byed ce na/rigs kyi bu 'khor de na brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /lha'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dag 'dus par
106a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur te 'khod la/nga rgyal gyis khengs pa de dag 'di snyam du/bdag cag ni tshe su bla ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no snyam du sems shing 'dud par mi byed//
106a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dud par mi byed/phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/rab tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pas na/des ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/brgya byin dang /tshangs po dang //
106a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'di dag yun ring por don med pa dang /gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal dang /log par ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces nga ni 'jig
106b1(dkon brtsegs): rten na thu bo yin//nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba mthar 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras te/tshig gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams//
106b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di go bar gyur nas/lha'i bu gang dag der ma lhags pa de dag kyang sgra de thos nas lhags par gyur cing /de nas lha'i bu de dag dang brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dag yid byung ba skyes shing ngo mtshad
106b3(dkon brtsegs): du'adzin par byed nas/smras pa dang bcus pasta thal mo drug dug par sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'dud cing phyoga'i tshal bar byed de/gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
106b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces da ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na bA dang /'chi ba 'thar 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras pa'i rgyu de yin rkyen ni de yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
106b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang dag pa yin te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma theg tu gang mo tshar rgod par byed ce na/rigs kyi bu byung
106b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du soms te/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni bdag/gau ti mug dang lhan cig skyes pa rgod pa'i gud mo yang med/rta gang tu rgod pa yang med med
106b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni bdag dang lhan cig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las bdag gis ni byang chub tho
107a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur gyi/sems can 'di dag ni le lo'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i thebs por gnas par gyur pas/kye ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa
107a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rje bgrod par bya ba'i chos thos cwa la brtson 'grus rtsom par mi byed pa yin no zhes de ltar snying rje chen po bskyed na/sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa
107a3(dkon brtsegs): ni bsam pa yong su rdzogs pa yin par rig la/bdag cag ni dman pa dang bag med pa yin par rig nas/de dag du bdag la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyuraro snyam nas/de'i phyir de'i tshe
107a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher rgod par byed de/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dri med par btsas ma thag tu brgya byin
107a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed ce na/rigs kyi bu de ni brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dag mchod pa'i las byed pa yang yin la/'jig rten na yang khyi'u dag btsas ma thag tu gdon
107a6(dkon brtsegs): mi za bar khrus byed pa dag yod pas/byang chub sems dpas kyang 'jig rten shes pa'i rjesu gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na don gyi dbang ngo mthong ba'i phyir/byang chub
107a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dag gis 'khru bar byed de/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabral mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon//
107b1(dkon brtsegs): par bcas ma thag tu kho nar byang chub kyi srid par mi 'grobar ci'i phyir grang du 'jug ce na/dbang ba rnams yangs smin pa kun tu bstan pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi byu ba kun du bstan pa dang /dga'//
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bdang rtse mo dag kun tu bstan nas kyang /gling chen po bzhi la mi bolta bar sbyangs te mngon par 'byung ba kun tu basbyin par bya ba dang /'di ltar sems can gzhan dag kyang ba dag gro rje su slob pa
107b3(dkon brtsegs): 'drang pa'i dga' ba dang /ni ma dang /longs spyod dang /'khor rgya chen po dag spangs te rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/gang gi phyir byang chub sems
107b4(dkon brtsegs): dgon par bcus ma thub kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar/grong du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin te/de yang byang chub sems dpe'i thabasal
107b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ce na/de la ni byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes
107b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas dus las 'das pa yin gyi/byang chub sems da pa'i nyes pa ma yin to/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog
107b7(dkon brtsegs): naganas pa nyid kyi tshon lho'i mig rnam par dag pas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe la so sor brtags na/byang chub sems dpas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe'i lhag me ni zla ba bcu dang zhag
108a1(dkon brtsegs): /bdun las ma las par shes nas/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs pa yin pas/rigs
108a2(dkon brtsegs): kye bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/de
108a3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yi ge dang /lag rtsis dang /bstan bcos dang /grangs dang /rtsis dang /ral gri'i thabs
108a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /mda' gzhu'i thabs dang /'gyed stobs dang /gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang /skar ma'i dpyad dang /dga' ba dang /rtsed mo dag legs par bslabs ce na/'jig rten dang rjesu
108a5(dkon brtsegs): mthun par bya ba'i phyir te/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas dang po nyid nas gang la legs par bslab par ma byas pa'i bzo 'am/gsang sngags sam/rig sngags sam
108a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan bcos sam/bro gar ram/glu 'am/rol mo'i sgra'am/gzhad gad dam/'je sgeg gam/dga' ba'am/rtsed mo kun du bstan par bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
108a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang med mod kyi/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni btsas ma thag kho nar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas thams
108b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon du 'gyur//nga ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon shin du lags par bslabs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs smin pa'i dbang gi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir te/de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la/
108b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma la btsun mo dang sras dang g.yog 'khor len par byed ce na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dad pa don du gnyer
108b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe no//de'i gnas skabs na skyes bu dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sred pa thum pas btsun mo dang /sras dang /
108b4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i 'khor gdon mi za bar bstan par bya dgos te/sems can gang dag 'di snyam du/byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi tha ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems pa
108b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/de dag yun ring por don med pa dang /gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /log par ltung bar 'gyur bas sems can de dag gi the tsham bcad pa dang /'di lta ste sras sgra gcan
108b6(dkon brtsegs): zin kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo se 'tshom blangaso//gang de ga 'di snyam du smras sgra gcan zin ni yab dang yum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yon snyam
108b7(dkon brtsegs): dusems na da ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sgra gcan zin 'dis ni sngon 'di skad du bdag sred pa tham pa'i bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na sgra gcan zin ni lha nas
109a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas 'dir brdzus te skyes pa yin gyi/pha dang ma'i mer mer po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir//shAkya bu mos 'tshom yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis blangs
109a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin gyi/des de bzhin gshegs pa ma ro me mdzad kyi spyan sngar/bram ze'i khye'u khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa na bdag gi khyim thab tu gyur la/bdag kyang khyod kyi btsun mor
109a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyiraro//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpas kyang 'od skad ces bzang mo nga ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/'on kyang nga khyod kyi bsam
109a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba bzhin du gyur ces ud pa la'i phyir khas blangs te/sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de ni mi slu ba yin pas na/byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mos
109a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ma blangaso//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa thum pas ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang /g.yog 'khor gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos te 'di ltar shAkya'i bu mo
109a6(dkon brtsegs): sa 'tshoms kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /lha'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di skad du/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): kye ma bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i phyir
109b1(dkon brtsegs): te/de ltar na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshom byang chub kyi sems bstan par bskyed du bzhugs pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma blangaso//gzhan yang sems can gang dang /
109b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang /bran dang /chung ma dang /las kyi mtha' dang /khang khyimo dang /nor rdzas kyi 'du 'dzis spangs nas yongasu 'dzin pa spangs te/rab tu 'byung bar mi nus pa'i sems can de dag
109b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa'i sred pa dang /longs spyod dang /nor rdzas dang /chung ma la mi ltar bar kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshem blangs nas khang khyim
109b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /nor rdzas dang /chung ma dang /'khor rnams la mi lta bar spangs te mngon par byung na/sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di yang de ltar btsun mo dang /
109b5(dkon brtsegs): nor rdzas dang /'khor dang /longs spyod rgya chen po dag la mi lta bar spangs te rab tu byung na de'i phyir/bdag cag kyang ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi bya snyam du sems par bya ba'i phyir//
109b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa/gzhan yod byang chub sems dpas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba spyod pa na/bud me gzhon nu bsnyen bkur ma gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams kyis//
109b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par byas shing /yid gcugs par gyur pa de dag gis 'di skad ces bdag cag khyod sred pa tha ma par gyur pa'i bar tshun chad kyi btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab
110a1(dkon brtsegs): pas+thA na/de dag gis dkar po'i chos rgya cher smin par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rnams blangs te/drin byang chub sems dpa' btsun ma'i 'khor gyi nang du
110a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas/bud med bzhi lnga nyis stong ni/bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs smin par byaso//lhag ma rnams ni legs par mi ltung ba'i chos can du byas te/rnam
110a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs nges kyang byang chub sems dpas 'khor rnams blangaso//gzhan yang bud med gang 'dod chags kyi yongasu gdung ba chen pos yongasu gdung bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
110a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar kun du shes par bya ba'i phyiraro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi chu zheng dang //bdog dang /dbyibs ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i
110a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa mngon par sprul nas/sprul pa de dang /bud med de dag lhan cig dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod par byed pa ni/de dgra so so nas 'di snyam du bdag ni byang chub sems dpa
110a6(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig dgA pa dang rje dang dgung mgur spyod par byed snyam du sems par zad kyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i gnas pas gnas par byeng //sprul pa'i 'dod kyi
110a7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad tshun chad nas/byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang
110b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//shAkya'i bu 'dun pa dang rta bsngags ldan gnyis kyang de gnyis kyi sngon gyi smon lam nyid yin par balhag par bya ste/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin/
110b2(dkon brtsegs): par blta bar bya'o//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu brtul ba dang /yab dang yum
110b3(dkon brtsegs): dag yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/mngon par 'byung ba dang /shes rab che ba nyid gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang /
110b4(dkon brtsegs): shing 'dzam bu'i brib mas ma gtang ba nyid kyang kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bsam gtan byed pa'i rgyu ni de yin/rkyen ni de yin//
110b5(dkon brtsegs): /de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang bskyed pa thams cad don du mgu nye bar ci'i phyir skyo mas tshal gyi sar byung zhen/
110b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang /nang po dang /shi ba kun tu bstan par bya ba dang /nye du rnams kyi 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni nye du rnams mi 'dod pa ma yin gyi/rga ba dang /no ba dang /'chi bas 'jigs shing skra
110b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags pas gnas pa ma yin par rig nas/mngon par byung ba yin zhes shes par 'gyur ba kun du bstan par bya ba dang /sems
111a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad byu na b+ha dang /na ba dang /'chi ba su 'jigs bdun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dbad mo don du mi g+hany+tsar
111a2(dkon brtsegs): dur yang bskyed pos tshal gyisar byung ste/de yad byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe mang da ba byung mi nyon mam
111a3(dkon brtsegs): yin zhe na/sems can rnams nying lce gnas na/dge ba'i rtsa ba dag 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bkun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/dkar pa'i chos ngan du gnyer ba'i rigs
111a4(dkon brtsegs): bus ni bad brgya chen pa ji snyed pa yang yongasu spangs te/nam phyed kyi dus kyi chen ma dris mo ltos par mngon par 'byung bar bya ba dang /bud+mo ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa dag kya yong su spang bar bya ba

111a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnyid log por byas te mngon par byung zhe na/skye bo rnams ni lha rnams kyis gnyid log par byas pas lha rnams kyis nyes par kun tu bstan pa'i phyir te byang chub sems dang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): la nye du rnams dang /spyi bo rnams tha ba dang du ni snga kyi sems bskyed par gyur na/de dag la yun ring por don med pa dang /gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dong /log par ltung ba
111b1(dkon brtsegs): byung /dgugs rgyusarnams rnams sgra gnyid gas par zlas byung /lha rnangs kyis m+b+ha b+hU ba snang du byung bas//da ni byung rgyu ba sems dbus maHsa so nas shes pa byud na/
111b2(dkon brtsegs): dngag byung chub sems dpa'i la nga pe rje po ma na sa don gying dbang de mdzang ba'i byer/spyib rnams gnyid lag par byas nis mngon par byung ste/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i
111b3(dkon brtsegs): thes la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems de ba ster+d+ha dang rgyun rnams gyu dun pa la phyir bskur zhen/'di lta ste tshig shes pa kun tu bstan par bya ba
111b4(dkon brtsegs): phyid/gzhang dag 'di skad nas byung chub sems dang na dngas po rnams cad la mi lci ba rab tu myong bas nagasar dang du sa gu na kyub ma yid du zhes par da padu/
111b5(dkon brtsegs): /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpes phyi ma'i skye ba dag rjes skyob du gzhug pU bya ba'i phyir te/'di ltar gang dag bsnyen pa 'di la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dge gis
111b6(dkon brtsegs): ni de'i rjes su bsgribs shing /dngos pa thams cad la mi s+t+waM bI 'phags pa'i rigos bzhi la brten nus rang tu 'byung bar byAs/rab tu 'byung bas ni dang po le na nas
111b7(dkon brtsegs): 'cha ba le sa shing rab tu 'byung bar mi bya'o zhes bsten par bya ba'i phyir te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
112a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis ral bris slu bregs te rab tu byung zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te
112a2(dkon brtsegs): skya 'breg par bzod pa'i lha 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am/ma 'am/mi maM yin pa ni stong gi sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang
112a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rab tu 'byung ba don du gnyer bas na dad pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes kun tu bstan pa dang /bdag nyid kyis skra bregs te rab tu byung na rgyal po
112a4(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang yang sus nga yi bu'i skra bregs pa chad pas bcad do zhes mi dga' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis rang gi rol gris skra bregs so zhes rgyal
112a5(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang gis thos nus/cang mi zer bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
112a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dgi phyir byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa yang nyon cig/'di ltar
112a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dag la nges par skyo bar bya zhing 'dun par bya ba'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
112b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma \u0f7f/sa asamam/a mkhathasamathas tham ma amyam a
112b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces/dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig/
112b3(dkon brtsegs): bya/byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'o thabs la mkhas pa dang ldem po'i dag
112b4(dkon brtsegs): yin par blta bar bya ste/las kyi sgrib pa de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spang do//byang chub sems dpas ci las bsams te tshig de skad ces smras
112b5(dkon brtsegs): she na/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rabA la bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng de la/

112b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas byang chub kyi sems de dag brjed par gyur nas/de'i tshe na rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag mu stegs can gyi brtul zhugs spyod par gyur cing sangs rgyas
112b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi brtul zhugs mi spong pa dang /mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags la brtson cing sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags la ma brtson pa dang /mu stegs can la mos shing mu stegs
113a1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi dbang gis byung chub ni bdug cag la yod de/bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas yin no zhes bdag nyid ston pa yin par khas 'che bar byed//bram zer
113a2(dkon brtsegs): khye'u 'od zer phreng gis rigs kyi bu de dag snod yin par rig nas de thabs la mkhas pas/bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dag rim gyis mu stegs can de dag/
113a3(dkon brtsegs): gi drung nas phyir bzlog par 'dod pas/des thabs la mkhas pas rdza mkhan bum byed la tshig 'di skad ces/dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo ci zhig bya/byang chub ni
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras te/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng des phyogs gzhan zhig tu bram
113a5(dkon brtsegs): ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu lnga po de dog dang lhan cig tu 'khod do//de nas rdzi mkhan bum byed des phyogs de ga la ba der song ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing bsngags pa brjod nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la 'di skad ces smras so//kye 'od
113a7(dkon brtsegs): zer phreng tshur shog/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'ding ngo //rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od
113b1(dkon brtsegs): skyong 'das ma du sems te/klu bram ze khye'u 'di dag ni dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sbyin pa yin pas/gal te bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs//
113b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas 'di srung dang /byang chub kyi bsdogs pa rjod tsi /mu sngags rkyen rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na/rigs kyi bu 'di dag yod sa dgas par gyur/
113b3(dkon brtsegs): nus de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sman snga 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i sprin su de lta bu yo sam+b+ha nus/zlum pa'i k+She'u 'o n+te
113b4(dkon brtsegs): desar ngem bcas pa de nyid rjesu bsrung bzhin du/shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun thabasil mkhas pasti tshig 'di skad ces/dge sbyong mig rarje mthong bas kho bo la ma
113b5(dkon brtsegs): /byang chub ni mchog tu rnyeng par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong myu ba rig la byung chub ga la yod ces smras so//ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs
113b6(dkon brtsegs): so mkhas pa yin zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub kyi 'du shes kyang med/sangs rgyas kyi 'tshe'u shes kyang meng /
113b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyang ying dag par rjes su mi /byang chub yang dge bar rjes skye ma mthu byang
