114a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//de ltar chos thams cad ma skyes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/byang chub ni gtan stong pa nyid yin pas bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng gis shes rab
114a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol phyin po'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pa des tshig 'di skad ces/dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba yin pas dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras so//de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng de ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag
114a5(dkon brtsegs): dang chu 'gram zhig na 'khod par gyur pa dang /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/rdza mkhan bum byed chu 'gram dri ga la ba der song
114a6(dkon brtsegs): stebram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye 'od zer phreng tshur shog/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin du rnyed par dka'
114a7(dkon brtsegs): baM yin gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
114b1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis smras pa/dge sbyong skye bo mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la
114b2(dkon brtsegs): yod ces smras te/bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng de de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/'gror ma btub pa dang /de nas rdza mkhan
114b3(dkon brtsegs): bum byed des bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gi thor to nas bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba dar khrodade
114b4(dkon brtsegs): skyong ngo //bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag gis kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng yongs su bskor te yid 'dun par byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
114b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ngo //de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes pa lnga po de dag cher 'dun par gyur nas/
114b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du 'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng 'dri/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bstan
114b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba dang /drung du 'gro ba dang /dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/rdza mkhan bum byed 'dis thor to nas bzung bzhin du yang bdag nyid kyi srog yongasu
115a1(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i srungs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas de ni ci 'dra ba
115a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos dri ni ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'i bu lnga po de dag gis 'dun par byos nas/de bzhin
115a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od srung la blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi thad du dong ngo //de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
115a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ma thag tu sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul bas dad pa thob par gyur to//de dag gis dad pa thob nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la
115a5(dkon brtsegs): smras po/ston pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag khyod kyis sngan chad kho bo cag lA ma smraso zhes smos so//rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu lta po
115a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpal dang gzi brjid kyang mthong /spongs pa yang thos/tshangs
115a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa yang thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
115b1(dkon brtsegs): mngasa' mas sa yaN kamatha saca.asas mamamasam thama.a mkhatha.a naHtham mamamam tsamathathams tham thams mthas yamakhas tshan thamam mas yama.a la yas as ma
115b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyu sa 'od srung gis/rigs kyi bude dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/de'i tshe byang chub seMn snad pa'i ste snod kyi rnam grang /
115b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir m+b+hi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs rdo rje'i rgyu gi chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba di lta de ltar yang dag par bstan par mdzad de/des rigs kyi bu lta po de dag gis mi
115b4(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de ltar nang ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' bas/khyed cag la gal te bram ze'i khyi'u da zer rje sa
115b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing /mu stegs can rnams kyi bsngags
115b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur na ni/des na rigs kyi bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro nga'i gnas
115b7(dkon brtsegs): dang skabs kyang med na/dad pa thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//zhes lung ston to//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
115b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/bram ze'i khyi'u 'od zer phreng gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs la mkhas pas
116a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces/dgra sbyong myugo rAgu mthong bas khro bo la ci zhig bya/byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dbyung ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byung
116a2(dkon brtsegs): chub pa la yod ces smras par zad kyi/rigs kyi bu phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o ni sangs rgyas l-I ni ma rur med rnying /byang chub la yang som nyi med
116a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang som nyi med de/de yang byang chub sems dra ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su
116a4(dkon brtsegs): sprin par byas shing /las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang /dAm lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad par gyur pas/sems
116a5(dkon brtsegs): can mi shes par spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni dge sbyong dang bram ze'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la/lkog nas tshig rtsub po smras la/de dag gis shis kyang rung mi shes
116a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rung /shes pa dang ldan yang rung shes pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste brjod par gyur na/de dag yun ring por don med pa dang /gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /log
116a7(dkon brtsegs): par ltung bar 'gyur bas na/sems can de dag la las kyi bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas las de kun du ston par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' la ni las kyi
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do//gzhan yang sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la chog rtsub po smras nas/bdag la ni thar pa'i skal ba med
116b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/'gyod pa la gnas shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa'i sems cacad dag gi 'gyod pa bsale bar bya ba'i phyir yang las de kun tu bstan to//de dag 'di snyam du
116b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gyi gsung rab la 'di skad ces/
116b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed por dga' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub gra la yod ces smras kyang /de la rnam par grol po'i skal ba yod par gyur na/bdug cag mi
116b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing de dag sdig pa'i las kyi nyes pa de yang 'chags la/gzhan dag kyang mngon par 'du mi byed par gyur pa'i phyir ro//
116b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mu stegs can dag gdul ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa kun tu bstan gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyus ni ma yin no//de ci
116b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir klen+da/dge sbyong dang bram ze rgya shug dang /til dang /'bras 'bru gcig tsam za zhing zas gzhan mi za bas rnam par dag par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag yod pas de dag tshar
117a1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' ma mamam ya 'tsham pacaH/sas mkhas mamama.amakha thas mamaHtham mamatham tham/thab mas tham thams mamal ma yam mas mam yang thamasa' mams yam ya yang thamamatham yama' ma
117a2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpas 'phags pa'i lam lAm brten par rgyu shug dang /til dang /'bras 'bru gcig tsam gyi zas ngan pa zabs rnam par
117a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par mi nus par bstan pa'i phyir tu/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig 'di skad ces byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/dge sbyong mgo reg la byang
117a4(dkon brtsegs): chub ga la yod ces smras pa'i rgyu ni nga yin rkyen ni de yin te/las kyi bya ba de la dmigs nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa bstan to//byang chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka'
117a5(dkon brtsegs): ba spyad pa bstan pas/lha dang phyi rol pa'i drang song ngan pa la mos pa sa ya phrag bzhi dang /nyis 'bum yang kha zas ngan pa des brtul nas/de dag gis ye shes mngon
117a6(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par 'gyur te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zas la yongs su longs spyad de/lus kyi stobs
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dang shugs dang /mthu yang dag par bskyed nas/byang chub kyi shang drung du song gi/lus nyams pa dang /lus nyam chung bzhin du mo song zhe na/byang chub
117a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas ni zas ma zos shing /lus nyams pa dang /lus nyam chung bas kyang /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus na/zas ngan pa zos pa lha ci
117b1(dkon brtsegs): sa twa/'on kyang skye dro phyi ma dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa zas mi za bas byang chub yongs su btsal brar sems pa de dag bkres pas yongs su gdungs pas ye shes bsgrub
117b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus pa de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zas la yongs su longs spyad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bde bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni chos rnams mngon par brjod pa ra
117b3(dkon brtsegs): nus kyi sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyis ni myi nus pas/ngas sems can de dag lnga badre bas ye shes rtogs par kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/ji lta zhe na/byang chub
117b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyid kyang grong mi'i bu mo'i zas la yongs su longs spyad nas/zas kyi byede ba nyid kyis byang chub 'thob po zhes sems can rnams dang rjes su slob par 'gyur ba'i
117b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro//de na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo'i legs skyes mo'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /skye bo phyi ma rnams la rjes su snying brtse ba'i
117b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/byang chub sems dpas de'i kha zas yongs su longs spyad nas byang chub thob par kun tu bstan par zad kyi/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ni bsam gtan dang /ting nge
117b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag mang por kha zas med par gnas par nus te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa
118a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rtswa dge slong bar byed ce na/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang rtswa gding ba la mos shing gdan la gdu
118a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pas/chog shes pa nyid kyi phyir dang /rtswa 'tshong bkra shes pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro//des kyang byang chub
118a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la rtsa dag phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas na/de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa drugra bcom pa
118a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas lung bstan te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir byang chub
118a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/bdud sdig can ma 'ongs par myur ba myur bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi byed ce na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
118a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas skabs mi phye bar bdud sdig can byang chub kyi shing drung du 'ong ba ni gnas med cing skabs med do/de ni gnas med mod kyi/rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems rgya chu kyini dung
118a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa na 'di snyam du sems te/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'dod pa'i khams 'di na dbang phyug ni su yin/sems can 'di dag ni su'i dbang du song snyam pa dang /de 'di snyam du
118b1(dkon brtsegs): mngamamamamam mamamacasas mkhasamamama.am thasaHtham mamatham mamamamamatham mas mamathas yamags an yang thamam sa ama.a a yamamam ya ma
118b2(dkon brtsegs): sems te/de ni bdud sdig can yin te/de'i dbang du song ngo snyam nas/de na byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/badrag gis bdud sdig can dang g.yul sprad de/
118b3(dkon brtsegs): de las rgyal bar byas ni 'dod pa'i khams kyang rgyal bar 'gyur la/bdud kyi 'khor mang po yang 'du bar 'gyur/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor dang /srin po'i 'khor dang /dri zas
118b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor da /lha ma yin gyi 'khor kyang 'du bar 'gyur zhing /'khor mang po 'dus pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge rnam par rtse ba mthong na/bla na med pa yang dag par
118b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing smon lam la debs par yang 'gyur la/gzhan gang dag gis mthong ba de dag la yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro
118b6(dkon brtsegs): snyam ste/rigs kyi bu de na byang chu'i sems dang byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pas mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye'o//'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas shing
118b7(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'odi dag kyang yongs su gtugs te/bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa skong nas 'od de las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo //shAkya'i sras po de shAkya'i khab nas mngon por byung ste/
118b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' zhing sems can brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi yul las ma
119a1(dkon brtsegs): drug par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur bas/bdud kyi phyogs nyung ba dang /bdud kyi 'khor nyung bar 'gyur gyis/khyod song la de dang g.yul spyod cig/rigs/
119a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de nas 'od des bdud sdig can la yang dag par bskul ba na de mya ngani gyi zug rngu chen pos gzir bar gyur te/khro zhing rdum bzhin du de'i mod la dang dru gi tshugs yan lag bzhi pa
119a3(dkon brtsegs): bshams shing bsdus nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la be der song ste/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' la bgegs bya ba'i phyir/dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi khor yug tu bdud kyi dmag
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gis gang bar byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpas shes rab rin po tsho dang /byams pa chun po dang /snying rje chen po la gnas nas shes rab rin po che las nges par 'byung ba'i phyag
119a5(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kho dog lta bus sa gzhi chen po la brdabs te/byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi sde thams cad pham par mdzad do//bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad ma thag tu/lha dang /
119a6(dkon brtsegs): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /mi'am tsaM dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /grul bum bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang /gzi brjid dang /sku
119a7(dkon brtsegs): medog dang /gzugs dang /dbyibs kyang mthong /stobs dang /shugs dang /mthu dang /seng ge rnam par rtse ba yang mthong nas/bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs
119b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes nas zhag bdun du skyil mo krungs mi
119b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs she na/de na gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rab tu zhi bar spyod pa dag kyang 'khod la/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo
119b3(dkon brtsegs): krung gis bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes shing /dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba skyes pa de dag 'di snyam du sems
119b4(dkon brtsegs): tibadag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems ci la brten pa nges par brtag par bya'o snyam nas/de dag gis zhag bdun du sems gcig tu bsdus tI brtags kyang /de bzhin
119b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thugs ci la brten pa ma rtogs pa nas de dag dga' ba dang /dang ba drang /mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes nas/lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bdag cag dang
119b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pas byang chub kyi shing la rtog par gyur cig ces/bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/gang gir
119b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas zhag bdun du skyil mo chung mi 'jig par shing gi rgyal po la spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa'i rgyu ni de yin/rkyen ni de yin te/de ni de bzhin
120a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs radra pa nas rnam par thar pa'i sgos sems can thams cad dbugs
120a2(dkon brtsegs): phyung zhing mgron du gnyer nas/tshangs pas gsol ba ma btab par chos ston par mi mdzad ce na/rigs kyi bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/lha dang
120a3(dkon brtsegs): mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phal cher tshangs pa la brten cing /tshangs pa gtso bor 'dzin pa yin pas/de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni tshangs pas sprul to//bdag cag
120a4(dkon brtsegs): ni tshangs pa las skyes te/tshangs pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi byed pa po gzhan yang med la/ston pa yang gzhan med do snyam du sems pas/de na de bzhin gshegs
120a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis tshangs pa 'ong bar byas shing tshangs pa la bsdad de/tshangs pas phyag byas na tshangs pa la brten pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang de bzhin
120a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur la/tshangs pas gsol ba btab nas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad kyi ma gsol bar ma bstan na/de dag nga'i chos kyang
120a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du nges so snyam du dgongs pa'i phyir te/tshangs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mthus/'di lta ste chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'ongs par
120b1(dkon brtsegs): zad kyi/tshangs pa nyid la ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes yid la byed pa'i sems gcig tsam yang med do//de ltar na tshangs pa la brten pa'i sems
120b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi tshangs pa la nges par spang ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa 'ong bar mdzad cing /tshangs pa la bzhes te/gang gi tshe tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
120b3(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa de'i tshe na tshangs pa drug khri brgyad stong gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin no//
120b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gtso bo yin no//'di ni rab mchog yin te/bdag cag kyang ye shes 'di lta bu dang /yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
120b5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur te/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka'
120b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi las kyi rgyu bcu po 'di dag bstan pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa
120b7(dkon brtsegs): yin par yang blta bar bya/ldem po'i ngag yin par yang blta bar bya ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba tha na skra'i rtse mo'i che shas tsam du phra ba 'ga' yang ldan na yang
121a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i
121a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas med skabs ma yin te de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing mi dge ba'i chos spang ba thams cad
121a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa ste/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i lhag ma ma spangs pa bag chags mchims sbyor ba tsam yang mi mnga' na/las kyi
121a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro//'on kyang sems can gang dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chud gzon cing /las kyi rnam par smin pa la ma dad pa'i
121a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud ston par yang mdzad de/chos kyi bdug po nga la yang las rnam par
121a6(dkon brtsegs): smin par 'gyur na/khyed cag la lta ci'i phyir las rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa
121a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rgyud ston par mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na yi ge dang /grangs dang lag rtsis legs par
121b1(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa'i slob dpon ni byis pa rnams bslabs pa'i don du byis pa rnams bod pa'i tshul gyis yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog du 'jug par zad de/de ni de la mi shes pa dang sgrib pa med mod kyi/
121b2(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis bdag la thos nas ci nas kyang yi ge dang /grangs dang /lag rtsis dang /bgrong ba dag gi rjes su slob cing /byang bar bya ba de'i ched du yi ge'i phyi mo dag klog tu
121b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la legs par bslabs pa de yang ji lta ji ltar sems can gzhan dag gi las yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung zhing /de lta de ltar las nye bar ston par yang mdzad do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sman pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la legs par bslabs pa ni/nad med bzhin du sems
121b5(dkon brtsegs): can nad pa rnams kyi mdun du sman tsha ba dag gi ro myang bar byed cing bsngags pa brjod par yang byed/rab tu bsngags pa brjod par yang byed de/nad pa rnams kyis de mthong nas sman tsha ba de dag
121b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thung bar byed/yongs su longs spyod par byed cing /de dag nad de dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po nyon mongs
121b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa/chos thams cad la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba brnyes pa yang las dge ba dang /mi dge ba 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes las kun tu
122a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa ya nga /bstar nasems can rnams las kyi sgribazlas 'jigs shing lhag pa dang / las dang /drug gi las dang /yad las ngasas
122a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur snyam nas/bsams bzhin du las kun du ston par yang mdzad do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon gyi bu 'am/khyim bdag gi bu btsas nas ring po ma lon pa
122a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig la pha dang mi dag gis ma ma zhig byin par gyur na/ma mra de nad med par gyur bzhin du 'di lta ste khye'u de'i 'o ma yongs su dag par bya'o snyam nas/sman khab dang bska bdag so sor
122a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags shing 'thung bar byed pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi yab kyang snyun mi mnga' ba brnyes bzhin du/las kyi bya ba chud gson pa'i sems
122a5(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las kun du ston par mdzad de/las che ge mo zhig gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes thos na/sems can de dag yid byung ba thob par 'gyur zhing
122a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid byung na sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur te/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems
122a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ye shes dam pa la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi
122b1(dkon brtsegs): yang ches pa ldan/tshong pa nor 'dod pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /de'i chen 'gyon pa de dag nyid kyi nang na mi las nag po byed pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa/
122b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phong rtsal mi rig pa legs par bslabs pa/chom kun byed pa/rmongs pa'i cha lugs kyis gzhan gyi nor 'brog pa zhig kyang gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du zhugs par gyur to//dri nas de snyam du sa
122b3(dkon brtsegs): tebadag gis gung gi rje tshang pa 'di dag don grub cing /bya ba byas pa de'i tshen tshong pa 'di dag thams cad srog dang sprul lnga nor rdzas kyi rnam pa thams cad khyer te/'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'i snyam
122b4(dkon brtsegs): du sems so//rigs kyi bu de nas tshong dpon de dag don grub ste/pha rol tu 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /de nas me g.yo can gyi rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du sems te/da ni bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag
122b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad srog dang phral la nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag khyer te/'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba'i dus la bab po snyam pa dang /de'i tshe na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang gru bo che de nyid kyi nang du
122b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur te/de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bdag nyid log ste/rmi lam rmi ban rgya mtsho chen po de nyid na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des de'i rmi lam du bstan pa/mgron pa/
122b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyi nang nas ming 'di zhes bya/gzugs ni 'di 'dra/cha byad dang //bdog dang dbyibs ni 'di 'dra ba/chom rkun pa la khu ba gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
123a1(dkon brtsegs): mngasa' ya masam mamasacasas mams ma nama.amakhathas maHthas mamatham thamatha mas tham thams sa mams yamakhas man yang tham yas yama.a kham khas yaya
123a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis tshong pa 'di dag thams ca srog dung bral la/nor rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad khyed te/'dam bu'i gling du 'gro'i snyam du sems pas gal te mi dis
123a3(dkon brtsegs): tshong pa 'di dag skyog da pral bar gyur na ni/de'i tshe sdig pa'i las dam po byas pad 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhen+do/'di ltar chod pa lce brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa
123a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag yin pa'i phyir//gal te mi 'dis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gsad par
123a5(dkon brtsegs): byung na/de las kyi sgrib po'i nyes pa des byang chub sems dpa' ro re'i phyir yang /byang chub sems dpa' gcig gis yun ring po ji srid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
123a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du sems can dmyal bu tshon do rnams su bsreg par 'gyur bas//de la ded dpon khyod kyis de lta bu las brten te/cinas
123a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'dis chod pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag gsad par mi 'gyur ba dang /'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba da lta bu'i thabs la mkhas
123a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam par gyis shig ces bstan to//rigs kyi bu de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de sod nas 'di snyam du sems te/mi 'dis tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag kyang
123b1(dkon brtsegs): gas par mi 'gyur la/'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam nas de zhag bdun gyi byar du 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro ba dang /mi mthun pa'aM/
123b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung langs te sdod pa'i tshe/zhag bdun du su la yang mi smra bar sems pa la zhugs par gyur pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/'di la tshong po 'di dag kyang gsod par mi 'gyur la/mi 'di
123b3(dkon brtsegs): yid sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ni mi 'di nyid srog dbral bar bya ba ma rtogs par gzhan med do snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te/gal te bdag gis
123b4(dkon brtsegs): don 'di tshong pa thams cad la bsgrags par gyur na ni 'di dge gros rab tu sdung ba'i sems kyis mi 'dri yang srog dang bral zhing gsad par gyur la/'di dag thams cad kyang sems can
123b5(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nus/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag gis mi 'di srog dang phral nas gzhi des bdag bskal 'bum du sems can dmyal ba chen po
123b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'asregs par 'gyur yang bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de lnga spro bar byar/tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po 'di dgra srog dang bral bar gyur na yang mi
123b7(dkon brtsegs): rung mi 'di la sdig pa'i las de snyed cig rab tu 'phel bar gyur na yang mi rung bas/bdag rang gis mi 'di srog dang dbral bar bya'o snyam nas/rigs kyi bu de ltar ded dpon snying rje
124a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang ldan pa des/tshong pa lnga brgya zlum po de dag kun tu bsrung ba dang /maud yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'gro ba las kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/
124a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po de dang /thabs la mkhas pa des bsams bzhin du chom rkun pa'i mi ngo mdung thung gis btab sde srog dang phral nus/mgron pa thams cad kyang don grub cing rang rang gi
124a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer du phyin par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na//
124a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro//tshong pa lnga brgya tsam po gang dag gru bo che de nyid du zhugs par
124a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga
124a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya yin no//rigs kyi bu ngas thabs mkhasdu pa de dang /snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum du 'khor ba snyil te bor bar gyur to//chom rkun pa de yang de nas shrI 'phos nus/mtho
124a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so//rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gang gi phyir thabs la mkhas pa de dang /snying rje chen po des bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du 'khor ba bsnyil te bor bar
124b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i don de/byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi sgrib pa yin par blta snyam na/khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'di ni thabs la mkhas pa nyid yin par blta bar bya'o///
124b2(dkon brtsegs): rim po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can las kyi bye ba la gzud pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pas/seng ldeng gi tshal pa zhabs la zug par bstan te//
124b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la seng ldeng tshal pas zug pa gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid yin par blta bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje mkhregs pa
124b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi shigs pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu 'on kyang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na srid pa tha ma pa'i mi nyi shu dang /mi nyi shu po de dag nyid kyi dgra bo ma nyi shu zhig kyang
124b5(dkon brtsegs): yod par gyur te/de nas mi dgra bo nyi shu po de dag rang rang gi sgyu dag gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/bdag cag gis mdza' bshes ltar bcos te/rang rang gi dgra
124b6(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyi khyim du zhugs la/de dag srog dang dpral bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/gcig la cig tshig tu ni ma smras so//rigs kyi bung nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/srid pa tha
124b7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa'i mi nyi shu po gang yin pa de dag dang /mi de dag gi dgra bo gsod pa po'i mi nyi shu po gang dag yin pa de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
125a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ga la ba der dong ngo //rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi bzhi bcu po de dag gdul
125a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbang gi phyir dang /skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir/gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dngas
125a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'di nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g.yas pa'i mthil du zug par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pas 'di
125a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod las phyogs de nyid nas seng ldeng gi tshal pa rnon po mtho gang tsam gyi tshad gcig byung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
125a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dor bar bgyi/
125a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so//ngas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'dis phyogs gzhan du 'dor bar mi nus so//rigs k+Shi bu de nas
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan mo dgal gyi bu chen pos stobs kyi shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa de brdung ba dang /'di ltar snong gsum gyi spyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la byin du
125b1(dkon brtsegs): bltas te rab tu g.yos par gyur kyang /seng ldeng gi tshal pa de ni tha na skra'i rje mo'i chi shas tsam yang mi 'gul lo//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal
125b2(dkon brtsegs): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su gshegs pa dang /seng ldeng gi tshul pa de yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gnas su 'ongs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sum bcu rtsagasu
125b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su ri rab kyi steng du gshegs pa dang /seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang ri rab kyi steng du 'ongs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /
125b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su yang gsheg pa/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang gshegs pa dang /seng ldeng gi tshal de yang tshangs
125b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ongs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas babs te/gdan la bzhugs pa dang /seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenas
125b6(dkon brtsegs): babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pa saM zhabs g.yas pa bzung ste/seng ldeng gi tshal ba rje mo ya
125b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig sa la zug la//rtse mo ya gtsig sa las gyen du lta ba de'i steng du zhabs bzhag go/bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa'i steng du zhabs bzheg ma thag tu de'i mad la
126a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzama' ba mamaca mam mthas ca sa sa mkhas ma tham/a mkhatha a maHTha sa namatham tham/ mam tham thams mkham yam kham macang thamasam ma yama.a la kham tha mam ma
126a2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par gyur to//de nas nga la gnas brtan kun dag 'os 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa
126a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon phrin las kyi sgrib pa ci zhig mdzad lpags na/dri'i rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur lags/ngas de la 'di skad ces bka'

126a7(dkon brtsegs): star/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdage cag kyang srog chags 'gums pa dang /rjes su 'gums par 'tshul ba lags te/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
126a8(dkon brtsegs): nings pa de dag nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de dag rjes su gzung du gsol zhes nyes
126b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la nyes par bshags so//de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la las kyi bya ba dang lus zad par 'gyur ba las brtsams te/de lta de ltar chos bstan pas/mi bzhi bcu po gang dag
126b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to//srog chags gzhan bzhi khris ni chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to//gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
126b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin/rkyen ni de yin te/de yang byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la
126b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa snyun dang bral ba smon pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ud pa la ha sta gan du bslangs te gsol bar mdzad ce na/rigs kyi/
126b5(dkon brtsegs): bu de'i tshe na so sor thar pa'i bslab pa bcas nas ring po me lon pa zhig na/dge slong rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa tha ma pa lnga brgya zhig nags khrod na gnas pa de dag la 'di ltar
126b6(dkon brtsegs): sman bkus te/bor bas 'tsho bar mi nus pa de lta bu'i nad byung ba 'gyur nas/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pas sman gzhan bsten par mi byed tshol bar mi byed do//rigs
126b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/nges dge slong de dag spyan gzhan tshol zhing bsten par rjes su gnang bar bya ba'i thabs ni ci yod/rnam grangs ni ci yod
127a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du dgongs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gal te de bzhin gshegs pus dge slong rnams la sman gzhan dag rjes su ma gnang na/phyi ma'i dus kyi
127a2(dkon brtsegs): tshedage slong rnams 'phags pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing /'phags pa'i rig bra le bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de bsu na de bzhin ga shegs pas
127a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed las bkru sman ud pa la ha sta gan d+ha bslangs te gsol ba dang /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
127a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa khyed cig sman gzhan tshol la'i chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig/dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces
127a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so//lha'i bu dag kho bo cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i mthu med cing dbang med pa yin pas/shi bar gyur kyang kho bo cag ni de bzhin
127a6(dkon brtsegs): gi shegs pa'i bslab pa lngas yang dgra par 'da' bar mi byed do//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag
127a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po de nyid kyis kyang sman bkus te bor ba spangs nas/gzhan btsal gyis khyed cag kyang sman gzhan tshal cig/de nas dge slong de dag 'gyed pa dang bral
127b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs masayaH mthas \u0f7f/sa a mkhasam ma.amathasams namayam sa ma ya am
127b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan gzhan btsal te bstan pa dang /de dag nad de lngas yongs su thar nas/nad dang bral ba de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so//rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin
127b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sman gzhan btsal ba ma mdzad du zin na/dge slong de dag kyang sman gzhan tshol bar mi byed pas/de dag nad de las thar pa dang nyon mongs pa lngas grol zhing dgra bcom pa nyid
127b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med de/skabs ma yin zhing de na gnas med de/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
127b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar ce na/rigs kyi bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa
127b6(dkon brtsegs): cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse bo dang /rjes su bsrung bar bya dgos te/dge slong bsod snyoms pa gang la la dge
127b7(dkon brtsegs): grong dang rnga/grong khyer dang /glong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/de dag bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms mi
127b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa de'i tshe na/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de nyid kyang grong du bsod
128a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi phyir ci ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa de bzhin du bsod snyoms ma rnyed par phyir byung bar gyur na/bdag cag dge ba rtsa ba chung ngu dung ldan pa rnams la/
128a2(dkon brtsegs): lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de bas na bdag cag bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas yid chad pa bskyed par mi bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/don gyi dbang dri gzigs pas na/
128a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs po bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang gang la la dag 'di skad ces gang dag gis
128a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms ma phul ba'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag de dag ni bdud sdig can gyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes smra na/rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i
128a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/bdud sdig can gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir te/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis//
128a6(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag byin gyis brlabs par zad kyi/rang gi blos ni ma yin no//de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' mod kyi sems can/
128a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas grong du zhugs pa bzhin du phyir yang byung bar gyur to//zhal zas bcad pa de'i tshe na
128b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga yid mi bde ba med cing /sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang de bzhin te/mtho ba yang me dma' ba yang med par gyur to//de nas de'i modado la
128b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bdun khris dad pa thob par gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi
128b3(dkon brtsegs): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to//bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang dus gzhan gyi tshe na ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yon
128b4(dkon brtsegs): tan dang chog shes pa dag thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te nyes pa la nyes par bshags pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis
128b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam yang dag par bstan pa mdzad pas/de na lce dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri nyis stango chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa ste/gang gi
128b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze'i grong shing sA la chen po can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ba'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin/de yang de bzhin
128b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong du lto bar bcings te/dge sbyong khyod kyis kho mo sbrum par byas kyis/kho mo la zas dang
129a1(dkon brtsegs): gros byin cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa la sgyur ba btab par gyur ce na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/de bzhin//
129a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang spyod mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pas do mkhyen bzhin du btang snyoms mdzad cing /
129a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas las kyi bya ba kun tu bstan par mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyi ma'i dus na bston pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dag byung bar gyur te/de dag la yang dag pa
129a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas de dag 'gyod pa dang sems zhum par 'gyur zhing /de dag mngon par mi dga' ba dang /nyams pa la 'jug par 'gyur bas/de dag skur pa btab
129a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe na 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa nyid kyis kyang skur pa brnyes par gyur na/bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi rnyed ces de bzhin
129a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rjes su dran par byed cing /de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis munan nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang /nyams pa la
129a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro//bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma ni re shig sdig pa'i las kun du rgyas pa dang /rang bzhin gyi ma dad pa mang ba yin pas/de ltar las
129b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa des na phung po dang /khams dang skye mched de dag nyid kyis bstan pa 'di la gdon mi za bar rma 'byin par byed pa yin te/de sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa des/gal to/
129b2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur no yang /de gnyid kyis sad pa'i tshe na dri mar yang 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas thabs 'ga' zhig gis
129b3(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa de las bzlog par spyod na ni bzlog par yang mdzad la/de bzhin gshegs pas bsrung bar spyod na bsrung brla yang mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin/

129b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas/kun du rgyu mdzes ma kun tu rgyu dag gis srog dang phral te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'obs kyi nang du bor ba btang snyoms su mdzad ce na/de bzhin gshegs pa
129b6(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad mkhyen pa thogs pa mI mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang ldan pa yin pa sna/de bzhin gshegs pas de de ltar 'gyur bar mkhyen cing /de bzhin gshegs
129b7(dkon brtsegs): bas de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs byin gyis rlob par yang spyod mod kyi/kun tu rgyu mdzes ma nyid tshe'i tshad zad cing /gdon mi za bar gzhan gyi gnod pas tshul ma yin pas 'chi
130a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/rnam grangs das nu gzhan mu stegs can dag 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dka pa chos rnam par
130a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /ji lta ji ltar de la gzhag par bya ba de lta de ltar de la 'jog par mdzad do zhes/bdag nyid kyi rang gnyis pas shin tu

130a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi thad du 'khor bzhi po dag lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ci nas kyang srog chags brgyad khra bzhi stong dag ye shes mthong ba skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de dag la chos
130a5(dkon brtsegs): bsten te/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyon mengs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas
130a6(dkon brtsegs): par tshul gyis bzhes pa n+d+ha/zla ba gsum du skye bo rnams la bag pa'i ste/bram ze nyon mongs med kyi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ce na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas

130b1(dkon brtsegs): su mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas/dbyar zla ba gsum du gang drug gi rta chas kyi nas dag gsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po glang dag yin pa
130b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa sha stag yin te/de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gos sdig pa'i las
130b3(dkon brtsegs): dang las dman pa byas shing /las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na rta cang shes cig yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po
130b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba smon lam gyis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang sngon mir gyur pa na/byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag
130b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin tu bcug pa yin pas/de de dag yongs su thar par bya ba dang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te/rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe
130b6(dkon brtsegs): rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing /de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rtar gyur pa lnga brgya po
130b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa de dag gi don du dbyar zla ba gsum der gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so//de na rta lnga brgya po dag gi rta chas
131a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slo lnga brgya po dag la 'bu'o//rta cang shes kyi chas kyi nas gang yin pa de dag las phyed ni de bzhin
131a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la 'bulo//phyed ni rta cang shas de nyid za zhing rta cang shos des rta'i skad kyis//rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing /sangs rgyas la sogs/

131a5(dkon brtsegs): la dad pa bskyed nas/zla bra gsum po de dag 'das pa'i 'o ga tu dus gzhan gyi chen rta lha brgya po de dag thams nAd shrI 'phos te/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /skul ba mnyam par skyes
131a6(dkon brtsegs): nas ltar gyur pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin ga shegs pa la zhal zas 'phrul zhing bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa bskye pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang d+he dgu
131a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam kyang /ji ga bye mes yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tungs par 'gyur 'di lta chos bston to//rta lnga brgya ba dadag 'jus zhi cheb byed rje ga yin pa de lang di 'i
131b1(dkon brtsegs): pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan to//de bzhin gshegs pas rta cang shes de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med
131b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa byas shing /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas naste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsum pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes
131b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi ma'i kha zas gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de/rigs
131b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu yongs su brtag par nye bar bzung na/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang /bong ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo dag zhal zas kyi phyir yongs su longs spyad par gyur na yang
131b5(dkon brtsegs): shing dang /bong ba dang /gasreg ma dang /gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang /ro bro ba'i mchog gi khyad par gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
131b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams na yang 'ga' yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bri ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin pas na/de bzhin gshegs
131b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku la zhal zas mi bsod pa thams cad gsol ma thag tu yang /lha'i kha na las yang dag par 'das pa'i ro dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des ni
132a1(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas thams cad ni bsod pa yin par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na dge slong kun dga'o 'di snyam du/de bzhin
132a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung nas/da rta chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzod pa lta zhes yid mi badra bar gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems

132a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal po'i khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags ni bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ro'i mchog 'di lta bu ni sngun ma 'tshal ma myong lags so zhes zer te/de'i byin

132a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par g.yangs pas ri mo mi byed pa'i sems can de dag la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/las kyi rgyud de lta bu dag tu ston par mdzadado//rigs kyi bu

132b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis 'dridu chags kyi kun nus ldang ba dag rnam par bskul nas/de dag thams cad kyis zlab gsum po dag 'das nas thAg bdun gyis dgra 'acom pa nyid thob par gyur to//rigs
132b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta ngas na dge slong lnga N+DI ba dge gdul ba'i dang ga pyi dang /rlung chub sems dpa 'di dag ngas su sbyin pa byu /de shin+da shig prasmra thabs li mkhas pa des

133a1(dkon brtsegs): spyong la bzhugs pa na/'od srung nga ni ro rgyab na bas khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces bka' stsal ce na/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na lha'i bu nyan thos
133a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dul ba gang dag sngon dge slong 'od srung gis sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /bgra yod pa'i bya ba dag la yang dang yang du dad pa bskyed cing /yang dag par 'dzin du

133a4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par glal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bston par gyur kyang de dag gis chos bstan pa kun shes par mi 'gyur bas na/de'i phyir dge slong 'od srung gis byang chub kyi yan lag

133a6(dkon brtsegs): nad par gyur nas/chos nyan du ma 'ongs shing chos mi nyan pa'i sems can chos ma thos pa de dag 'di snyam du/de bzhin gsheg sde pa chos kyi bdag po de yang byang chub kyi
133a7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag gi gtam dag gsan nas/snyun nad las yongs su thar par gyur na/bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos mnyan par mi bya snyam du sems par yang 'gyur te/
133b1(dkon brtsegs): rogs kyi bud lta na lha'i bu dag gdul ba'i dbyung gi phyir dang /sems can nad pa rnams tshos la gus bkun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshog sta pasna chog 'di skad chos 'ang //
133b2(dkon brtsegs): srung nga ni ro rgyu ba na bas/khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag dag shod cig ces gsungs par zad kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la snyun mnga' ba ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
133b3(dkon brtsegs): /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku yin te/de dag la 'byung ba'i lus rags pa yongs su grub pa med pa'i

133b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'o nga klad pa na zhing mi bde'o zhes gsungs she na/rigs kyi bu de ni sems can gang la la dag de bzhin gshegs pas nye du rnams kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sdug bsngal gyi

133b7(dkon brtsegs): cad chud zos kyang des nye du rnams yongs su ma bskyabs pa las na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni nye du rnams la phan par bzhed pa yang ma yin/don du bzhed pa yang ma yin/bde
134a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhed pa yang ma yin/grub pa dang 'dre bar bzhed pa yang ma yin no//snum du sems par mi 'gyur bar sems n+dan+d+ra de dag gi sems bzung ba'i phyir/

134a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de bstan pa na/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags khri btul bar gyur te/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thungs la mkhas pa yin no//ci'i phyir de bzhin
134a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bram ze b+ha ra dA rnas spyi ba rnam po brgyas smyos pa na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa de dag dang du len par mdzad ce na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni bram ze b+ha ra dwa rngu
134b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod par pyod pa la phyir stong pa 'am/yang ni de phyogs gzhan du 'phang ba'am/yang na de de bzhin pa/shegs pa la tshig gcig tsam gyis skyo bar yang mi spobs pa de ltar byin gyi brlabs kyi/
134b2(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlab par yang spyod mod kyi/'on kyang 'khor deng lho dang mi mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma zhum po dang /mkhengs pa dang /thugs mnyam pa dang /
134b3(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i dngos po dang /gnyen pa dang /des pa dang /sngon gyi ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin pas/bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/srog chags bzhi stong gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
134b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/bram ze b+ha ro dadzAs smyos pa btang snyoms su gzhag go//des kyang spyo bar byed pa bram ze b+har
134b5(dkon brtsegs): dAdwadzA de bzhin gshegs po la sems dad par gyur nas/sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'dre' ba'i chom gyi sa bon bskyed par gyur te/de yang de bzhin

134b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa da yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lhas sbyin la brten nas/nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa dge yongasu rdzogs shing sems can dpag tu
135a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyi don kyang byas pa'i phyir ro//rnam grangs glang gis shes na/rigs kyi bu 'di la gang gi tshe sems can rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur cing //
135a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sbyin pa yang mi shes/len pa po yang mi shis pa de'i tshe na lhas sbyin byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs te/bu dag kyang slong bar byed/chung ma dag kyang sbed par byed/
135a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyul srid dag kyang slong bar byed/lag pa dang /rkang pa dag dang /mig dang /mgo yang slong bar byed cing /de dag la sogs pa dka' ba dang /sems can rnams la bde ba spyod pa

135a7(dkon brtsegs): dedag kyang tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed pa dang /sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob pa na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas/de dag la spyos
135b1(dkon brtsegs): samA brgyad bkrug glum/brdegs na yang 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing /bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/rnam grangs des kyang sems can rnams kyi don byas pa yin na/
135b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe lhas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bgrongs pa'i phyir bshad mi'i mi dag spad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bgrongs pa'i phyir glang po che gdug pa nor skyong sbed pa dang /de bzhin
135b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bgrongs pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par lta bar bya'i las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa ni ma

136a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yin te/sems can dman pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rung ngu rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya/bstan par mi bya/bshad par mi bya/bkrug par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bstan pa 'di/

141b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ji ltar ni rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/mi gum pa'i rkang lag dang mig nyams shing /'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe dbang

142a2(dkon brtsegs): lags/lus dang ni ji ltar 'bral bar 'gyur/rnam par shes pa 'dis lus yongs su btang nas lus gzhan ji ltar len par 'gyur/ji ltar na khams rnams yongs su btang zhing
142a3(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams bor nas/'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar 'gyur/ji ltar na lus tha dad pa dag len par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi gum pa'i skye mched rnams
142a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'jig rten pha rol du ji ltar myong bar 'gyur/ji ltar na phung po 'di dag gis dge bo'i rtsa ba bsags

142b1(dkon brtsegs): yod cing bzung du yod pa dag las gzugs su snang ngo //de lta bstan du yod pa ni shing 'phrul zhing g.yo ba dang /sgra skyad 'ur phur po'i sgra 'byin pa dang /byung ba dang /dro ba'i rig dang /

143a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa skyes na tshong ba rnams dang sems bya rnams 'du bar 'gyur te/dper na me tog gi dpung gros smras tshor la/sna'i dbang gis dri tho
