148b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ba/dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/mi dge ba la mi dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa/rlung gi khams kyis yongs su zin pa shes pas mngon par brlan
148b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan la mngon par du phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa pha ma phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro//dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gzugs brnyan snang yang /bzhin med par yang gzug
148b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyan mi 'byung la/me long med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste/ji ltar bzhin dang me long phrad pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs brnyan yin la//
148b6(dkon brtsegs): de la tshar ba dang rab tu shes pa yang med/lus gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang de nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing //ji lta bur lus smra ba dang /'bod pa dang /'gro ba dang /bskum pa dang /brkyang bar
148b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin du gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo //bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems gang gi dbang gis gzugs brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur/bzang skyong gis gsol pa/mi'i dbang
149a1(dkon brtsegs): /gis gzugs brnyan gda' ste/de yang me long gi rkyen gyi gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan gda' la/gzhan gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang /dbang po ma tshang ba dang /dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi
149a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan 'byung ljags so//bzang skyong ji ltar lus kyi dbang dang /me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis
149a3(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di tshar ba myong zhing /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /yid la byed pa 'grub par byed do//de la me long gang yin pa de ni pha ma phrad pa lta bur blta'o//ji ltar lus snang na gzugs
149a4(dkon brtsegs): brnyan mi snang ste/dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin yod pa spangs nas/yang chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams
149a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dri yang lus yongs su btang ste/lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas phung po gzhan thob par gyur to/dper na sa bon gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang shing n+ya gro ta dang /u dum+bu bar la sogs pa'i
149a6(dkon brtsegs): shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas/yang shing de yongs su btang ste/shing gzhan 'dzin la sa bon gyi khams yongs su btang ba na/dus bzlog par 'gyur bas shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par
149a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//khams kyi btsung rnams med par gyur pas shing de yongs su rnyings shing yongs su skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i khams phra zhing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang lus
149b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams bskyed nas/yang yongs su gang ste/lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed//dpe na nas dang /til dang /zla dang /skyon sran gre'u dang /mon sran sne ru la stsogs pa'i sa thon cung dgung na na /
149b2(dkon brtsegs): pa der cung ba sems pa lta bur gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du//rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dri yang sems can gyi ris gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der sems pa yongs su bzung zhing /
149b3(dkon brtsegs): ba chung ngu dang /bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rjes su bzung nas/'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa rol du 'pho'o//dper na bung ba rol sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te/longs
149b4(dkon brtsegs): spyad nas me tog yongs su btang ste me tog gzhan du 'phro la/bung ba de yang me tog dri mi zhim pa longs spyad nas/dri zhim par 'gro bar byed do//me tog gang dang gang la 'byar ba de dang de la chags
149b5(dkon brtsegs): shing ro yang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i lus blangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du langs spyad nas/phyir yang sems can dmyal ba dang /dud
149b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dang /yi dgas kyi nang du lus blangs te/des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas yang phung po lnga po gzhan dag len to//de la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar blta zhe na/dper ni
149b7(dkon brtsegs): gur gum gyi sa bon nam/leb rgan rtsa'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la de dag gi khong na myu gu yang mi snang /me tog kyang mi snang /kha dog kyang mi snang yang sa bon de sa'i khams la btab na
150a1(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams kyis yongs su bdun nas myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed de/myu gu mngon par 'grub nas me tog dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/sngon po 'byung bar gyur/
150a2(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang kha dog de yang sa bon gyi khong na mi gnas la/sa bon med na sang kha dog dang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas//
150a3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i sha tshugs can yin la/sha stag gu'i dbang po 'byung ba'i skye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te/de lta'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang ldan zhing /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /chos kyi skye mched rab tu
150a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur la/'di snyam du gang bdag gis las byas pa de nyid ni bdag yin na snyam du med shes so//lus de yang rnam par shes bya'i rkyen gyis dgus pa yin te/
150a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na dar gyi srin bu rang gi lus las spyad pa'i rgyud byung bas khyim byas lo de nyid de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed de/dbazhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus bskyed nas dang
150a6(dkon brtsegs): drin bu bzhin du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su btang nas med par 'gyur ro//dper na bud chu'i na nas lha 'dri dang //kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang /ng+ga dkar po de la chu'i khams rgya
150a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs la/de'i nang du mi snang bar gyur nas/gang dus pan gnas pa dang /kha dog dang /ji dang /ro rnams gnas par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du
150b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phro zhing 'gro ba der dbang po dag gi spyod yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te/tshor ba dang /sems pa dang /chos kyi khams rnams kyang der 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//dper na yid bzhin gyi nor
150b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che grang du 'gro ba der longs spyod thams cad 'pho zhing 'gro byar 'gyur ro//dper na nyi ma dang 'brel pa'i 'od zer rnams nyi ma gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du 'od zer rnams kyang rjes
150b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dag gang du 'pho bya de dang de nyid du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'pho zhing 'gro'o//gzhan yang rnam par shes
150b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'dis lus yongasu btang nas/dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongs su bzung ste/shA med pa dang /rus pa med pa'i lus 'grub par byed do//de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni
150b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yin no//dbang po'i dngos po rnams ni tshur bas myong ngo //dran pa ni lha'i lta ba pa mthong ste/dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to//dper na rgya shug dang /'bru go dang /a mra dang /nya ti dang
150b6(dkon brtsegs): so'u dang /bil ba dang /ka pid ta lA sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni ro du mar 'grub ste/tsha ba dang /khab dang /skyur ba dang /lan tshwa'i rir dang /bska ba la sogs pa'i ri ris rnam par smin par 'gyur te/
150b7(dkon brtsegs): la la ner che bar 'gyur/la la ni sbyar//la la ni dang re//'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang po gang du 'pho ba der ro yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams
151a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der tshor ba 'pho byar 'gyur ro//bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang dran pa yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang rnam par shes par
151a2(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dis ni lus yongs su btang nas/bdag gis lus 'di yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes so//de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya'o//dge ba'i las kyang rab
151a3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so//mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so//las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te/de bas na rnam par
151a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang lus 'di bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te//de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//dper na rlung gi khams grang bar yang 'gyur zhing /tsha bar yang 'gyur//
151a5(dkon brtsegs): ladri zhim po yang ldan zhing /dri nga bar yang ldan ste/spyod pa de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las byung yang /rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can ma yin la len pa'i rgyus snang ste/
151a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo ba dang /grang ba dang /tshu ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa las rlung gi khams shes par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs
151a7(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin te/gzugs len pa'i rkyen dang /'dod pa len pa'i rkyen dang /lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang /tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa len pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myong bar 'gyu ro///
151b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i rkyen gyis lus dang kha dog skye zhing 'grub par byed pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//de nas tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa stan las ldangs te thal mo sbyar nus bcom ldan 'das la 'dra
151b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzugs ji ltar lte ba bgyi/len pa ni ji lta bu lags/las len pa ni ji ltar lta bar bgyi/lta ba len po ni ji lta bu lags/tshul khrims
151b3(dkon brtsegs): dradang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa ji ltar lta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zla ba 'byor pa legs so legs so//mkhas pas na mkhas pa'i mtshan
151b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid de ltar shes so//zla ba 'byor pa 'di na khwa dag bzang po'am kha dog ngan pa yang rung ste/de ni sha kha ma tshad dang /rtswa dang /rgyas pa dang /mgo bo dang /glad pa dang /rus pa dang /rkang pa dang /
151b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma dang /gnye ma dang /mkhol ma dang /snying dang /lto dang /glo ba dang /phyi sa dang /gcin dang /lgang pa dang /pho ba dang /long ka dang /zhag dang /chu ser dang /rnag dang /khrag dang /
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhris pa dang /bad kan dang /ngang snabs dang /sgra dang /kha spu dang /sen mo dang /spu dang /lpags pas g.yogs pa shin du gyur pa/mi sdug pa dang /mi gtsang ba mang po la brten pa'o//
151b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyur byas pa las mngon par 'grub ste/de yang pha ma phrad pa'i rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur ste/de bas
152a1(dkon brtsegs): /na gzugs len pa'i rgyu zhes bshad do//zla ba 'byor pa lus kyi sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so//gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so//dro ba nyid dang /
152a2(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mo'i khams so//g.yo ba nyid dang /bskum pa dang /btung ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so//lus de'i rab tu shes pa dang /ro'i khams dang
152a3(dkon brtsegs): dri'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /dran pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pas 'di
152a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/lus las rnam par shes pa ji ltar
152a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur/lus yongs su btang nas 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no snyam du ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zla ba 'byor pa 'dir
152a6(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di gnas par gyur nas dus log par gyur nas//khams rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur te/dper na 'o ma dang chu bsres te lhan cig tu bzhag pa ma dang phrad ni/'o ma yang
152a7(dkon brtsegs): logs shig tu 'gyur zhing chu yang logs shig tu 'gyur te/'o ma'i snum gyi khams gang yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin no//zla ba 'byor pa de bzhin du mi shi ba'i khog pa yang
152b1(dkon brtsegs): logs shig tu 'gyur/khams rnams kyang lcogs shig tu 'gyur/rnam par shes pa yang logs shig tu yang 'gyur te/rnam par shes pa de yang khams kyi rten yongs su
152b2(dkon brtsegs): blangs nas/chos kyi khams yongs su len to//dran pa ni chos kyi khams dang /'brel bar 'gyur te/dran pa chos kyi khams dang 'brel pa dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba blangs
152b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro//dper na dge ba chen po zhes bya'i sman mar de ni sman ro tsha ba dang /kha ba dang /skur ba dang /lan tshwa'i ro dang /bsku ba'i ro'i mthu dang /rnam
152b4(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa du ma blangs nas lus kyi nang du 'gro'o//dge ba'i sman mar gyi ro'i mthu dang /rnam par smin pa de nang du song bas/lus la kha dog dang dri dang ro skyed par byed cing /de mir
152b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams yongs su btang nas/lus la 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su blangs shing chos kyi
152b6(dkon brtsegs): khams yongs su blangs nas rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur te/mar gyi khams gang yin pa de ni lus lta bu'o//sman rnams phrad pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams phrad pa lta bu'o///
152b7(dkon brtsegs): sman rnams kyi kha dog dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa lta bu'o//'pho ba gang yin pa de ni shi bo'i dam par shes pa 'pho ba lta bur blta bar bya'o//mi'i kha
153a1(dkon brtsegs): dog rgyas pa dang /mdog byazlang zhing 'dre bar smin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba lta bur bstan to//dge ba chen bu'i sprin mar des mdog ngan cing skya bor 'gyur ba gang yin//
153a2(dkon brtsegs): pade ni mi dge blta bur bstan to//dge ba chen po'i sman mar rin po che ji lta bde bzhin du ni rnam par shes pa'i khams blta bar bya'o//ji ltar dge ba chen po'i smin mar gyis sman rnams kyi kha dog
153a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par byed cing /ro dang /dri 'jug par byed kyang /mar de la rkang lag dang mig med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khyams 'dis kyang yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/
153a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams yongs su len cing /tshor ba yongs su len te/dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to//zla ba 'byor pa mi shi 'phos pa des kyang lha'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur te/'dod pa
153a5(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo //sems can dmyal ba bcu drug kyang mthong ngo //bdag nyid kyi lus rkang lag mnyam pa yang mthong ste/de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi khog pa yin no///
153a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du yang shes so//de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i dran pas lha'i lhas khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra zhing shing gel pa dang /'khri shing dang /ldum bu sna tshogs kyis kun nus bskor
153a7(dkon brtsegs): gser bcom gsar pa'i mdog ltar sba ba sbas pa rnam par dbye ba byas pa dag mthong ngo //des lngas de mthong nas/mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/de dga' ba skyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par
153b1(dkon brtsegs): smin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de'i rnam par shes pa de ni rta la zhon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/dper na g.yul ngor chas pa na/dmag ma'i nang na mi ci la ma rag par chas pa
153b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra las bzung ste/myur ba myur bar zhon par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dge ba la dmigs pa dang 'brel cing dbugs rgyu ba rgod pas chos kyi khams yongs su blangs
153b3(dkon brtsegs): shing skye mjed 'gags te/lus bor nas lha'i gnas 'og min man chad tshangs pa'i bar du yongs su len par 'gyur ro////dam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//de nas sman chen
153b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//rnam par shes pa lus les 'pho ba de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lpags/bcom
153b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen da ltar khyod kyis nga la ji skad bskul ba de bzhin te/legs so legs so//dri ba 'di ni mchog tu zab po//dI ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
153b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bstan par bya ba yin te/rnam par shes pa dri ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
153b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen ni zab po ni zhu bzhu ba la mkhas pa lags te/blo zhib cing 'dzings la mkhas pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
154a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong de bzhin te/rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu spyan chen 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no//bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon
154a2(dkon brtsegs): nu sman chen 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan mu stegs can du gyur nas de 'di snyam du rtog ste/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin/rnam par shos pa'i khams 'di
154a3(dkon brtsegs): su'i yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci lta bu zhig yin snyam mo//bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du chud de/ngas 'di'i the tshom bsal
154a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o//de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sman chen la 'di skad ces smras so//sman chen legs so legs so//khyod ni shes rab rgya che zhing yangs la chos zab mo zhu ba la mkhas
154a5(dkon brtsegs): so//sman chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes la 'jug pa blo dag pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa la bskul cig/zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni byis pa ste yul sred pas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
154a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la lan 'ga' yang ma bskul bskul ba ma byas so//de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' la/dam pa'i chos dang phrad pa yang shin du rnyed par dkas/bcom ldan 'dra
154a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zab pa zab pa'i gnas rnams bcom ldan 'das la bskul cig/de nas sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ston ka'i dus kyi me tog pade'i tshol ltar rgyas pa mthong ngo //mthong
154b1(dkon brtsegs): sa kyang sman chen dad pa skyes te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'tshal bA lags na bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bstan du gastsol/
154b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa'i mthar ma thub par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gshegs pa zhig tu gyur nas/de'i slad na sems can 'di dag gis las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa
154b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal to//'khor ba na yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don gyi phyir yang brag gi rtse mo nas rang
154b4(dkon brtsegs): gi lus bor te/dka' ba rnam pa brgya stong du ma nyams su myong ngo //sman chen khyad ci dang ci 'dod pa dri shig dang //nges khyod la lan gdab po//de skad ces bka' stsal nas//bcom
154b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dri'i rang bzhin ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen sgyu ma
154b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhan gyi mi'i rang bzhin gang yang yin pa dang /mi'i grig ma chu'i nang du 'byung ba gsal ba yin zhing /mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /mig dang ni mkha'i rang
154b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang yin pa dang /sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa bzhin no//sman tshan gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sred pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
155a1(dkon brtsegs): /bka' stsal pa/snying du sdug pa'i mi mthong ba na mig gi dbang po 'pho ba dang /ji ltar mis me long la rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong la/me long gud du phyung
155a2(dkon brtsegs): na rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'phos na/rang gi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams
155a3(dkon brtsegs): des mthong ngo //dper na mi dmus long gis nyi ma 'char ba 'am/nyi ma gang na 'dug pa yang mi mthong la mtshan mo yang zla ba 'char ba dang /nub pa mi mthong ba de bzhin du rnam par
155a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus la mi snang ngo //sman chen 'on kyang lus la sred pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams
155a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/de yang lus 'di'i khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang phung po rnams phrad par byed pa yin no//de la gzugs can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/mig dang
155a6(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang sna da rlo dang sgra rnams so//tshor ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang yid rnams ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i dngos po ste/de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no//sman chen
155a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi'i lce'i thor te sa ro kha ba dang tsha ba dang sgyur ba dang dang ra ba dang lan tshwa'i ro dang bska ba tsher te de'i lce de yang gzugs can yin la/ro'i dngos po yang gzugs can yin no//
155b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du lus 'di la yang nus pa dang rkang dang /sha dang /khrag ni gzugs can yin la tshor ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs can ma yin te gang gis rnam par smin pa dang /bskyod nams
155b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba de ni rnam par shes pa'o//de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
155b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang bsod nams ma lags pa myong ba de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig/bden pa ma mthong bar ni//
155b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'di mi mthong ste/de ni lag mthil du skyu ru ra gzhag pa bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//de ni mig la yang mi gnas te mig las kyang skye ba mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro//bzang skyong
155b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du/ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud de 'on kyang byis po
155b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mi shes pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dpes bstan to//bzang skyong 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin /
155b7(dkon brtsegs): du rig ste/dper na mi la la skem byed dam/brjed byed dam dri za'i gdon rnam lha'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na/bzang skyong 'di ji snyam du sems/ci mi de'i khong na 'dug pa'i skem byed dam/dri
156a1(dkon brtsegs): za 'am/lha de snang ngam gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//mi de'i nang ngam smad rol na yang gdon mi gda' ste gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa lag so///
156a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin du dri zhim pa dang /spos dang bdug pa dang /me tog phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsod nams dang ldan
156a3(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang lus blangs nas/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/tshong dpon nyid dam/lha nyid byed du 'jug ste/de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no//ji ltar
156a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gdon de lha'i me tog phreng ba byin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang rgyul srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dga' bar
156a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing /lus de yang tshim par 'gyur te/de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no//bzang skyong dper na srul po'i gdon mi sdug cing gzugs mi snang ba mi'i lus
156a6(dkon brtsegs): la granas te/mi gtsang ba dang /rul pa dang /ldan ljin dang /gtor khung nas 'bab pa dang /gtor ma 'dod cing de yang gtor ma dris dga' bar 'gyur la mi de yang gdon gyi dbang gis
156a7(dkon brtsegs): dring zhing mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas btsog pa la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las
156b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis skye gnas ngan par bskyed de dbul po 'am/yi dgas dran pa 'am/ldan ljin za ba dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te/de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dri ni bsod nams
156b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa myong ba yang yin no//dper na lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du/rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'di yang bsod
156b3(dkon brtsegs): nams gzugs can ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams bskyed par byed do//dper na srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa mi la gnas shing phyi sa dang /ldan ljin za bar byed pa
156b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te//de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod
156b5(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro bar yang lta'o//bzang skyong de bas na khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o//gdon gyi longs spyod
156b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang ngan pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba dang /mi dge ba lta bur lta'o//mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur lnga'o//do nas bcom ldan 'das la sman tshon gyis 'di/ska/ ces gsol to//bcom
156b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ni len pa'i rgyu ji ltar lta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/dper na rtsub stan las kyang brten/nub shing las
157a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang brten/de skyed pa mi'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te/me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di len pa'i rgyu skyes pa dang /bud med kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang /rig pa dang /
157a2(dkon brtsegs): ro dang /gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//dper na me tog las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/'on kyang me tog de la yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/'bras/
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bur grub pa la yang me tog mi dmigs pa de bzhin du lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/'on kyang lus de la yang rnam par shes pa mi snang la/rnam par shes pa ldog
157a4(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang /lus kyi rus pa dang /rkang dang /mar mar po dang /mi gtsang ba rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro//dper na sa bon de me tog gi kha dog dang dri dang /ro 'debs pa
157a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang /lus yongs su btang nas dge ba dang /mi dge ba btab cing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /yid la byed pa yang btab nas/
157a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o//dper na skyes pa dang /bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad nas/dga' bos brlan te/bud med la shin du dam por 'khyud nas/nyon mongs pa 'byin
157a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/de gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par gyur nas yang bral bar 'gyur ro//de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/der nyon mongs pa phyung nas/'dod chags
157b1(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur te/yang gcig la gcig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas dga' ba bskyed de chags pa 'brel ba byed//dpor/
157b2(dkon brtsegs): na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs mthong nas/skyes pa'i 'dod chags bskyed la yang phrad pa las bral na/phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongasu
157b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs nas yang bar te gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa 'gyur/'di la pha ma phrad pa dang dri za nye bar gnas pa dang /las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pa lus 'grub par byed de/las de dag kyang
157b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin la/skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de yang gzugs can ma yin no//len pa'i rkyen las 'dod pa 'byung ste/dra bas na 'dod pa'i len pa len pa zhes bya'o//gzugs
157b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dod pa len pas na/de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o//sman chen gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa de gang zhe na/'di la tshul khrims ni srog
157b6(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /'bru'i chang dang /sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o//de'i mchog tu 'dzin
157b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//del len pa ni srid pa ste/lha dang mir skye zhing skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa bskyed pa ste/de ni zag pa dang bcas pad
158a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i yongs su smin par byed do//phung po rnams kyi sa bon yang brlan par byed do//lus dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do//rnam par shes pa
158a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyor bar byed do//nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang bsreg par byed de/de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la spyan chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lci'i nang du lus ngas su len pa lags sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar
158a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/sman chen de'i phyir nyon cig/'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'das chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/lha'i lta ba bskyed de/
158a5(dkon brtsegs): deri lta ba de yang sha'i mig le brten pa ma yin no//de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin de ni len pa zhes bya ste/de bas na lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o//de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs pang
158a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa des/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste/der lha rnams lha'i rtse ba dag gis rtse ba mthong nas/de der chags pa skye'o//'di snyam du yang sems te/
158a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni der 'gro'o snyam mo//des der tshigs su ru zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so//dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de yang de ma mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/'di ni bdag gi
158b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/'di la bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len pa'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam mo//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyi
158b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa khog pa de la chags nas/ci'i slad du mi gnas/khog pa de nyid ci'i slad du mi brten/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen dper
158b3(dkon brtsegs): na/mi la la'i sgra dang /kha spu bregs te/ske dang kha spu de mthong nas/mi de 'di snyam du sems te/skra 'di dag ni dri zhim zhing gnag pa yin gyis/'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam na
158b4(dkon brtsegs): sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ci skra de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen de bzhin du rnam par shes
158b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'dis khog pa bor nas phyir yang khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to//rnam
158b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar bsgrub par bgyid cing /rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khog pa yang ji ltar rtol bar bgyid/glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan
158b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi dang /glang ngo che'i rgyal po yang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen dper na/rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i ri brag na gnas pa de
159a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ri phrag de nas byung ste/ri rab dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa ri'i rtse mo d+hi lte bar byud cing /dgyes par byed na spyan chen 'di ji snyam du sems/rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin na
159a2(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu/ri de'i rang bzhin ji lta buM/sman chen gyis gsol pa/rlung gi khams ni sti zhing lus ma mchis par lta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen
159a3(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ji ltar rlung gi khams snyi zhing lus med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang zhan cing lus med mod kyi lus chen po dag dang /chung ngu dgu bskyed par byed de/sbrang bu'i
159a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin to//glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no//dper na mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba 'am/khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de bzhin du
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang /chen po rnams 'grub par byed do//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la
159a6(dkon brtsegs): sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci las de'i gzugs can zhig legs sam/'on te gzugs ma mchis pa lugs/rang bzhin ni ji lta bu
159a7(dkon brtsegs): legs/rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen 'di la las rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang 'byor pa dag
159b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kha zas thob pa yin te/dper na mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las/der gcig gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la/gcig ni sgromA ste shrIn/chung la la zhig gis
159b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyim pas rgyu bcus te/mi de la byin pa yang med/l-i la zhig gis mi cig shos de la bkag pa yang med kyi/bsod nams kyi mthu 'ba' zhig gis cig gis ni chu rnyed la/gcig
159b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni ma stong pa de bzhin du/dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos de dag la lta bar bya'o//zla ba yar gyi ngo dang /mAr gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//
159b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na shing tog rlon pa yongs su smin pa na/kha dog gzhan du 'gyur te/kha dog de dag dang yongs su smin pa yang me'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lus 'di
159b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser dang pasti drug tu rgyun nye bar ston to//lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar ston te//dbang phyug gi rgyan glang yin pa de ni
159b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi dbar bstan to//dper na swa bon sa la btab na/shing gi rtse mor snang ba 'byung la/sa bon de yang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med shing gi nang na yang
159b7(dkon brtsegs): sa bon de mi dmigs la/mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon de blangs te/shing gi rtse mor bzhag par yang med cing /sa bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba yang mi dmigs pa
160a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du las dge ba dang /mi dge ba lus la gnas pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo //dper na sa bon las me tog 'grub pa na/sa bon gyi nang na
160a2(dkon brtsegs): yang me tog mi snang zhing /me tog gi nang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa de bzhin du lus las kyang las 'byung /las
160a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi/lus kyi nang na las mi snang /las kyi nang na yang lus mi snang ngo //dper na me tog yongasu smin pa na/'bras bu mi dmigs pa de bzhin
160a4(dkon brtsegs): du/lus sbyin na las rnams dmigs so//dper na gang na sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar snang ba de bzhin du/lus 'di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der las dge
160a5(dkon brtsegs): pab dang /mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste/lngas de yang gzugs can ma yin la/rnam par smin pa yang gzugs cin ma yin no//dper na mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing /gzugs
160a6(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin pa 'byung lnga/mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/grib ma de yang mi de'i lus dang 'brel pa ma yin la/lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/lus
160a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la dge ba dang /mi dge ba 'brel par 'dug ste/lus gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'brang bar 'gyur te/lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba ma yin la/lus
160b1(dkon brtsegs): med na yang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro//dper na sman tshwa ba dang /kha ba dang /bska ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkru sman btang na/nAd thams cad las thur bar 'gyur zhing /
160b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mdog rgyas pa yang lus la snang bar 'gyur ba de/ji ltar sman tsha ba dang /khu ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon shur 'dug pa dang /yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing 'di snyam du ma
160b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ni/sman zos gor ma chag gI snyam du shes par 'gyur mod kyi/sman de dag gi ro dang /smin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ro dang smin pa gzugs can ma yin pa yang mi'i mdog
160b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/dge ba'i las 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/de las lus 'grub nas/kha zas dang nye bar spyad pa dang /longs spyod dang /gos kyi brag gi
160b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang gi rkang lag mnyam zhing /mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/nor bu dang /gser dang /dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no//rigs dang
160b6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las nyams pa dang /nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang /kha zas ngan pa za zhing me la stan ngan pa dang /gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can
160b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no//dper na me long gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa 'am mi sdug pa snang la me long gi gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs ma yin pa de bzhin
161a1(dkon brtsegs): du dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di rnams dang /mi rnams dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yid dgas kyi nang du skye bang/
161a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/sman chen las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o//de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'dis dbang
161a3(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ji ltar 'bebs/lus chen po yang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen 'di lta ste dper na rngon pa nags thibs po'i
161a4(dkon brtsegs): nang du song nas gzhu shin du bkang ste/dug mangs spos kyi glang po che bong tshod che ba la/bsnun la dug de yang khrag dang phrad na yan lag dang /nying lag rnams 'pho zhing 'gro ste/
161a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad 'dor la gnad rnams su snun cing khrag gis kha dog sbyar te/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la/phyir yang lus bor nas/dug
161a6(dkon brtsegs): de lus phyir byung na sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/dug dro dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i tshod ji tsam/gsol pa/ri rab dang /yungs 'bru bzhin lags so//bka' stsal pa/dug
161a7(dkon brtsegs): de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la khams rnams kyang yongasu gtang ngo //de ltar na rnam par shes
161b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do//sman can gzhan yang khrod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par she ba 'di de ltar lus rten po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces ze ba ni/ji ltar kho ga
161b2(dkon brtsegs): che zhing dwags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te/dper nA ri'i rgyu la pe ri rib kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/de yang klu'i rgyal po dga'o dang /nye dga'
161b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis gsum khris yongs su bkris te/klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas rgya mtsho ba tung bar mi rung bar 'gyur zhing de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g.yo bar
161b4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spyo ba che zhing yangs pa bzhin du nor rgyus kyi bu dang /'jog po gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o//sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems de dag gi rnam par shes pa
161b5(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan no//sbrang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam na de ltar lta bar mi bya ste/sman chen 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid lta bu'i yang yin la/de nyid de dag gi yang yin no//dben
161b6(dkon brtsegs): dug bdas na ba dang /ha la ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu yang klu'i rgyal po dga'o dang /nye dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos nA/de dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro//sman chen 'di ji snyam
161b7(dkon brtsegs): du sems/dga'o dang nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang /bad san pa dang /ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang yin pa de'i nang na/ches mang ba gang yin/gsol pa/
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dga'o dang nye dga' gnyis kyi dug chos mang bar lta bar bgyi ste/bad sa nub dang /ha la ha lA'i dug ni de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan
162a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la gzugs/
162a3(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin par lta bar bya'o//rnam par shes pa de yang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par byed de/dper na shing n+ya gro da'i sa bon chung ngu las/shing gi
162a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mtho zhing rgya che lo/yal ga dang /yal ga phre'u brgyad stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/sa bon de'i tshed ni ji tsam
162a5(dkon brtsegs): shing de'i tshad ni ji tsam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru'i nang dang /bar snang bzhin te/khyad che legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
162a6(dkon brtsegs): sman chen de bzhin du sa bon de'i nang na yang shing mi snang la/sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du rnam
162a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs chen po 'grub par 'gyur te/lus la yang rnam por shes pa mi dmigs la/rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye ba mi dmi/
162b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam pa yam mas sam samam/anathas mnathas mamams mkhas mthas mamaya
162b2(dkon brtsegs): so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyas chung ba
162b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen dper na/mi dbul po la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed nas des yid
162b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas/lha'i gnas dang /skyed mos tshal dang /skyed tshil dang /zhing dang /ra ba dang /sgo khang dang /shing gel pa dang /'khri shing sna tshogs kyis
162b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dang /khang pa me tog gis gtor ba dang /rdzas dang /yo byad dag sprul no/sman chen de dag thams cad ni mi brtan zhing nyams chung la myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa'i chos
162b6(dkon brtsegs): can yin te/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de mi de'i lag nas stor na/de'i bde ba'i longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro//ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis
162b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi phyed la de'i yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin lta bu yin la lus gang yin pa de ni snying po med do//
162b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa de ji ltar gzugs 'khrang zhing sra ba phye ste 'pho zhing mchi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen dper na//
163a1(dkon brtsegs): tshu rgyun kun du ma pa rigs pan dag pa snad nyid la te byu na/sman can sa mas/sman nas sra ba gang seMn+tu/gsalag /
163a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis 'khrung la rdo rje ltar brtan zhing sleb lags la/rgya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam snying reg na bde ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
163a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can gyi ris na sems can shi 'phos
163a4(dkon brtsegs): lce rnams kyi nang du skye ba len pa lpags/ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen
163a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir nyin cig/sems can de shi 'phos nas/bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyisna yongs su zin nas/lus yongs su btad nas/rnam par shes pa des
163a6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i lci ba yongasu spangs te/lha'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro//de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo //sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo //
163a7(dkon brtsegs): lus de yang 'dor bar mthong ngo //lha rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang /dga' tshal dang /'dras tshal dang /me tog gi rna rgyan dang /shing ku she sh+ya dang /ko ka na da dang /gzhal med khang //
163b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshal stug po dang /lha'i bu mo rtse bas bskor ba yang mthong ngo //rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i 'ongs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang /se mo dodang
163b2(dkon brtsegs): gdub zlum dang /gdub le ba dang /dpung rgyan sba zhing spras pas brgyan pa de dag kyang des mthong ngo //lha gzhon nu dang lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing /yid rab tu dga' ba yang des mthong ngo ///
163b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag mthong nas kun du chags pa bskyed de//de der kun du chags pas dga' ba mthong bar 'gyuraro//dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro//de snying dga' bas de'i tshe/
163b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur te/'di ltar bzhin gyi mdog pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro//sna yang yo bar mi 'gyur/de khwa yang gnam par mi
163b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de bzhin du de'i mig ud pa la sngon po'i mngab ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro//de'i gnad rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur/de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur/phyi sa yang
163b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur/de spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur/da'i sen mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur/lag pa yang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur/rkang lag kyang g.yob par mi byed
163b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro//sman chen de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di ltar khang par brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong /
164a1(dkon brtsegs): /gis brgyan pa mthong ste/lha'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang /lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i phreng ba shin du zhim pa dag mthong ngo //
164a2(dkon brtsegs): lha gzhon nu rgyan dang gser gyi mchog dang /se mo do dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo //des lha'i gzhon nu dag mthong nas
164a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba skye'o//de yid dga' bas khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te//so me tog kun da dang /ku mu da ltar dkar bar snang ngo //mig ha cang yang mi 'dzums
164a4(dkon brtsegs): ha cang yang mi 'byed do//sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo //de'i bzhin yang pad+ma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro//shrI ba'i khog pa yang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/ha cang grang bar yang mi
164a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags chen po 'dron par mi byed do//de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyuraro//phyogs kyang mun par snang bar
164a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro//de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs shin du dri zhim zhing shin du yongs su dag pa tshor bar 'gyuraro//de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur/de'i lta ba yang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/
164a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dad pa skye bar 'gyur/gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na gzhig nas phyir 'ongs pa 'am/ring mo zhig tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin
164b1(dkon brtsegs): du mgul nas mkhyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste/'di skad du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul ni 'di yin gyis/dang dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong shig ces des gnyen de dang /yang
164b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do//sman chen gal te sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam re re la tshigs bcang dang /
164b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs su bcad pa dang /gtam sna tshogs dang /gtan tshigs sna tshogs brjod cing sla la/de'i tshogs gnyid la yang sred par mi 'gyur zhing gnyid kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro na/bde
164b4(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad dang ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ro//de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha dang lha mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi steng na 'dug la/lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lhag pa/lha'i
164b5(dkon brtsegs): lag pa'i steng du bzhag cing /de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag byung ste/lha mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas/lha de la 'di skad du/lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la byab
164b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis/dgyes par mdzod cig ces zer ro//des kyang me tog rnams la ga par mnye zhing phur bar byed do//des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
164b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang /dbang po rnams bor zhing dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste/khams rnams yongs su btang nas/khams kyi don yongs su blangs te/mi gsal zhing
165a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin la/dz+nyAnon pa lta bu dang /nyi ma dang /me shel dang /bsreg bya lta bu dang /chul zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /sbubs kyi nang gi rlung lcing
165a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o//de yang de'i tshe me tog la rten nas/pha ma khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi na du
165a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dres par 'gyur ro//ya nga der 'dud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang /lha gzhon nu rna cha rngub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang

165a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/sman chen dper na rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang /ri dang nags tshul la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
165a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do//sman chen gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phreng //

165b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa de yang pha ma'i dbang gis 'jug ste/rnam par shes pa yang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs la/lus med par yang rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ngo //sman chen dper na mi
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ma byung bar gzugs dang /dro ba dang /kha dog gsal bar mi snang ngo //sman chen de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed

166a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongs su ma bzung ba des ji ltar lus gzhan la gnas par bgyid/rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka

166b1(dkon brtsegs): dong sang na sa/mdu dang /ral gri dang /mda' dag gis snying myos te/g.yul dar d+ha'i mchog las sal lhung la/nga yang lus kyis 'bod rtu lA yongs sbyangs pa zhig ste/myur ba myur
166b2(dkon brtsegs): ba rAng las rti'i rgyab tu 'gong bar byed na/ji ltar mi de lhung na N+Da la zhon pa dang /mgong che bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la rtal 'ag bya na/rta 'gro bzhin du 'god pa chen po 'gong bar byed pa
166b3(dkon brtsegs): debazhin du rnam par shes pa la yang blta bar bya'o//ji ltar mi pha rol gyi dmag tshegs kyis 'jigs shing skrag nas rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'dis theg ma shi 'phos
166b4(dkon brtsegs): nas lha'i dmigs pas yongs su zin cing /lha dang lha mo'i khri steng na 'dug pa mthong nas/shin du myur bar skye ba yongs su len to//sman chen gzhan yang dang be shi 'phos nas da dung ma skyes
166b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis smras pa de ni/dper na mi'i 'grib mchu'i steng du bab pa gzugs su lAm snang mod kyis/de gzugs su gtogs
166b6(dkon brtsegs): par yang blta bar mi bya'o//sman chen dper na rkang lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dri ba'am/grang ba 'am/lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing /lus
166b7(dkon brtsegs): de la ni shi'i drim bu lto bu yang ming ngo //grib ma de la ni khams kyis glegs pa yang me de//mi'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal po'i sgra 'am/bde ba
167a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byung ba yang med do//de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas lus kyi khog pa bor te/gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro//sman chen de ltar//

167a5(dkon brtsegs): de na/sems can gyi ris nas 'chi 'pho ste/shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni de nyid yin te/sems can dmyal ba 'di nas shi 'phos so//'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no snyam
167a6(dkon brtsegs): du dran pa skye'o//shi 'phos pa de'i lus de ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur to/yan lag skyes rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo //dang
167a7(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos po de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nas sems can dmyal ba sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo //rnam par shes pa dang po sha 'phos po de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'dreb par 'gyur
167b1(dkon brtsegs): tod+ha phyogs kha gcig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa grazhi khrag gos gtor ba mthong nas de der chags pa bskyed par 'gyur ro//de chags par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba ba'i lus
167b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/de'i rnam par shesngo pa des las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin du rul cing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa ma rnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te/dper na
167b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba dang /ldan ljin mnam po'i rkyen gyis srin bu skye ba dang /dper na zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /chang mnam por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro//sman chen de bzhin

167b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/bzang skyong der khrag gi nang na skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chu thung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni
167b7(dkon brtsegs): sprin sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'gyur ro//ba tsha can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi gur 'byung bar 'gyur//de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gozhon nu bde dkur rim
168a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa ltar gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro//bzang skyong de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur te/mgo bo gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro//sen mo ring zhing kha spu yod la spun
168a2(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur zhing rkang lag mi sdug par 'gyur te/gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi la ltar 'gro na/mthong ma thag tu 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
168a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi/de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang mdo//de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la
168a4(dkon brtsegs): sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman chen sems can dmyal ba de ni de dag
168a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'khyam la/shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar por snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te/de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig brjod par byed de/kha zas 'dod pa khyed chur
168a6(dkon brtsegs): sheg/ces zer ro//de dag kun nas 'phungs te/snyim pa bzed nas zangs dang ra gan skol ba ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/snyim pa bzed cing zangs dang ra gan skol ba'i kha zas de
168a7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dod pas kha gdangs te/zangs dang ra gan za bar byed do//de dag zangs dang ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des/suM ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing khog pa 'bar bar 'gyuraro//sman chen de dag kha
168b1(dkon brtsegs): zas 'drubs bslus nas sdug bsngal shin du che ba myong bar 'gyur ro//sman chen sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa rus pa'i lus dag la gnas pa

174b6(dkon brtsegs): mo 'dri ni stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' grang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na rab tu bstan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas//'khor ba na gnas kyang mngon par

175a1(dkon brtsegs): drang po spyod pas na//yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur//mos pa'i stobs ni gang yin pa//nyes pa mang po spong byed cing //dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pas ni//
175a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag brtson la gnas por 'gyur//sbyor ba phun sum chog gyu pA/rtag tu legs par rab brtan nas//brtson 'grus brtan par gyur pas na//sems can rnams ni bde ba
