175a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs gang yin des//thegs pa dman pa spong byed cing //sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas//chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur//byams chen stobs kyi dbang bris na//
175a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can snyoms par lta byed cing //byams sdang dag ni med pas na//zhe sdang gnod pa bskyed mi 'gyur//snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni//sems can dang du len byed cing //'khor
175a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la zhen med cing //yongasu skyo zhing dul ba med//dge ba'i bla shes gnyin stobs kyis ni//rtag par phan tshun chad med cing //sems ni bying bar mi 'gyur bas//byang chub la ni/
175a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur//dpa'o gang yin de dag gis//stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur nas//byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni//bdud dpung mang po bcom par 'gyur//gzhan yang bu mi
175b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/dang po ni sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/
175b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro//gnyis pa ni chos thams cang mnyam par gyur pa ste/chos thams cad rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro//gsum pa ni zhing thams cad mnyam
175b3(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa ste/stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//bzhi pa ni shes pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/mnyam pa nyid stong pa'i phyir ro//lnga pa ni spyod pa
175b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro//drug pa ni thegs pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro//bdun
175b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems mnyam par gyur pa ste/sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro//brgyad pa ni bdud rnams mnyam par gyur pa ste/nyon mongs pa'i thog ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro///
175b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos rnams brgyad kyis mnyam pa nyidadu la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de sgra' stsal pa/sems can rang bzhin bdag
175b7(dkon brtsegs): med pas//ska gcig tsam yang dmigs mi 'gyur//mnyam pa nyid la gang gnas pa//de lta bur ni bstan par bya//chos rnams thams cad mnyam pas na//rang bzhin rtag par
176a1(dkon brtsegs): spyong zhing dben//yi ges tha dad phye bar zung //chos rnams rang bzhin bye blag med//phyogs bcu zhing rnams thams cad kun//mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs
176a2(dkon brtsegs): pas /de yi rang bzhin na mkha' 'dra//sangs rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam//dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun//chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na//ye shes
176a3(dkon brtsegs): mthu'i yas rnam par grol//sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no//sems can rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rnams//thams cad kun kyang mnyam pa dang //de yi spyod pa rab shes pas///
176a4(dkon brtsegs): ci rigs par ni go bar byed//sems can ji snyed tha dad pa//sgyu 'phrul lta bur rab tu rtogs//phyi ning gnyi ga len med pas//rang bzhin rtag tu rnam par dog/theg pa sna chog
176a5(dkon brtsegs): ra ba bshad kyang //'dus ma byas su rab tu mnyam//'dren pa sa thabs ni rab mkhyen pas//rnam par phye ste thigs gsum bshang //nyon mongs bdud la rab gnas kying //
176a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs dngos po ci yang med//lha dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud//spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin//gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ches brgyad dang ldan na byam
176a7(dkon brtsegs): sdang rnams yongs su spong bar byed //brgyad gang zhe na/byams pa dang ldan pa dang /snying rje dang ldan pa dang /rtag par phan 'jog par byed pa dang /'jig rten gyi chos la ma
176b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang /rang gi lus la chags pa med pa dang /rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems bsgom pa dang /lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang /nyon mongs pa rnams la so sor rtog
176b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/chos brgyad po 'di dag ni mngon par bsgrub par nus na byams sdang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byams
176b3(dkon brtsegs): sems go cha rab bgos nas//thams cad kuni la snying brtse zhing //mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa//byams sdang snyems ni skye mi 'gyur//blo ldan pan+da 'dogs spyod pas na//
176b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag par gzhan la bde ba gtong //rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mtho//brnyas shing smad kyang kho na 'dzin med//rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyod pos//byams sdeng drug ni mi skye zhing //bdag
176b5(dkon brtsegs): gi gal te gzhan yang rung //byams dang 'du shes yongs mi bskyed //'du shes dag ni rab spangs nas//spyod yul dag pa zhon pa med//rtag par rang gi lus rtogs pas//
176b6(dkon brtsegs): lus srog dag la phyangs pa med//mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bde bya yis//g.yos par mi 'gyur na mkha' bzhin//nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na/bdag dang bdag gi
176b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyi ga spong //spyod 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas//byams sdang dag na yong mi bskyed//gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar mi 'gyur ro//brgyad
177a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhan/dge ba'i d+d+ha yangs shing rgyan pa'i d+hi r+ya dang /sems can las sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang /rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mtho shing mchod
177a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i phyir dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams mthong de'i phyir/rtag pad+ma sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongs su gakhyer ba'i phyir dang /'khor ba rmi lam lta bur rab tu rgyug
177a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir dang /chos khyad par can dag la zhugs pa'i phyir dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dod yang dag pa'i mtha' la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
177a4(dkon brtsegs): yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/rnal 'byor lam ni gang bsgom pa//dge sbyong skyon phan dri ma myed//bar snang zla ba rnam dag bzhin//sdug bsngal sems can sgrol bar
177a5(dkon brtsegs): byad//yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir//'khor bas yongs su dral mi 'gyur//soms can rang bzhin rtogs byed cing //rab brtan brtson 'grus spyod par byed//sangs rgyas
177a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni tshad med du//sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas//de phyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa//'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur//'jig rten dpag med tshad med dang //bas
177a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab chos ston cing //dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod//chos rgyal ting du mngon 'tshang rgya//tshul khrims dam par gang bsrung ba//'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur
177b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing //'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa//rmi lam sbyin dang glog ltan shes//chos rbA/gang zhig rnam grol ba//'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur//byang chub lnga ni rab gnas
177b2(dkon brtsegs): shing //dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde/thabs kyi pha rol gang yin dri//'khor byas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur//rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang //bar snang ci bzhin 'brel bar
177b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//sangs rgyas yon tan glang mos pa//'khor bas yongasu ngal mi 'gyur//'khor ba mu mtha' med 'gyur kyang //rtag par yang dag mtha' la gnas/gi yul tsam shes rab
177b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes 'thun pa//'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur//gzhan yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan na sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/sems su dang mtshungs par
177b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /sems chu dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang //sems me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang //sems rlung dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang //sems
177b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang //sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par 'gyur dwa'i phyir dang //sems rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
177b7(dkon brtsegs): sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir te//'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshig su bcad
178a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/sems na sa dang mtshungs pasan//thams ca khun du khyer bar byeng //dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung //'phel bu meng cing 'grib pa med//snyoms
178a2(dkon brtsegs): ni chu dang mtshungs pas na//dri ma mi gtsang lakhri byed cing //'jig rten rnams ni gso po dang //nyon mongs gdung ba sil bar byed//sems ni me dang mtshungs bas na//nyon
178a3(dkon brtsegs): mongs dag ni bsreg byed cing //sgron ma chen po snang ba yin//gsal bar mi byed gang yang med//sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na//gnas pa med cing rten med par//tshul
178a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims thos pa dri yas ni//dus gsum kun du khyad par byed//sems ni ni mkha' mtshungs pas na//lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag/thams cad kun du 'jug byed kyang //
178a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi rjes su 'brang mi byed//sems ni chos dbyings mtshungs bsnun//bde ba nyid du rab gnas shing //'phel ba myed cing 'dri ba med par//rtag par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug
178a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi//rnam par grol ba thob gyur kyang //'ching ba dag kyang yod min la//grol ba dag kyang yod pa min//'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das//'ong ba med
178a7(dkon brtsegs): cing 'gro ba med//rab dben nyer zhi gnas nas ni//dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed//gzhan yang bu mo chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung
178b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas su 'gyur ro//brgyad gung zhen//dang ba ni sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te//ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro//gnyis pa ni tshul khrims 'byung gan sa//
178b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin to//nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsum po nr-i bzod pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te//zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro//bzhi pa ni brtson 'grus 'byung gnas su gyur
178b3(dkon brtsegs): po yin te//le lo med cing nung de med pa'i phyir ro//lnga pa ni brasam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te//thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro//drug pa ni shes rab 'byung gnas byung
178b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/tshul khrims bsrung ni pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//bdun po ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/rnam par grol bas nye bar ni bIr 'gyur ba'i/
178b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro//brgyad pa ni mngon par shes pa 'byong gnas su gyur yin pa yin te/rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
178b6(dkon brtsegs): tshugs su bcod de bka' stsal pa//rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong ba//'dod chagasku gdung ba spong bas nas//'bras bu rnam smin mi ri bar//sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo bar byed//
178b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan theg pa che ba'i phyir//bcad cing btubs kyang khong khro med//rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing //bag chags spangs pas 'gog ma ngon med//byang chub sem
179a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal brtson 'grus can//skal mang sems can ched du ni//sdug bsngal zod cing 'jig rten rgya//brtson 'grus stobs ni 'phel bar byed//bsam gtan
179a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni gang bsgom pa/spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing //bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur kyang //bsam gtan rjes su yo mi ste//shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas//
179a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar lha rnams ni spong byed cing //'jig rten stong dben rig pas na//gti mug mud pa ma lus spel//nyer zhi tshangs gnas gang bsgom pa//ngan song rnams ni spangs pas na//
179a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur//don gyi phan pa nan tan bsgom//mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgya ba//sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan//rang bzhin mos pa rab
179a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas//chos bshad sems can zlos par byed//gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpolnga ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob par
179a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang //mkhan po dang slob dpon lnga rim gro byed pa'i phyir deng //chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang /
179a7(dkon brtsegs): jiskad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par bstan par byed pa'i phyir dang //chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang //gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir nga //chos smra ba dag la
179b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po bzhin du gus pas smi zhu byed pa'i phyir dang /gzhan gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spangs par bskul bar byed pa'i phyir te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos brgyad dang ldan na//
179b2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs dang thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/rtse gci ka rtag tu
179b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyer ba//mkhan po dge ba shes rim gro byed//sdig pa'i grogs po spong bas na//mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur//mang thos yongs su skyo med par//rab brtson chos
179b4(dkon brtsegs): ni gnyer bar byed//ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pa//rnyed pa dge la re tshol med//spobs pa rnam dag gang thob pa//'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na//chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing
179b5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed//chos spyod mngon par zhen med cing //gzungs ni gang zhig thob 'gyur ba//khrims srung rang lus lta bas na/gzhan gyi nyes skyon yong mi tshol//
179b6(dkon brtsegs): byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing //dus min tshig ni mi smra bas//thogs med spobs pa thob 'gyur nas//sgo tshig pha rol phyin pa ston//chos ni legs par smra ba lA//mkhan po
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gus par byed//skyon 'cha ba nyes pa spong bskul bas//mi zad kun 'dzin rgya mtsho thob//gzhan yang bu mi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas
180a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//brgyud gang zhe na/srog la bab par gyur na gzhan gyi nyes pa mi brjod pa dang /sems can rnams dkon mchog
180a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bskul ba dang /thams cad byang chub kyi sems la 'god pa dang //tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzu
180a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag byas nas pad+mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang /sems can mya ngan byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang /khengs shing nga rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag nyid
180a4(dkon brtsegs): dman par byed pa dang /gang la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur
180a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang /nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra//rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags pa//sangs rgyas rgyan ra brdzus te skye//byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //thams cad mkhyen pa
180a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bskul nas//rtag tu tshongs par gang spyod pa//sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te ste//gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs brgyan te//rin chen pad+ma ga dran la bzhag/
180a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can mya ngan gang sel ba//sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye//nga rgyal byed pa de dag la//slong mo bzhin du bdag dman zhing //gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba//sangs
180b1(dkon brtsegs): mang ya yams mkhamam pathachams sa mams mtham/a maHthas maH thas mamam ya kab kham la thamamamamayamathamayas tham yamaH tham pam tam
180b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyus spyan spang gardzas te ste//gzhan yang bla ma rnaMs brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/sbyangs pa'i yan tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rtag par dgon pa na gnas pa la mos par 'gyur//
180b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/'dodu ba chung ba dang /tshig shes pa dang /dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /dge bas bdag nyid gas par byed pa dang /rtag par 'phags
180b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang /'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par spro ba dang /rtag par mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang spyod pa dang bdag med par
180b5(dkon brtsegs): bya dang /dad pa shin du brtan zhing gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pas
180b6(dkon brtsegs): chos dga' dge mang bdag nyid gso//rtag par 'phags rigs bsgrub la mos//'khor ba'i sbyin mthong sems la skrag/sbyad pa dag la rtag mos par//bse ru gcig ltar
180b7(dkon brtsegs): grogs kyang med//'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces//blo yis rab dang brtson 'grus gnas//chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'brang //rtag par dben gnas sangs rgyas bslam
180b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pas thag bsrings gdung ba med//rtsod sgra nyes dmigs mang ba med//nya ba shes yongs su bsngags gcod pa//des na dgon par gnas la mos//gzhan yang bu mo
181a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do//brgyad gang zhe na/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhugs pa dang /mtshan
181a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang /smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang /nang the tshom dang sem nyis med pa
181a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rtswa skye ba med par rab tu brjod pa dang /ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang /thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi byed pa
181a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa//rnam thar gsum thob bdud dpung rab
181a5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'joms//'dus byas dus min mtshan nyid gnyis su med//skyon med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur//chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa//de dag bdud dpung
181a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu pham par byed//skye ba med dang 'gagra med 'di dag dang //phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra//chos la ngo bo nyid med ngas rtogs shing //de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs
181a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pas//chos rnams bdud kyi las shes gang 'byed pa//rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed//thabs dang shes rab gnyi ga rab spyod cing //yod dang stong
181b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa med par ni//de ltar chos mchog gang zhig sgom byed pa//thabs mkhas gzugs lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur//gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
181b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/yang dag pa'i lta bas log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
181b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byed pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying rje bar byed pa dang /yang dag pa'i las
181b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su sdud pa dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba rnams yongs su bzlog pa dang /yang dag bri'i 'tsho bas log par
181b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang /yang dag pu'i rtogs pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting nge
181b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la gnas pa dag bslang nas gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/yang dag lha dang gang ldan pa//
181b7(dkon brtsegs): log lta de dag smin par byed//rtag par yang dag rtsol bsgoms pas//log sems dag la brtse bar byed//rnam dag yang dag dag gis ni//log sgra rnam par brtse bar byed//
182a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag las mtha' gnas pa yis//log pa'i lus can spyad par byed//rtag par yang dag rtsa lnga bsgoms nas//log brtson dag ni spyod mi byed//yang
182a2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'tsho ba rjes mthun pa ste//log 'tsho gang yin sdud par byed//blo ldan yA de dag rtog pa yis//log par yid byed brtse bar sems//yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas
182a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/log pa'i ting 'dzin sdud par byed//bla med yang dag ldum brgyad kyis//chu bo dag las bde bar sgrol//rgyun phyogs ded pa zlos byed pas//da ni byang chub lam
182a4(dkon brtsegs): chen yin//nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams//rtswa yi gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlos//byang chub sems dpa' kun zlos pas//dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra//
182a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud rtsi'o lam mngon du byed par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/rtsod pa med pa'i chos la
182a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang /thogs pa'i sems legs par rab tu srung bar byeng pa dang //rtog par de kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed pa dang //byang chub kyi sems rab tu gnas nas
182a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su drad pa drug sgom par byed pa dang /nan tan brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed pa dang //dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags nas sems can yongs su smin par
182b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /snying rje chen po la glanas nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su sdud par byed pa dang /mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nus phyir mi ldog pa lta rab tu gnas pa gang yin
182b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs na//dge sbyong tshe yi chos la gnas//zhe sdang nyes pa yongs spangs
182b3(dkon brtsegs): nas//dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsogs par byed//yang dag don ni rab lta bas//mi zad spobs rnams thob par byed//byang chub sems la rab gnas nas//rtag par dran med
182b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran//pha rol phyin pa thams cad kun//rab brtson bsgrubs pas log pa med//thabs mkhas stobs rnams thob pas na//des ni sems can sgrol bar byed//
182b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni//brtse sems thams cad kun sbyin pas//myur du mi skye bzod thob nas//byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur//gal te de ltar spyod nus na//
182b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'//ring por mi thogs bdud btul nas//byang chub mcho ga ni thob par 'gyur//de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas dga' mgu rangs par
182b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos rnam pa du dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags//bcom ldan 'das
183a1(dkon brtsegs): /kyis bka' stsal pa/bu mo ches brgyad dang ldan par gyur na bud mod kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro//brgyad gang zhe na/phrag dog mi byed pa dang //
183a2(dkon brtsegs): sor sna mi byed pa dang /g.yo sgyu med pa dang /khong khro ba med pa dang /bden par smra ba dang /bag rtsub po mi smra ba dang /'dod chags spangs pa dang /log par lta ba
183a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/bu mo chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par bsgrubasran/myur du bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan
183a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gzhan la phrag dog mi byed cing //ser sna spangs nas chos mos pa//g.yo sgyu dag ni mi spyod cing //
183a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med lus la skyo ba dang //byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas//rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang /'dod bsal dgra rtsub spangs nas ni//yong dag lnga la
183a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya//gang gis bud med lus skyo nas//'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na//myur du bud med lus spangs nas//skyes pa'i lus bzang len par 'gyur//gzhan
183a7(dkon brtsegs): yang bu mo chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyuraro//brgyad gang zhe na/sangs rgyas lo bla mar byed cing chos la shin du mos pa dang
183b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims drang bzod pa dang mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur drang rim gro byed pa dang /skyes pa dang bud med dang khyim gyi dngos po dag la
183b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen cing chags pa med pa dang /bslab pa'i dngos po yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par byed pa dang /srog chags thams cad la log pa'i bsam pa mi
183b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos pa la yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub kyi sems kyis skyes bu chen po'i chos la gnas pa dang /'jig
183b4(dkon brtsegs): rterton pa'i khyim gyi 'tsho tshis rnams la sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bkra' stsal pa/sangs rgyas
183b5(dkon brtsegs): rab gus tshos la mos//tshul khri mas mang thos bla mar byed//'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na//bud med dngos po myur du spong //khrims srung ngo tsha khrel yod
183b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan du/gzhan la mi bden bsam mI khyab//byang chub sems la rab gnas nas//theg pa gzhon la mo sra byed na//des ni myur ba kho nar yang //mi gtsang bud med
183b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po spong //bsam pa mchog gi sems skyo nas//thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang //chos rnams rang bzhin g.yo med dang //rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben zhes//nan tan
184a1(dkon brtsegs): /yang dag chos bsgoms na//myur du skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur//de nas bu mo rnam dag dang bu gsor gyi phreng ba thogs pa de dag bcom ldan 'dra/
184a2(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par gtor ba dang /steng gi bar snang la go ser yang dag pa'i gzhal med khang dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu gyur nas/gzhal med kheng
184a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nang du sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa sha stag mngon par byung bar gyur to//de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang so so nas lus kyi rgyan
184a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams bkrol nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang /steng gi bar snang la gser gyi gzhal med khang dang /rin po che'i gur dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /bkod
184a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to//de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong ba dang /skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bcom ldan mi mchog
184a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags pas nas//thugs rje sems can rnams la sman par mdzad//bdag cag dang ni byang chub sems bskyed nas//mos pa rjes 'thun rab tu dul la gnas//bcom
184a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'dren pa bde bar rab stsal pas/bdag cag mi mchog la ni mchod par bgyi//chos thos dbang gis rdul rnams rab spangs pas//bdag cag the tshom nom nur yong ma mchis
184b1(dkon brtsegs): des na bud med nyon mongs yongs spangs nas//nyon mongs gtan bcos bdud ni pham par bgyis//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad mod rnams//bdag cag dka' bas rtag tu mchod//
184b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal/sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus rab gnas nas//bzod dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyi//thabs dang shes rab sems ni yongs bsdus nas//byang chub mchog/
184b3(dkon brtsegs): lam gang lagaso mngon du bgyi//lha mi'i 'khor ni tshad med sman btags nas//thams cad theg chen sems ni bskyed par bskul//bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur//
184b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag lha mi'i ston pa bgyid par mchis/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do//sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni nam 'dzum pa mdzad pan 'di zer kha dog rnam pos tshogs
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /dngul dang /shel gyi khwa dog lta bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/'jig
184b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams tshad med/dpag tu med pa dag nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khya par snang bar byams nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
184b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu thim par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di lta
185a1(dkon brtsegs): bu bstan par mdzod lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dang ba 'di mthong dum/kun dag 'os gsol pa/mthong
185a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga'o bu mo rnam dag dang ba la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas tshe zad pa dang /bud myed kyi lus spangs
185a3(dkon brtsegs): nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes te/bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang /bskul pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskur bsti dang /rim gro dang mchod pa
185a4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur bas/bu mo rnamo ngag dang ba bskal ba bye bya khrag khrig brgyang khri zhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams grog gi 'od ces bya bar mngon par rdzogs par
185a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa 'o bzer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//bskal pa bzang po'i ming ni rtag tu snang ba zhes bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i
185a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du tshe la stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams ngan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi 'khor
185a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'khor byed par 'gyur ro//bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang /'khor de dag gi nang na gtso bo mchog byed par 'gyur ro ji ltar nga ltar de'i tshe/byung /
185b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po dag glan por gyur pa bzhin no//kun dga'o bud med gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongs su 'dzin par
185b2(dkon brtsegs): byibyed klog par byed/kha ton du gdon par byeng na bud med kyi lus 'od gtugs nas phyis yang len par mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
185b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshung rgyu bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bu mo rnam dag dang ba lto sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /
185b4(dkon brtsegs): myu yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' nas mngon par bstod to//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pachen po'i chos
185b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las rnam dag dang bas zhes pa'i le'u ste/'dus pa bzhi/bcu pa rdzogs so///lo ts+tsha ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya nag gi dpal sa/
185b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te/gtan la bab pa/////rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA mA tI ya/prits+tsha pa ra berta nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa byams pas zhus pa'i le'u
185b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo///bam po gcig pa//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
186a1(dkon brtsegs): nA/bcom ldan 'das yul brgan chu srin byis pa gsod pa lta bu'i 'jigs su rung nga'i nags ri dwags kyi nags na/dge slong lta brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi
186a2(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/mngon par shes pa/gnas brtan nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kaM din+ya dang /tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
186a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /tshe dang ldan ming chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang /tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa lakha

186b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros phreng dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan dang /blo gros yang pa dang /spobs pa brtsegs dang //

186b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//dri nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas ston las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig
186b7(dkon brtsegs): tu gaHra nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljongs la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la 'dir logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
187a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan las kyis bdag la skyabs bye na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
187a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skyed cu sku gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka'

188b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa ma tshol ba dang /bdag la rtog pa dang /chos la mngon par dga' ba dang /gzhan la phani 'dogs par zhugs pa yin te/byams /
189a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa
189a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya'o//byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos drug dang ldan na/ngan song thams
189a3(dkon brtsegs): cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste bskam pa med
189a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/sdang ba med pa yin/rmongs pa med pa yin/dris ma thag tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lan ljon pa yin/bsnyen par dka' ba med pa yin/stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul
189a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad spang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag
189a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun dang ldan na/dran song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs
189a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste dran pa la mkhas pa yin/chos la
189b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yin/brtson 'grus brtsam pa yin/dga' ba thob pa yin/shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhra/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
189b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i
189b4(dkon brtsegs): lag tu mi 'gro lA/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/brgyad grang zhe na/'di lta ste yang dag par lta ba can yin/yang dag
189b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa can yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' can yin/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' can yin/yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba can yin/yang dag pa'i rtsol bcan yin/yang dag pa'i dran
189b6(dkon brtsegs): pa can yin/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin can yin te/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag ldan na/ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro
189b7(dkon brtsegs): la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro lA/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di
190a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste byams pa byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa dag la dben pa sdig po mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las
190a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so//rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa//
190a4(dkon brtsegs): dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa po sgrubs te gnas so//dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas
190a5(dkon brtsegs): shing dran pa dang shos bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa/gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod
190a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/dga' ba med pas bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so//bde ba yang spangs te/snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub
190a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yi na/btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
190b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so/
190b2(dkon brtsegs): snyams nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa
190b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtho' yas skye mched las bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
190b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'ongs nas/'du shes med 'du shes med
190b5(dkon brtsegs): min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so//rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mi ni skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrub/
190b6(dkon brtsegs): nas gnas te/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos dgu pa de dag dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang
190b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byams pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs
191a1(dkon brtsegs): /po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rjod par 'tshang rgya ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin/
191a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/thabs kyis 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/rnam parA snang byed kyi
191a3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pA ya na/kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin+da/kun du ge stsal ba'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ran chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yi naM/rmu
191a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin te/byams pa
191a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ches bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ngan song thams cad sbyong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
191a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po byams pa tshim zhing mgu la yid re ngas te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid
191a7(dkon brtsegs): bod ba skyes te/stan las langs nas blo gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
191b1(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//sngon chad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa//sdug pa'i bu dang zas
191b2(dkon brtsegs): skom dang //mig dang mig kyang bting mdzad de//sangs rgyas sbyin kun pha rol phyin//g.yag+sa rnga bzhin du yul rings nus//khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrung //khrim
191b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyed 'dra ma mchis te//sangs rgyas khrims legs pha rol phyin//bzed pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzadri nas//byis pas nongs par bgyis pa bzod //bzod pa'i stobs
191b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun dang ldan//sangs rgyas bzod legs pha rol phyin//brtson 'grus stobs ni skyed mdzad nas//zhi bde bla na med pa brnyes//brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs dang ldan//
191b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas brtson legs pha rol phyin//sdig pa thams cad bsreg mdzad nas//'dren pa skyes chen bsam gtan bags//bsam gtan stobs kyi stobs dang ldan//sangs
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsam legs pha rol phyin/chos rnams de dag rang bzhin stong //ngo bo nyid kyis gang mi skye//shes rab kyis ni pha rol gshegs//sangs rgyas shes legs pa
191b7(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin//mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du//sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis btul//don gyi mchog kyang brnyes par gyur//sangs rgyas 'dud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms//skyes
192a1(dkon brtsegs): chen wa ra na ser ni//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//mu stegs tshogs ngan skrag par mdzad//sangs rgyas mu stegs can tshogs 'joms//shes
192a2(dkon brtsegs): rab chen po bla na med//kun nas zla dpe yod ma mchis//dkon+da mchog chos de ston par mdzad//'dren par sangs rgyas 'od mdzad lags//sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims/
192a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs//bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis//kun gyi pha rol phyin par gyur//sangs rgyas yon tan mang po 'phags//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad po 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das la
192a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun druga'o sa 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum chog
192a6(dkon brtsegs): pab dang /'di ltar shin du rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang /'di ltar tshig dang yi ge mtshungs pa'i chos ston pa dang /'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis chos ston
192a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'di ltar legs par 'brel pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang /dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar logs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
192b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'o de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing /byang chub sems dpa' byams bla shin
192b2(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa nas/rjes su tshig gis bar gyis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar to//kun dga'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pas ni
192b3(dkon brtsegs): nga tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod par ma zad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dgra'o sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bcu ra tshang bar
192b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas reg pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
192b5(dkon brtsegs): pA skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lce bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rname par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba
192b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzig dz+nyAn du byung ste/de'itshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/khwa dog bzang po rgyus pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa
192b7(dkon brtsegs): de skyed mos tshil du 'gro ste grong bar du phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par
193a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mdzes pa dad par bya ba/dbang po zhi pa/thubs ni b+ha/dul ba dang zhig nas kyi mchog turnyes pa/dul ba dang ni gnas kyi da pa brnyes pa/
193a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po bsrungs pa/glang po che dbang po thul ba lta bu/mtsho ltar drang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal bya/skye sde bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag
193a3(dkon brtsegs): gis sku legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyud bcu po dag gis sku rnam par spras pa/shing sA lo'i rgyal po me tog shin du rgyus pa 'dra ba ri'i
193a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lham mo lhan ne lhang nge ba/shing n+ya gro
193a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar chu zheng gab pa/'od 'bar ba'i skus dpal chen pos 'bar bya mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to//de sems dad/
193a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dri snyam du sems te/a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing /kha dog dang /gozi brjid dang /dpal dang /mtshan rnams kyis ni
193a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar zhing lam me lhan ne lhung nge ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo//de nas bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//a la la bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
193b1(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig/kha dog dang /gzi brjid dang /dpal dang mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar 'bar zhing lam me lhan ne lhang nge bar gyur cig ces
193b2(dkon brtsegs): des smon lam de skad btab nas/sa la nyal te 'di snyam du bsam so//gal te bdag kyang mi 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/kha dog dang /
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gzi de rjid dang /dpal dang /mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'gyur zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs bdag gi lus la reg par gyur
193b4(dkon brtsegs): cig snyam mo//kun dga'o de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i
193b5(dkon brtsegs): khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/bram ze'i khyi'u bzang dag ga lwa ba der gshegs te/bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do///
193b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad ma thag tu/de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i/
193b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//kun dga'o de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des snam logs su gzigs nas
194a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams la bka' stsalu pu/dge slong dag khyed gang gis bram ze'i khye'u bzung drugu de'i lus la rkang pas maN+DI shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na khyad/
194a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro//de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis lha'i mig dang /lha'i rna
194a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa thob bo//rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so//de bzhin
194a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod do//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
194a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams su bskor te bskul bgyis kyang /'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yong ma mchis//'gro ba kun na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags//rnam par 'dren
194a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rang byung khyod la badrag phyag 'tshal//dper na bar snang la ni nyi ma lhan ne ltar//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na//'jig rten 'di
194a7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad 'od kyis lham mer gyur//sangs rgyas yon tan gzi mda' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na smre sgrogs pa//wa tshogs phal chen
194b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gyis gnon par bgyid//de ltar mi yi dam pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang //mu stegs can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon//bde bar gshegs pa smin mtshams par gyi
194b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzod spu dkar//dngul dang kha ba'i tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid can//des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis//'jig rten kun na sangs rgyas khyod ni mi mnyam snyam//skyes
194b3(dkon brtsegs): bu khyu mchog zhabs la lha yi 'khor lo mda'//gsal zhing mdzes la rtsibs stong tshang zhing mu khyud 'khor//de dag gis ni ri dang nags btsas sa 'di rnams//rab tu g.yo bgyid thub pa gong
194b4(dkon brtsegs): zag mtshungs ma mchis//nyon mongs shas chen dor bar bgyi ba thams cad bor//'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes//nor rnams kun dang ldan zhing yon tan rnams kyis phyug
194b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkod pa mdzes//sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs ma mchis//yon tan kun la mnga' brnyes tshul khrims rnam dag pa//ji ltar
194b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar//'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes chags khro mi mnga'//bzod pazad kyis btugs pa don dang chos rnams kun//snying po ma mchis pa deng gsob dang gsog tu
194b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag ni gang rnams la//rlom sems 'gyur ba'i sems can srog dang dngos ma brnyes//khams dang spyod pa dag la sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen//rmad du byung dang
195a1(dkon brtsegs): 5/rnam par 'byed mdzad sgron mar gyur//chu bo chen pos ded po'i 'gro ba gzigs gyur nas//sngon chad brtson 'grus stobs brtan mthu ni bskyod par mdzad//skye ba
195a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs shes nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan//thugs rgya chen po skye dang rga shi mtha' mar 'byin//nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu//'jig rten chos
195a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu//bdag nyid chen po shes rab kyis ni snang bar mdzad//mun pa mun nag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel//'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing
195a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gti mug gi/dri ma sna tshogs mun bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//kun dga'o de tshun chad bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam//mngon par shes pa rnams
195a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams par ma gyur to//kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur pa de bzhin zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis za'am the tsom zan
195a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur te/de bzhin gsher
195a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//de skad ces
195b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di gal te yun
195b2(dkon brtsegs): ring po de srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags na/ci'i slad du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/de skad ces
195b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang /yongs su bzung ba ni
195b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po 'di dag ste/gnyis gang zhe na/sems can bkod pa dang /sems can yongs su bzung ba dang /zhing bkod pa dang /zhing yongs su bzung ba dang /gnyis po 'di dag yin
195b5(dkon brtsegs): nad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i che zhing bkod pa rnam par sbyangs shing zhing yongasu bzung ba yong su bzung ngo //kun dga'ong
195b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ngas ni sems can bkod pa rnam par sbyangs/sems can yongs su bzung ba yongs su bzung /zhing bkod pa yang rnam par sbyangs
195b7(dkon brtsegs): sheng yongs su bzung ba yang yongs su bzung ngo //kun dag 'ongs mngon par shes te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs pa nas bskal pa bzhi
196a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i 'og tu ngas gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/kun dga'o bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas bskul pa
196a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bcu rtsa bzhin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bo'i rig pa la saM/kun dga' blongs brtson 'grus 'bar bar byas pas
196a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/kun dga'o ngas brtson 'grus rlabs po ches myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
196a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
196a5(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/bcu gang zhe na/bdog pa phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /chung ma phongs pa yongs su btang ba dang /bu phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /
196a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /mig phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /rgyal srid phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /longs spyod phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang //brag
196a7(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /rus pa dang rkang phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /yan lag phangs pa yongs su btang pas nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
196b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/kun dga'o chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso///
196b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dka'o gzhan yang ngas chos bcus myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang bo chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/bcu gang zhe na/kun dga'ong tshul khrims//
196b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan gyi chos la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga' bo nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas
196b4(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o du brtson 'grus 'dar ba brtsams pas myur du bla na med pa yang/
196b5(dkon brtsegs): dgA par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rdzogs par sangs rgyus so//kun dog 'ong bsam gtan gyi yon tan la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
196b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
196b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'ongs sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
197a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so//kun dag 'ong thabs mkhas pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so///
197a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'ong sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o/
197a3(dkon brtsegs): dus stong pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o ngas mtshan ma med pa dang
197a4(dkon brtsegs): smyon pa med pa'i chos rtogs pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o chos bcu po de dag
197a5(dkon brtsegs): gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga'o ngas tsher ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa brtsub pa ji lta bu
197a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de/galA te khyod kyis shes su zin na/kun dga'o khyod spobs par mi
197a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga'o sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/
197b1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog bzang po rgyus pa/mchog dang ldan pa/rgyal po'i bu 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/grong bar du phyin/
197b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal la/nad tshabs chen pos btab pa'i mi zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur to/mi de gra la bre der song ste phyin nas
197b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so//kye mi khyod kyi sdug bsngal lam/des smras pa/lha badrug ni nad kyis btab po//des smras pa/k+She mi khyod kyi nad ces zhi bar 'gyur/khyod la
197b4(dkon brtsegs): ci sbyin/des 'di skad ces smras so//gal te bdag lha khyod kyi sa lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i khrag gcig 'thung du thob pa lta na bdag gi nang zhi bar
197b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//kun dga'o de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa des mtshon rnon po blangs te/rang gi lus phug nas khrag gzags te mi de la gtung bar byin no//
197b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo mo des de 'thungs ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to//kun draga'o rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pas rang gi lus phug ste/khrag thams cad
197b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang 'gyod pa'i sems gcig kyang med do//kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod
198a1(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi smyan/ rba zlu rgyu nan/ m+b+hanA/ rgan da rnams phywas ra
198a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//kun dga' rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni ched bzung du yod kyi/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing nges sngon sems can
198a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la khrag byin pa ni tshad med do//kun dga' sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tig ces bya ba gzugs bzung ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/kha dog bzlang
198a4(dkon brtsegs): po rgyus pa mchog dang ldan pa/rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mithu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshul gyi sar 'gro ste sbyong bar du phyin pa dang /sgyu tsAbakyi
198a5(dkon brtsegs): nad kyis btab pa'i m+b+hi gle nod pA swAny+dzanA pA/sdug bsngalnga ba nad tshabs chen po b+h+rig+ma mdzo ngo //des de mthod nas kyung+tha snying rje bar gyur te/mi dgalta bI der song nas 'di skad
198a6(dkon brtsegs): hUMs smras so//kye ci zhig gis mi khyud kyis nad 'di zhi bar gyur/khyod la ci zhig sbyin/des 'di skad ces smras+ho//gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam
198a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshim par gyur pa'i rkang zhig thob pa ldan bdag gno zhi bar 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog de tshim zhing mgu la yi rings te//rab tu dga' nas bang
198b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yod badra blo skyes te/rang gi lus brdungs nas rkang brus te de'i lus la bslus so//kun dga'ongs bslus ma thag tu mi de'i rlung sos par gyur to//kun dgA'o rgyal
198b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu me to gos gisnga rang gi lus brdungs nye rgud gzigs kyang sems la'i gyod pa med par gyur to//kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya
198b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis za 'u ma/the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dwa nyid de'i tshe dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog
198b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya bar gyur to//kun dgablo rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/bla na med pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su tshol zhing /ngas sngon
198b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can+da rnams la rkang byin pa ni tshad med do//kun dga'i sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzed
198b6(dkon brtsegs): po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/grong par du phyin pa dang /mi mig
198b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa long ba/dbul po bkres pa/slongs mo byed pa zhig mthong /mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur to//de nas mi de rgyal po zla 'od gA la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces
199a1(dkon brtsegs): /smras so//lha khyod ni skyed do/lha khyod dgyes so//bAdag+h+ra ni sdug bsngal lo//long ngo mig ma mchis so//dbul po bkren no//slongs mo bcwa/
199a2(dkon brtsegs): mgon ma mchis so//kun dga'o de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis mi de yang mthong tshig kyang thos nas ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye mi khyod la ci
199a3(dkon brtsegs): dgos/bzla' ba dang /btung ba dang /gzhon pA dang /rgyan dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /rin po che sna tshogs sbyin par bya la ma/khyod la gang dgos
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pAdre smros shig/mi nges smras pa/bdag lu mig 'tshul nA bdag lnga mig sbrul du gsol/kun dga'o de nas rgyal po zla 'od des rang gi mig kyang phyung ste mi de la
199a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin no//kun dga'o zla 'od kyis rang gi mig phyung ste/mi de la byin yang de'i sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to//kun dga'o de'i tshe de'i dus ni rgyal po zla 'od
199a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis za 'am/the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces
199a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur to//kun dga' ri'i rgyal po ri rab la ni tshang bzung du yod kyi/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing /ngas sems can rnams la
199b1(dkon brtsegs): mig byin pa ni ches mang ste tshad med do//kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/theg pa bde ba/'jug pa//
199b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba/lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so//kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems
199b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//lag pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/rkang pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/rkang yongs su btung ba ma byas/chung ma phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/bu phangs
199b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/grong dang /grong rdal dang /grong khyer dang /ldong dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas te/kun dga'o byang chub

199b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldanangapa kun dag 'os 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
199b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas thabs mkhas pa gad la gnas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa
200a1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/de skad rgyas gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun+da dgeng 'di la byang chung ma
200a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/nyin len gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gang nas pus mo ga
200a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du byas te tshig 'di skad ces hAs so//sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo//drang srong lha mi
200a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang //nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing //mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/
200a5(dkon brtsegs): rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa//byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo//sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa//sangs rgyas spyan sngar michag/
200a6(dkon brtsegs): nas su//bdag gis de dag pa shugs par bgyi//bdag la rnam pa gsum gang gis//bsad nams tshogs ni skyes pa de//bdag gi kun mkhyen sa don te/bdag gi bya chu
200a7(dkon brtsegs): mizad //phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su//sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba//sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i yi rang bas//de la bdag ni yi rang ngo //sdig pa thams cad
200b1(dkon brtsegs): bshags par bgyi//bsod nams kun la yid rang ngo //sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo//bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/phyogs bcu dag gis phyogs rnam nA/
200b2(dkon brtsegs): sa cu dag la gnas pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul mar 'debs//byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing //sde dang bcas ra
200b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud btul nas//srog chagaso kun la spyan slad du//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni//sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog+sa/la

200b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan du/srid pa'i ri tshe las sgrol bar shog/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang //gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa//dri dag rjes su bdag slob cing //byang chub sbyar ba spyod
200b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/phyi rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas//'gro drug sems can zang ba gyid klog/mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas//bla med byang chub reg gyur gyin//ma
201a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mi 'byung dang /rang bzhin ma mchis glanas ma mchis//rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis//stong pa'i chos 'di rtogs par shog/sangs rgyas
201a2(dkon brtsegs): drang srod chen po ltar//sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis//gang zag mi mchis gsam mchis//bdug ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/bdag 'dzin bdag
201a3(dkon brtsegs): glir 'dzin pa ni//dngos po kun la mi gnas dar//sems can kun la byed skad du//sder sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog/dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas//bdag

201a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis//brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang //dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang //rdo rje ltar bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/

201b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas gang la gnas nas thabs mkhas pas/theg pa bde ba/'jug pa bde ba/lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

201b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/sem sa can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /zhe sdang chung ba dang /gti mug chung ba dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/phyis pa bdag
201b7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci mi rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam par sbyangs so//kun dge'i dus de dang tshod de 'byung ba yod do//

202a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sman lam gyi dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon shes pa ra kya
202a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//kun dga'o ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/snyigs mi lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe/sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang //
202a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang /gti mug gi shas che ba dang /'dod chags bde ba dang /zhe sdang bdo ba dang /gti mug bdo ba dang /chos ma yin pa lnga chags shing zhen
202a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /chags pa yang bas zil phyis non pa dang /chos log pas yongs su zin pa dang /pha la 'khu ba dang /ma la shu ba dang spun la 'khu ba dang /ming sring la 'khu ba dang /
202a6(dkon brtsegs): khyo shug la 'khu ba dang /nye du la 'khya ba dang /'phags pa la 'khu ba dang /mkhan po dang slob dpon la 'khu ba dang /bdag la 'khu ba dang /mi la 'khu ba dang /
202a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dri ma can dang /ming mu rgod dang /mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci
202b1(dkon brtsegs): ma rung zhes de ltar smon lam yongs su sbyangs te/dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas na/kun dga'o ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/snying rje chen po dang ldan pasang da ltar
202b2(dkon brtsegs): grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang /'kho ru rnams su zhugs te chosu ston pa dang /de la khang na zer zhing
202b3(dkon brtsegs): gA she rgyab ste/tshogs par mi 'byung ba rtsub pa rlang pos smra ba byed do//kun+da dag 'ong la chad ba smra ba yin shes kyang zer rtag par smra ba yin zhes kyang ze ro//'khor 'dod pa mang po zhwa kyang klong//
202b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi nang na zhugs na yang nga la sos kyang 'thor ro//dug dang bsres pa'i kha zas kyang byin no//me'i phung po yang nye bar bsgrubs so//'di lta ste sangs rgyas su
202b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa yang btab po//kun dga'o nga ni snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/snying rje chen po
202b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to//de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la kun dag 'os 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
202b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston par mdzad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba khur chen po/
203a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnams pa dka' ba mdzad pa lcags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
203a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'o de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/kun dga'o de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba khur chen
203a3(dkon brtsegs): po bsnams pa/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sem can de lta bu dag la chos ston pa ni dga' ba mdzad pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar snying rje chen
203a4(dkon brtsegs): pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'os 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dri
203a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing /bcom ldan 'ad kyi khyu mchog gi gnas 'di thos nas spu zing zhes bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
203a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga'o de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi smon

210b1(dkon brtsegs): te/lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta//sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa//byang chub sems dang 'dra la ston par sems//ston pa'i 'du shes
210b2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhag nas kyang //de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod par byed//sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa//bla med ye shes yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/chos de dag
210b3(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pa rnams//byang chub sems ni rnams kyang brjid mi 'gyur//'od srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongasu
210b4(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur te/dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyuraro//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyung pan pa'i glus de tshig tshul ba dang //rnyed
210b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur bsti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba ste/
210b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/dge ba'i tshe de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro//
210b7(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang pan tshol//rnyed kyi phyir ni mi la sbyor bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la ldang //de dag bsngags min//
211a1(dkon brtsegs): kun du smra bar byed //de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo//bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa spod par byed//chos 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni//dge ba'i
211a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis//chos bzhi 'di dag rgyad bsrid rnam par spang //'di dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste//
211a3(dkon brtsegs): gnam sa ring bas shin du ring bar 'gyur//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi drang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/
211a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho lnga ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa tshol gyi nyes par zlob mi tshal te
211a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa'i sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/log pas 'tsho ba thams cad yongs su spangs shing 'phags/
211a6(dkon brtsegs): pA'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang /ma byung ba mi gleng zhing gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan mi tshol ba yin/sangs rgyas
211a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mthe' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
211b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'jug ste/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi spong ba ste/'od srung byang chub
211b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams
211b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /thabs la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson//nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis su//sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin//chos dang mthun pa'i rnyed
211b4(dkon brtsegs): pas chog sems shing /'tsho ba yang dag 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas//gzhan gyis 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing //gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do//gang de'i
211b5(dkon brtsegs): blos ni zab mo mi rtogs pa/de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste//bde gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pas//rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gris mi sheso///
211b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi 'di dag rigs kyi gyur pa ni//ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur//chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni//rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed
211b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dka'//'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste sangs rgyas
212a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la somA nyi dang /yid gnyis dang /the tshom za ba dang /sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /'chub pa dang /khro dang //
212a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod par sems pa dang /gzhan gyi rnyeng pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /mi snyan pa
212a3(dkon brtsegs): dang brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni gya gyo can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su
212a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyang bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/chos rnams la ni som nyi yid gnyis byed//sems can rnams la dro rgyal rgyags khro bsten//gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag
212a5(dkon brtsegs): dog byed//rgyal ba la ni nams kyang dad mi byed//mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la//bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan brjod//g+ha g+haM n+dan gyi sems
212a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi rnam par spang //byang chub sems dpa sla rtag tu sems can bstan//'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/bzhi
212a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/'di lta ste ltung ba byung ba rnams mi 'chab cing brjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang /'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis
212b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid sbyor ba 'am/nor yal ba 'am/srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi mkhyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du bsgyur ba'i tshog mi smra ba yin/gzhan gyis glan
212b2(dkon brtsegs): po bya ba skur pa dang /'tshang 'bru ba dang /snod pa dang /bshung ba dang /bsdigs pa dang /rdeg po dang /gsod pa dang /'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag gi
212b3(dkon brtsegs): nyes par sems shing /las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la ston pas gzhan dge la mi 'khrug cing khong du 'dzin pa med pa yin/de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/bsam pa
212b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dad pa ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan
212b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin no//de la 'dri skad ces bya ste/ltung ba byung ba 'ichab par mi byed kyi//brjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes pa 'dor//nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang //'du
212b6(dkon brtsegs): shes bsgyur te brdzun pa'i tshig mi skye/skur drang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang //'ching ba byed dang go rer bcug pa la//bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug
212b7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed//las ni bdag gir bya bas kho na mi 'dzin//de ni bder gshegs rnams kyi byang chub dang //dad la gnas shing bsam pa dang ldan pa/'di dag drang ba'i mtshan//
213a1(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas gsungs//sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsnyen par bya/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de/bzhi gang /
213a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di lta ste thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/rjes su bstan pa la
213a3(dkon brtsegs): gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su granas shing /slob dpon dang mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/dam bcas pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun spyod de/dad pas byin
213a4(dkon brtsegs): pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes pa rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal 'dzin pa yin te/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
213a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dmu rgod do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/thos pas rgod par gnas par byed pa yin//rjes su bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur//de ni chos kun gces pa
213a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba bsten//'phags pa rnams la num yang sri zhu med//dam bcas nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yi//kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za/byang chub sems dpa' cang shes
213a7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dag/mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing //dmu rgod dag ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcag mi brten//'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs
213b1(dkon brtsegs): pAs gsungs//de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang //'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste legs par thos pa nyan
213b2(dkon brtsegs): cing de la nan tan du byed de/don lnga rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/gdams pa/rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin cing /bka' blo bde la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing //
213b3(dkon brtsegs): bla m+ba la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes pas zas za ba yin/byang chub sems dpa' dul bcang shes mthong na gus pa dang bcas
213b4(dkon brtsegs): shing zhes dang bcas par de la gzhol de la 'bab de la brub cing //de'i yon tan 'dod pa yin te/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang sheso//de la 'di skad cing bya ste/
213b5(dkon brtsegs): glang ma hAn+da de ni legs par nan tan byed//chos dron snying por byed cing nan tan gnas//rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed cing //chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma bsten//tshul
213b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims ting 'dzin la rtag gnas shing //tshul khrims bsdams nas de ni bza' ba za/gus dang bcas shing zhe dang bcus pa yin//de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod//rgyal
213b7(dkon brtsegs): sras gang dag cang shes thob gyur pa//de dag la ni rtag tu dga' bas lte//bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni//bder gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin//'od srung
214a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste//bzhi gang zhe na//'di lta ste sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub
214a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /rgya chen po lo mos
214a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la thegs pa dman pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang //sems can yang dag pa lnga rab tu gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'tshol pa sdig pa'i chos can kun du sdud pa/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag
214a5(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/yongs smin ma byas rnams la yid mi bstan//snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad//rgya
214a6(dkon brtsegs): chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman//byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis ba shang mi bya//yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan//dge ba'i
214a7(dkon brtsegs): chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya//tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu//sdig pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya//'khrul pa'i chos bzhi/
214b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag shes gyur nas//byang chub sems dpas rgyud bsring rnam par spang //'di dgu bsten na byang chub 'tshang mi rgya//de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spangs//'od///
214b2(dkon brtsegs): srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /sems can thams cad la mtshung
214b3(dkon brtsegs): par chos ston pa dang /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang /sems can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/
214b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lamo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//sems can rnams la rtag tu sems snyoms bya//sangs rgyas the ga mchog/
214b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'dzin du 'jug/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya//sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya//yang dge sbyor zhing nan tan byed par gnas/
214b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bye//ches bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te//rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bsten//'od srung bzhi po 'di
214b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshe sa gnyen ngan pa ste//de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spong bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
215a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /radwa sangs rgyas kyi thog pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang /'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig sna tshogs
215a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spobs pa can dang /gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi chos kun mi sdud pa ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes
215a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/nyan thos gang dag bdug phan brtson pa dang //
215a4(dkon brtsegs): glang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod//rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing //bdog gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong //byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang phan klog//
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed//gang lo brten nas zung zong kun sdud kyi//chos 'di nam yang sdud par mi byed pa//de bzhi byang chub sems dpas rab
215a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs nas//dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi lnga brten par bya//'dri dag bshes gnyen ngan dang glogs ngan du//rgyal bas gsung te thag bsring yongs su spang //
215a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i po shes gnyen te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste byang chub kyi lom ston pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems dpe'i
215b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshos gnyen dang /thos pa'i shes rab ston pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab
