215b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i baM shes gnyen dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir sang sa rgyus pa com ldan
215b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs rnams byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no//de lta 'di skad ces bya ste/
215b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs su ston phyir len pa po//sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin//chos sngon smra ba thos dang shes rab byed//dge ba'i bshes gnyen smin
215b5(dkon brtsegs): par bad+ma gshegs gsungs//gang drug rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa//de dag dge rtsa yin bsre ba shes gnyen gsungs//rdzogs spangs rgyas kyi lam ni
215b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rnams ni bde gshe gas sras kyi bshes//rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzhi po 'di dag ni/'dra gshegs sras kyi dge bo'i bshes gnyen
215b7(dkon brtsegs): te'adi dag bsten cing rtog tu bag yod na//bde gshegs bstan pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur//'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste//
216a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste rnyed pa dang bkur+ya bsti don du gnyer gyi chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyis/
216a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /'khor gyi tshogs
216a3(dkon brtsegs): don du gnyer gyi dben pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lhur bcos pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rnyed pa don du gnyer
216a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos don min//brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min//bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing //sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer//'khor/
216a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs don du gnyer gyi dbyen mi 'dod//bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa//bzhi po de dag bcos par gsungs pa ste//de dag byang chub sems dpas yod
216a6(dkon brtsegs): su spang //'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste stong pa nyid la
216a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mos la las kyi rnam par smin pa yang yid ches pa dang /de bdag med par yang zod la sems can thams cad la yang snying rje che ba dang /de'i bsim pa mya ngan
216b1(dkon brtsegs): sa 'das pa la yang gnas la sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang /de snyoms can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i rnam par smon pa la yang mi ra bya ste/
216b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub snrums dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/chos rnams stong pa nyid du
216b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag mos kyang //las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches so//bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang //sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed//de yi bsam/
216b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas//de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin//yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang //las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med//'od
216b5(dkon brtsegs): srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems da pa'i gter chen po rnyed pa ste/bzhi gang zhe ni/'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa
216b6(dkon brtsegs): drug nyan pa dang /chos smra ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang //bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag
216b7(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed//pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan/
217a1(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba lnga sems ni rab tu dang //mthong na rtag tu gus pa spyod par byed//rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gunAs//de ni de nyid la yang
217a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dga'//bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi//gter chen yin par bde bar gshugs pa su gsungs//'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
217a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sems med pa dang /lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtog pa dang /sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi
217a5(dkon brtsegs): lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byud//sems can rnams la khong khre rtag tu
217a6(dkon brtsegs): spong/rngalta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed//sems can tshogs la brnyas pa yongs mi byed//bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni//bdud las
217a7(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs//'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa//gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur//'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag
217b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul 'chos pa med par dgon par gnas pa dang /lan du
217b2(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po de nga /sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang /thos
217b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/'od srung chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i/
217b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/de gon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong //rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can
217b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byed//dum chos yongs su btsal bra brtsam byas nas//lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed//dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du mi nyung ba//yang dag sgrub
217b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong //dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir//chos bzhi 'di dang khrid par gshegs pas gsungs//'od srung chos bzhi po 'di
217b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa dang /tshul khrim
218a1(dkon brtsegs): /'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang /nyams chung ba rnams la bzod pas bstan
218a2(dkon brtsegs): pA ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems
218a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis su//chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab tu bsngags//tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che//gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed 'jug/nyams
218a4(dkon brtsegs): chung rnams la bzod pa sa dang du len//'di ni dege chos srung bar gsungs pa ste//'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na//byang chub sem sa dpas de dag rtag
218a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bsten//'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul khram+bi
218a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa sgron ma sbyin pa dang /tha na 'dres pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/'od srung bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
218a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin byed dang /dam chos 'dzin dang
218b1(dkon brtsegs): sgron ma sbyin byed dang //de bzhin tha na 'dres la sbyin byed cing //mkhas pa ma rig sa las rnam par 'byed//'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i
218b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi gang zhe no/'di lta ste dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /phrag dog med pa dang /gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa
218b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/'od srung chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang dag byang chub la ni sgrib byed pa//sdig
218b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzhi pa bcu po rnam spangs nas//mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na//'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur//sems can dam pa gang dag chos tshul 'di//
218b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin tam klog gam rab tu ston byed pa//de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsung //de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnams brjod do//gang gis zhing ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//rin chen
218b6(dkon brtsegs): bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas//gang gis 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad klog/bsod nams 'di yi grangs su'ang mi phod do//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' ni ming tsam
218b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang /snyoms par spyod pa dang /dge ba spyod pa dang /chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la
219a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/sum cu rtsa
219a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsdam pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang /bdag
219a3(dkon brtsegs): ci ri zhes yongs su 'jal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang /nga rgyal med pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang /bcos ma ma yin par byams pa dang /
219a4(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang /tshig ngan cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba
219a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongasu ma bcad pa dang /yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /dam pa'i
219a6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang don gyis doms mi myong ba dang /bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar
219a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgo ba dang /spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang /rnam par smin pa la mi ro ba'i gtong ba dang /srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad
219b1(dkon brtsegs): la mo gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang /sems can thams cad la zho 'grus pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dgra par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang //
219b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par bskul ba'i bsam gtan dang /thabs mkhas pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dang
219b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /tshul khrims 'tshal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang /gus par byas te chos nyan pa dang /gus par byas te dgon pa la
219b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang /'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ba dang /theg pa dman pa
219b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bani sgrub pa
219b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsin pa dang /ye shes la rton pa dang /sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba dang
219b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu chad par smra ba dang 'den pa gces su byed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan
220a1(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//de lnga 'di skad ces bya ste/sems can kun la phran drang bde bya ba'i//lhag pa'i bsam la mos par byed pa
220a2(dkon brtsegs): yin//kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems sgrol zhing /ri 'am myi ri snyam du bdag la dpogra/smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med//bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa
220a3(dkon brtsegs): med par byams /mdza' dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms//mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug par du//sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'//
220a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por smra bar byed//khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med//sems can dug la snying rje yongs ma bcad//dam chos yongs su tshol
220a5(dkon brtsegs): ba skye ba med//thos pas mi ngoms badrag gi 'khrul skyon lha//gzhan lnga gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med/spyod lam rnam gsum sems ni rab tu sbyong //gtong
220a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par smin la re ba med//tshul khrims srid ba'i 'gro bar gnas ma yin//sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spangs//dge ba yang dag sgrub pa'i
220a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang /gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang //thabs kyis yang dag zin pa'i shes rab dang //bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin
220b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs med khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa drang //gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang //gus par byas te dgon gzhi gnas pa dang //'jig rten sna tshogs
220b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar mi byed dang //theg pa dman lnga dga' bar mi byed cing //theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed pa dang //sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong byed cing //dge ba'i bi shes
220b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen rtag tu bstan pa dang //tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la bsgoms pa dang //mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu rtson pa dang //ye shes rjes su rtag tu 'byung ba dang //sgrub
220b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang //sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang //gcig tu chud par rtag tu smra ba dang //bde la rtag tu bus dang bcas pa dang //byang chub
220b5(dkon brtsegs): sems ni sngon du btang nas su//rgyal bas bsdigs pa'i chos ni sgom par byed//bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum bcu rtsa gnyis chos//'di dag bde gshegs sras
220b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsten par bya//byang chub sems dpa' ga yin de dag ni//chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs//'od srung dpe nye bar dgod pa bstan pa gang dag
220b7(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po 'di ni
221a1(dkon brtsegs): /sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
221a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa yang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs por re ba med do//de la 'di skad
221a3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho//ldan la mi re 'gyur ba med pa bzhin//byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa//rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i
221a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su//ma gyur bar du skye bo kun gyi 'tsho//ldan la rU ba med cing 'gyur ba med//bu dang dgra la'ang yid kyis mtshungs par semaso//byang chub mchog
221a5(dkon brtsegs): rab rtag par yongs su 'tshal//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na chu'i khams ni rtsa dang /shing gel pa dang /sman dang nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do//'od srung
221a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa//sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas te/gnas pa yang sems can thams ca dA la dkar
221a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos thams cad bskyed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na chu ni rtsa dang gel pa dang //nag so tshal sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa bskyed//de bzhin byang chub
221b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bsam dag pa//sems can mtha' yas byams pas khyab par byed//sna tshogs chos la khyab byas rim gyis su//dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par
221b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'gyur zhing //dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas//rim gyis rgyal bri'i byang chub thob par 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na me'i khams ni lo
221b3(dkon brtsegs): thog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams cad kyi dkar pa'i chos thams cad yong su
221b4(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na ma ni rtswa dang sman rnams dang //lo thog thams cad yongs su smin par byed//de bzhin bde gshegs sras kyi
221b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang //skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub po//'od srung
221b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub po//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
221b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na rlung ni sangs rgyas dgongs pa bzhin//rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par bsgrub//de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang //bde gsheg+sas
222a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgrub//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na spyod par
222a2(dkon brtsegs): lha thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa'am yongs su zad par mi nus//'odra srung de bzhin de byang chub sems dpa' bskum pa dag pa yang bdud thams cing
222a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis zil gyis mnan pa 'am yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so//'od srung 'di lta ste dper ni zla ba yarA gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro//
222a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas par 'gyur ro//de lo 'di skad ces bya sku
222a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang ngo la//skye zhing yongs su gung 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur//de bzhin pasam drag byang chub sems dpa' yang //dkar po'i chos
222a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor los lan+da gcig phyung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis sems can thams cad snang
222a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan gcig phyung ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la shes
222b1(dkon brtsegs): pa s+yAd du spyod do//de la 'di//daces byaste/dper na nI lus lan gcig phyung ba yi//'od zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byung //de bzhin rgyal smras ya //
222b2(dkon brtsegs): 'o R+Ya gyiso//sems can rnams la shes rab snang bar byed//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni gang las gar 'gro ba thams cad du
222b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang tshul khrims dang /bslob pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang
222b4(dkon brtsegs): yo byad sbyangs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes la glanas pa yang gang las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi smrig pa nyid du 'gro'o//de la 'di skad
222b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ral pa can//'jigs pa med par gang du 'dod par 'gro//de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang //thos dang
222b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gnas pa dga'i mgur 'gro//'od srung 'di lta ste dper nu ba gleng glang po che shin tu dulta ba ni khal thams cad khyer bas yongs su skyob med do//'od
222b7(dkon brtsegs): srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phung po lnga'i khur khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do//de la
224a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na rab dul stobs ldan glang po che//khalnga rnams khrur yang yongs su skyo ba med//de bzhin byang chub sems
224a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems rab dul//sems can+da khur gyis skyo bar 'gyur ba med//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na pad+ma chu las skyes kyang chus mi gos so//'od
224a3(dkon brtsegs): srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi goso//de li 'dri skad ces bya ste/dper na pad+ma chu las skyes
224a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang //chu'am rdzab kyis gos pa med pa ltar//de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten skyes//'jig rten chos kyis nam yang gos pa med//
224a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na shing ljon pa yal ga gcad pa ni/rtsa ba ma snang na slar yang sa las skye bo//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs
224a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa nyon mongs pa'i yale ga bcad pa yang snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun du sbyor ba mo nyams na slar yang khams gsum du skye'o//de la 'di skad
224a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/dper na shing ljon la lag bcad pa ni//rtsa ba brtan par ma snang slar yang skye//de bzhin rtsa ba kun sbyor ma spangs na//thabs kyis bsal yod slar yang skye bar 'gyur/
224b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po'i chu'i phung po rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa ni 'di lta ste lan cha'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro//'od srung //
224b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo tha dad pa nas bas gos pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa tham cad kyang 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur
224b3(dkon brtsegs): ro/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams dang //rgya mtsho cher 'bab ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin//tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsags byas pa//byang chub
224b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang //sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri rab la gnas so//'od srung de bzhin du
224b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams dang //sum bcu
224b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas//de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgur gnas te//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos rnams ston//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na blon pos yongs su zin
224b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po rnams ni rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad byed do//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad
225a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na blon po ldan pa'i rgya la po rnams//bya ba thams cad rtab tu byed pa lta rwa//thabs ldan byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang //
225a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas don rnams rtag tu byin pa yin//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sprin med cing nam thang ba'i na mkha' la ni cher 'bab pa'i rgyu med do//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
225a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa nyung ba la yang dam pa'i chos kyi char dbab pa'i rgyu med do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na sprin med nam thang na mkha' la/chang 'bab rgyu ni rnams kyang mi dmigs so//de
225a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thos nyung lnga//chos ston nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo thog thams cad
225a5(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'bab po//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang mang du thos pa'i chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i chos kyi char yang sems can thams cad la mngon par
225a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bab po//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na sprin chen glog dang bcas pa las//char pra bab pas lo thog ngoms par byed//de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dam chos kyis//sprin
225a7(dkon brtsegs): byung chos rgyu sems can tshim par byed//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'byung ngo //'od srung de bzhin du byang chub
225b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dbu' gang du 'byung ba der byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang 'byung ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang byung /
225b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/der ni yi rin chen sna bdun 'byung //byang chub sems dpa' gang du 'byung gyur pa/der ni byang chub yan lag bdun po 'byung //'od srung 'di lta ste dper na gang nor bu rin
225b3(dkon brtsegs): po che bI dAr+ya 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de ni kar sha pa ni brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do//'od srung de bzhin du gang na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sgo yod pa de na nyan thos dang rang sangs
225b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'bumi phrag mang po 'byung ba'i sgo yod do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na gang du nor bu rin chen 'byung //der ni kar sha pa ni mang 'byung ltar//gang du rdzogs pa'i byang chub
225b5(dkon brtsegs): sems 'byung ba//der ni nyan thos mang po 'byung bar 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongasu
225b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams ni mtshungs par gnas so//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa'i sbyor ba yang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad la mtshungs
225b7(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na 'dres pa'i tshal gnas lha rnams kyi//longs spyod rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pa yin//de bzhin bsam dag byang chub
226a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yang //sems can rnams la rtag tu legs par sbyor//'od srung 'di lta ste dpe na sngags drung sman gyis yongs su zin pa'i dug gi sa 'chi ba
226a2(dkon brtsegs): byed mi nus so//'od srung de bzhin du ye shes dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so//
226a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i dug/skye bo rnams la nyes pa byed mi nus//de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ye shes can//nyon mongs rnams
226a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis log ltung byed mi nus//'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na grong khyer chen po rnams kyi lung gang yin pa de ni bu ram shing gi zhing drug dang /rgun 'brum gyi zhing dag la phan pa yin no//
226a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i lung gang yin pa de sang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par 'gyur ba yin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na grong khyer
226a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mi gtsang lung//de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan+da//de bzhin byang chub sems kyi nyon mongs lung //de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan par byed//'od srung 'di lte ste dper na
226a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phong rtsal ma bslabs pa las mtshon thabs slob ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa nyung ba las dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /dpyid pa 'i don 'dzin pa'i
226b1(dkon brtsegs): shes par blta'o//'ad sru 'di lta ste dper na sam gyu du'i snod rnams la ni rnga mkhan gyis mtshan pa btang dgas sa//'ad srung dab zhin du shes rab ma sbyin pa'i sems can
226b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me chen po btang dgos par blta'o//'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos
226b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'dod pas tshul bzhin du tshas la rab n+d+ha d+hA ba skye'o//'od srung nga la byung chub sems dpa'i dus bzhin du rgyas la rab tu sbyor bag she/di lta ste dbum
226b4(dkon brtsegs): lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa'o//'od srung dbu mo'i chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/'di srung gang la bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang /
226b5(dkon brtsegs): sems tsun med pa dang /sgrog med pa dang /gso ba med pa dang /skyes bu med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /shed las skyes pa med pa dang /shengad bu med par rtog pa ste/'a
226b6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam rgyas rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang dbu mi'i lam tshus rnams la yang dag par sa sa ro rtag da ni gang gzugs
226b7(dkon brtsegs): la rtag par yangs sor mi rtog mi rtag par so sor mi rtog pa dang /'od srung de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam pa
227a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la gang rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams lnga yang dag par sa sbyor rtog p+ta/
227a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i ldum chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang sa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog
227a3(dkon brtsegs): pab dang de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtag par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag
227a4(dkon brtsegs): par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i la mchos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la
227a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang mig gi skye mched la rtug par yang so sor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
227a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yid kyi skye mched rnams la rtag par yang so sngor mi rtog mi rtag par yang so sor mi rtog pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu mi'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor
227a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung drug rje bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go/mi rtag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so//mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/bstan du
227b1(dkon brtsegs): med parten ma yin pa/snang ba med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/gnas med pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung
227b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go//bdag med ces bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so//mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa/bstan du med pa/rten ma yin pa/
227b3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/gnas med pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i laM tshe rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung sems yang dag pa zhes
227b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go//sems yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gnyis so//'od srung gang na sems med pa dang /sems pa med pa dang /yid med pa dang /rnam
227b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa med pa 'di ni 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//dge ba dang /mi dge ba rnams dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten
227b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /kha na ma tho ba dang /bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa rnams dang /
227b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no//'od srung kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go//rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba de ni mtha'
228a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis so//mtha' de gnyis khas mi lon cing mo brjod mi skye bro grang yin pa 'dra ni/'od srung dbu ma'i la mtshos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa
228a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//'od srung yod ces bya ba de ni mtha' gcig go//med ces bye ba 'di ni mthu' gnyis so//de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyang du med pa/bstan du med pa/
228a3(dkon brtsegs): med de/snang ba myed pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/gnas med pa sngo/'od spya dri ni bu ma 'i rdzamachos rnams la yang dag par sti sa rtog pa zhes bya'o/'disu
228a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi byu 'di ni mtha' gcig go//mya ngan las las buzhes bya ba 'di ni mtha' gnyis so//de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin par ni dpyang du meng pa/basbyin pa
228a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa/rten ma yin pa/snang ba med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/gnas med pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes
228a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//'od srung gang yang ngas khyed rnams la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rgyan gyis ming dang gzugs
228a7(dkon brtsegs): maung dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rig pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len
228b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung
228b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'oba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ma reg pa 'gugs pas 'du byed 'gag/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag
228b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa 'gegs pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gog/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa
228b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gegs pas sred pa 'gag/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gago//len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags pas skye
228b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/de ltar sdug bsngal
228b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bsten pa de la 'od srung rig pa dang ma rig pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med do//'od srung 'di la
228b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /'du byed rnams 'gag po dang /rnam par shes pa
229a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /ming dang gzugs 'gag pa dang /skye mched drug dang /skye mchod//
229a2(dkon brtsegs): drug 'gags pa dang /reg pa dang /reg pa 'gug pa dang /tshor ba dang /tshor ba 'gag pa dang /sred pa dang /skyed pa 'gag pa dang /len pa dang /len pa 'gag pa dang /srid
229a3(dkon brtsegs): pA dang /srid pa 'gag pa dang /skye ba dang /skye ba 'gag pa dang gzhi na shi 'gag pa de dag gnyis ma yin shing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/'od srung 'di la shes pa gang
229a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//'od srung gzhan yang dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa ni gang stong
229a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid stong pa dang /gang mtshan ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med
229a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid smon pa med pa dang /gang mngon par 'du byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par
229a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa med par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /gang ma skyes pas chos rnams ma skyes par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid ma skyes pa dang /
229b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ma byung bas chos rnams ma byung bar mi byed de/chos rnams nyid ma byung ba dang /gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de/chos rnams nyid ngo bo nyid med
229b2(dkon brtsegs): par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni 'od srung dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o//yang 'od srung gang zag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa
229b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma yin gyi stong pa nyid stong pa'o//'od srung sngon gyi mtha' stong pa/phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa/da ltar byung ba stong pa ste/stong pa nyid la rton par bya ba'i gang zag la ma yin no//'od
229b4(dkon brtsegs): srung gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ngas gsung rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams zhes bshad do//'od srung gang zag tu lta bA ri rab tsam la
229b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa bla'i//mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/'od srung
229b6(dkon brtsegs): gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi nad pa zhig yod la/sman pas de la sman btang nas sman des de'i nad thams cad
229b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyod de/sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de nad de las thar par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te/
230a1(dkon brtsegs): gang spyan das na thams cad bskyod nas/sman ljon mchis pa nyid ma byung na/mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshags che bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
230a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na/'od srung gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rungango zhes ngas ba shwa //
230a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na sman pas nA da ni bsal ba'i phyir//mi zhig la ni bkru sman btang ba las//nad rnams bskyod nas 'khrus par ma gyur na//de yi gzhi
230a4(dkon brtsegs): las nad ni sos mi 'gyur//de bzhin lta ba thibs por gnas pa las//'byung ba'i mchog ni stong pa nyid yin na//gang zhig stong pa kho nur lta gyur pa//de ni gsor mi rung
230a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes rgyal bas gsungs//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig nam mkhas 'jigs skrag nas brang brdung zhing ngu ste/nam mkha' 'di sol cig ces de skad zer na/
230a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/nam mkha' de bsal bar nus sam+ba/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
230a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag stong pa nyid kyis skrag rab tu skyug na/de dag gi sems 'khrugs pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do//
230b1(dkon brtsegs): ra sh-in/'od srung de dag ni stong pa nyid la spyod la de nyid kyis skrag pa'i phyir ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na na mkhas 'jigs pa nyen pa'i phyir//blun po rnamakha
230b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sol zhes zer//na mkha' bsal bar nus pa ma yin yang //rmongs pas byis pa dag ni 'di skad smra//de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig/stong pa
230b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis skrag cing sam+b+has 'khrugs pas//byis pa de dag stong pa nyid spyod pa//stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang gzhog mi nus//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri mo mkhyen
230b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig bdag nyid kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig byis nas de 'jigs skyug ste/kha spyab tu 'gyel nas brgyal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'od srung gyis
230b5(dkon brtsegs): ba sro so'i skye bo rnams kyang bdag nyid kyis byis pa'i gzugs dang /sgra dang /d+hI dang /ro dang /reg bya rnams kyis 'khor ba na 'khor yang /cho sded dag yang dag pa ji lta ba
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rab tu mi shes so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na ri mo mkhan zhig gis/gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs byas nas//de yis 'jigs te kha swab d+hu/
230b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur pa ltar//byis pa sa so'i skye bo kun//bdag nyid kyis ni byis pa yi//gzugs sgra la sogs rmongs gyur pas//'gro ba drug tu 'o khyi mas
231a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu mas sprul pa sprul nas/sprul pa des sgyu ma mkhan du nyid zlos pa de bzhin du 'od srung //
231a2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang dang glang yid la byed pa de thams cad de la rdzogasog tu snang ngo //gso ba dang /stongs pa dang /snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo //
231a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis mngon sprul pa//sgyu ma byas pa de yis de zos ltar//rnal 'byor pas ni yid la gang byed pa//de la de dag gi sog dang /
231a4(dkon brtsegs): gsob tu snang //'od srung 'di lta ste dper na shing gnyis rlung gis drud pa de las me byung ste/byung nas shing de gnyis bsreg pa de bzhin du 'od srung yang dag par so sor
231a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa yod na/'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po skye ste/de skyes pas yang dag par so sor rtog pa de nyid bsreg par byed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na
231a6(dkon brtsegs): shing gnyis rlung gis drud pa las//me byung bas ni de nyid bsreg par byed//de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang //so sor rtog pa de nyid bsreg par byed//'od
231a7(dkon brtsegs): srung dper na mar me bus na mun pa mun ne ga thams cad med par 'gyur yang //mun pa mun nag de gang nos kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de//shar phyogs dang /lho dang /
231b1(dkon brtsegs): nub dang /byang phyogs su yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do//yang 'od srung mar me de 'di snyam du bdag gis mun pa mun nag bsal lo snyam du mi sems mod kyi/'on+da kyang mar me/
231b2(dkon brtsegs): lo bsten nas mun pa munA nag med par 'gyur ro//'od srung de la mar me gang yin pa dang /mun pa munaM nag gang yin pa de gnyi ka stong pa ste/bzung du med cing byed pa
231b3(dkon brtsegs): med do//'od srung de bzhin du ye shes skyes na mi shes pa med par 'gyur yang mi shes pa de gang nas kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do//shar phyogs dang /lho dang /nub
231b4(dkon brtsegs): drang debyang phyogs su yang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do//yang 'od srung ye shes kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mi shes byas bsal lo snyam du mi semos mod kyi/'on kyang yi
231b5(dkon brtsegs): shes lnga brten nas mi shes pa med par 'gyur ro//'od srung de la ye shes gang yin pa dang /mi shes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga stong pa ste gzung du med cing byed pa med do//
231b6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di spyad ces bya ste/dper na sgron mase mun pa munA kun//med par gyur kyang 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med/de bzhin shes byung mi shes med gyur kyang //de ni gang nas 'ong
231b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am 'gro ba med//sgron mas mun pa bsal snyam mi sems kyang //snang ba byung nas man pa med par gyur//stong pa gzung med na mkha'i me tog 'dra//de bzhin yis
232a1(dkon brtsegs): /mi shus gnyi ga stong //'od srung 'di lta ste dper na khyim 'am/khang pa 'am/khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang ldan 'ga' yang mar m+b+ha ma bus pa
232a2(dkon brtsegs): der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na/'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/mun pa mun nag de 'di snyam du bdag ni lo 'bum du bsag pa yin te/bdag 'di nas mi 'gro'o snyam
232a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi sems lags te/mar me bus na mun pa mun nag la mi mchi ba'i mthu ma mchis kyi/gdon mi 'tshal bar mu
232a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de bzhin du las dang nyon mongs pa bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa yang tshul bzhin du yid
232a5(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa'i so sor rtog pa gcig gris med par 'gyur ro//'odra srung mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dgas so//'od srung mun pa mun
232a6(dkon brtsegs): nag ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dag so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis//ring zhig lon nus
232a7(dkon brtsegs): mar mi bus byas na//de la mun pa bdag gnas ring lon gyis//'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med //mar me phyung nas mun pa mun nag la//med par mi 'gyur ba yi
232b1(dkon brtsegs): nus med de//mar me bsten nas mun pa med par 'gyur//gnyis ka stong pa rnam sems ci yang med//de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes bsten//mi shes nyon mongs
232b2(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa med par 'gyur//ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang //de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs pa rnying //ye shes mi shes med phyi mi sems kyang //ye shes
232b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten nas m+b+hi shes med par 'gyur//gnyis ga gzung mod rnam pa'i me tog bzhin//de bzhin ye shes mi shas gnyis ga sbyong //'od srung 'di lta ste dbar nan mkha' la nis
232b4(dkon brtsegs): don rnams mi skye'o//'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus mi byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba na ma byung mi 'byung ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
232b5(dkon brtsegs): dperan mkho' lab sa bon skye ba ni//'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang ngo ltar med//de bzhin 'dus ma byas la sa sangs rgyas chos//skye ba gang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur//'dra
232b6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di lta ste dper na lud kyi so gang ba'i sa la nis don thams skyo'o//'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs po'i lud kyis gang ba'i 'jig rten gro nas pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
232b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams skye'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na lung po cas mtshan dang bcas pa la//sa bon skye yi dgon gdung rnams na min//de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye ro lo//
233a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sngas kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na 'brog dgon pa dgon gdung rnams na ni pad+ma mi skye'o//'od srung de bzhin du gang 'dus ma
233a2(dkon brtsegs): byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skyes pa de ni mi byung mi 'byung ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na pad+ma chu rdzing rnams ni skye//dgon gdung
233a3(dkon brtsegs): dag na nams kyang skye mi 'gyur//de bzhin 'dus ma byas las sangs rgyas chos//skye ba glang du'ang ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper no lung yod pa'i
233a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dam rdzab nas pad+mo skyes so//'od srung de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
233a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams skye'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na lung bcas 'dam rdzab chu las ni//pad+ma skye yi thang las nam yang min//de bzhin nyon mongs log ldan skye bo la//rgyal
233a6(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams kyi rgyal ba'i chos rnams skye//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mor sar gyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i
233a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa blta bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na rgya mtsho bzhi po mar sar gyis//yongs gang gtsang zhing kun nas yid du 'ong //de bzhin bya
233b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bde ga shugs sras//dge ba'i klung brus rtag tu ga pa dang / srung 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig gis sku rtul pa brgyar bshogs pa'i rtse mos rgyu
233b2(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po bzhi lngas chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de bzhin du 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas par ngabalta bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na chu
233b3(dkon brtsegs): yi phung po de la ni//sku tshal brgya yi rtse mo'i thigs blangs pa//de bzhin nyan thos rnams kyis dge byas pa'i//dge ba dag dang ldan par blta bar bya//'od srung 'di lta ste/
233b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa'i nang gi na mkha' bzhin du nyan thos kyi 'dus ma byas par blta bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na yungs 'bru srin bus zos pa yi
233b5(dkon brtsegs): nang gi na mkha' de ni rdung ba yin//nyan thog 'dus ma byas pa shes pa yang //de bzhin chung shing shin du chung bar blta//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i
233b6(dkon brtsegs): khams bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus ma byas shes par blta bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper ni phyogs bcuri 'jig rten thams cad na//na mkha'i khams ni sgrib pa
233b7(dkon brtsegs): med par 'dug/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes 'dus byas pa//'gro ba kun gyi mchog kyang de ltar blta//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyapa rigs spyi ro nas dang de bskur
234a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i btsun mo dam pa skyes pa dbul po dang nyal nas phyis de las bu byung bar 'gyur na/'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ngo rgyal po'i blo zhes bya 'am//gsol
234a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/bcom ldan 'das dri ni mi 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos rnams chos rnams chos kyi dbyings las skyes
234a3(dkon brtsegs): myomod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras dbang bskur ba re 'os shes mi bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo yid 'ong ma//skyes pa dbu'o//
234a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang ni nyal gyur te//de phyir de la bu byung gang yin pa//de ni rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min//de bzhin nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa//de dag dro bu dbang bskur
234a5(dkon brtsegs): 'os ma yin//'di ltar de dag bdag la phan phyir brtson//bdag gzhan gnyi ga'i don byed sangs rgyas srasra//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba
234a6(dkon brtsegs): nas dbang bskur ba/bran mo ngan pa dang nyal ba de las de'i bu byung na/'od srung de bran mo ngan pa las byung du zin kyang de lnga rgyal po'i sras shes bya'o//'od srung de bzhin du
234a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa 'khor ba na 'khor zhing /sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mthu ma thob du zin kyang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras shes bya'o//
234b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba bran mo dang //nyalta bar gyur pa de las du byung bu//bran mo las ni byung bar gyur kyang de//rgyal po'i sras shes 'jig
234b2(dkon brtsegs): rten zer ba ltar//byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa//srid pa gsum na 'khore zhing mthu chung ste//spyi ni dang thabs kyis sems can mi 'dul yang //
234b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag pa rgyal ba'i sras shes bya////bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//'od srung 'di lta ste dpe ra na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon
234b4(dkon brtsegs): nu stobs che zhing mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa mthu rnyed pa stong yod par gyur la/de dag gang yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang mi ldan na de dag la 'khor
234b5(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mI skyed pa de bzhin du/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan po thos bye ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems
234b6(dkon brtsegs): dpar ma 'a gyur na de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shrIs myi bskyed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na mi bad/rgyal ba sras stong po//'ga' yang bu yi
234b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang mi ldan na//de phyir de dag gces byed mi nus pas//de la mi mchog bro yi 'du shes med//de bzhin sangs rgyas zham ring byed pa mang //'ga' yang byang chub sems
235a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ma yin na//don byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' med phyir//de la bad+mo gshegs sras su dgongs mi mdzad//'od srung 'di lta ste dperan 'khor
235a2(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa chags nas zhag bdun lon te 'byung ba chen po mer mer
235a3(dkon brtsegs): po 'dugakyang /shin tu stobs dang ldan pas de la lha rnams re ba bskyed kyi gzhon nu stobs che le mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing mthu rnyed pa de dag la ni
235a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
235a5(dkon brtsegs): po bskyed pa/dbang po yongs su ma sbyin pa nyon mongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po mer mer por gyur pa/'khor ba ni 'khor zhing /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dge
235a6(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub pa yang shin du stobs dang ldan pas de la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams re bi bskyed kyi/dgra btsam pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la byasam gtan pa
235a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par gnas pa'i phyir ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun
235b1(dkon brtsegs): mo'i mchog/de mngal bsod nams mtshan ldan sems can chags//stobs dang ldan pas lha rnams re ba bskyed//gzhon nu mthu thob rnams la ma yin ltar//byang chub
235b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rtse gcig sems gnas shing //'khor bar gnas te byang chub tshol byed pa//de la lha dang klu rnams re ba bskyed//rnam thar brgyad dang bsam gtan byed la
235b3(dkon brtsegs): min//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig gis 'ching bu'i nor bu'i phung po ri rib tsam zil gyis gnon te/'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems
235b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na 'di gsal rin chen baiDUr+yas//
235b5(dkon brtsegs): mching bu'i nor bu mang po zil gyis gnon//byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pas//nyan thos stong yang de ltar zil gyis gnon//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/
235b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ka la bing ka'i phrug gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa mig ma bye ba yang 'di lta ste/zab cing snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon to//'od srung
235b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa mo rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis mig khe'is
236a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang 'di lta ste/dge bu'i rtsa bA yongs su bsngo ba bsngo ba'i sbyor ba'i sku spyad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnan to//'od srung
236a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa les gzhon nu 'khor los bskur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa btsas ma thag tu tshang dpon dang /grong rdal
236a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mo dang /yul gyi mI thams cad dang /rgyul phran thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa
236a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal lo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper nas bdag chen po rgyal po lnga//mtshan gyis lus smras bu zhig yod gyur
236a5(dkon brtsegs): na/gzhon nung ni bcas par mthong mi thag/grong khyer mi dang rgyal ban thams cad 'dud//de bzhin byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag/mtshan ldan rgyal ba'i sras pa
236a6(dkon brtsegs): da la ni//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag 'tshal zhing //dang po'i sems kyis shin du gces par 'dzin//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po gongs ril stan
236a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med//ris su bcas pa med/rnam par rtog pa med de/nad gang la bting yang nad rab tu zhi bar byed do//'od srung de bzhin du
236b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yo shos kyi spyan gang yang dag par sgrub pa de thams cung rnam par mi rtog par sgrub cing /sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis gasngo bar
236b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sbyor ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper nar rgya la grangs kyi ri bo li//sman skyes de dag mi rtog ngar 'dzin med//gang la btang ba dekun zhi bar byed//kha cig
236b3(dkon brtsegs): nad dang rga ba'ang sel bar byed//de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po ye shes sman//yang dgi sgrub pa'ang rnam par rtog spangs nas//sems can thams cad phan phyir yang dag sdug
236b4(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i sems kyis sems can gso bar byed//'od srung 'dri lta ste dper na zla ba chos pa la phyag 'tshal ba ltar nya ba lA nI ma yin no//'od srung de bzhin du gang dag de la
236b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las ni de
236b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ngo //de bzhin gra shegs po las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/zla ba tshes la thams
236b7(dkon brtsegs): cad phyag 'tshal gyi//zla ba nyil de ltar phyag mi 'tshal//de bzhin gang dgang dang de dag gis//rgyal sras byed chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal cig/'od srung 'di lta ste/
237a1(dkon brtsegs): /dper na yi glo'i phyi mo rnams ni bstan bac+doMs thams cad 'dzin pa shes pa'i sngon du 'gro'o//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang /byin gyis brlabs thams cad 'dzin pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i sngon du 'gro'o//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/
237a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/su yang skyur ma'i gzugs la nam yang sngon phyag ma byas so//'od srung de bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdag/
237a4(dkon brtsegs): la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i bslab pa la zhugs pa btang ste/nyan thos la nam yang phyag mi 'tshal lo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
237a5(dkon brtsegs): sus kyang zla ba rnam par spangs nas su/skar me'i tshogs lnga nam yang phyag ma byas//dri bzhin bslab la zhugasra pa nu ma du yang //du sras btang ste nyan thos
237a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag mi 'tshul//'od srung 'dri lta ste dper na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'ching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang /mching bu'i nor bu nAmra yang nor bu rin po che baiDUR+Yar
237a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin du nyan thos tshul khrims dang /bslab pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad sbyangs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan yang
237b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po r+ya 'dug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nAm yang mi 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//dper na
237b2(dkon brtsegs): lho dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis//'ching bu'i nor bu byi dor byas kyang ni//'ching bu dag ste bai DUr+yar mi 'gyur//'di 'dra de nyid de yo rang bzhin yin//de bzhin nyan thos khrims
237b3(dkon brtsegs): dang thos pa dang /bsam gtan ldan zhing sbyangs pa kun ldan yang /byang chub snying por 'dug ste bdud btul nas//byang chub reg ste bde gshegs 'gyur ba med//'od srung
237b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya byi dor byos na de kar she pa ni brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyuraro//'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi byi dor byas na de nyan
237b5(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rin chen bai DUr+ya ni spang byas na//kar sha pa ni mang po 'byung bar 'gyur//de bzhin
237b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras kyis sbyang byas na//nyan thos mang po 'byung ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/'od srung
237b7(dkon brtsegs): yul gong du srin bu rnga mo dud ka zhes bya ba mgo nag gan rkyal du nyal ba byu na yul de 'jigs pa dang bcas/'tshe ba dang bcas/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas/'khrug pa dang
238a1(dkon brtsegs): bcas par 'gyur ro//'od srung gal te yul der byang chub sems dpa' byung na yul de 'jigs pa med pa dang /'tshe ba med pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med
238a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro//'od srung de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don la brtson pa ste/des dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub//
238a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bya'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas sems can thams cad la btang bar bya'o//ye shes kyi sman gang tshel ba des phyogs pa nir song ste sems
238a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bar bya'o//yang dag pa'i gso pas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o//'od srung de la yang dag pa'i gso ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
238a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la mi sdug pa dang /zhe sdang la byams pa dang /gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /lta bar gyur pa thams cad la stong pa nyid dang /rtog pa dang
238a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang /mtshan ma'i dmigs pa yid la byed pa thams cad la mtshan du med pa dang /'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med
238a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams thams cad la gnas pa spangs pa'i phyir smon pa med pa dang /phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/mi rtag pa la/
238b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag myed pa la bdag
238b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes pa la chos thams cad la bdag med pa dang /mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa la mya ngan las 'dus pa zhi bas gso ba dang /lus drang tshor ba dang sems
238b3(dkon brtsegs): dornam la gnas pa rnams pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/de la lusA la lus kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang lus kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang /
238b4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba can gnas kyang tshor ba'i rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung ba dang /sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas
238b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bur mi ltung ba dang /chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba can du gnas kyang chos kyi rjes su lta bas bdag tu lta bar mi ltung bas
238b6(dkon brtsegs): gso ba dang /yang dgra pa'i spong ba bzhes ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
238b7(dkon brtsegs): ni lus dang sems la ril por 'dzin pa 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lngas ni ma dad pa dang /le lo dang /brjed ngas pa dang /rnam par g.yeng ba dang /
239a1(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin med pa rnams gso ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis ni chos la shin tu rmongs shing mi shes pa gso ba dang /'phags pa'i
239a2(dkon brtsegs): lam yan lag brgyad pas ni 'chal pa'i shes rab dang /phas kyis rgol ba thams cad dang /lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams gso ba ste/'od srung 'di ni yang
239a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gso ba zhes bya'o//'od srung byang chub sems dpas gso ba 'di la bslab par brtson par bya'o//'od srung 'dzam bu gling na sman pa dang sman pa'i slob ma ji
239a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed yod pa de dag gri nang na 'tsha byed pa mchog ces bya'o//'od srung gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
239a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dang 'dra bar gyur kyang /de dag la la la zhig lta ba dang /'gyod pa la gnas pa gso ba'i sman gang yin nas dris na/de dag
239a6(dkon brtsegs): gri shes pa 'am bstan pa 'am bskor bar mi nus so//'od srung de la byang chub sems drapas 'di snyam du bdag ni/'jig rten gyi sman tsam gyis mchog par mi bya'i bad
239a7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman yongs su btsal bar bya'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang legs par yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du brtag
239b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//de ltar brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman gang tshol ba des phyogs bzhir song la/sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya ste/
239b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i gso bas sems can rnams gso bar bya'o//'od srung de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sman grang zhe na/'di lta ste rgyu rkyen la 'jug pa shes
239b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gso ba med pa dang /gang zag med pa'i chos la mos pa'i shes pa dang /stong pa nyid kyis
239b4(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la mi sdang ba dang /sems can yongasu tshol ba'i brtson 'akrus so//de 'di ltar sems yongs su tshol te 'dod chags par 'gyur ba 'am/zhe
239b5(dkon brtsegs): sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yin/ci 'das pa'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung ba zhig yin nam/de la sems 'das
239b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'o//ma 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o//da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo//'od srung sems ni nang na yang med/phyi rol na
239b7(dkon brtsegs): yang med/gnyi ga la med par yang mi dmigs so//'od srung sems ni dpyad du med pa/bstan du med pa/rten ma yin pa/snang ba med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa
240a1(dkon brtsegs): /gnas med pa'o//'od srung sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyuraro//log par zhugs
240a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba
240a3(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba lta zhe na/'od srung sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin to//'od srung sems ni
240a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bab chu'i rgyan dang mtshungs te mi gnasapa skyes nas 'dzag cing 'ju ba'o//'od srung sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o//'od
240a5(dkon brtsegs): srung sems ni mar mo'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba'o//'od srung sems ni na mkha' dang mtshungs te nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams
240a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa'o//'od srung sems ni glog dang mtshungs te skad cig tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o//'od srung sems ni spre'u dang mtshungs te yul thams
240a7(dkon brtsegs): cad 'dod pa'o//'od srung sems ni las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ri mo mkhan dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni nyon mongs pa tha dad pa 'byung
240b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir mi gnas pa'o//'od srung sems ni gnyis pa mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i phyir gcig pu rgyu ste gnyis su med pa'o//'od srung sems ni chos thams cad la dbang byed
240b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir rgyal po dang mtshungaso//'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir me mnga' ba dang mtshungaso//'od srung sems ni bde ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig
240b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i phyir bye ma'i khring pa dang mtshungs so//'di srung sems ni mi rtag pa la rtag par du shes pa'i phyir zil pa dang mtshungs su//'od srung sems ni sdug bsngal la bde
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bAr 'du shes pa'i phyir nya'i mchil ba dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni
240b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba lnga gcong bar 'du shes pa'i phyir sbrang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni gnod pa rnam po mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshungaso//'ong
240b6(dkon brtsegs): srung sems ni rtag tu glan ka tshal ba'i phyir ga/nod sbyin medangs 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni rtag tu glags lto bas dag dang mtshungs pa'o//'od srung
240b7(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas rtog par mthon dman can no//'od srung sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rku bas chom rkun dang mtshungs so//'od srung
241a1(dkon brtsegs): /semaswA ni gzugs la dga' dus rgyu la'i myig dang mthus su//'od srung sapas ni sgra la dga' bas g.yul gyi rnga dang mnangaso//'ad srung sems na
241a2(dkon brtsegs): bag mi gtsang ba'i dril dga' ba bzhin du dril dga'o//'od srung sems ni rol dga'i bslazas kyi lhag ma~M zla ba bran ma dang mtshungs//'od srung sems ni reg
241a3(dkon brtsegs): b+hapA la dga' bas sbyang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so//'od srung sems ni kun du btsal na mi rnyed do//gang mi rnyed pa de mi dmigs pa'o//gang+gA mi
241a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/
241a5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o//gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa de ni med pa yang ma yin med pa yang
241a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no//gang yod pa yang mi yin med pa yang ma yin pa de ni ma bdod la skyes pa de la ngo bo nyid med do//gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do//gang 'byung ba
241a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la 'gag pa med do//gang 'gag pa med pa de la 'bral ba med do//gang 'bral ba med pa d+mal 'ong ba yang med/'gro ba yang med do//'chi
241b1(dkon brtsegs): yang med/skyo ba yang med do//gang la ltung ba yang med/'gro ba yang med/'chi 'pho yang med/skye ba yang med pa de la 'du byed gang yang med do//gang la /
241b2(dkon brtsegs): byed gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o//gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rig so//'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bslab pa med/
241b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa las 'das pa yang med do//gang la bslab pa yang med/bsgrub pa las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med/mi rgyu ba yang med/rab tu rgyu ba yang med do//
241b4(dkon brtsegs): gangal rgyu ba yang med/ma~M d+hU ba yang med/rab tu rgya ba yang med pa de la sems nga med/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do//glang la sems kyang med/
241b5(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do//gang la las kyang med/las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la nga
241b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang mdo/sdug bsngal ba yang med do//gang la bde ba yang myed/sdug bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/'bigs pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin
241b7(dkon brtsegs): bde la ni las kyang med/las mngon par 'a byed pa yang med//gang le la sa kyang med/las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med pa'i rigs de la ni dus kyis las nga pa
242a1(dkon brtsegs): med do//dgra gis ma yin//yid kyis mu yin no//rigs de lA rngam dang /'bring dang /mchog tu rnam par bzhag pa yang med do//den+ti'i phyir zhe na/
242a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs de ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o//rigs de ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir khyad pa med pa'o//rigs nga ni lus dang sems dben pa'i phyir dben
242a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//rigs de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa'o//rigs de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'o//rigs de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yin
242a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pas nga yi ba med pa'o//rigs don yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mnyam pa las byung ba ste/mi mnyam pa med pa'o//rigs de ni don dam pa'i
242a5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa yin pas bden pa'o//rigs de ni gtan du mi skye ba'i phyir mi zad pa'o//rigs de ni rtag tu chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir rtag pa'o//rigs de ni mya ngan la
242a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dras pa mchog gi phyir bde ba'o//rigs de ni rnam po thams cad du dri ma med pa'i phyir dge ba'o//rigs du ni bdag yongs su btsal te ma rnyed pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o//rigs
242a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni rab tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o//'od srung nang du yongs su tshol la phyi rol du ma rgyug cig/'od srung ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang
242b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa dag 'byung ngo //'od srung ji ltar na dge slong khyi rdol skyugs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na khyi na rdos 'jigs la rjod nyid kyi phyir
242b2(dkon brtsegs): snyegs kyi/rdo ding sus 'phangs pa de la ni mi snyegs//'od srung de bzhin du 'di la dge slong dang bram ze kha cig gzug dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg byas 'jigs shing skrag nas
242b3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa'i gnas rnams la gnas shing /de dag da ni gcig pu gnyis su med par lus rab tu dben par 'jug ste/chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang
242b4(dkon brtsegs): ro dang /reg bya rnams snang bar gyur na/de dag de la btang snyoms su 'jog cing bsod nams su sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas kyi/nang du so sor rtog pa la mngon par mi
242b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson te/de dag gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las cis 'byung ba mi shes shing khong du mi chud do//de dag gis de ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas/
242b6(dkon brtsegs): glong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal pa'i pho brang 'khor dag tu srong na yang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams
242b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnod par 'gyur ro//gal te de dag dgon pa na gnas pa las 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na 'jig rten po'i sdom pa la gnas pa de dag mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye
243a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/der yang de dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis gnod par 'gyur ro//de dag dri nas shi 'phos nas ngan song bzhi las yongs su ma
243a2(dkon brtsegs): grol bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha ma yin no//'od srung de ltar na
243a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong khyi rdo la snyegs pa dang mtshungs pa dag yin no//'od srung ji ltar na khyi rdol snyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin zhe na/'od srung gang gshe yang slar mi gshe/khros
243a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang slar mi khro//mtshangs drus kyang slar mtshang mi 'dru/brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg/bsdigs kyang slar mi bsdigs/smad kyang slar mi smod cing nang du so sor rtog ste/
243a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ga she bu 'am/khros pa 'am/brdag pa 'am/bsdigs pa 'am/smad pa'am/mtshung brus pa de dag gang yin snyam du so sor rtog pa'o//'od srung de ltar
243a6(dkon brtsegs): na dge slong khyi rdo la bsnyegs pa dang mi 'dra ba yin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na khyi ni rdo bas skrag gyur kyang //sus 'phangs mi sdigs rdo la snyegs par byed//
243a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze la la dag/gzugs la sogs pas skrag nas dgon par gnas//de dag dgon pa de la gnas gyur kyang //gzugs la sogs pa
243b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa mthong gyur na//btang snyoms 'jog cing nad gyi tshul mo shes//de yi nyes las byung ba gang yin pa//mi shes pas na slar yang grong du gnas//gzugs
243b2(dkon brtsegs): lo sogs pas drir yang gnod par 'gyur//'dir yang lha yi longs spyod spyad gyur te//lha dang mi lus kha cig shi 'phos nas//de dag ngan song sar ni ltung bar
243b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//blun po de dag shi 'phos sdug bsngal 'gyur//de ltar sdug bsngal brgya ldan de dag ni//khyi rdo snyegasu pa 'dra zhes bde gshegs gsungs//skyes kyang
243b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gshe brdeg kyang mi brdeg dang //su zhig smad kyang smod par mi byed dang //de bzhin 'tshang drus 'tshang 'dru mi byed dang //khros kyang nges pa khro ba mi byed cing //nang gi
243b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag/tshol zhing yid zhi dran dang ldan gyur pa//de 'dra'i tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa ni//rdo snyegs khyi mi 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs//
243b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na rta'i 'dul skyong la mkhas pas rta de gang dang gang du g.yo byed cing ma byang ba de dang de rab tu sbyong ngo //'od srung de bzhin du dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa yang gang
243b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du sems 'gyur bar 'thong ba de dang der de rab tu sbyong ba 'jug ste/de ci nas phyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba ltar sems rab tu 'chos so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
244a1(dkon brtsegs): dper na rta yi 'dul spyod mkhas pa zhig/byang zhing g.yo med tshul du rab tu 'dul//rnal 'byor pa yang sems ni 'gyur mthong nas//ji ltar phyis
244a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug mi 'gyur de ltar 'chos//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na lkog nad lha gor gyis ni srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed de//'od srung de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams
244a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rlung na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni chos kyi srog gi dbang po 'gag par byed pa'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na lcu gor srog gi dbang po la//gnod cing de la
244a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba sbyin pa min//de bzhin lta gyur nang na bdag lta ba//de ni chos srog rnam par 'jig par byed//'od srung 'di lta ste/dper na myi ni gang dang gang du bcings
244a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang de nyid las dgrol bar bya ba yin no//'od srung de bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems gang dang gang la chags pa de dang de las dgrol bar bya ba yin no//de
244a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na mi ni gang du bcings gyur pa//da dang de las dgrol bar byas yin//de bzhin sems mangs gang dang gar chags pa//rnal
244a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pas ni de dang de las dgrol//'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i na mkha' la yongs su chags pa ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig
244b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba dang /lhung bzed dang chos gos lcug par 'chang ba sgo 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/'jig rten rgyang panA goms byed brtson+da pa dang /
244b2(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed chos gos lhag par 'chang byed pa//'di gnyis na mkha' la ni chags pa ste/de dag byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya//'odra srung 'do gnyis ni rab tu byung
244b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'ching ba dam pa ste/gnyis gang zhe na/lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i 'ching ba ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad
244b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/lta 'gyur 'ching dang rnyed dang bkur bsti dang //grags pa'i 'ching ba rab tu byung ba yi//'ching ba dam zhes 'phags pa rnams kyis gsungs//de dag rtag tu
244b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bas spring //'od srung 'dri gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i chos gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/khyim pa phyogs lnga brten pa dang /'phags pa'i phyogs
244b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnod par sems pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/khyim pa'i phyogs la brten par byed pa dang //'phags pa'i phyogs la rnam par spyod byed pa//'di
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rab byung bar chad bgegs byed pa//byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang //'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i dri ma ste/gnyis gang zhe na/nyon mongs pa la
245a1(dkon brtsegs): /me medzad pa dang /mdza' bo'i khyim dang nas steng ba'i khyim yongs su 'dzin pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di na ces bya ste/rab tu byung ba tsun mong sa mi mngon dang /
245a2(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bo'i khyim dang zas ster khyim bsten pa//de gnyis dri myur rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs//byang chub sems dpas de dag rnam par spang //'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab
245a3(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba'i ser ba 'bab pa ste/gnyis gang zhe na/dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /tshul khrims las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la
245a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/dam pa'i chos ni spong ba dang //tshul khrims nyams kyang spyod pa ste//ser ba 'bab pa 'di gnyis ni//rgyal sras rnams kyis spang bar bya//'od
245a5(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i rma yin te/gnyis gang zhe na/pha rol gyi nyes pa la so sor rtog pa dang /bdag gi nyes pa 'chab pa ste 'di gnyis so//de l-i 'di skad
245a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/bdag gi skyon ni 'chab byed dang //pha rol nyes la rtog byed pa//'di gnyis dug gi me dang 'dra//rtog pa rnams kyis rma 'di spang //'od srung 'di gnyis
245a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu byung ba'i yongs su gdung ba ste/gnyis gang zhe na/rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa
245b1(dkon brtsegs): las bsnyen bkur dang rim gror bya ba bdag gir byed pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rnyog dang bcas pa'i sems kyis ngur smrig 'chang ba dang //bsnyen
245b2(dkon brtsegs): bkur rim gro byed dang gus par smra ba dag/tshul khrims ldan pa rnams las bsten par byed pa dang //chos gnyis 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ba yin//'od srung
245b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu ste/gnyis gang zhe na/bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal ba dang //snying po ma blangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad
245b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/bslab pa'i gzhi las 'gal bar gyur pa dang /snying po ma blangs par ni dus byed pa//'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i zug rngu zhes//lha mi'i sten pa thams cad
245b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas gsungs//'od srung 'di gnyis ni rab tu byung ba'i nad gsor mi rung ba ste/gnyis gang zhe na/mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sems nges par sems pa dang /theg
245b6(dkon brtsegs): pa tshon pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi 'dun pa bzlog pa ste 'di gnyis so//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/mngon pa'i nga rgyal sems la nges sems dang //
245b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas theg pa las ni 'dun pa bzlog/'di gnyis rab tu byung ba'i nad yin zhes//gang zag mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs//'od srung dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba
246a1(dkon brtsegs): /ji tsam gyis ni dge sbyong dgra sbyong zhes bya zhe na/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong bzhi gang zhe na/kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi ngag sbyong dang /tshogs srungs zhing
246a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong dang /brjod pa'i sgro tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong dang /yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong ngo //'od srung de la kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dag
246a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gang zhe na/'od srungs 'di la dge sbyong kha cig kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs dang ldan par gyur te/chos gos snam sbyar gyon cing skra bregs te lag nau lhung bzed
246a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs mod kyi/de lus kyi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/ngag gi las yongs su ma dag par spyod/yid kyi khos yongs su ma dag par spyod cing /ma dul
246a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma zhi ba/ma bsrungs bla ma byang ba/'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa/brkam pa/le lo can/tshul khrims 'chal ba/sdig pa'i chos can yi nA te/'od srung
246a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyi dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'od srung de la cho ga srung zhing tshul chos pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/'od srung 'di la dge sbyong kha cig cho ga dang
246a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul dang /spyod pa phun sum tshogs shing skyed lam bzhir shes bzhin du spyod la/zas dang skom ngan pa za 'thung /'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag gis chog
246b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin/bas mtha' gnas mal la mngon par dga'/khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre la/tshig nyung zhing smra ba nyung mod kyi/de'i spyod lam de dag kyang
246b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa dang /kha bsag gis yongs su rtags pa yin te/sems yongs su drag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/nye bar zhi bar
246b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir me yin gyi/dmigs par lta ba yin te/ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas shing /stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams la g.yang
246b4(dkon brtsegs): ser 'du shes pa yin/stong pa nyid sna dra'i dge slong rnams la yang dgrar 'du shes pa yin te/'od srung de ni cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'od srung
246b5(dkon brtsegs): de la brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/'od srung 'dri la dge sbyong kha cig ji ltar bdag tshul khrims dang ldan par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du
246b6(dkon brtsegs): so sor brtags nas tshul khrims srung /ji ltar mang du thos par gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam du so sor brtags nas thos pa 'dzin ji ltar gzhan bdag dgon par
246b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur snyam dus song btsugs nas dgon pa la gnas shing /sa so brtags nas 'dod pa nyung mchog shes pa dang rab tu na pa'i /
247a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir yin gyis/skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/'gog par bya
247a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma yin/nye brang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/dge sbyong gi phyir ma yin/tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/mya ngan
