247a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin te/'od srung de ni brjod pa'i sgra tshig su bcad pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'od srung de la yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/'odra
247a4(dkon brtsegs): srung gang lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba yin na/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa lta ci smos//stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa'i
247a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thos na dga' zhing de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa yin/mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dod pa med par spyad pa spyod na/khams gsum pa la mngon par dga'
247a6(dkon brtsegs): ba lta ci smos/stong pa nyid du lta ba yang mi 'dod pa yin na/bdag dang sems can dang /srog dang /skye ba po dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag
247a7(dkon brtsegs): tu lte ba lta ci smos//don la rten gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa nang du tshol gyi phyi rol du rgyug po ma yin/chos tha~Md
247b1(dkon brtsegs): shin du yongs su dag cing rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par mthong bas bdag nyid skyabs yin ta/gzhan skyabs ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa la chos
247b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du yid me lta na gzugs kyi skung lta ci smos//chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi lto na smra ba'i tshig ga lam nas brjod par lta ci smos/'phags pa 'dus
247b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa'i dge 'dun la yang rnam par mi rtog na mang po 'dus par lta ci smos//chos gang spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin/bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin//
247b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin/'khor bar yang mi skye/mya ngan las 'das pa las yang mngon par dga' ba ma yin/thar pa yang mi dmigs/bcings
247b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin la/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rigs nas/kun nga mi 'khor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'du' ba yin te/
247b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'od srung yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur bar brtson par bya'i ming gis gnod par ni mi bya ste//'ong
247b7(dkon brtsegs): srung dge sbyong ni bzhi po 'di dag go/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang zhig lus dang ngag dang sems ma dag/ma dul ma bsrung ma byang 'dod chen can//skra bregs chos
248a1(dkon brtsegs): kas+t+ra ltung ba zed lag na thogs//dA ni daSh+Tha a r+thAgs dge spyang yin zhes bsnun//rdzog spyod pa las sogs ldan gyur rnying //kha zas dran
248a2(dkon brtsegs): za tshul 'chos la sogs bsten//'du 'dzi rgyud ring yongs su spong byed cang //spyod lam 'phags pa'i rig skye dang ldan gyur k+Shang //de yi de kun dul bar bya phyir
248a3(dkon brtsegs): min rjen zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min//stong pa mtshan med g.yang sIr 'du shes pa//cho ga srung zhing tshul 'chos gnyis pa yin//tshul khrims ting 'dzin sbyangs
248a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan thos//gzhan dag ngo mtshar 'dzin du gzhug phyir byed//zhi phyir ma yin skyo bar bya phyir min//brjod dang grags 'dod dge sbyong gsum pa yin//gang
248a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig lus srog don du mi gnyeng ning /rnyed dang bkur bisti la ni rgyab kyis phyogs//rnam par thar pa bskyed pa'i sgo thos nas//srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad don mi gnyer//
248a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams shin du stong par yongs brtags nas//mya ngan 'das dang ma 'das mthong mi 'gyur//chos la 'dod chags bral bar rtag tu rtog/ma byas chos rtogs mya ngan
248a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das par 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/mi dbul po zhig la mdzod 'byor pa zhes ming btags na/'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/mi dbul po de dag ming nge mthun
248b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin nam/gastsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze gad drug dgra
248b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dang bram ze'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa de dag ni gsung rab 'di las mi dbul po zhes dus bu shad do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na dbul por gyur pa'i mi sdig
248b3(dkon brtsegs): lo/mdzod ldan ming btags de la mdzes ma yin//dge sbyong nyams la dge sbyong ming mi mdzes//dbul la phyug ces btags pa'i dpe dang mtshungs//'od srung 'di lta
248b4(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la/chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung 'di la dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po
248b5(dkon brtsegs): blangs te/kun chub par byas kyang 'dod chags la sred pa mi sel//zhe sdang la sred pa mi spe la/gti mug la sred pa mi spel ba de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos khyer la/nyon
248b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na mi zhig rgya mtshwa'i chus khyer la//de ni sgom
248b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur//de bzhin chos mang srod pas bag med pa//chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas kyang ngan song 'gro//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na sman pa sman /
249a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rgyu ba de nad cig gis btab nus nad de gso mi nus na sman de ni don med pa yin no//'od srung de bzhin du mang
249a2(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du lta ste/gang mang du thos pa des badrag nyon mongs pa'i nad las gso mi nus ni/de'i mang du thos pa da ni don med pa yin no//de la
249a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/dper+ya na sman po'i sman sgor bcug pa'i skran//'jig rten kun du yongs su rgyu byed kyang //nad kyis btab pa bzlog par mi nus na//de yi sman de don
249a4(dkon brtsegs): med gyur pa yin//de bzhin dge slong tshul khrims yon tan ldan//zlos dang ldan yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i//nyon mongs byung ba'i nad ni mI sel na//de yis
249a5(dkon brtsegs): thos la brtson pa don med yin//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi nad pa zhig la rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman btang la//cho ga bzhin ma byas pas 'chi ba'i du byas pa de
249a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/'od srung gang mi sdom pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de yang mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nang du lta'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na rgyal po 'os pa'i
249a7(dkon brtsegs): sman btab nas//tshig mi byas mi de shi bar gyur//de bzhin gang mi sdom pas 'dir shi ba//de ni mang du thos pa'i nyon mongs nad//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na nor bu
249b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che mi gtsang ba'i nang du lhung na sdud par 'gyur zhing mkho bar mi 'gyur ro//'od srung de bzhin du mang du thos pa rnyed pa dang bkur bsti'i myi gtsang ba'i rlung du lhung bAr lta ste//
249b2(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med pa la ni lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mi 'gyur ro//de lnga 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na rin chen mi gra tsang lhung ba smad//ji ltar sngon bzhin de ni phyis mi
249b3(dkon brtsegs): yin//dge slong mang du thos par gyur pa yang //bkur bsti'i mi gtsang lhung ba de 'drar bshad//'od srung 'di lta ste dper ni mi ro'i mgo la ge ser gyi phreng ba btags
249b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'tshal ba ngur smrig gyon par blta'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/dper na mi ro'i mgo la gser phreng ngam//yang na me tog phreng ba gdags
249b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa//de bzhin khrims med ngur smrig gyon pa yang //mthong nas de la yid ni dang mi 'gyur//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig legs par khrus
249b6(dkon brtsegs): byas te/legs par rnam par byugs la skya drang sen mo dregs nas gros dkar po 'gros te tsan dan mchog gis bamus pa'i mgo la tsam pa ka'i me tog gi phreng ba thugs
249b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/'od srung rdul khrims dang ldan zhing mang du thos pa ngur smrig gyon par lta'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/legs bkrus legs par byugs pa sa//tshong
250a1(dkon brtsegs): dpon bu yi mgo bo la//tsam pA kA yi me tog thod //dri ni m+bu yod 'od btags pa mdzes//de duzhin tshul khrims ldan gyur cing //mang thos tshul
250a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims phun sum tshogs//rgyal ba'i sras po yon tan ldan//dril ngur smrig de bzhin mdzes//'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'tshal pa tshul khrims
250a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'od srung 'di la dge slong kha cig tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsnams
250a4(dkon brtsegs): shing gnas/cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa/kha na ma tho ba phra rab rnams la yang 'jigs par lta/yang dag par blangs te bslabs pa'i grin
250a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la slob cing /lus kyi las dang /ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gnas pas 'tshe ba yongs su dag kyang /de drug
250a6(dkon brtsegs): tuzla ba yin te/'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltung bcos pa dang po'o//'di spyang gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig 'dul ba 'dzin
250a7(dkon brtsegs): nga 'dul ba la drugs te/'dul ba'i tshul la gnas pa yin yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa yin te/'od srung de ni tshul khrims 'tshal sa
250b1(dkon brtsegs): tshu la khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gnyis pa'o//'od srung gzhan yang 'di la dge slong kha cig byams pa la gnas pa la gnas pa yin te/sems can la
250b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa yin yang 'du byed thams cad la skye ba med pa thos na skrag ste kun tro drangang par 'gyur zhing kun du rab tu dngang par 'gyur ba de ni 'od srung
250b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcos pa gsum pa'o//'od srung gzhan yang 'dri la dge slong kha cig sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag
250b4(dkon brtsegs): par blangs kyang dmigs par lta ba yin te/ngar 'dzin pa dang /ngar yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa de ni 'od srung tshul khrims 'o chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa
250b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcos pa bzhi pa ste/'od srung bcu po de dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa ltar bcas pa yin no//'od srung tshul khrims shes bya ba
250b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang la bdag med pa dang /bdag gi ba med pa dang /bya ba med pa dang /mi bya ba yang med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa
250b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyu ba ma yin pa dang /mi rgyu ba yang ma yin pa dang /rab tu spyod pa med pa dang /rab tu spyod pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang /ming med pa dang /gzugs
251a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin pa dang /rlab tu zhi ba ma yin pa dang /rab tu ma zhi ba yang ma yin pa dang

251a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/rtog pa ma yin pa/khams gsum pa dang bral ba/rten thams cad med pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcud pa 'di

251b1(dkon brtsegs): med/ tshul khrims ldan la rdul rnams med de nyes pa meng //zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nyo bar zhi ba'i yid//rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral zhing nyan mongs med//grayo
251b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni rlom sems kun dang rnam bral bar//de ni 'od srung srangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan//lus la mi lta srog la phangs par 'dzin mi byed//sred pa
251b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams su skye ba kun la 'dod pa med//yang dag zhugs shing de nyid tshul la rab gnas pa//de na 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan//'jig rten
251b4(dkon brtsegs): ma gos 'jog rten dag la gnas pa med//snang ba thob cing bdag gi med de ci yang med//bdag tu 'du shes mod cing gzhan du 'du shes med//'du shes

251b6(dkon brtsegs): dang chags med tshul 'chos med cing zag pa me//de ni 'od srung sangs rgyas bstan la tshul khrims ldan//ming dang gzugs rnams la ni chags pa med pa'i yid
251b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni mnyam par gzhag cing shin du dul ba'i sems//gang la bdag med bdag gaur 'dzin pa med pa ni//de tsam gyis ni tshul khrims gnas zhes brjod pa yin//so sor
252a1(dkon brtsegs): thar pa slob pas rlom sems byed pa med//des ni 'drin dri la chags par mi 'gyur te/dri yi gong du 'phags pa'i lam rnams tshol byed pa//de ni tshul
252a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan mA'o//tshul khrims gtso bror ma yin ting 'dzin dang chags med//de yi gong du shes rab bsgom pa yongs su tshol//dmigs pa med
252a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs yin te//tshul khrims de ni bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bsngags//'jig pa'i tshogs la lta las rnam par grol ba'i yid//de
252a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir nga dang dA yi snyam du 'gyur ba med//sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa nyid la lhag par mos//de yi tshul khrims la ni mnyam pa med pa'o//tshul khrims la ni gan+d+ha
252a5(dkon brtsegs): nas ting nge 'dzin kyang thob//ting nge 'dzin rnams thob nas shes rab shin tu bsgom/shes rab kyis ni ye shes rnam par dag pa thob/ye shes rnam par dag pas tshul
252a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims phun sum tshogs//tshigs su bcu dang mngon par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pa zab/rnams las sems rnam par
252a7(dkon brtsegs): grol lo//srog cha gsum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/dge slong ba sem gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni chos
252b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/ma rtog sum mos pas sbyar las langs te dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol/
252b2(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong brisam gtan thob pa lnga brgya po 'di dag chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/mi rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te

252b6(dkon brtsegs): slong lnga brgya po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la mu stegs can gyi nyan thos su gyur te/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung las brgal ba'i bsam
252b7(dkon brtsegs): pas chos bstan pa gcig thos so//thos nas dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed de/ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
253a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'jam zhing snyan par gsung ba ngo mtshur to sgyum mo//de dag 'chi bu'i dus byas nus dad pa'i sems gcig rnyed pa des sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha//
253a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi nang du skyes so//de dag de nas shri 'phos nas 'dir skyes te rgyu de nyid kyis nga'i bstan po 'di la rab tu byung ste/'od srung dge slong lnga brgya po lta bar bying
253a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dri dag ni chos bstan pa zab mo 'di la mi 'jug ste/mi rtogs mI mos shing skrag ste kun du sbyangs kun du rab tu stangs so//yang 'di dag ni chos bstan pa

253a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di dog la bshad nAM yang mthun par mi bgyid na bdag la lta smos kyang ci 'chal/do nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam
253a7(dkon brtsegs): gang nas 'dod pa'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul to//de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de gnyis las gang nas 'dod pa'i lam
253b1(dkon brtsegs): de dong ste phyin pa dang /'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa dag gaR+Sha 'dod de gnyis kyis smras pa/kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas rnamasu bsam gtan gyi ba ba lA/

253b7(dkon brtsegs): ba lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so//tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang

254a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang med pa gang yin pa de zhi ba zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'a'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag ting ni/
254b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khar zhing yongs su mya ngan las mI 'da'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag chos de dag gis yongs ma
254b2(dkon brtsegs): dAn las 'da' bar ston na/chos de dag kyang steng pa dben pa gzung du med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste mya ngan la sa 'das pa'i 'du shes spong zhing /'du
254b3(dkon brtsegs): shes la yang 'du shesum byed cig/'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes par mi byed cing /gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongasu shes pa de ni
254b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'du shes kyis bcings pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhugs shig/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'du
254b5(dkon brtsegs): shes dang char ba 'gog pa'i snyom par 'jug pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smras so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa

254b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sa dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dge
255a1(dkon brtsegs): gar dod/gang nas lhags/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang /gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i
255a2(dkon brtsegs): rabacom ldan 'das kyis cho sde babyen to//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyisgra ston pa gang yin/smras pa/gang ma skyes shing yongasu mya ngan
255a3(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'da'o//smras pa//khyed kyis ji ltar tshwa swa thos/smras pa/bcings pa'i phyir yang ma yin/thar pa'i phyir yang mo yin no//smras pa/

255b1(dkon brtsegs): na las 'ad//sgyus pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam+b+ha yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba nA'o//spu sma /khyud kyis bya ba byas suma?/smras pa/dang //

255b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro/smras po/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud paro//de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongasu
255b7(dkon brtsegs): dris te/dge slong de dag gis len btab nas/'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol//srogs chags sum khri nyis stong ni
256a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas sdang ba zhes bya ba 'khod//
256a2(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dus pa de stan las longs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das grwa la
256a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de logasu thal me sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
256a4(dkon brtsegs): slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu tshar bcad cing tshur bcad nas chos kyi rnam

256a6(dkon brtsegs): khams pa'i grur zhugs te/gda'i klung chen po brgal bar 'dod par gyur na/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mi ngas ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gru de bsar
256a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o//da ci'i slang zhe na/'dag ni chu bachen po'i nang du zhugs kyis bdag 'gram du ma byin
256b1(dkon brtsegs): par bar ma dor glu zlog tu 'ad snyam du sems pa'i skud du//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/kun du snang ba da ltar byang chub sems dpas de bas kyang chos stobs dang ldan//
256b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsgrub par bya ste/stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par byen
256b3(dkon brtsegs): kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/bdag gis snying por ma blangs par byer ma dor 'i che ba'i dus bya su 'ong ngo yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyis chu bo bzhi
256b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bskal ba'i phyir/dam pa'i chos kyi gru glang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgral
256b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya'o//kun du snang ba de la byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya ba dro ci 'dra zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can

256b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa bcing ba srad bu dam par spel pa/bzod pa dang nges pa dang dran po'i sbyor kas legs pa sbyar ba/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi chags

257a2(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes kyi dge ba'i bzos legs par zin par byas pa/shin+da du mi'akhrugs pa'i chos can/snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa/bsdu

257a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par bsags pa/legs par byas pa/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis legs par yongs su sbyangs pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhis legs par

257b1(dkon brtsegs): can dan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar byed ba/zhi gnas kyis nges par soms pa brtan pa/lcug mthong gis sbyor ba/mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jug pa/rgyu'i chos/

257b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer baiSh+Ti sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o//kun du snang ba de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mtshon pa shes po myur gang zhe na/gang 'di sems can thams cad las bco
257b7(dkon brtsegs): ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /sngar bzhin

258a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mi bsrung ba rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang /dron dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang /shin du mi 'khrugs pas ye shes kyi don dang /yis
258a4(dkon brtsegs): kyokyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang /mi 'khrugs pas bden pa'i dron dang /yang dag par sbyor bar byas pas stong pa nyid kyi don dang /shin du nye bar zhi ba'i don yin pas

258b1(dkon brtsegs): rlosmra k+Shi rnam grangs 'dri ba las tshogs su bcad pa gaN+DIg tsam bstan na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu mo de bsad nams te phung po dzinam ba skyed par 'gyur/de ska nas

258b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

259a1(dkon brtsegs): chagasu bcad pa gcig tsam lung mnos te/lud mnos nas kyang mi spong na de ni de bas chos bsod nams mang du bskyed do//bud med gang zhig lung

259b1(dkon brtsegs): bklayo bar mi byed ba drung /rkang pa 'phya bar mi byud bu dang /gaN+DIn mi sbyor ba dang /phyis mi 'byung ba dang /de'i snying khar rdul mi 'byung ba dang /khwa tshur mi 'chung ba dang /na mkhang //

259b3(dkon brtsegs): paM bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'ad m+b+ha ste gladrongs snyan pa'i cho ga dang /mnyen pa'i tshig drung /'jam pa'i tshig dang /dga' ba'i tshig dang /snyan pa'i tshig dang /sla

259b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa dang /'chab par mi 'gyur ba dang /tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang /nyes pa la mi dga' ba dang //bon btsugs la mi dga' ba dang /khan bcugs ldi/mi dga' ba
259b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang /spang ba la bag yod par 'gyur ba dang /ma zhugs pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'dzin pa dang /nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyis

260b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang shI len tra bo d+hi dang

261b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pas dge sbyong zhes bya ste/shes rab dang ldan pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i snying po ltar len pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ba dang /

261b5(dkon brtsegs): drang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang /gzhan gyi drang la mi 'jog pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i rjes rnams la brdzun 'grus brtsams po dang //

261b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang /stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang /chos rnams kyi brten
262a1(dkon brtsegs): /pA shwAs pa la mkhas pa dang /lAm+b+ha shes pa dang /lam la mkhas pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
262a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan b+hi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /don la rnon gyi tshig 'bru
262a3(dkon brtsegs): lA mi rton pa dang /ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rten pa dang /nges pa'i don gyi mdo snga la ston gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rten pa dang /chos nyid la
262a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gang bag la mi rton pa dang bdud bzhi'i lam las shin du 'das pa dang phung po yongs su shes pa bsrung ba dang /nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang /tha ma'i lus 'dzin/
262a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'chi bdag gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang /sdug bsngal ba yang dag par yongs su shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang /
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang /lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
262a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzeg pa dang /ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byis pa dIng /byed pa byas pa dang /zag pa zad pa dang /
262b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dathar pa brgyud la bsam gtan pa dang /bad+d+ha b+h+yon dang rmongs pa dang /ga snang byas bas pa dang /dz+nyAn d+hI pa dang bsam pa phun su tshogs
262b2(dkon brtsegs): pe dang /dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang /'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang /blo
262b3(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu med pa dang /rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang /bse ru lhar gcig pur rgyu ba dang /'du 'dzis 'jigs/spags pa dang /khams
262b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum las rnam par grol ba dang /rtag tu 'ji snyas pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang /yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas pa dang
262b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang /'dzag rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang /grags po dang /ma grags pa dang /bde ba
262b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal ba dang /bstod pa dang /smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang /sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar
262b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te/gnas pa dang /bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrungs pa dang /'khrul pa med pa dang /'khrug pa med pa dang /yang dag par
263a1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa dang /nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /mtshan ma
263a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la de'i sems mi chags mi 'ching ste/dper na nam mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags/mi 'ching ba yin te/
263a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu/de dag dang ldan na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'ong
263a4(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon tan 'di dag yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das
263a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i dus ni gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa
263a7(dkon brtsegs): nub par bgyid do/dge sbyong ma lags pa'o/dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'tshon tshangs par spyod do/ma lags
263b1(dkon brtsegs): par tshangs par spyad par mchod kyis 'chi ba'i dge slong la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
263b2(dkon brtsegs): pa byung dang khyod dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan 'das shing /byang chub sems dpa'i 'di dag kyang spangs
263b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong nas bstan pa 'di rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba ni tshig gis bstan par mi nus so//'od
263b4(dkon brtsegs): srung de la dge slong lus ma bsgoms patshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/sems ma bsgoms pa shes rab ma
263b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa/byis pa dman paglen pa rmongs pa dang /ra tu ma zhig/mdul ba/kha cig 'byung
263b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/de dag gi/g.yod do/sgyu dang /mi ba dang /tha byung nga/dge sbyong gi
264a1(dkon brtsegs): /ma dang /dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par bya'o//'od srung de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'dro dag
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/dri dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o//sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gri dri ma dang /gnod sems//
264a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /rnam par 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa dgra stong gi dri ma dang /bdag la bstod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /gzhan la
264a4(dkon brtsegs): brnyas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun du tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gri dri ma dang /dad pas byin
264a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chung sngon pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /khyim pa la brten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /rab tu byung ba dang brten pa dge
264a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gre dri ma dang /'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /rnyed pa yongasu ma grub par rtog po dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /bdog gi rnyed pa dang /chog
264a7(dkon brtsegs): der mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang //pha rol bsod nams kyis rnyed pa la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dI na dang /pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi
264b1(dkon brtsegs): demya dang /bdag gi 'khrul bya la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs su tshol bya dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba mi srung ba drug
264b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang /khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri me dang /ma gus pa dang rgod pa dang khengs pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dong rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma
264b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri mo dang /'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge
264b5(dkon brtsegs): spong gi dri ma dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /chos zab mo spong ba dge
264b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang /chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gI dri ma ste/'od srung sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge
264b7(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dri ma ste/de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bla ma rnams
265a1(dkon brtsegs): lA mi gus pa dang /chos rnams la rim gro med pa dang /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yin la byed pa dang /ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba dang /bdag
265a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang /gang zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang /'dus mA byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi 'jug gi 'dus byas nyid
265a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjesu sgeg pa dang /'du byed rnams ma skyes pa zhes thos nas skrag pa dang /chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa thos na g.yangs chen por lhung ba bzhin du
265a4(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba ste/'od srung brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/rab tu gyur pas de dag yongasu spyang par bya'o//'od srung dge sbyong gi kha dog dang rtags/
265a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyis dge sbyong zhes da mi 'chad kyi/yon tan gyi chos la nun tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ni dge sbyong zhes ngas bshad do//'od srung dge sbyong gis ni
265a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung rnyog pa med pa la ngas ngur smrig gnang gi/'od srung rnyog pa dang //
265a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba de dag thams cad ni ngur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/bsam pas myos pa rnams ni ma gtog so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
265b1(dkon brtsegs): no 'bugs pa rnams kyi rgyul mtshan yin pa'i b+hi te/skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyi snga gos 'di dag ni nye ba n+d+ha pa'i rjesu mthun pa byams pa'i rjes zug sa
265b2(dkon brtsegs): ro//'odi srung de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gung zhe na/'od srung bcu gnyis pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/bcu gnyis gang zhe ni/'od
265b3(dkon brtsegs): srung tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /ting 'dzin 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /shes rangab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /rnam par

266a1(dkon brtsegs): /snang gangs mtshan 'ad dgu dang ldan par 'dagus pa'i rigs gos ngur sgrog dag 'chang ba don nong par chos la zhugs pad+d+ha Sh+Tas ngas pa blang /
266a2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang 'gul bar gnas pa zhes dza~M ka de//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes ba shad do//mya ngan las le s+yA pa'i phyogs

269b1(dkon brtsegs): slong zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o//bdag tu 'du shes pa bcom pa dang /sems can du 'du shes pa dang /srog tu 'du shes pa dang /
269b2(dkon brtsegs): gso bar 'du shes pa dang /gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /skyes par 'du shes pa dang /bud med du 'du shes pa dang /khye'ur 'du shes pa dang /bu mor 'du shes/
269b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom pa ste/de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o//lus bsgoms pa dang /tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang /sems bsgoms pa dang /shes rab bsgoms pa dang //
269b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs skrag pa med pa dang /srid pa'i chu bo las brgal ba dang /'byung ba dang 'jig pa la lci ba dang /'jigs pa thams cad las bral ba dang /'jigs pa med
269b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam la gnas pa ste/de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o//'od srung gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la bdag ni dge slong dge slong ngo snyam du khas
269b6(dkon brtsegs): 'che na/bsam pas mos pa ma gtogs par nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yino//'od srung sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal tsher nga'i bstan
269b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te/'od srung ya mtshan dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa nub par byed mi nus//gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa
270a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lasnga mi gti mug pa yod par mi sems pa gang dag 'byung bla de dag gis de'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyuraro//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na ra//
270a2(dkon brtsegs): dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge shrI ba'i sha lu gcan zan nas bya grang gis kyang zla bar mi nus kyi/seng ge'i ro dwa nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung ba de dag ri dgas kyi rgyal ba
270a3(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i sha la za'o//'od srung de bzhin du de'i bstan po 'di nyid las mi blun po pirkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/nges par mi sems pa
270a4(dkon brtsegs): lhod pa brdzun du smra ba gang dag 'byung ba de dag nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyuraro//'od srung chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa can gyi dge slong du rig par bya ste/bzhi gang
270a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/chags pa dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te bzhi po de dag go//gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/khengs pa dang /
270a6(dkon brtsegs): mu cor smra ba dang /byA khA ta lta bu dang /tshig 'chal pa ste bzhi po de dag go/gzhon yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/rgod pa dang /po theg can dang /rnyed pa 'dod
270a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/g.yo can dang /sgyu can dang /mi mthun pas 'tsho ba dang /mi
270b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pas smra ba yin te bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa la smod pa dang /sngon byas pa mi dran dang /mdza la
270b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khu ba yin te bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/dang pos byin pa log par lhung bar byed pa dang /tshul khrims mi srung ba dang /so sor
270b3(dkon brtsegs): thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang /gdul ba mi srung ba ste/bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag tu smra ba yin/sems can du smra ba yin/
270b4(dkon brtsegs): sog tu smra ba yin/gang zag tu smra ba yin te bzhi pa de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin//chos la mi gus pa yin/
270b5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la mi gus pa yin/bslab pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te/bzhi po de dag gi/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/dge 'dun mthun pa la mi dga' ba yin//
270b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsug ldeg 'ang la dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin/'du 'jil mngon par dga' ba yin/'jig rten rgyung pan pa'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi
270b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bzhi gang zhe na/rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/grags pa 'dod pa yin/gnyen pa ses 'dod pa yin/chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te bzhi po de dag ga/gzhan/
271a1(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhiste/bzhi gang zhe na/bdud kyis zin pa yin/bdud kyis non pa yin/rmugs pa dang gnyid meng ba yin/'phags pa'i rigs rnams
271a2(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa yin te/bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lus rul cing bad+mAn pa dang nyon mongs pas sdud pa dang /mya ngan las
271a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa dang /'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'dod chags kyi yongasu gdung
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pas yongasu gdungs pa dang /zhe sdang gi yongasu gdung bas yongasu gdungs pa dang /gti mug gi yongasu gdung bas yongasu gdungs pa dang /nyon mongs pa
271a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yongasu gdungs bsdu yongasu gdung ba ste bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lam dran pa lnga gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong ba
271a6(dkon brtsegs): yin//ser sna can du gyur te kun mi 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can yin/thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod cing chog mi shes pa yin//doms mi myong zhing thos
271a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nan tan dang bral po yin te bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/rnam par gzhol bas mun par gyur pa yin//rmongs pa la gzhol bas
271b1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par gyur pa yin/log pa'i chos kyi sa dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin/mya dran las 'das pa'i sgo bcud pas 'khor ba'i bcings pas bcings pa yin te
271b2(dkon brtsegs): bzho pad dag go//gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lus kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/dag gi tshul 'chos pa yin/sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos
271b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te bzhi po dag go/de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni ngal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin/mgo smad par tshul 'chos pa yin/gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing tshul
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa yin/gos chags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin/dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/gong
271b5(dkon brtsegs): bur 'du shes pa mi sel bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul ba chos pa yin/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rje su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin//
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung dang shing drung du gnas pa lhur tshal 'chos pa yin/chos badrad rtsi'i sngan mi tshol bar bkus ha bor ba'i sman tshal ba lhur
271b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa yin te 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o//de la dag gtsul 'chos pa gang zhe na/che ge ma zhes bya mis kho bo shes shing che ga mo zhes bya bas kho bo 'gron
272a1(dkon brtsegs): du bos gang 'dod pa rnyed cang /bsti bstang du byas nas rnyed/kho bos bzang po rnyed/kho bos mang du rnyed/kho bos mang du thos/kha bo tshul
272a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin/kho bo ni bod par bos pa yin/kho bo ni slar lan gdab pa'i 'os yin/kho bo ni nus pa dang ldan zhing bskal pa yod la
272a3(dkon brtsegs): mthu yod pa yin/kho bo ni don rnam par nges pa bstan pa la mkhas pa yin/gang che ge mo zhes bya ba kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/kho bos de la 'di skad
272a4(dkon brtsegs): skad smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par byas/kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas/kho bos log so zhes bya ba thab/kho bos de la bag pa thob/yang 'od
272a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo 'gron du gnyer ces bya ba ste/'od srung nges par mi sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa las tshig 'chal ba de lta bu gang ci byung ba de thams cad
272a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste/mi rigs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rigs pa rnams kyi ma yin te 'di ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o//'od srung de la sems kyi tshul chos
272a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin zhe na/gang sems kyis chos gos dang bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongasu rtog la/tshig gis bdag la ci yang mi dgoso zhes zer ba dang /gang sems
272b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rnyed par 'dod la 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyis tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sems kyis rnyed kyang tsa ma rung snyam sems//
272b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgyes med sgra//med pa'i ngo bo'i yid kyis de smras te//na mo yang bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin//sems kyis tshul chos bsam pasal
272b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang //klu dang lha mgu can rnams sme bar byed//smras pa'i sems kyis nams kyang dag mi 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis de mkhyen to//'od srung
272b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa sdig pa can rnams kyi cho ga ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta gang yin pa 'di ni sems can dmyal po dang /dud 'gro
272b5(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///'od srung dri la dge sbyong gdol po lta bu gadra zhe na/'od
272b6(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di lta ste dper na gdol pa ni/rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul ba yin te/shaM ba lA re ba dang /byams pa med pa'i mig gis 'gro ba la lta ba dang /shi ba la dga'
272b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba yin te/de nas rnyed pa dang bsgyur
273a1(dkon brtsegs): stis nye bar 'tsho zhing byis pa de dag chas sam 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang /de skyed pa'i rgyud du 'dris par byed kyis don gyi ched du ma
273a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang /mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/gdol
273a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag blon po dang //de khams kyi rgyal po dag dang /bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong rdal gyi mi dang /yul gyi mi rnams
273a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtag tu yongasu spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongasu spang ngo //'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu
273a5(dkon brtsegs): yang /dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa/yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi so yongasu spong bar bya
273a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'i 'os yin te/dge sbyong gdal pa lte bu'i sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod cing tshul khrims 'chal par rig nas/thag ring po bas kyang ring por ljongs su spong
273a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo //'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/gdol ba'i kha phyis sam/gos sam/yongasu spyad pa de dag thams cad la ni skye bo ya rabs rnams mi reg cing yongasu mi
273b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod do//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzeng dam/chos gos sam/yongasu spyad pa thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongasu btsal pa/
273b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang /sems smras pas yongasu btsal ba yin pas/tshul khrims dang ldan pa/yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do//'od srung 'di
273b3(dkon brtsegs): lbu ste dper na/gdel pa ni khyis thogs te/zhum zhum por byas nas/gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang zhum zhum
273b4(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshalo//zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o//zhum zhom par byas ni su gtsug lag khang
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /gnas khang dang /gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o//zhum zhum por byas nas 'gro ba dang /'dug pa dang //nyul bar byed do//'od srung de ltar na zhum zhum
273b6(dkon brtsegs): por byas pa ldog pa 'chab pa de'i spyod lom gang yin pa dri dag thams nAd ni rung ba ma yin pa lus yongasu sngags pa'o//'odro srung 'di lta ste dper na/gdol
273b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mo gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de rang gi las kyi nyes par phyir/'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sems
274a1(dkon brtsegs): byung bde 'byor 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing /de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhig la de dran 'gro gsum du gnas par snang
274a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med de/'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong gdol ba lta bu zhes bya'o//'od skad de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal po la
274a3(dkon brtsegs): 'os pa'i bdud ba ro mchog dang ldan pa la sa gang+gA s+t+wa~M ku mchog bcu sa bya de'i lhag mi nI rul cing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste/myung bar byu ba mo yin no//
274a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang chos kyi mchog gi snying ku'o rlo b+h+yo b+ha dang bral ba yin te/drid ba dang /yongs snang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/
274a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang /g.yo sgyu 'dzin pa dang /'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin/nyon mongs pa'i dris
274a6(dkon brtsegs): pabasgos pa yin te/de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du yang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi/gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma yin te/'od srung 'di ni dge
274a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong rul ba zhes bya'o//'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/rul ba zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang /'thungs pa dang /'chos pa gzugs pa de ni rul cing dring po
274b1(dkon brtsegs): smin te/sgru ba ya rabs thams cad kyis yongasu spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rdul ba yang gzugs pa dang mtshungs te/lus dang ngag dang sems
274b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi kun tu spyod pa yongasu ma dag pas/'phags pa'i skye bos yongasu spang bar bya ba yin te/'di ni dge sbyong rul ba shes bya'o//'od srung 'di lta ste/dper na/
274b3(dkon brtsegs): sa bon rul pa gang yin pa de ni sa chen po las sbyor mi rung ngo //'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mo skye zhing 'phags
274b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus pa ma yin la/'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o//'od srung de la dge sbyong za ma
274b5(dkon brtsegs): tog lta bu gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/za ma tog phyi rol shin tu byi ngor byas la/nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du dge slong
274b6(dkon brtsegs): za ma tog lta bu yang dge sbyong ltar bcos shing phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod par gyur la/nang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug gis yongasu gang ba yin te/'od
274b7(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di ni dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o//'od srung de la dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste/dper na/ku ran da ka zhes bya ba'i me
275a1(dkon brtsegs): tog nI kha dog byulta na skyug la reg na rtug lci ba'i sbrang ma'i dri mnam zhing shil bur kany+dzi rna ba'i dri mnamA s+t+waM/mkhas pa mtshungs pa rnams//
275a2(dkon brtsegs): ni me tog de lta bu la mi rig mi len mi snom gyi brang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog dri lta bu len cing snomo//
275a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong ku rAn da ka lta bu yang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang mi nges pa yin/tshig brlang ba yin/'tshul
275a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin/'chi ba nyams pa yin/spyod pa nyams pa yin/lta ba nyams pa yin te/mdzangs pa mkhas pa rnams ni ku
275a5(dkon brtsegs): rAn dA ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la ston pa 'am/bsnyen pa 'am/bsnyen bkur mi b+he ts+tsha/de'i tshulnga rig pas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su
275a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod ngo //gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da kaM lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten cing sbyin lnga bsnyen bkur byed du/ku ran dA ka'i
275a7(dkon brtsegs): memi tig byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa bzhin du/de dang 'thun pa nyid du 'gyur te/'od srung 'di ni ku r-in da ka bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//'ad srungad de la
275b1(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhe na/'ad srung 'di lta ste dper na/mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brkam pa/chags pa'i ril gyis non pa/bdug gi n+d+ha
275b2(dkon brtsegs): pas tshig par mi 'dzin pa/gzhan gyi nor la re ba drag shul can/dbyug pa dang /mtshon cha dang /dgra cha thogs pa/ngo tsha med pa/snying rje med pa/rtag tu bdug
275b3(dkon brtsegs): cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/de gang gi tshe/grong bar ram/glong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/yul du 'jug pa'i tshe/de 'di snyam du gzhan
275b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gi nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur na/re skyes snyam du sems shing /de zin du 'di zhes mkhyun bu mekhyun bur rgyu ba yin//'od srung de bzhin du chom rkun lta
275b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag tu brkam pa/chags pa'i zil gyis non pa bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa/gzhan gyi rnyed pa la reg pa yin te/de gang gi tshe/grong bar grong
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dam/gling khyer ram/grong rdal lam/yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/de brnyid pa'i phyir 'jug gi/chos kyi phyir ma yin te/spyod lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur
275b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yin/'chab cing spyad pa yin te/bdag dge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/shes par gyur na/so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don
276a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la m+b+ha bskyed par 'gyur//snum nas rtag tu skrag cing rtag tu 'jigs te/spyod lam thams cad kyang g.yas spyod pas m+b+ha dang k+Sha
276a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin+da dang /d+hi zla dag gis chom rkun 'ang ngo //chom rkun 'gro'o//chom rkun 'greng ngo //chom rkun 'jug/chom rkun 'dun nye lo ches gos len/
276a3(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun grang du 'gro'o//grang nas 'byung ngo //chom rkun za'o//chom rkun 'thung //chom rkun ste 'dreg zhes rig par 'gyur//'od srung de ltar na ltang
276a4(dkon brtsegs): klu dang /gni sbyin dung rnams kyis de'i spri las klung sbyin pa dedab skye du rlung bam yin yongasu brgyugs pa sa yin par rig par 'bye
276a5(dkon brtsegs): rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed cing /kye ma 'ong mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu dag gis/bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pa'i bstan pa/
276a6(dkon brtsegs): nub par byed phyir Sh+Tagyur zhes 'byo na myi sman pA zer//tshul khrims dang ldan par yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la ni lha dang klu dang /gnang sbyin dang /
276a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang 'di dag ni bstan pa yong su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa tshar bskyed do//'od srung chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong bstan pa 'od la rab tu byung ba ni skyeng dang /'dod
276b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang ma sbeng na/'bras bu 'thub pan+d+ha ci sa kyis/de ni gnas med de/'od srung 'di ni cham rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o//
276b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de la dge sbyong shin te ma gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/'bru'i nang na gang dag mA sbyin pa dang /mi grung ba dang /'ongs med cing 'bru 'dra ba de dag
276b3(dkon brtsegs): gi shin te ma zhes bya'o//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te mi yang /yang zhing mthu chung la bdud kyis zin pa bdud kyis non pa/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis
276b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs la/rlung gis g.yengs pa lta bu ste/'od srung dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba da ni/dge sbyong tshul khrims 'chal pa/sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla
276b5(dkon brtsegs): dgas la phyogs bsta na ngas dge sbyong shan te ma zhes btag so//'od srung de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/nas kyi ljang bu phun
276b6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa'i nang na/nas la gnod pa zhig skyes nas/de ljang bu'i kha dag 'dra zhing rtogs dang dbyibs kyang 'dra bas/de la nas kyi bdag po de dag 'di
276b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du phyogs thams cad na nas yin snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed skyed pa las/gang gi tshe nad kyi ljang bu los snye ma byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/nas la gnod pa de la nas
277a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo //'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong sum par byed pa'i dge slong/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nung na 'dug pa yang tshul khrims
277a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/yon tan dang ldan pa/sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams dang /kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas/de la sbyin pa po dang /sbyin bdag de dag
277a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong do snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing /sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa las/de nas gal to/mi gti mug pa/dge sbyong ma yin lo//dge sbyong
277a4(dkon brtsegs): du khas 'tshe ba/tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la/tshangs par spyod par khos 'che ba/nang rul cing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste//shi 'phos shing 'chi bo'i
277a5(dkon brtsegs): dus byas nas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis/de sems can
277a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar skye bar mthong ste/mthong nas kyang gti mug pa 'di ni sngon dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas nga sems can dmyal ba
277a7(dkon brtsegs): chen por skyes te/nas la gnod pa la nas kyi yon tan med pa ltar 'di la yang dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi 'bras bu medado//zhes snying rje chen po skyed de/'od srung 'di
277b1(dkon brtsegs): ni dge sbyong mun par byed pa zhes bya'o//'od srung sa de la dge sbyong ltar btsos pa gang zhe na/'od srung 'di lta skye dper na/ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i lcags shig yod//
277b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongasu sbyang ba byas shingashin tu yongasu dag par byis na/gser 'byung byar gyur te/'on kyang gsar gyi rin thang dang /gsor gyi kha dog dang /bdar
277b3(dkon brtsegs): 'pho dang /srong la gzhal ba'i ljing 'dra ba ni ma yin no//'od srung de bzhin du dge sbyong ltar bcos pa'i dge slong yang lus shin tu bkrus shing gos bzang po mdzes
277b4(dkon brtsegs): pagyon la/dge slong gi phyi rol gyi spyod pa thams cad yongasu dge ste/'gro ba dang /'ong ba dang /mdun du lta ba dang /g.ya' g.yor lta ba dang /bskum
277b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /brkyang ba dang /chos go sa rnam sbyar dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos 'dzin pa shes bzhin du spyod kyang /de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa da
277b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gis bcom pa dang /gti mug giso bcom pa dang /nyon mongs pas bcom pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur stis bcom pa dang /nga rgyal dang
277b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nga rgyal dang /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /log pa'i nga rgyal
278a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom pa dang /nyon mongs pas 'khol ba dang /bsnyen bkur lhur len gyi chos lhur len pa dang /lus che bar sbyor ba la brtson gyi//
278a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi tsha bar sbyor ba la mi btsun pa dang /zas dang gos lhur len gyi/'phags po'i chos ltar mi len pa dang /'jig rten pha rol du khA na mya the bas 'jigs
278a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi lnga pa dang /tshe 'di lhur len gyi/tshe khyim lhur mi len po dang /lus gso ba dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /grags pa la rten gyi/chos la rim
278a4(dkon brtsegs): gror bya ba la mi rten pa dang /sbags pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa dang /sdig pas bsgres pa dang /khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la mngon par brtson pa dang /khyim pa
278a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pas/bde ba dag gis kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang //gshin
278a6(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten du gzhol ba yin zhing /de dge sbyong gi rin thang drang //ri ba dang /dge sbyong gi srung kha dang mi mnyam pa ste/'od srung 'di ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa
278a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//'di srung de la ci ltar na dge sbyong gzo 'phrogs pa yin zhe na/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/skye ba 'am/bud med dam/khye'u 'am/bu mo gang la
278b1(dkon brtsegs): laTIg mi ma yin pas gzi 'phrogs par gyur na/de dbang chung bar grags shing /mdog ngan la/mi sdug par 'gyur te/de ltar mdangs 'phrogs pa rnams
278b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni sman tam/gsang sngags sam/rig sngags rnams kyi mi smon te/de 'chi bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyuraro//'od srung de bzhin
278b3(dkon brtsegs): du dge sbyong gang la la tshul khrims kyi gzi med pa dang /tingange 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang /shes rab kyi gzi med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i gzi med pa dang
278b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang /byams pa'i gzi med pa dang /snying rje'i gzi med pa dang /dga' ba'i gzi med pa dang /btang snyoms
278b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzi med pa dang /sbyin pa dang yang dag par sdom pa dang /nges pa'i gzi med pa dang /dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang /'phags pa'i rigs laM gan+da
278b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzi med pa dang //sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gzi med pa dang /lus dang ngag dang /sems yongasu dag pa'i gzi med pa 'dri ni
278b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dge slong gzi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/'od srung gzi phrogs pa de lta bu rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/'di lta ste/
279a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags lam+b+hi stug pa'i sman pa dang /sho sdang la byams pa dang /gta mug la rten cing 'bol bar 'byung ba dang /nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul
279a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yid la bya ba dang /'du 'ji la dben par dga' ba dang /'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang /gsum bsdams pa'i phyir lus dang /
279a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang /sems yongasu dag pa dang /sems la su rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongasu dag pa'i sman de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la
279a4(dkon brtsegs): me tshugs te/de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur//gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i sman 'di lta ste/phung po
279a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /khams shes pa dang /skyes mched shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
279a6(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur//
279a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lnga brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongasu ma dag bzhon du dad pas byin pa spyad par gyur na/mi rung zhes
279b1(dkon brtsegs): nyams par byas te/slar khyim du dong ngo //de la dge slong gzhan dag cig 'di skad du/dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor spyod pa 'ang dag bsnun pa las nyams
279b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni shin tu mi legs zhes 'phyo'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dag khyod 'di skad du/dge slong che ba'i bdag
279b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bston pa las shin tu nyams pa 'di ni shin tu ma leg so zlum smra shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag mngon par mi dga' nas/khyim
279b4(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa 'di ni dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin te/dge slong dad pa dang /mos pa mang ba 'gyod pa dang ldan pa/'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/bdag cag
279b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongasu mA dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongasu spyad na/mi rung ngo zhes nyams par gyur to//'od srung nga lung ston te/dge slong 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos
279b6(dkon brtsegs): nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ri su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa'i grangasu chud par 'gyur ro//dge sbyong gradol pa
279b7(dkon brtsegs): lte bu'i le'u ste gau tsum pa/bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
280a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong ci lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung ngas zhal tu bya bar
280a2(dkon brtsegs): gnang ba'i dge sbyong gnyis te pa gnyis gang zhe na/dang slang yang su dag pa/'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba las kyi rnam par smin pa
280a3(dkon brtsegs): la rton pa/mdzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang /gang yang zag pa zad pa/dgra bcom par gyur pa ste/'od srung dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis
280a4(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo //ri ci'i phyir zhe na/'od srung legs par gsungs pa'i cho sa 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba/sems kyis mos
280a5(dkon brtsegs): ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa/kha cig ni dgon pa pa bzhi pa'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/kha cig ni bsod snyoms
280a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/kha na gla ni grang ma ba na gnas po/kha cig ni 'chi ba yongasu dag pa/kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/kha cig ni chos smra ba/kha cig ni 'dul
280a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzin pa/kha cig nim mo 'dzin pa/kha cig na grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste/
280b1(dkon brtsegs): skyemyas rnyan gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnams bsgrud dka' ba'i phyir//'od srung de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas/dge sbyong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu ba
280b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//'od srung de la dge slong dgon pa pa bas mtha'i mel snyan pa gang yin pa de dgra ni/dge slong zhal ta byed pas yongs lasu bsko bar mi bya'o//zhal ta byed pas dge
280b3(dkon brtsegs): slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/dus ma yin par gsol ba mi bya/dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o//'od srung gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi
280b4(dkon brtsegs): bye bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las ris brnya na/dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las de bdag nyid kyis bya'o//yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las de byed du gzhug
280b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/dge slong dgun pa pa la gnod par mi bya'o//'od srung de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo ba shel
280b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//'od srung de la dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la/dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'thun pa'i batshogs chas dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad
280b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams sbyin par bya'o//dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa des phyogs gang la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der//dge slong zhal te byed pa des/sgra chen po dang skud drag pa mi dbyung zhing /
281a1(dkon brtsegs): byed du yang mi gzhug go/dge slong zhal tu byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa/de bsrung zhing /mal ca yang sbyar bar bya'o//kha zas bsod pa dang /
281a2(dkon brtsegs): yi gar 'ong ba dang /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang 'thun pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba rnams smyon par bya'o//dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
281a3(dkon brtsegs): brten pa'i phyir gnas pa yin to//de la bdag gis rjes 'thun pa'i yo byad thams cad meng du sbyor bar bya'o snyam du shin tu phungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//'od srung
281a4(dkon brtsegs): del dge sbyong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal tate byed pas lung nos shig/lcogs shig/kha ton gyis shog/
281a5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shig/'dug la
281a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig/bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shug ces spro ba skyed par bya'o//'od srung du la dge slong zhal ta byed pas
281a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya/lasu bsko bar mi bya'o//dge slong zhal te byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dog bsrung bar bya'o//'od srung de la chos smra ba'i
281b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las mi bsgo bar bya'o//grong dang grong wAR+Sha dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug
281b2(dkon brtsegs): tu bcug la chos 'chad du gzhug go/chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o//'bel ba'i tshe skyi gtam gyi phyir//dkyil 'khor
281b3(dkon brtsegs): du gzhag par bya'o//chos smra ba'i dge slong la dge slong gang dag gnod pa byed pa'i dge slong deg dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o//dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos
281b4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bas par bya/leg so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o//'od srung de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gi gan
281b5(dkon brtsegs): du dge slong zhal ta byed pa de song la//ji ltar na bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dang /ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyis zhal ta bya zhes yongasu dri bar bya'o//de nas
281b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhal ta byed pa de'i bsam pa rig na/de'i bya ba dang /'byung ba gang yin pa dang /byed pa gang yin pa
281b7(dkon brtsegs): de bstan par bya'o//dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs par bya ba dang /dad pa dang /gus pa dang /zhes rab tu ba
282a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dge slong zhal ta byed pas/dus du su dge sbyong gi dge 'dun lnga 'bul bar bya'o/dge 'dun
282a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnyed pas bsags shing spro bar mi bya ste/ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/mo bskul bar sbyin par bya/gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o//des 'dun pa dang
282a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /'jigs pas 'gro bar mi bya'o//dge slong gi dge 'dun la rten por bya'o/khyim pa'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o//dge 'dun gyi
282a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba la rton par bya'i/bdag dgar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o//dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o/bya ba ci tsam du chung ba yang dag
282a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi gros bzhin bya zhing rang dgar mi bya'o//dge 'dun gyi 'am/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am/mchod rten gyi yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/ci lta ba bzhin
282a6(dkon brtsegs): du gzhag par bya ste/dge 'dun gyi phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o//phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o//
282a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o//mchod rten gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang
282b1(dkon brtsegs): bsro bar mi bya'o//gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bral phrongasu gyur la/dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/dge sbyong zhal ta byed pas/dge sbyong gi dge 'dun
282b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdus la/gros 'thun par bgyi ba te/dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la shugs par bya'o//gal te de bzhin ga shegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ril du
282b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/dge 'dun gyi dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyeng po che bar gyur na/dge slong zhal ta byed pas/dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad bslus la/gros
282b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par bgyis te/'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/dge 'dun gyi dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar
282b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing /dad pa dang ldan la/dunang cing gnang na bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa
282b6(dkon brtsegs): 'odi las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'dis ltung bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na/dge slong nal
282b7(dkon brtsegs): te byed pa de ba de bzhin bya'o//ci ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/dge slong zhal te bying po des sbyin pa po dang /skyon bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la//de bzhin gshegs
283a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o//'od srung gral te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar myang du myur du sbyin kyang /dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun
283a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dad cing drang ba mang po dag gi sa mchod rten la phul ba ni tha nA ras kyi kha cur gcig
283a3(dkon brtsegs): tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin no/rin po che'am/rin po cher smos pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/mchod rten la gos phul ba
283a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang nyi ma dang /char pas dengs kyang bla'i/mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gam/dbyig gi
283a5(dkon brtsegs): rin du bsgyur bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mchod rten gyi ni rin thang cung zad kyang med la mchod rten ni cis kyang brel ba med pa'i phyir/'od srung dge slong zhal te
283a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pas de ltar yongasu dgu par bya ste/des dkon mchog gsum gyi dang /ma spags pa bya'o//bdag gi rnyed pas cho ga shes par bya'o//dkon mchog gsum
283a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o dngos po rnams la bdag gi 'du shes mi bya'o//'od srung dge slong zhal ta byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis
283b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa/yon tan dang ldan pa/sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros snum/dbang byud cing bsgo blag byed na/de ma dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal
283b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gro bar 'gyur//gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'dis na yang bran dang gzhan gyi lus byed par 'gyur ba dang /khu tshu ro dang thal lcags dang /lag cha snyems pas brdegs
283b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /phrad par 'gyu ro//'od srung gzhan yang dge slong zhal te byed pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/rang drag ra dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing /sgo ba dang /chad
283b4(dkon brtsegs): bas gcod pa dang /'jigs par byed pa dang /sngags pa dang /dus ma yin par mngag pa dang /dus ma yin par bsgo ba byed na de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe ba'i sems
283b5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stang zug cing /de dag 'bar rab tu 'bar la/kun tu rab tu mched
283b6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bor bar 'gyuraro//des tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /yon tan dang ldan pa/sbyin gnas rnams la sdigs shing /ngag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa gang yin pa
283b7(dkon brtsegs): des/de dang skyes nas/lho'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing /de'o lce'i dbang po de la lcags pur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing de dag kyang 'o bar rab tu 'bar//

290a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po med pa/bdag gi med pa/yong su 'dzin pa med pa de ltar g.yo ba med cing byed pa med de/stong bzhin du skye zhing 'jig la su yang de dag skye bar mi byed/'gog par mi byed pa'i mtshan ma

290a6(dkon brtsegs): rten tshegs pa las 'byung gi rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba ste/'di la don dam par skye ba dang 'gug pa'i tshogs gang yang med do snyam du mtshan ma gzung bar bya'o//'od srung de ltar dge
290a7(dkon brtsegs): slong dgon pa pas chos kyi yi dam kyi spyod pa 'di lta bus dgon pa la gnas par bya'o//de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa de nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/byang
290b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa zhig tu myur du khyad par du 'gyur ro//gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur na ni de myur du 'bras bu thob par 'gyuraro//ji snyed lus kyi sgrib pas bsgribs te 'bras bu thob par
290b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur na yang de zag pa rnams la sems rnam par grol gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis samA gsum lis mi 'di'o//gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni de myur ba nyid du rang byang
290b3(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par 'gyuraro//gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur na ni de'i tshe 'di nyid la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/de sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro//sgrib pa
290b4(dkon brtsegs): med par sangs rgyas mthong nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//dgon pa pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med
290b5(dkon brtsegs): par zag pa rnams lngas sems rnam par grol lo//dgon pa pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////'od srung de la ji ltar na dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa ma yin zhe na 'od srung 'di la dge slong bsod
290b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyod pas 'di ltar bdag bsod snyoms kyi kha zas la gnas te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/bdag sngon gyi smon lam dang dam bcas pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du
290b7(dkon brtsegs): bslab par bya'o//dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa des mi brkam pa dang /tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /kha bsag med pa dang /mgron du 'bod pa thams cad kyi sems
291a1(dkon brtsegs): /med pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang ma 'bags pa dang /yid dmyal brtan par bya'o//des kha zas bzang po rnams la ro blo bI'i 'du shes thams cad kyi thams cad du//
291a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bya'o//des 'di ltar bdag gis gdol pa lta bu dang /lus dang sems gtsang mar bya'i kha zos kyis lus gtsang mar ni mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/zas bzang po ji snyed cig
291a3(dkon brtsegs): zos kyang de thams cad ni tha mar rnag tu zag go//tha mar mi mthun no//tha mar dri nga ba'o//de lta bas na bdag gis bzang po 'dod par mi bya'o snyam du bslab par bya'o//de der shin tu nges par
291a4(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i sems kyis grong ngam glong khyer ram krod rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na mthar chags su bslang bar bya'o//des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste bdag la skyes pa
291a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms ster gyi bud med ni ma yin no zhe 'amra/bdag la bud med bsod snyoms ster gyi skyes pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/bdag la khye'u bsod snyoms ster gyi bu mo ni ma yin no zhe'am//
291a6(dkon brtsegs): bdug la bu mo bsod snyoms ster gyi khye'u ni ma yin no zhe 'am/bdagu gis bzang po rnyed kyi ngan pa ni ma yin no zhe 'am/bdag gis bsti stang du byas nas rnyed kyi bsti stang du ma byas pa ni ma
291a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhe 'am/bdag gis bde blag du rnyed kyi sha thang par ma yin no zhe 'am/bdag la skyes pa 'am bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo bsu bar 'gyur zhe'am/phyin ma thag tu sems par
291b1(dkon brtsegs): /'gyur ram+b+ha/bdag pastong dgos par 'gyur ram/shin tu bsdogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ram+b+ha/bdag gis kha zas bzang po ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnyed par 'gyur gyi dbul po'i zas lta bu ngan pa ni
291b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ma yin no snyam du ngas mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad bskyed par 'i bya'i//'di lta bu'i go cha 'go bar yang bya ste/rnying pa ma rnyed kying yongasu yid chad par mi bya ba dang /ngan pa dang bzang ngom
291b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ba 'di ni dge slong bsod snyoms pa dag gi chos nyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can phyal tshor ni ro la brkam sta zas kyi phyir sdig pa'i las rnams byas nas sems can
291b4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba rnams su skye'o//gang dag chog shes pa dang /mi brkam pa/ma zhen pa/ro la mi gdung ba/lce'i dbang po chog shes pa/zas ngan don ci rtsam gyis kyang 'tsho ba de dge shi 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas
291b5(dkon brtsegs): nus mtho ris su skye bor 'gyur/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde 'gror 'grong bar 'gyur/lhar skyes nas bdud rtsi za bar 'gyuraro//'od srung da ltar na bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gi rol sred pa bzlog
291b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/sems des por sems pas lhag zan zhag bdun lon pa za ying yid chad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus gso ba dang /'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs bsag pa'i don du bdag gis zas//

292a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur zhing dran pa dang ldan la shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsam gton dang po bskyed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod par 'gyur te/des bsam gtan thob nas bsam gtan
292a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bde ba 'dod pa na nyi ma gcig gam/nyi ma gnyis sam/nyi ma gsum nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bosam gtan gyi bde ba'i zas kyis gnas so//gal te 'di ltar rnal 'byor la zhugs la bsam
