296b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung khyim pa rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba ni dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/gos ngur smrig bgos shing/
296b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mang po/spags pa sna tshogs kyis sbags pa zas dang gos lhur len po de dag khyim pa dag gis gos ngur smrig gyon par rig nas zhe sa dong gus pa bskyed pa dang /chos gos dang bsod
297a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyis sdud par byed pa dang /gus par smra zhing phyag 'tshal la/ldang bar byed pa ste/'od srung 'di ni khyim pa de dag gi khyad par du 'gyur ba yin gyi de dag rab tu byung ba/
297a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag ni yongasu len pa la brtson pa ma yin zhing ci yang mi sogs pa'i phyir ro//'od srung de'i tshe nga'i dus na dge slong phal cher lhung bzed dang
297a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gos mang zhing snod spyad mang ba dang rnyed pa mang bar 'gyur te/de dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/btsun par byed par 'gyur/ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe
297a4(dkon brtsegs): na'adi ltar de sbyin pa dang phyir sbyin pa dus dus su byed cing bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro//dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams
297a5(dkon brtsegs): zad par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa yid la byung ba mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa don nyung ba/rang gi don la brtson pa 'dris par byed pa yongasu spangs pa dag 'byung ba de
297a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gi gan du ni de'i tshe de'i dus na su yang mi 'gro mi bsten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar khyim pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di ltar len gyi/
297a7(dkon brtsegs): chetshe rabs phyi mi lhur len pa ma yin pas de dag 'di snyam du dge slong de dag la ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba med ni/bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsten/ci'i phyir phyag bya/ci'i phyir mchod/ci
297b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsnyen bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro//gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de
297b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la bsten par byed/bsnyen par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo //'od srung chos 'di lta bu tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar
297b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe na/bden pa mthong zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang /rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/chos don du
297b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa'o//'od srung mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta ba/
297b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lhur len pa tshe rabs phyi ma lhur mi len pa thams cad kyi sgo ngas bshad par bya'o//'od srung gang dag tha ni thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems cig tsam yang mi bskyed pa'i mi gti mug pa de dag la ni/
297b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'dir skabs mi 'byed kyi steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos na bdag bsgrub pa las nyams par rig nas smad par bya bar sems te/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa
297b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi 'di dag ni rang bzod sbyar ba 'am/bdud kyis mtho brtsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing de dag 'di lta skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyuraro//de dag ni bdag nyid kyang phung
298a1(dkon brtsegs): la gzhan kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur/bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can du gyur la gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du byed par 'gyur te/de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni bdag
298a2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de
298a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir nan tan snying por bgyid pa'i gang zag chos kyi dbang phyug
298a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po gang lags pa de rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad lagaso//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
298a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas mos shing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de de bzhino//de de bzhin te/gang dag
298a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yang sa bzung ba yino//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o
298a7(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/kun dga'o khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhi po 'dod pa grol bar 'dod pa de dag gi ched du chos kyi le'u 'di zung shig/khyim pa dang rab
298b1(dkon brtsegs): /tu byung ba de dag kyang chos 'di la bsgrubs nas phung po thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'du
298b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung lags na/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos
298b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/'phags pa'i rigs sbyang pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa yong su 'dzin pa dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa spa 'go/
298b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /rin po che brtsegs bri dang //rin po che'i phung po dang /rin po che bsags pa dang /rin po che'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
298b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mang
298b6(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phyag brgya pa las rin po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzog so//
298b7(dkon brtsegs): ma po gnyis so//sho log drug brgya bdun nu///rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ron dra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo rgya ba bane de yo shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgyag
299a1(dkon brtsegs): skad du/Ar+ya Ak+Sha ya ma ti bA ri br-In+d+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas nus pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang
299a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di snyi bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaben d+ha rgod phung po'i ril dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
299a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byung chub sems dpa'i stong ma 'di smra ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shrIs twoH dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems da
299a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos kyi rtog dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i rtog dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
299a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po mtha' yas tog dang /bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa bcu
299a6(dkon brtsegs): drug dang /byams pa la sogs pa bskul pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po thams cad dang thangs gcig tu bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
299a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po blo gros mi zang pa yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcus yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdang te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa
299b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zo gros mi zad pa stan lngas lAngs d+d+hi/thugs phrag pa gcig tu gsar nas dus mo g.yas pa'i lhungs la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga lta ba d+ma logs thal mo sbya ba
299b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud nas/bcom ldan dngas la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang /me tog gi pu rams mchod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byung
299b3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems shes bgyi ba/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems
299b4(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das byang chub lnga ni sems same/sems dpa' ma dmigs mi dmigasde dmigs par mi 'gyuraro//byang chub las gung na yang byang chub kyi sems mi dmi
299b5(dkon brtsegs): te/byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/sems ni gzugs ma mchis/bstan du ma mchis thogs pa ma mchis rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing sems dpa' yang mo dmigs na/bcom
299b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji ltar chos 'di dag gi don rtog par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda'am gdags pa 'am tha snyad du mi dmigs shed/byung
299b7(dkon brtsegs): chub las gud ni byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/byang chub ni brjod du med sems ni gzugs med bstan du med thogs pa med rnam par rig pa med de/sems dpa' yang mi dmigs
300a1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no//sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no//byang chub dang sems ji lta bar
300a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no//sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
300a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob po//chos thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o//byang chub ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
300a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang da ltar byung ba ma yin te/sems kyang de bzhin no//sems dpa' yang de bzhi no//chos thams cad mi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa maud de/byang chub kyang med byang
300a5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu gdags pa yang med/sems can yang med sems can du gdags pa yang med/nyan thos kyang med nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/rang sangs rgyas kyang med rang sangs rgyas
300a6(dkon brtsegs): s+ye gdags pa yang med/byang chub sems dpa' yang med byang chub sems dpar gdags pa yang med/sangs rgyas kyang med sangs rgyas su dgags pa yang med/'dus byas kyang
300a7(dkon brtsegs): med/'dus byas su gdags pa yang med/'dus ma byas kyang med 'dus ma byas su dgags pa yang ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/rigs kyi bu 'on kyang //
300b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skye ste/de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams
300b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/de la rgyun tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang bag tsha ba med pa dang skrag pa
300b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshul gyis ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsal lta bur blta ste/de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis sred
300b4(dkon brtsegs): med kyi bu'i mthu stobs dang shugs dang brtson 'grus dang brtul pa lta bur blta ste/de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chos mi
300b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur blta ste/de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun nag chen po
300b6(dkon brtsegs): sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni dad dpon mdzod chen po phyug pa ltar
300b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis bsam yid yong su rdzogs par byed pas legs par brgyan par blta ste/de la rgyu ni thebs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems
301a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa brgyud pa ni zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs rdzogs par blta ste/de la rgyu ni smon
301a2(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsam pa yongasu
301a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed par blta ste/de la rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dang chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas
301a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis na mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed
301a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//don dam par ni 'di la byang chub kyang med/byang chub sems dpa' yang med/byang chub kyi
301a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang med do/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste dad pa'i dbang po sngon
301a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang /bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang /snying rje chen po sngon/
301b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang /sems can rten sngon du 'gro ba dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang /snangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa
301b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams

301b5(dkon brtsegs): par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa
301b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang /smon lam yong su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa
301b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste rjesu chags pa spong ba sngon
302a1(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang /khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /lus la mi blta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /srog la yod mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /myos pa sngon du 'gro//
302a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /sems can yongasu smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang /zab mo'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /rgya chen po la mos pa ston
302a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang /mi shes pa bsil ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//rigs/
302a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod
302a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /dge pa'i lus dang dgra dang yid mngon par sgrub pa le rje su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /phyir mi ldog po'i sa bsdu
302a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i dgra gdul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos
302a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can yongasu smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs

302b3(dkon brtsegs): tu byon pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /tide 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang /snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du

302b7(dkon brtsegs): da'i rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /khams la mkhas pa sngon du
302b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang /skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gri ba dang /bden pa la mdzes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /lta bar gyur pa theman
303a1(dkon brtsegs): cad pasal ba ston du 'gro ba dang /shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro bya dang /mI skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnyongasu
303a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon
303a3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na//
303a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can gyi rten du 'gro ba dang /byams pa dang /snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can
303a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bya ba la mi skyo ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon
303a6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu byang bar byab yongasu smin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /dngos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yong su rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems kyi stobs nye bar
303a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongasu thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
303b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
303b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sems kyi spyod pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thebs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems
303b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dbang po thebs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gri ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bo ra rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems
303b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang khams gsum thabs po nye bar rgyu
303b5(dkon brtsegs): bshes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba thibs pa nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'phro ba dang skye ba
303b6(dkon brtsegs): thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad phung po gsum du rnam par bzhags pa thibs po nye bar rgyud shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /dbang po mi skye ba'i
303b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongasu smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//
304a1(dkon brtsegs): /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad gnod ma
304a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos
304a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
304a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang bar dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du
304a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
304a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin du rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /dkar po'i chos shin du yong su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa dang gaM
304b1(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongasu bzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /'jig rten gyi
304b2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la
304b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing rje su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba
304b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ljon pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
304b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o//de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/spyod pa'i khyad par yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i ngan ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//ye shes zab cing rgya chub
304b6(dkon brtsegs): yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i
304b7(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i
305a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no//sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par byed pa'i don
305a2(dkon brtsegs): ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjesu rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu
305a3(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i don no//bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
305a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no//bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par mkhas pa yongasu rdzogs par byed
305a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha
305a6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i don no//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyangs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//
305a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//byang chub kyi stong po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongasu rdzogs por byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no///
305b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i dono//'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//yon tan thams cad
305b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
305b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i dono//bla na med pa yang
305b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyi su bskor ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no///
305b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i snga lhas ni/stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
305b6(dkon brtsegs): gis yongasu gang ba mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
305b7(dkon brtsegs): lag 'thil lta bur gyur pa la rin po che bye ba khrag khrog brgya stong du mas legs par brgyan pa mthong //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum
306a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra ltas nI/bdag nyid dpa' shing lag cha dang go cha sra ba thogs nas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad gdul bar mdza//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sum
306a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i sde ltas ni/phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la mi tog sna tshogs kyis
306a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'thor ba mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan po'i bud med kyis mi
306a4(dkon brtsegs): la me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga ltas ni/rdzing thems skyes bzhi dang
306a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa gser gyi bye ma jal ba rnyog pa med cing nga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang pa me tog ud pa lnga dang ku mu ta dang pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/de la bdag
306a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid rtse dga' yongasu spyod pa mthong //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na sems
306a7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i g.yangs mthong ste/de nas bdag nyid ma smos ma nyams par slar ldog pa mthong //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i
306b1(dkon brtsegs): sa brgyud pa'i snga ltas ni/phrag pa gnyis na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan thogs pa ni gcan zan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing 'dug pa mthong //rigs kyi bu de la byung
306b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste/skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor
306b3(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun gyis bltas la mgo'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems
306b4(dkon brtsegs): dnga'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/kha dog gser lta bu 'ong mdom grang ba tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos
306b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa mthong ste/regs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'i snga ltas yin no//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpal
306b6(dkon brtsegs): sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa gsum pa la ni/
306b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa drug pa la ni shes rab
307a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa bden pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnan to//sa brgyud pa la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa dang /
307a2(dkon brtsegs): pal ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to//sa bcu sA la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po gnon to//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
307a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang po ni rin po che yid dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzung ste skye'o//sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//
307a4(dkon brtsegs): soms bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skyo'o//sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//sems
307a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi mi'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//sems
307a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis
307a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bzung ste sbyoro//sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes sgron ma'i ting 'dzin gyis yongasu gzung ste skye'o//sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin gyis yongasu
307b1(dkon brtsegs): gzung nas skye ste/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
307b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa dang po la byud par gyi byin gyis brlabs pa shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa gnyis pa la ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa gsum pa la ni rab tu gnas
307b3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa bzhi pa la ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzung skye'o//sa lnga pa la ni yon tan sna tshogs shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa drug pa la ni ye shes kyi dkyil
307b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa bdun pa la ni khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa brgyad pa la ni rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//
307b5(dkon brtsegs): sa dgu pa la sgo mtho' yas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//sa bcu pa la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu seng gi'i
307b6(dkon brtsegs): tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du thams cad rdzogs shing /sangs rgyas kyi chos
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan thams cad sgrub par gyur pa ni mtshor to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de ni ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/lha'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub
308a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir ma/
308a2(dkon brtsegs): ldog par dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lta ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa yin te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna
308a3(dkon brtsegs): lam du grag par mi 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu chos kyi grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi
308a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar 'gyur/dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
308a5(dkon brtsegs): gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa dang ske la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar
308a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzung dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/rdo rje ltar sra zhing
308a7(dkon brtsegs): brten pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/brjod pa med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag pa gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/tshig dang spyod
308b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/na mkha'i dkyil dri ma med par bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi sku
308b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa yongasu rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu
308b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston to//chos nyid lus kyang mi g.yo la 'gro ba yang med 'ong ba yang med do//sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed kyang sems can
308b4(dkon brtsegs): du dmigs pa yang med do//chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid la g.yo ba med do//'chi 'pho dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med skye ba yang med do//chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir
308b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams gang du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur gang nas 'ong bar yang mi 'gyuraro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
308b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can chad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems
308b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer sdang ba thogs pa med pa dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /
309a1(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
309a2(dkon brtsegs): stastong phrag brgya pa las blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzog so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren tra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha
309a3(dkon brtsegs): bi ban d+hi ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//sho lo gnyis brgya//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha d+hiHtri n+da las skad gsar gcad kyis kyang zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgyu gar skad du/
309a4(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya sab ta sha ta kane nA ma prad+d+ha dAr mi twA ma hA lA na sU hA/bod skad du/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang 'o//
309a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad le phyag 'tshamo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
309a6(dkon brtsegs): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
309a7(dkon brtsegs): pas yo thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byams pa dang /spobs pa
309b1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa dang /brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa sA dang la zhabs gcig/nga nas 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
309b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rang shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go//
309b3(dkon brtsegs): donas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/rang gi gnas nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo //
309b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgol gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa t+ya'i bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa gsus pa che
309b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /de dag thams cad dang /gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba dang song nas phyin pa dang /phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/
309b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas/bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste/pho brang gi phyi rol phyogs gcig tu gdun bting ba la bzhugaso//
309b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhogs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha brang gi
310a1(dkon brtsegs): skyon 'dug/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thog ma
310a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab sgor mchis so//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'chal ba'i slad du slad kyis mchis//de nas bcom
310a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams
310a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thag ma nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgor 'dug pa bden nam/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
310a5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags/bde bar gshegs pad de ltar lags te/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen dkur bgyi
310a6(dkon brtsegs): slad du/thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du rang gi gnas nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mtshos//de ci'i slad du nan bcom ldan
310a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyis bas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs
310b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchi ba de yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang
310b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi na/ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba dang /ji ltar bdag phyag bgyi ba dang /ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o//de ltar phyag/
310b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi slad du
310b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/'jam dpal gyis gsel pa/mi dmigs pa'i
310b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang /rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba
310b6(dkon brtsegs): nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma mchis te de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de
310b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ni 'byung ba yang ma lags 'jig pa yang ma lags te de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de bzhin nyid ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te de ltar de
311a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa yang ma lags ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags da ltar byung ba yang ma lags te de ltar de bzhin
311a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa lnga blta bar bya'o//de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma lags gnyisu ma mchis pas rab tu phye ba yang ma lags te/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pA la blta bar
311a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi
311a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ste/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o//de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba mthong ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyuraro//de skad ces
311a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar bltas na ci zhig mthong /'jam dpal gyis
311a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ltar bltas na ci yang mthong ba ma mchi so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang la yang skye ba yang ma mthong /'gag pa
311a7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mthong //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rangadwa ti'i dus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang /
311b1(dkon brtsegs): bston pas byas pa gang yin pa dang /\u0f7fsa kya byams pa chen pos snyams can thams cad ma nyo bar gnas kyang /khyod la sems can du rdzogus pa dang /som+b+has+yA rgyun du mngan
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ba shin pa'i las song cing /sems can thams cad yongasu mya dran la sna 'das pa'i phyir zhugs kyang khyod la sems can du mngon phyir zhen pa gang yid mi 'byung ba dang /khyod mi dmigs
311b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i tshul dang /sgyid lhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgros pa de ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam
311b4(dkon brtsegs): dngul gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bla la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus ji skad smras pa de de bzhin to/sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir
311b5(dkon brtsegs): gocha 'dri yang bogs te/bdag le sems can du dmyigs pa'am sems can lo mngon par zhen pa gang yang mdo//btsun pa shA radwa tI'i bu go cha de ni ji ltar bdag gis sems can gyi
311b6(dkon brtsegs): khams bri ba 'am gang bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yongasu brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/gar+dz+dza ti sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
311b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin mtshan du chos ston to//gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par bzhugs par gyur la/gang gA'i
312a1(dkon brtsegs): /klung gi bye ma skad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan par a senas can rje skyed bdul ba de rgyud kyi sems can da bzhin gshegs par ras/cho
312a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa re res btul bar gyur du zin kyang sems can gyi khams la bri ba'am grang bar mngon pa med//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can dben pa dang sems can sems can ma yin
312a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no//de skad ces smras po dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
312a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras//'jim dpal gal te sems can dben pa dang /sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams bri ba dang gang bar mi mngon na/'o na byang chub
312a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston/de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces smras//btsun pa
312a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe sems can shin du mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zheg mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/su la chos bstan par bya/de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ltar
312a7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal gang gi tshe chos thams
312b1(dkon brtsegs): cad shin du mi dmigs pa de'i cha ci sems can du 'ang 'dogs sam/yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la 'ga' zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/'jam
312b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed yod pa de snyed do zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te yang sems can
312b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ji tsam zhes 'dri na/de skad 'di ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ci tsam pa de tsam mo zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal
312b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la gal te yang la la zhig 'di skad du sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs shes 'dri na/de la khyed kyis ji skad bya/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba
312b5(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis 'di skad du skye ba med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang du gtogs par gtog so zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal gal te yang la la zhig
312b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la 'di skad du sems con gyi khams ci la gnas shes 'dri na/de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du/
312b7(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313a1(dkon brtsegs): b+hinu pa sgom par tshanal gnas twA shas rab kyi ba rab tu phyin pa bsgom/2jam dpal d+his gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das gang gi cha bdag shes pa kyi dang/
313a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe mi gnas byar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dzem dpal mi gnas pa la shes rab kyi
313a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom du yang ci yod/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang ci lce'ang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so///
313a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 'phel ba dang 'bri bar 'gyur/'jam
313a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba 'am 'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma mchiso//bcom ldan 'das gang la chos 'ga' zhig 'phel
313a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'am 'bri ba mchis na de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du'am 'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas
313a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang mi len/
313b1(dkon brtsegs): bde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//de ci'i slad du zhe na//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni chos gang spang ba 'am blang bar dmigs
313b2(dkon brtsegs): bas chos gang la yang mi gnas pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gang 'khor ba'i skyon du yang ma mchis lnga/mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan du yang mi mchi ba de shes rab kyi
313b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'khor ba nyid kyang mi mthong na 'khor ba'i skyon smos kyang ci 'tshal/mya ngan las 'das pa
313b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang mi dmigs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang blang po'ami gzung ba 'am dor ba ma mchis pa de shes
313b5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'dis gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa 'am 'phel ba mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso
313b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la 'grib pa dang 'phel ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313b7(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang skye ba'am 'gag par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das gang
314a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang 'grib pa 'am rgyas par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol
314a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la yang mi smon gyi bcom ldan 'das gang la yang smon pa dang /gang gis smon pa de nyid kyang ma
314a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsgom nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
314a4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni mchog go/chos 'di dag ni tha ma'o//zhes bgyi bar nye bar mi gnas shing /chos gang dag mchog dang tha mar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag kyang
314a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs te/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni chos thams cad mi dmigaso//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
314a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa ni chos gang yang mchog ce'am tha ma zhes mi rtag//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la mchog gam tha me zhes bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis
314a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o//de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos thams cad kyi bar la yang mchog gam tha ma ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsgom na shes rab kyi pha rol
314b1(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
314b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma yin nam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mchog ljag so//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong
314b3(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa legs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams
314b4(dkon brtsegs): cad stong par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//'jam dpal gyis gsol pA/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la mchog gam tha ma zhes bgyi ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das
314b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal legs leg so//'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ji skad smras pa bzhin no//'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bla na med pa ma yin nam/'jam
314b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis po stsol pa/de de lta lags te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bla na ma mchis pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de dag la chos cung zad tsam yang ma
314b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing mi dmigs te/de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang sangs rgya skyi chos rnams bsgrub par yang mi bgyid la/so so'i
315a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos rnams spong bar yang mi bgyid cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dul ba yang ma lags la/'dzin pa 'dra ma lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
315a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang chos gang la yang mi sems la rnam par mi rig pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaso//bcom ldan 'das/
315a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi sems sam/'jam dpal gyis gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
315a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongasu grub par mthong na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sems lagaso//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i
315a5(dkon brtsegs): chos so//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi choso//'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes chos gang la yang rnam par rtog
315a6(dkon brtsegs): pas nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bus chos de nyid kyang mi
315a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs te/gang la chos de dag so so'i skye ba'i chos shes brjod pa 'am/slob pa'i chos shes brjod pa 'am/mi slob pa'i chos shes brjod pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
315b1(dkon brtsegs): chos shes brjod pa'am/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos shes brjod pa yang mtha' las 'das pa'i chos nyid lags pas chos de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
315b2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu mi mthong ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsgom nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
315b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni 'di ltar 'di ni 'dod pa'i khamaso//'di ni gzugs kyi khamaso//'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams zhes bgyi ba nas 'di ni 'gog
315b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyings so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du yang mi semaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar des 'gog pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ste/bcom
315b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ltar sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang chos gang la yang phan pa 'am/gnod pa yang mi bgyid/
315b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa yang ma lags
315b7(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gcod par bgyid pa yang ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi 'gog la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi 'thob pa
316a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
316a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal to//'jam dpal khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa legaso lagaso//'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan
316a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dmigs pa can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par bya ba'i phyir rgya 'di bzhag go//
316a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur pa de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig/
316a5(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
316a6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par spobs lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam
316a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang gis gnas pa mi dmigs pa dang mi gnas pa yang mi dmigs pa de shes
316b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa ste/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang lhag par dmig/
316b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis
316b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du
316b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur na rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du mi 'gyur na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal ba de shes rab
316b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par lta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bsgom pa gang la brten nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang sangs rgyas
316b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes rnam par mi rtog pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub
316b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bsgom pa gang la brtan nas mthong ba ma mchis
317a1(dkon brtsegs): /par chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su mthong ba dang /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chosu mthong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag so//
317a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen
317a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de shes rab kyi pha rol
317a4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsgom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
317a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang tha dad du mi bgyid pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
317a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom po lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la
317a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gag pa de snyed la ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag
317b1(dkon brtsegs): gos de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/'jam
317b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das gang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos de gang yang dmigaso sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
317b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag su la yod/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das nyid la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba de dag gi ming yang ma
317b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te mi dmigs na gzhan rnams la mchis par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis chags pa med pa nyid rnyed dam/'jam
317b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid tshogs pa ma mchis pa nyid legs na bdag gis kyang chags pa ma mchis pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan
317b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod ci byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' brtsan par bgyis na bcom ldan 'das
317b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang byang chub kyi snying po la ma zhugs na bdag lta mchis par ji ltar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de dag gi
318a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba da ni 'jig tshogs kyi tshig bla dgas/bcom ldan 'das
318a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs de ni ma mchis pa ste/'jig
318a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ma lags pa de ni mi 'pho la 'pho ba dang bral ba yang ma la gas te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/tshogs de ni 'jig tshogs ma lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
318a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos
318a5(dkon brtsegs): nas mos te/mi skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
318a6(dkon brtsegs): po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas
318a7(dkon brtsegs): mos te/mi skrag me dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub lo nye bar gyur pa lags//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gang chos de dag rjes su rtog pa de
318b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid byang chub mchog lags pa'i slad dul//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sa 'di skad ces gasngal to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
318b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te/mi skrag me dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas nyid du lta bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/
318b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba de ni don dam par na skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshig blo dgas lags pa'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la sring mo dmigs pa med pas 'di skad
318b4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mas te/mi skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de
318b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par mi
318b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa ste/de ci'i slad du de dag la dmigs pa ma mchis//
318b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/de de bzhi no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa zab ma bstan pa 'di thos nas mas te/mi skrag mi dang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub tu nges par 'gyur//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs//
319a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos twa/mi skrag mi dang dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing spyi bos len pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa yin
319a3(dkon brtsegs): par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ma te mi sgrog mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dang de dag ni sbyin bdag
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dam par 'gyur sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur sbyin bdag khyad par 'phags par 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dang de dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/tshul khrims
319a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/tshul khrims dang ldan pa khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur/tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi lam brnyed par 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang
319a6(dkon brtsegs): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mos te/me skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dang de bzhini bzod pa'i mchog dang /brtson 'grus kyi mchog dang /bsam
319a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi mchog dang /mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319b1(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bstan pa thos nas mas te/mi skrag mi dngang dang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bar du
319b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na bla na
319b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'dod/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub tu zhugs na ni de ltar na
319b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub tu smon pa ma lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang lags
319b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de byang chub nyid do//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal khyod zab mo zab pa'i gnas
319b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di ston pa legaso lagaso//'di ltar khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste/mi dmigs par tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du spyod pa'o//'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/
319b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag mi dmigs par spyod pa lags na ni chos thob pa nyid du 'gyur ba lagaso//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
320a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom
320a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthang lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar ci 'dra bar mthong /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar so so'i skye bor mi mthong ba
320a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /slob par mi mthong ba dang /mi slob par mi mthong ba dang /mthong ba yang ma mchis mi mthong ba yang ma mchis pa de ltar mthong ngo //'di ltar mang du'ang mi mthong ba dang /
320a4(dkon brtsegs): nyung ngu yang mi mthong ba dang /rul bar yang mi mthong ba dang /ma dul bar yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
320a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams de ltar mthong na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams khyod kyis ji ltar mthong /'jam
320a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA r-i dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i las kyang rjesu mi mthong /byang chub tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rje su mi mthong /byang chub kyi phyir/
320a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod do zhes bya ba'i chos kyang rje su mi mthong /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i chos kyang rje su me mthong ste/btsun pa shA ri dwa ti'i bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
320b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa po dag de ltar mthong ngo //shA ra dwa tI'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mthong /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu glang
320b2(dkon brtsegs): po chen po zhog shig glang po chen po ma bskyod cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal
320b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/shA ra dwa tI'i bus smras pa/'jam
320b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal 'di lta ste bdag ces bya ba de ni skye ba mang ba'i tshig bla dag so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/bdag ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin
320b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas shes bya ba de yang de'i cho ga bla dag so//btsun pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu yang 'di lta ste sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni gzhi med pa'i tshig bla dag so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
320b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shes bya ba de ni chog gis shes bya bar dka' ba'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshig kyang 'di ni tshig zhes brtag par dka' na sangs rgyas shes bya ba lta ci smos/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
320b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shes bya ba gang gi tshig bla dgas shes de skad smra ba ni/gang yang dag par ma grub pa dang ma skyes pa dang mi 'gag pa ste/gang chos gang dang yang mi ldan pa de la gzho ci yang med cing
321a1(dkon brtsegs): gni dbyer med la ga med pa ste/btsun pa shA rAdwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni de'i tshig bla dgas//btsun pa shA radwa tI'i bu de bzhin ga shugs/
321a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tshol bar 'dod pas bdag btsal bar bya'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdug ces bya ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas te/ji ltar bdag ces bya ba shin tu med cing mi dmigs
321a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang shin du med cing mi dmigs so//ji ltar bdag ces bya ba'i chos gang gis kyang tshig tu brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang chos gang gis kyang
321a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig tu brjod pa ma yin no//gang la grangasu bya ba med pa de ni sangs rgyas shes bya ste/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ba ga ces bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dgas de ni shes par sla ba ma yin no//
321a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i gzhi'i tshig bla dgas 'di yang shes par sla ba ma yino//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad
321a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gauzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni ji ltar las dang po pas 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mi ston to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /'jam dpal
321a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti ri bu kho bo ni ji ltar dgra bcom pa byas pa rtogs pa can gyis kyang shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
321b1(dkon brtsegs): chos mi ston te//kho bo ni ji ltar sus kyang shes par 'gyur ba de lta bur yang mi ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub ni sus kyang ma shes sus kyang rnam par ma shes sus kyang
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par mA rtogs/ma mthong ma thos ma dran ma bskyed ma bkag/ma smras/ma bstan pa'i phyir ro//btsun pa shA ra dwa tI ri bu byang chub ni de lta bu ste byang chub de yang dngos
321b3(dkon brtsegs): po ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ci yang med cing /byang chub kyang byang chub kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin pa'i
321b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro//shA rA dwa ti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs por sangs ma rgya sa sam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA rang
321b5(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de ni mi yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings nyid bcom ldan 'das yin pa'i phyir//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te bcom ldan
321b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/'o na ni gang skyo ba med pa'i dbyings de dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings de
321b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid byang chub po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos kyi dbyings ni sems can med pa'i phyir ro//chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi tshig bla dgas te/de ni chos kyi
322a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi grangasu 'gro ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi yul tu tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tha dad pa med ces
322a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni rnam par rig pa med pa'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par rig pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes par mi nus pa ste/'dus byas su rnam par rig par mi nus pa nas
322a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi bar du yang rnam par rig par mi nus pa ste/de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med pas des na de rnam par rig pa med pa'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad
322a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par rig pa med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni gang la gnas te rnam par rig par 'gyur ba'i skye ba med pa'i phyir//gang dag mtshams med pa la zhugs/
322a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa'o//gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag ni yang dge ba la zhugs pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
322a6(dkon brtsegs): bu yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhi dbyer med pa'i phyiraro//gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de ni mtho ris su 'gro ba ma yin/ngan song du 'gro ba ma yin/mya ngan las 'das
322a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba ma yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'gro ba dang mi 'gro bar nye bar gnas
322b1(dkon brtsegs): po ma yin pa'i phyir//btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gang dag ltung ba'i rtsu ba bzhi la gnas pa de dag byung rtsa ba med pa la gnas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu skyo ba med pa la rtsa ba'
322b2(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo zhes bya ba med de d+hir/rgyu ba med pa'i dge slong shes bya ba de ni mi gnas pa'i dge slong gi tshig bla dgas//rtsod pa byung ba zhes bya ba ni lhag par sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas
322b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lhag par sgro 'dogs pa la spyod pa ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnasu 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar mnyam pa la de lhag par sgro btags pa'i phyir//btsun pa shA rang /
322b4(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu dge slong dad pa ni dad pas byin pa spyad pa'i 'os ma yin/bcud pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong ma dad pa ni dad pas byin pa spyad pa'i 'os so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rung ba can
322b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyad pa'i 'os ma yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rung ba can ma yin pa'i dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyad pa'i 'os so//tshul ying dag par ma bcos
322b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad ces smra/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/mnyam pa nyid gang
322b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid yang dag par 'joms par mi byed pa de nyid tshul yin te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la bsams nas tshul yang dag par ma bcos pa'i dge slong ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad
323a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o zhes de skad smras//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jigs pa las ma brgal ba zhes bya ba de ni dgra bcom pa zag pazang ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dag so//shA radwa
323a2(dkon brtsegs): te'i bus smras pa/'dzom dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/'jam dpral gyis smras pa/de'i 'dzegs pa cung zad tsam yang med na ci zhig los brgal byar 'gyur/shA rI
323a3(dkon brtsegs): teti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpalam skyes pa'i bzod pa can zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gang gis chos cung blud tsam yang
323a4(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed pa de ma skyes pa'i bzod pa can zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal dge slong ma dul ba zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
323a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong ma dul ba zhes bya ba de ni dge slong ma dul ba zag pa zad pa'i tshig bla dag so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma dul ba ni dul la dul ba ni ma dul bas/
323a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di la bsams te dge slong ma dul ba zhes bya ba de ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i tshig bla dag so zhes de smraso//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i sems
323a7(dkon brtsegs): la spyad do zhes bya ba de ni/so so'i skye bo'i tshig blo dgaso//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA
323b1(dkon brtsegs): rAd ti'i bu 'di ltar de lhag par byed pa'i phyir//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bus la ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal khyod/
323b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis dgra bcom pa zag pa zad po ji lta ba bzhin du smras pa legs legaso//'jam dngul gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//
323b3(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni zag pa zad mod kyis dgra bcom pa ni ma yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar kho bo'i bsam pa zad pa'i phyir te///
323b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na kho bo thag pa zad mod kyi dgra bcom pa ni ma yino//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
323b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzem dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'dug la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba med par
323b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por mchis la/bla na med pa yang
323b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub la cung zad tsam gyi chos
324a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma mchis shing /mi dmigs pas de'i slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces 'gyi'o//byang chub de yang ma skyes pa ste/de lag
324a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa 'am/su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/gang gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/byang chub kyi snying po la
324a3(dkon brtsegs): lding ba gang yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por mchis la/bla na med
324a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba ma mchis//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
324a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//'jam dpal byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces dri rgya
324a6(dkon brtsegs): bde ni mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag gi tshig bla dwagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dngos po ma mchis pas/mtshams mi mchis po lnga po de dag nyid
324a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/de'i slad du byang chub de ni mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i rang bzhin can leg so//mtshams ma mchis pa rnams mngon par rdzogs pa rtogs pa byang chub
324b1(dkon brtsegs): lags/chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa yang byang chub ma lags//de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon sum ma lhags te/de dag gis kyang mngon//
324b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par ma rtogs ma mthong ma thos/ma 'tshal pa nas ma rtogs pa'i bar gyi slad du ste/de lta bu de ni byang chub bo//de lta lags kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das
324b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas mngon sum du bgyis pa'i bar du de dag bzhag/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal ci khyed du la 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'o snyam du sems
324b5(dkon brtsegs): sam+ba/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi de bzhin ga
324b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o snyam du mi sems pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de/de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
324b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnam par rig par mi bgyid cing /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de bzhin nyid rnam par rig par mi bgyid pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/
325a1(dkon brtsegs): /dan dam pa nu bzhin nyid dngos pa ma mchis shing /de bzhin gshegs pa yang des pa ma mchis pa'i slad du//bcom ldan 'das de bas na/bdag ni 'di snyam/
325a2(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'o snyam du mi sems//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas na/gang la bdag 'di snyam
325a3(dkon brtsegs): du de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/'jam
325a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la the tshom za 'am/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das da ni ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa byung
325a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/de bzhin gshegs par yongasu ma grub par 'ga' zhig mche na ni de la bdag the tshom 'tshal//de skad
325a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo snyam du sems sam//
325a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba ma mchis na ni/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur//bcom ldan
325b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang d+ma'i klung gi bya ma snyed yongs mya ngan las 'das par myi mos sam/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom
325b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul du yul gcig pa ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal dede
325b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul du yul cigo/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das da ltar bzhugs sam
