358a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/bag la nyal ba bzhi po de dag yongasu spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de 'du shes bzhi yongasu spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/
358a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na//rtag par 'du shes pa dang /bde bar 'du shes pa dang /gtsang bar 'du shes po dang /bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/'du shes bzhi po de dag yongasu spangs
358a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de rnam pa bzhi yongasu dag par sbyin par sbyin par byed/bzhi gang zhe na/lus yongasu dag pa dang /ngag yongasu dag pa dang /sems yongasu
358a5(dkon brtsegs): dag po dang /bsam pa yongasu dag pa ste/rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par
358a6(dkon brtsegs): byed de/gsum gang zhe na/rnam par smin pa la chags pa dang /'gyod pa la chags pa dang /theg pa dman pa la bsngo ba la chags pa ste/gsum po de dge las
358a7(dkon brtsegs): shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de 'jigs pa gsum las shin du 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed/gsum gang zhe na/lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jigs pa dang /
358b1(dkon brtsegs): rloms sems kyi 'jigs pa dang /bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de rgyu bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed//
358b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyus btab pa dang /sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang /byang chub stong po nyid kyi rgyas btab pa
358b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/rgyu bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/bzhi gang zhe na/sems can thams cad
358b4(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par byed
358b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/brtson 'grus rtsam pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de dran
358b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang /sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang /byams pa chen po dran pa dang /sems
358b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dran po ste/dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed//de 'khor gsum yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/gdum
359a1(dkon brtsegs): glang zhe na/bdag gi 'khor yong su dag pa dang /sems can gyi 'khor yongasu drug pa dang /byang chub kyi 'khor yongasu dag pa ste/'khor gsum po
359a2(dkon brtsegs): dag yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byedado//de shes pa yongasu dag pa bzhis yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa shes pa yongasu dag pa dang
359a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongasu dag pa dang /sgyu ma'i chos su sngo sor rtog pa yongasu dag pa dang /bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa yongasasu dag pa ste/
359a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yongasu dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongasu dag par sbyin par byed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ches la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
359a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag par shin tu yongasu dag par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi
359a6(dkon brtsegs): bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
359a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yong su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/rnam pa gcig gang zhe ni//'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems/thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/'jig
359b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum po thams cad la mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/
359b2(dkon brtsegs): las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa tha~Md mod du zad par byed pa'i sems/sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid
359b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dor zhing bsrung ba dang /sbed pa dang /mi mjed pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gcig rigs
359b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can thams cad la 'ong //
359b5(dkon brtsegs): zer thogs pa med pa dang /sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/'di ni rnam pa gnyis//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha
359b6(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal nas lus yongasu dag pa dang /kha bsag dang gzhog slong dang ngag
359b7(dkon brtsegs): gi skyen zhe 'apal los ngag yang su dag pa dang /'dod pa dang gnod sems dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yangasu dag pa ste/'di ni rnam pa gsum//rigs
360a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bslab pa yang dag par
360a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang /bslab pa yang dag par gzung ba ma nyams pa dang //sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongasu smin par byed pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin
360a3(dkon brtsegs): du gus par byed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa lnga ste/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/
360a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/bdag la mi bstod pa dang /gzhan la mi smod pa dang /ma bslabs pa la mi brnyes pa dang /nyan thos kyi sems la mi re ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi
360a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ste/'di ni rnam pa lnga'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa drug ste/rnam pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
360a6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang /tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjesu dran pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rje su dran pa
360a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rwa nyon mongs pa thams cad yong su spong bas gtong pa rjesu dran pa dang /skyo ba thams cad mi gnas pas tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su
360b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pas sgyu rjesu dran pa ste/'di ni rnam pa drug/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa bdun to/rnam pa
360b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang /bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas
360b3(dkon brtsegs): te khrel yod pa dang /nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang /bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang /'jig rten pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam
360b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshe ba med pa dang /sems kyi yong su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/'di ni rnam pa bdun no//rigs kyi blo byang chub sems da shi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
360b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/rnam pa brgyud gang zhe ni/'di lta ste zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang /yong su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas
360b6(dkon brtsegs): khya bsag med pa dang /rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa
360b7(dkon brtsegs): yong su rdzogs pa dang /dgon pa la gnas parje su mi gtong bas lus 'ami blta ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pas srog la mi lci ba dang /'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pun dga' ba dang /
361a1(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos dga' ba la mos pa ste/'di ni rnam pa brgyad do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems du tshul khrims kyi
361a2(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/rnam pa dgu bang nis 'di lta ste kun nas mnad sems kyi dngos po dgu pa rnams 'dul ba dang /sems can gyi gnas dgu
361a3(dkon brtsegs): po rnams las gaunr-i t+yA 'da' ba nga/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa rnams kyi rtsa ba yongasu spyod pa dang /ya su gdung ba med pas sems lci ba dang /sa
361a4(dkon brtsegs): las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun du tshol ba dang /chog dang tshul khrims dang lta ba nyams pa las shin du 'das pas ma lhod pa dang /theg pa chen po yangasu rdzogs pas
361a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rteni thams cad la mi sla ba dang /tshul khrims la snyan med pas shin du mthar thug pa dang /yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa dgu'o//
361a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems depa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus kyi las rnam pa gsum
361a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag po dang /ngag gi las rnab pa bzhi yongasu dag pa dang /yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs dag pa dang /g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing 'chas pa med pa dang /bsar
361b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa dang /bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal bya dang phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjesu ston pa dang /dul zhing cang shos pos sa'i phyir snyoms dam rgod ma yin
361b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang /de rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /sgrog gi dbang por chos
361b3(dkon brtsegs): mdun du byed kyi 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa bcu'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
361b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste mtshan ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas par tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'bral ba dang /
361b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad lo sgro mi 'dogs par slob pa ste/'di ni rnam pa gnyis//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
361b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste nang rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang /phyi rnam par dag pas
361b7(dkon brtsegs): lus thams cad spangs pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta
362a1(dkon brtsegs): ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/
362a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha
362a3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni ngag yongasu dag pas 'di ltar gshe yang slor mi gsheso//lus yongasu
362a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pos brdegs kyang slar mi brdego//sems yongasu dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o//lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas 'tshig par byas kyang slar mi 'chig/rigs
362a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la blta ba'i phyir/gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mi gshe'o//'jig rten
362a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol la blta ba'i phyir/lag pa dang bong ba dang dbyug pas brdeg kyang khong khro bar myi 'gyuraro//byang chub kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/yan lag dang nying lag bcad kyang khong
362a7(dkon brtsegs): khro bar mi 'gyur//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasu 'dzin pa'i phyir slong ba la mi gshe'o//byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar
362b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i phyir de dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrub po//smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje bskyed //bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir ba/
362b2(dkon brtsegs): spong yang de la phan paro sems shing snying rje chen po dang ldan te/byang chub kyi yon lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o sangs
362b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sku yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing bzod do//stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjesu dran zhing bzod do//dus gsum la chags pa med
362b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjesu dran zhing bzod do//byams pa chen po yongasu rdzogs par bye ba'i phyir phan par 'dod pa rje su dran zhing bzod do//
362b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjesu dran zhing bzod do//mi 'jigs pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjesu dran
362b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing bzod do//sems can thams cad la 'dud ba'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi snang badz+ra su dran zhing bzod do//'jig rten thams cad kyiso zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir mtshan
362b7(dkon brtsegs): dad dpe byad bzang po rjesu dran ning bzod do//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa rjesu dran zhing bzod//rigs kyi bu
363a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongasu dag par 'gyur te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang /bsgom
363a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs//de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te/bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stob so//gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni bsgom pa'i stob so//rigs kyi bu
363a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing /chos thams cad la bden par
363a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod de gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod po yongasu dag pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di la don dam par gang bzod pa 'am mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med de/gang chos
363a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongasu dag pa gang yang med//gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa ni bzod pa
363a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa ste/zhum pa la ni bzod pa yong su dag pa gang yang med do//gad chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongasu dag
363a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang medado//gang la bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /chos med pa ni bzod pa yongasu dag pa ste/bdag dang sems can dang /chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa
363b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa yang medo//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasasu dag pa'i rnam pa gnyis te/gnyis glang zhe na/'od /
363b2(dkon brtsegs): ste lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzung pa yongasasu dag pa dang /chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yong su dag pa ste/gnyis po de dag go/rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems
363b3(dkon brtsegs): dwade'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/byang chub
363b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa dang /rtsom pas mi ngal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs pA lo mi zhen pa/pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
363b5(dkon brtsegs): lus phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa/chos thams cad ston par brtson pa/chos thams cad yongasu 'dzin pa la spro la/mchod sbyin chen po las
363b6(dkon brtsegs): sgrol po/sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa la yongasu mi skyo ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/theg pa dman pa las shin du 'das pa/sngon dam bcas pa yongasu
363b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed pa/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa'i tshogs bsogs pa//sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chung mi gzon pa/nga rgyal med pas sems can thams
364a1(dkon brtsegs): cad la rim gror bya'o cog byed pa ste/'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//de'i yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/gang lus la mig yor dang /
364a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan du shes pa/tshig la brjod du med par shes pa/sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa/mi
364a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba shes pa/nges par rtogs pa'o//de rtsom pa la gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rlom ste/gsum gang zhe na/gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang //yongasu rtog
364a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i rtsom pa ste/gsum po de dag go/de la chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/gsum gang zhe na/mig dang /gzugs dang /mig rnam par
364a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mi chags pa/rna ba dang /sgra dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/sna dang /dri dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/lce dang /ro dang /
364a6(dkon brtsegs): lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/lus dang /reg bya dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/yid dang /chos dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi
364a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa'o//de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len//ser sna mi 'dod//tshul khrims mi len/'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi
364b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod/bzod pa mi len/gnod snyoms mi 'dor/brtson 'grus mi len/lo l-I mi 'dong /dusam gtan mi len/g.yong ba mi 'dor/shes rab mi ldan/'chalnga pa'i shes
364b2(dkon brtsegs): rab mi 'dor/dge ba mi len/mi dge ba mi 'dor/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro//de len pa med cing 'dor ba
364b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas gnyis yongasu dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/de la gnyis gang zhe na/gang nang gi kun tu ldang ba las/dmigs pa kun tu ltung ba dang /phyi rol tu
364b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjesu 'brang por 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o//de la gnyis yong su dag pa gang zhe na/gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang /
364b5(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa ste/'di ni gnyis yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o//gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi
364b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag po gang zhe na/gang bsam gtan gyi
364b7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang /so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te/de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la
365a1(dkon brtsegs): /de nas byasam gtan mi byed/de bsam gtan byed kyad tshor ba la ma yin/'du shes la ma yin/'du byed rnams la ma yin/rnam par shes pa la
365a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te/bsum gtan mi byed/de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te/bAsam gtan mi byed/stsal
365a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/skye la ma yin/lus la ma yin/yid la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed//de bas mo gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed/sbrul ma yin/dril
365a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ro la ma yin//reg bya la yin//chos la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang lus la rnam par rtog pa la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed/de
365a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan byed kyang sems rnam par rtog pa la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed/de bzhin du tshul ma yin//
365a6(dkon brtsegs): ma la ma yin/rlung la ma yin/na mkha' la gnas te/bAs mya gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang zla ba lam yin/nyi ma la ma yin/brgya byin la ma yin//tshangs pa
365a7(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas to//bsam gtan mi byed//'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed do//gzugs kyi khams la ma yin//gzugs
365b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams la gnas te//bsam gtan mi bye'o//de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed/'jig rten pha rol tu gnas te bsam gtan
365b2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te/
365b3(dkon brtsegs): dasom gtan mi bya//de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/srog la ma yin/gso ba la ma yin//gang zag la ma yin/sheng las skyes pa la ma yin
365b4(dkon brtsegs): shed bur nye bar lon pa'i lta ba la gnas te/bsam gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta bar khas blangs te/bsam gtan mi byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang
365b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba la ma yin/'byung bar lta ba ma yin/'jigs par lta bar khas blangs te/bsam gtan mo byed//de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir
365b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan mi byedado//de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang //'bras bu thob pa mngon su du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi bye do//de bsam gtan byed kyang
365b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed//de stong pa nyid ting 'dzin 'dres par bya ba'i phyir bsom gtan byed kyang /stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i
366a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsam gtan mi byed//de mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /mtshan mA med pa'i 'dzin mngon sum
366a2(dkon brtsegs): du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed//de smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i
366a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir bsam gtan mi byed//de byams pa chen po'i go bgos//snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs la gnas te/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid/
366a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchog mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed //de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/tshul khrims ma/
366a5(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba med pa/bzod pa mi tshang ba med pa/brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/bsam gtan me tshang ba med pa/shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/thabs ma chud pa med pa/
366a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa/snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/bden pa shes pa 'jug pa la ma tshang ba med pa/byang chub kyi sems sems
366a7(dkon brtsegs): can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang /bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don byed pa dang /don mthun pa ma tshang
366b1(dkon brtsegs): nga med pa/dran pa dang shes bzhin mi ldan pa med pa dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan
366b2(dkon brtsegs): lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa ma tshang ba med pa/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /
366b3(dkon brtsegs): des ma tshang ba med pa/ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa/mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos
366b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa//dge 'dun gyi tshul yongasu sdud pa dang ldan pa/se ni thams cad la lta bas byin gyis
366b5(dkon brtsegs): rlabs pa//sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongasu rdzogs par bsdus pa/sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan
366b6(dkon brtsegs): pesangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par gzung ba/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa
366b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rje su mthun pa/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba
367a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang mu bral ba/sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/rton pa bzhi thob pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
367a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pas smras pa drang ba la mkhasde pa/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/nyon mongs
367a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad sbyong ba/chu bo las sgrol ba/'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/ring bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba/las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zhi bar ma zhi ba/chos
367a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi btang snyoms pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems pa'o//byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/rang gi
367a5(dkon brtsegs): nga gis lung du ma bstan pa/sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bad pa ste/'di ni
367a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong po nyid ces bya'i//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
367a7(dkon brtsegs): khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa yan lag rnams rnam pa tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/de la la la ni sa
367b1(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'bri ba la mo mkhas/la lA ni gtan la 'bengs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/kha cig rkang lag 'bri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang marga
367b2(dkon brtsegs): bo dang rna ba 'bri ba la mi mkhas pa dag yin la/rigs kyi bya de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bsgrubs pa/yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba la tha da du bsgrubs pas gzugs tha dad du
367b3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te/khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig/khyed
367b4(dkon brtsegs): cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mor bris shog/de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs ni sme ras de brgyangs po lasari mi mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul
367b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan cig tu song bar gyur la/de nas ri mo mkhan b+hi ma de dag gis de la rgyal ba de'i gzugs bris na/rigs kyi b+ha 'di ji snyam du sems/ri ma khan gcig po de'i lag tu ma
367b6(dkon brtsegs): blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram/gsol bya/bcom ldan 'das dA ni mA lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
367b7(dkon brtsegs): blo de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya bar phyir 'di dper byas te/'di'i don ci lta zhe na/rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi
368a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang /spyod pa ji snyed dang /banon pa ji snyed kyis spangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
368a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bsnan na yang/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin//nam sangs
368a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang /nyon mongs pa'i kun+da nas ldang ba dang /mtshan ma lnga dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig
368a4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pA de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no//bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa'
368a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i blosam gtan gyi pha rol tu
368a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yingasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su drug pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
368a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongasu dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab
368b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang
368b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byung ba la mde'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /'dus byas pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa
368b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /'jig rten gyi gzo
368b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa la yad de'i shes
368b5(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de la zhes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med
368b6(dkon brtsegs): cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes pa dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jun pa dang /kun rdzob bstan pa la
368b7(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /don dam pa bsten po la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med kyi
369a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/rlub dang 'bring dang tha mi'i dbang po mchub dang mdzad
369a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes ya dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te/de'i shes
369a3(dkon brtsegs): rang de yang 'phags pa zug pa med pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa dang /nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/sems can gyi bsam pa'i rje su zhugs pa ni gting dpag
369a4(dkon brtsegs): ga//mthong bar dka' zhing zab la/khong du chud par dka' ba bye phrag byed cing /nges par rtog pa/lta ba dang ma bral ba/bag chags bsal ba/bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs
369a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad stong pa nyid du rjesu rtogs pa/chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa don la nges par rtog pa/shin du khrigs pa/shin du sbyangs pa/ci yang snang ba med pa/'gal
369a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ma 'gags pa/dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa/dus las mi 'da' ba/skyon med pa/legs par bsrung ba/skyon med pa la dga' ba/bdun pa
369a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa/'gag pa'i bden pa rje su rtogs pa/shin tu brgal ba/thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa/gcig pu spyod pa/spyod pa med pa/legs par spyod pa/sems
369b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang grang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa/yul thams cad las shin du 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul
369b2(dkon brtsegs): las phyir ma log pa/rtsom po thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongasasu smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod
369b3(dkon brtsegs): pa las phyir ma log pa/sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod po las phyir ma log pa/nye bar len pa spyod kyang nye bar
369b4(dkon brtsegs): len pa med par 'bad ba/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa'i rjesu zhugs pa'o//
369b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud par dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/yun ring por lta ba rtag tu rgyan mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/byang chub kyi
369b6(dkon brtsegs): snying po la gzhol ba/dge ba sbyin pa smod pa/nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byan gyis brlabs pa/bdud thams cad 'dul ba/sems can
369b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tshim par byed pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/don thams cad rjesu rtogs pa/chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/thabs thams cad kyis lus dag par/
370a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'o//rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu spyong pa dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
370a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//mtshan ma thams cad dang /dmigs pa thams cad dang /sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
370a3(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa zhes bya'o//de'i shes rab yongasu dag pa gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongasu dag pa/thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi
370a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yongasu dag pa ste/de dag ni yongasu dag pa gnyis//gzhan yang yongasu dag pa gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/dmigs pa yongasu dag pa dang /lta ba yongasu
370a5(dkon brtsegs): drag pa ste/de dag ni yongasu dag pa gnyis//de'i shes rab de yang thams cad kyi rjesu song ba/sems can gyi rje su song ba/chos kyi rjesu song ba'o//de'i shes rab de
370a6(dkon brtsegs): ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro//de'i shes rab kyi gnas pa yang med la yul thams
370a7(dkon brtsegs): cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la gnas//de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la dbus la yang mi gnas pa'o//de'i shes rab de ni phyogs bcur/
370b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par blta ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul//'byung ba shin du mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed do//de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs pa'i sngon du
370b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'o//de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin/mi ldan pa yang ma yin/bral ba yang ma yin te/sbyor ba 'am/mi sbyor ba 'am/chos gang gis
370b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang brjod par bya bya ma yino//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin//bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yi no//thos pa'i
370b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas yin//yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yino//chos kyi 'byung gnas yin//gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yino//so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung
370b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas yino//yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
370b6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi'i srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i
370b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems skyeso//byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
371a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol//lha'i bu khri na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral nId dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas/de dag gi tshig 'di skad ces 'dzi to//bcom
371a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
371a3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba lags na/gang dag thos nas mas pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smraso///
371a4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug nu rin po che la bka' stsal po//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i
371a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/lus
371a6(dkon brtsegs): lo rnam pa gonyis so sor rtog po dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog/rnam pa gnyis so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa/
371a7(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o//de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/
371b1(dkon brtsegs): cog pas yong su gang ba yun zung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yino zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o//de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe/
371b2(dkon brtsegs): nu/'di lta ste/gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/chos kyi sku/bsod nams kyi sku/rdo rje'i spyi/mi shigs pa'i sku/'jig rten gsum lus
371b3(dkon brtsegs): bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni stag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/rigs
371b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'odi ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis so sor rtog pa dang ldan par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpe'i lus lo lus kyi
371b5(dkon brtsegs): rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni chos gnyis yongs skyong ste gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /rtag pa'i rnam pa'o//de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ni/gang
371b6(dkon brtsegs): zhenakye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ring por mi gnas pa/tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas/lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to//
371b7(dkon brtsegs): snying po gsum len te//gsum gang zhe na/lus kyi snying po dang /longs spyod kyi snying po dang /'tsha ba'i snying po'o//de la lus mi rtag snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran
372a1(dkon brtsegs): dang slob mar khas blangs te bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/lus mi rtag snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang /g.yo dang /tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do//
372a2(dkon brtsegs): lus mi rtag snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed//lus mi rtag snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de/bdag pa
372a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas te/de la yon tan gyi phan yon rab
372a4(dkon brtsegs): tu thob bo//de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de
372a5(dkon brtsegs): dge sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rigasami 'chad pa dang /sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongasu bskyab
372a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ste/sems can thams cad la btang ba/sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o//gang
372a7(dkon brtsegs): mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o//'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad//
372b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa 'dus ma byas nyid du yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o//stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/de la byang chub
372b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang /mtshan ma med pas nges par brtags pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di rtag pa'i
372b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa zhes bya'o//nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i
372b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa/bdag gi lus de sems can thams cad kyi lus
372b5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'dogs shing /bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi
372b6(dkon brtsegs): yus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog/de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu sheso//de zag pa med pa'i chos thob
372b7(dkon brtsegs): pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do//zag pa rnams gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /srid pa'i zag pa dang /ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /lta ba'i zag pa'o//de la
373a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyudu ga pa yang gas pa du smran sa sus sa na sno smon pa byu'i phying bus smras spyanan du dag sa // pa na/
373a2(dkon brtsegs): su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa'i phyi bsams n+d+ha du da pa pa ma pa'i ga pa dang /sgyu ga pa
373a3(dkon brtsegs): don bye byed byu rgyu ba sems dpa' rnal 'gyur 'ju/lus la sus suM m+b+ha drun pa bar bzhag pa bsgom pa de smras la ston gyi mtha' das kyang pa byung bar ma
373a4(dkon brtsegs): /sa b+h+rUM Sh+T+r-I nga me mi ba mas sa /sa la na rnaM yang sa sa / stsa la sasu da
373a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'jig gas la sgru bas+yA bdad+mo//lam rgyag stsa la lta /zul pas bdug nga mi spyod//bdag 'i byud de yi pas sna su yin kyil ma
373a6(dkon brtsegs): ngasu dzin pa med pas spyod pa med pa nga de zla sa pas gning sa pas mad//da pongs med pas spyod pa rnye zugag/
373a7(dkon brtsegs): pas phyi sa par mi gyur med pa'i ying po'i gyur//nga'i pa mi'i byung ba mi 'gyur gyim rgyas nyid le gdus par gyur/
373b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang chos pa yin pa la spyod par mi 'gyuraro//chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo //chos kyi 'gros su spong bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do///
373b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pas yongasu bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyuraro//chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro//
373b3(dkon brtsegs): yul la bsrungs pas ting 'dzin sgrub po//mnyam par bzhug pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par
373b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed//rnam par rtog par mi byed//rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur//mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed//rnam par mi byed//nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni
373b5(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin thob nas/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob po 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa
373b6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/
373b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni/tshe rab la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen
374a1(dkon brtsegs): po thob par 'gyur//de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin zhes slob ste/de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spangs pa'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjesu
374a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgomo//de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba yang 'gog par mi byed//des tshor ba gang
374a3(dkon brtsegs): ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung zhing myong bar byed//de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams snying
374a4(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po rnyed de/bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo ///nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje
374a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnyed de/bdag gri zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spongango //nam bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de na gti mug la spyod pa'i
374a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed/bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo //de bde de'i tshor ba la rje sa chags par mi 'gyur te/rjesu chags pa legs
374a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzams par yang byed do//sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/khong khri ba legs par 'joms par byed//sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin
374b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par myi 'gyur te/ma rig pa legs par 'joms par yang bya //des sbyor ba gang ci myong yang de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag pa shos shing myong bar//
374b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do//sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do//de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyuraro//sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngud shes par 'gyuraro//sdug
374b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tsher ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro//de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o//gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal nyid//
374b4(dkon brtsegs): gang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes lta zhing gnas pa de chos
374b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad smras pa dang /zhig pa dang /zhu ba dang /gnas pa med par shes//chos thams cad la skye ba dang /'jig par yang so sor rtog/so sor rtog pa na chos skye ba de
374b6(dkon brtsegs): dag gang na ste 'ongs/'gag pa rnams gang du sogs par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong //des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
374b7(dkon brtsegs): gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par bsgrub po//bsgrubs nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thams cad kyi tsher
375a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gag par byed kyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor bar
375a2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thobs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongasu zin pa'o//gang tsher ba 'gag pa yang rab tu shes la/tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du
375a3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed/tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa la gnas pa de tshong ba rnams dben pa dang /rnam par dben par yang dag par ji lta ba
375a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rab tu shes//'di la ni myong ba gang yang mdo//'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang medo//chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/bdag dang bdag gi dang bral
375a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o//rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o//bdag po med pa'o//nga'i ba med pa'o//yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'o//des yang
375a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmyig so//des ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar rkyen stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams
375a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang stong pa'o snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang /sems dben pa dang /don shes pa dang /chos rnams shes pa dang /ye shes rig pas tshong ba
375b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tshod nga'i rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhug pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o///
375b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
375b3(dkon brtsegs): sems la sems kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste/sems dran pa ye shes kyis sems kun
375b4(dkon brtsegs): tu cholo//de sems kun du tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong /sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong //sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes
375b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong /phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjesu mi mthong /khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rje su mi mthong /skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par
375b6(dkon brtsegs): rje su mi mthong ngo //des sems yang dag par rjesu ma mthong bas sems ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/dmigs pa yod pa las sems
375b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur snyam//de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam/'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/gal te
376a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzhan na ni sems de gnyi su 'gyur//nyan te dmigs pa glang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni/sems kyis sa/
376a2(dkon brtsegs): de lhur mthong bar 'gyur te/sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung //'di lta ste dper na/ma gyi so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid bcad par mi nus pa dang /sor mo'i rtsa
376a3(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus snyam nas de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyod ba la gang sems
376a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas/chang pa ma yin pa/rtag pa ma yin pa/ther zug tu mi gnas pa/rgyu med pa ma yin pa/rkyen dang mo 'ag lta ba/de las kyang ma yin gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/
376a5(dkon brtsegs): de nyid thang ma yin gzhan yang ma yin da'i sems kyi rgyud/sems kyi mkhri shi /sems kyi chos nyid/sems mi gnas pa dang /sems rgyu med pa dang /sems
376a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba med pa dang /sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid du 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes//de ltar mthong //de bzhin nyid ji lta bu de bzhin du sems de dag
376a7(dkon brtsegs): dben pa nyid du rab tu shes/de bzhin nyid du mthong ba de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//
376b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam+ba yang mi mthong rnam par mi mthong /mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/g.yo med/rlom sems med/spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub
376b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon pad+mo 'dus
376b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o//ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du/byang chub kyi sems
376b4(dkon brtsegs): yong su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o//ji ltar byang chub kyi semasu bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de yang gzugs med de/de'i phyir sems ji ltar spyod pa
376b5(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhino//spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin//byang chub ji lta bar yongasu bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub po/byang chub kyi
376b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni chos thams cad de/gang 'di ltar sems rab tu 'byed po shrI pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//rigs kyi bu
376b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa dang /rab tu mgyogs pa/mi gnas par rgyu po/spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/'bab chu'i rgyun dang /'bru mer gyi mar me dang 'dra ba rgyang ring por 'gro ba/
377a1(dkon brtsegs): lus med pa/yul la brkam pa/skye mched drug la spyad yul ba/gzhan dag bzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'o sems gnas pa/rtse gcig pa/mi 'phro ba/
377a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi 'phro ba/zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/g.yeng po med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o//dral dran pa nye bar bzhig pa yongasu rdzogs pa gang zhe na/sems la rnam
377a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byed par shes pa dang /sems la chos kyi dbyingasu gnas par shes pa dang /sems la sems kyi gnas par shes pa dang /sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar
377a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /sems la mngon sum gyi shes pa dang /sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang /sems la dus gsum mnyam pa
377a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du shes pa dang /sems la de kho nar shes pa dang /sems lA g.yo ba med cang gzung ba med par shes po 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//
377a6(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes//sems kyi rang bzhin de yongasu shes nas de bzhin du
377a7(dkon brtsegs): ston to//rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu sheso//sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du
377b1(dkon brtsegs): chos sten to//rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes//sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes
377b2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to//ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu sheso//sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang
377b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chos ston to//de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu sheso//sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to//
377b4(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu sheso//sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
377b5(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu shes//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing //sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyuraro//sems gnas pas
377b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings gnas par rje su shes kyang /sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa
377b7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhog pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyis rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/
378a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/chos kho na skye ba
378a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams skye/chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'og go ste/'di la bdag gam+ba/sems can nam/srog gam/skye ba po 'am/gso ba 'am/skyes bu 'am/gang zag gam/shed
378a3(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa 'am/shed bu 'am/gang skye ba 'am/rga ba 'am/'chi ba 'am//'pho ba 'am/skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang medo//'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid//gal
378a4(dkon brtsegs): te bskyobs na ni 'grub/gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste/dge ba yang rung /mi dge ba yang rung /mI g.yo ba yang rung /ji lta bur bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub
378a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi chos rnams las sgrub par byed pa yang med la/chos rnams la rgyu ba med par yang gang gis kyang mi skye'i snyam du nye bar brtags na/'di ltar chos dran pa'i
378a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes skye ste/gang pos de nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang /g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsumo//de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon
378a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o//'di ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa//mchog dam pa/rab/khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyu ro bcu po
378b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste lus yongasu dag pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pa thams cad las shin
378b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das pa dang /ngag yong su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung /sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/rnam pa drug cu shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa dang
378b3(dkon brtsegs): sems yong su dag pas/sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa yongasu
378b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pas/don dang /chos dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /spobs pa mi zad pa dang /byams pa chen po yongasu dag pas/sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i
378b5(dkon brtsegs): lam la rab tu 'gong pa dang /snying rje chen po yongasu dag pas/bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba dang /stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs pas/sems
378b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /mi 'jigs pa yongasu rdzogs pas bar du gcod pa dang /bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab
378b7(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongasasu rdzogs pas/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye
379a1(dkon brtsegs): shos mthong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs pas/rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na mod
379a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dam pa bzang po/mchog rab bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur 'gyuraro//des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa la
379a3(dkon brtsegs): chog mi shes par 'gyuraro//bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams
379a4(dkon brtsegs): cad du bag chag su yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed//de mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed kyang /ting
379a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'gyur la/ting 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skyo ste/bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i
379a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i kham su yang skye'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas/chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta ba'i dran pa nye
379a7(dkon brtsegs): bor ba zhig pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag sgom la/byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon
379b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar mi ltung /mi dge ba'i chos spong yang chud par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/gang lnga chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang
379b2(dkon brtsegs): chad pa yongasu spangs pa'i dbu ma'i lam mo//de yang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /ma rig pa de gnyi ka yang mtha' ste gang de
379b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o//de bzhin du ma rig pa dang /'du byed rnams
379b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'du byed med pa rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /ming dang gzugs med pa dang /skye mched drug dang /

379b6(dkon brtsegs): skrod pa dang /srid pa med pa dang /skye ba dang /skye ba med pa dang /rga shi dang /rga shi med pa dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid
379b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur pa ma yin te/'di ni chos rnams kyi
380a1(dkon brtsegs): dasgyu rol m+b+ha nos byu //sa rnams da sgyu la tha na 'du /de dra nas bstan par myu dzu//dang la lam ldan pang+gAgs pa m-i
380a2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ sung ngas padi skyed den nga ste/ ni / ni ma rgyugs ci da
380a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gyur ba ma yin te/myu gam dag pang mi rgyas kyi de bzhin du/rigs kyi bung rigs pa klung gis rnam par shes bskye dang /gang dum sa rnam par
380a4(dkon brtsegs): byaganas pa de gcig yang man+ta ste/gang dag kyis dbye mar bsten par mi nus pa ni rigs kyi bu ba' tsamadu dbu ma'i la ma zhes bya'i don dam par ni me yin//
380a5(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa gang yin pa de ni sno du myedade la ni nyung du med med meng ba yang med do//gdul srung du yang med mang po yang med pa de ni ma'i l+h+wam mo//
380a6(dkon brtsegs): kyai bu gzhan yang bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyig yeng mthur ste/bdag dang bdag ma pa'i jibo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu mi lam mo//srog dang gang
380b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/srog dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo//mtshan ma dang /mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste//
380b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshon ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo//dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/rtog pa dang 'jig pa med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo//
380b3(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste//brjod du med pa ni dbu mi'i lo mo//tshu rol dang pha rol ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/'jig tshogs 'gag
380b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dbu ma'i la mo//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i la mo mo//'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba
380b5(dkon brtsegs): de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu mi'i la mo//rigs kyi bu de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
380b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu 'du bar rab tu shes//chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi
380b7(dkon brtsegs): khams//de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med par khong du chud do//chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de
381a1(dkon brtsegs): gaN+DIg pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shos+ho//des chos thams cad dbying sa gcig tu sta nas chos rnams la chos kyi d+d+hasaSh+Ta nga gnas kyang sul mngon pang /
381a2(dkon brtsegs): shrishing lbu bar yang mi 'gyuro//de nA ma mi mthong ba de na chos rnams le tha dad du mi byed//des chos rnams lo mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/lha'i mgo gis mthong ba ma yin/shes rab kyi
381a3(dkon brtsegs): mig gis mthong ba mi yi no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te de'i phyir shA'i mig gis mthong ba ma yi no//de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par lhung ba ma yin te de'i phyir de lha'i
381a4(dkon brtsegs): mig gis mthong ba ma yin//de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te//de'i phyir de shes rab kyi migs mthong ba ma yino//chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnus pa de chos thams cad ji lta
381a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gnaso//de chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjesu dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi gtang ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
381a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos rjesu dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o//gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang /tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rje su dran pa de yang mi 'dor ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu
381a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpe'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzlog pa bzhi po de dag lo gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong
381b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lhu ste lus la lus kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong //tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas pas sdug bsngal
381b2(dkon brtsegs): la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong //sems la sems kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo //chos rnams la chos kyi rjesu lta
381b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong //de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid bsgrub bo//yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
381b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gang yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa rab tu 'thob ste/yang dag par spong
381b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' do 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la sems 'jug gi/mi dge ba la ni ma yi no//de phyir zhing sdig pa
381b6(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /sdig po mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes
381b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams bskyed po'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyamos par mi 'gyur po dang phyi ro zhing 'byung ba dang /yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
382a1(dkon brtsegs): /brtson 'grus nam//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de sngon gyi las yongs dag pa'o//rang gi dang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/'bad pa med cing
382a2(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ni skye'o//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu
382a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di dag sems kyis dbang bsgyur por 'gyur gyi/brtson 'grus kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin//de dag pa dang //dri ma med pa
382a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /kha na mtho ba med pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang /snying chen po dang ldan pa'i snrums dang sems las byung ba 'jug ste/yang dag bye
382a5(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa de ni yang dag par spong ba la granas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i spong ba mnyam pa nyid kyi mi mnyam pa ni ma yino//de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi mi mnyam pa ma yin//
382a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang /mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par bsgrub pa ste/de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o//de ltar yang dag par
382a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dun pa'i ti nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /btsun
382b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyitad 'dzin spong ba 'o du byed dang ldan pan rdzu 'phrul da pa dang /sems kyi ting 'dzin spong ba'o 'du byed dang ldan par rdzu 'dul myerkang pa dang /dpyad pa ting 'dzid spyong bar du
382b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o//de byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur//mi dge ba thong pas brtson 'grus rang bar 'gyur//snying rje chen pa rab tu thob
382b3(dkon brtsegs): ngos se mapa yang bar 'gyur//thabs mkhaso pa rab tu thob pas spyad pa yang bar 'gyur//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa

382b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing sems can de dag yongasu smin par byed pa dang /sems can tshe ring po chos bstan na yongasu skyob rnams la chos bstan pas yongasu tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshe thung ngu yong su 'dzin
382b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /lha 'am mi gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du tshe'i tshad la dbang bsgyur ba yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas dbang dang po 'di thob po//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
382b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lus la dbang thob ste/lus la dbang ba des yid kyi lus rab tu thob nas lus ci 'dra ba dang /gzugs ci 'dra ba dang /kha dog dang mtshan ma dang

384a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/phyogs bcu'i sbyangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang wAn cig tu gnas shing 'dus/stu gtum zer ro//de bzhin du tshangs pa thams cad dang /

384b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /dgos pa grub par byed pa dang /snyoms las mi byed pa dang /sems mi zhum pa dang /'dod chags rnam par sel ba dang /zhe sdang nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /gti mug gi mun pa sol

384b5(dkon brtsegs): spel ba dang /khams gang gis 'byung ba khyod du chud pa dang /phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang /byin nas kyang 'gyod pa med pa dang /sems can thams cad la lta ba'i
384b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /dad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /gzhan dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang /bde ba bzhin la stob pa dang /bdag
384b7(dkon brtsegs): garnyed pas chog shes pa dang /gzhin gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang /rab tu byung ba la gzhol ba dang /gzhan dag kyang rab tu byung ba la mos par byed pa dang /byas pa bzo ba dang /byas pa shes pa
386a1(dkon brtsegs): /dang /mdza' ba bstan pa dang /mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang /rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang dpung pu chung sbyin pa dang /ngal ba rnams yang dag
386a2(dkon brtsegs): par spro bar byed pa dang /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /bslab pa rnams la ston pa tsam du 'phags par 'dzin pa dang /ma bslabs pa rnams la mi
386a3(dkon brtsegs): brnyas pa dang /dbul po rnams la longs spyod 'gyed pa dang /nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang /sman sbyin pa dang /byas pa rnams la mi smod pa dang /dkon mchog gsum
386a4(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro byed pa dang /bsti stang byed pa dang /bsti stang mi byed pa rnams la btang snyoms dang /'jig rten gyi chos las shin tu 'da' ba dang /sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /
386a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos dang /yon tan thams cad bsgrubs pa dang /byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba dang /dran pa mi nyams pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
386a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongasu sbyang ba'o//de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongasu sbyangs nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du nyams par mi 'gyur/yongasu nyams par mi
386a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/'di
386b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste mi 'phrogs pa dang pa'i dbang po dang /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dran pa'i dbang po dang /snying rje chen po mi gtong ba
386b2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /chos thams cad 'dzin par brtson pa shes rab kyi dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos shing drung pa ni byang chub
386b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dang pa'i dbang po'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi
386b4(dkon brtsegs): brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbong po'o//sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par yong su bsngos pa
386b5(dkon brtsegs): ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang bsam pa mi phyed par gyur pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o//lhag pa'i bresam
386b6(dkon brtsegs): pa khyad par du 'gro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o//yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//sems can thams cad la 'od zer mnyam par gtong ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
386b7(dkon brtsegs): po'o//sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa ni
387a1(dkon brtsegs): /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po'o//sems can thams cad chags pa las shin tu thar par byed pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por//gang la yang mi
387a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//sems can thams cad kyi chags pa mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o//gang chags pa dang mi chags pa thams
387a3(dkon brtsegs): cad du shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnyog pa med par gyur pa 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o//sems rnyog pa can dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni
387a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o//gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi dran pa mi 'dor pa 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//gang sems rnyog pa med par ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang
387a5(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o//gang rnyog pa med pa'i chos thos pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa rnams rnyog pa med pa'i chos nyid la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi
387a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i dbang po'o//dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni brtson
387a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi dbang po'o//dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang ma bsgrubs pa rnams mi brjed pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o//gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang bde ba mi 'dod cing sems
387b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o//gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du so so rang gis shes pa
387b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni 'dor ro//brtson 'grus kyis ni yang dag par bsgrub po//dran pas ni chung mi gson to//
387b3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni bsrung ngo //shes rab kyis ni rnam par 'byed do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pas ni bdag tu 'dzin pa rab tu spong ngo //brtson 'grus
387b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni bdag tu 'dzin pa 'dor ro//dran pas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las shin tu 'anga'o//ting nge 'dzin gyis ni lci bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dor ro//shes rab kyis ni
387b5(dkon brtsegs): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spong ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
387b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa gang zhe na/gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar brtan nas bdud thams cad kyis mi rdzi bor 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
387b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gnyis kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ba dang /sngon gyi
388a1(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang /lus kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /dbang po rnams spyod par 'gyur ba dang /dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par
388a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang /phyas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyed par 'gyur ba'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis bya ba ma yin pa mi byed do//
388a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bya ba byed do//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byas pa'i las chud mi gson to//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni gzugs dong sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa
388a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rma mi 'byin to//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni 'gyod pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad las shin tu 'da'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs
388a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gang gzhan la dad pas mi 'gro'o//brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bar ma dor zhum par mi 'gyur ro//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu thob po//ting
388a6(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mtshungs par chos ston to//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
388a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni mos pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do//brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do//dran pa'i
388b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems dang bsam pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
388b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi smod pa tshim par byed do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni ser sna'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo //brtson
388b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ngo //dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni mnyam pa'i sems
388b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi 'dor ro//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni rnam par smin pa la re ba med do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ded pa'i stobs kyis ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rab tu
388b5(dkon brtsegs): slong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bslab pa rnams las mi 'da'o//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang
388b6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi sa la 'gro'o//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshul khrims rab tu spong ngo //rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni gnod
388b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bzod pa bsgom mo//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems
389a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad rnams rjes su bsgyung ngo //shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bdag dang sems can dang bzod pa la rnam par rtag go//rigs kyi bu gtAn yang byang chub sems
389a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ngad pa'i stobs kyis ni le lo'i dri ma rab tu spong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni rtsom pa thams cad nyam 'og tu chud par byed do//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub tu yongs
389a3(dkon brtsegs): su bsngo'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa bsgrub po//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni mi byed rnam par mi byed do//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
389a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyis ni rnam par guyeng ba'i dri ma rab tu spyong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan gyi yan ldog rnams yang dag par bsgrub bo//
389a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rtse gcig tu yongs su bsngo'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo'o//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni bsam gtan de la chags rab tu
389a6(dkon brtsegs): spong ngo //rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i stobs kyis ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi dri ma rab tu spong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni thos pa yongasu tshelo//
389a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i stobs kyis ni tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ro//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni sems nges par sems pa rab tu 'thob po//shes rab kyi stobs kyis ni nan tan gyis yang dag
389b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrub pa//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyis nI nor bdun rab tu 'thob po//brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu
389b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob po//dran pa'i stobs kyis ni rjes su dran pa drug rab tu 'thob po//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun las shin tu 'anga'o//shes rab kyi stobs/
389b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni log pa nyid du nges pa brgyad las shin tu 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mi phyed cing sems dang /bsam pa rnyog pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i
389b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis spong pa yongasu dag pa'o//gang phyir mi ldog cing blang ba med la dor ba med pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi spong pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang dran pa sngon du 'gro
389b5(dkon brtsegs): la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa 'di ni dran pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang sems rab tu dul ba so rang bzhin gyis ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa la snyoms
389b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi spyod pa yong su dag pa'o//gang lta ba thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su
389b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dang bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtson 'grus
390a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dasmra pa'o//me brjed pa'i mtshan nyid ni dran dA'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rnam par ga yeng ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting
390a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pani//so sor rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
390a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i stobs kyi spyod po yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
390a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba ni bdun te/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
390a5(dkon brtsegs): yan log dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /ting nge
390a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagago/de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsags/
390a7(dkon brtsegs): shing bsags po rnams chud mi bzon pa yin te/'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang lhag mthong gi tshogs
390b1(dkon brtsegs): dang zung du 'brel par gyur pa yin te/'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag go/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang spong ba khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni nyi 'di///
