390b2(dkon brtsegs): ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang mi dga' ba sel bar 'gyur ba yin te/'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
390b3(dkon brtsegs): lag go/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gang lus dang sems shin tu byang bar 'gyur ba yin te/'di na shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ting nge
390b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag na gang rnam par grol ba snying por 'gyur ba yin te/'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yon lag go/btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi
390b5(dkon brtsegs): yin lag ni gang byed pa byas par 'gyur ba yin te/'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag nas bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi bsam pa ma brjed pa 'di ni//
390b6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go//gang sems can yongs su
390b7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pas yongs su mi skyo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go//gang dam pa'i chos kun dga' la dga' bos gnas pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi
391a1(dkon brtsegs): /yan lag go/gang shin tu sbyangs pa la sems can rnams 'god pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/gang ting nge 'dzin la sems
391a2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams 'god pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/gang mngon sum du shes pa btang snyoms la sems can rab tu 'god pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang
391a3(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis dran pa med pa yid la mi byed pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
391a4(dkon brtsegs): lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang chos thas cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa
391a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o//gang lus dang dag dang yid kyi las brtul ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang rjes su
391a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang bya ba byas pa dang byed pa byas pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs
391a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//gang 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug kyang gcig tu snyoms par zhugs par yang gyur po 'di ni
391b1(dkon brtsegs): tong nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongasu dag pa'o//gang gnyis su med pa'i chos la rab tu gnas te rtog pa dang sel ba med cing btang snyoms par kun tu snang
391b2(dkon brtsegs): la sems can la yang lta ba 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams
391b3(dkon brtsegs): cad khong du chud par byed pa dang /rjes su rtog par byed pa dang /rab tu 'byed par byed pa dang /'jal bar byed pa dang /nye bar rtog pa khong du chud cing sems can gyi spyod pa mtho ba
391b4(dkon brtsegs): dang dma' bo thams cad rtogs te/de la gnas nas kyang ngan song du 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa dang /dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bag la nyal ba dang kun nas dkris po dang bral ba
391b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ste/'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no//
391b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni bdud sdig can rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni nga rgyal can rnams kyi spyod yul ma//
391b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni mtshan mo la dmigs
392a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang ska dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
392a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tshor ba yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni sems
392a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gong yin pa de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa dang rnam par rig pa'i chos
392a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no//'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni tho na mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa rnams kyi spyod yul yang ma yin te/
392a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//chos tha~Md la rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongasu rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ni 'phags pa rnams
392a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul//chos thams cad kun nas mi ldang ba'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//chos thams cad dang mi mthun po'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi
392a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul lo//chos thams cad rtsod pa med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo//chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ni 'phags pa rnams kyi
392b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul lo//rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'phags pa'i spyod yul yongs su dag pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi/
392b2(dkon brtsegs): bud la byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs su dog pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i
392b3(dkon brtsegs): lulas kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes smos pa de la yang dag
392b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lta bA ga she na/gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i lte ba zhes bya ste/de bdag tu lta ba dang /sems can du lta ba dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /
392b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag tu lta ba dang /sems can du lta ba dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta bar
392b6(dkon brtsegs): nimatshungs so//de cha par lta ba dang /rtag pa lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba ldang bar mi byed do//de 'i phyir na no//chung par lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du
392b7(dkon brtsegs): lte ba de ni mtshungs so//'byung bar lta ba dang /'jig par lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba yong ldang bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'byung bar lta ba dang /'jig par lta ba dang/
393a1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du lta bya de ni mtshungs so//de 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /drang 'dzin par lta ba dang /nga yid 'dzin par lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba ldang dbang mi
393a2(dkon brtsegs): byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /ngar 'dzin par lta ba dang /nga yir 'dzin par lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so//de sangs rgyas su lta ba
393a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos su lta ba dang /dge 'dun du lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba yang ldang bar mi byed de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /chos su lta ba dang /dge 'dun
393a4(dkon brtsegs): du lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba de ni mtshungs so//rigs kyi bu de ltar na lta ba'i dmigs pa ni ji tsam du chung na mya ngan las 'das pa la lta ba'i dmigs pa yang rung ste/de
393a5(dkon brtsegs): tsam du yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin no//gang tha ma dang /rab dang /'bring gi lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
393a6(dkon brtsegs): de mnyam par lha'i mi mnyam par ma yin no//ji ltar na mnyam par lha'i mi mnyam par ma yin no zhe na/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni dman pa/slob pa'i chos rnams ni
393a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lha na mi mnyam par lta ba'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa mi slob pa'i chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o snyam du gal te/
393b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nam mnyam par lta ba'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zang zing dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zang zing med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lhan mi mnyam par lta
393b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi minyam par lta ba'o//
393b3(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni 'dus byas yin la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'dus ma byas yin no snyam du gal te de ltar lta na mi mnyam par lta ba'o//nam so so'i skye bo'i chos
393b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad slob pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du mthong ste/de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos stong pa nyid dang mi slob pa'i
393b5(dkon brtsegs): chos stong pa nyid mtshungs par mthong ste/de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lte ba zhes bya'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi rkyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud po dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rkyen
393b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa mtshungs pa mnyam par mthong ste/de ltar lta ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos dben pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos dben pa mnyam
393b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du mtshungs par mthong ste/de ltar lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o//so so'i skye bo'i chos yongs su grub po med pa mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa
394a1(dkon brtsegs): rga dun pa smra sa na/dums pa nas s+ho//ngasu sa pa byung bdun
394a2(dkon brtsegs): la ste/gangagi nyis su meng pa sa nga ba du yang dag pa ma nga don//rgyu mdzes pad+ma med bye yang thadad mi byed //yang du ma dang ma ba na yang da
394a3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa mau na du na gyi sbyirnam pa pa skyed de// mas pa di ni ya na pa
394a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par mdang ba de ni mameng ba rgya yid med//mdzang ba yang med sbyi ni ma dag pa ma nga // marnam pa ba na chos kyi yang sa
394a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bems dang snang ba med byung ma d+mo bdu ni yad dag pa mdzod du'o//rigs kyi bu gang rnam de dag ltu ma meng ba 'dzin yang dag pa mdzang sh+lo/
394a6(dkon brtsegs): sa ma du ming ba'i ni lags pa dgasungs ngas byas ya ga sa //s+yA
394a7(dkon brtsegs): do de ni glengs brgyan lenapa ma dpang dag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang chub sems dpa'i snying phrag mang bzhig ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi
394b1(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes so//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/rtog pa gang rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o//de yang gang zhe na/'di lta ste zhi gnas kyis yongs su
394b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa ste/de chos gang zhig chos grang dang ldan snyam du chos de dag la rnam par lta'o//rnam par rtog go/de chos thams cad phan tshun mi ldan pa dang
394b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ldan pa ma yin pa dang ma 'dres par rab tu shes te/des de ltar shes nas mnyam par yang mi rtog na gang mi mnyam par rtog par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/de ni gnas ma yin//
394b4(dkon brtsegs): no//de chos su rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs te phyir yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu
394b5(dkon brtsegs): de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/tshig gis bdag la mi gdung la gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /bdag kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed la gzhan la yang
394b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang /bdag la yang mi gnod la gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste/'dri ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o//gzhan yang yang dag pa'i tshig gis chos thams cad mnyam
394b7(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid du nges par rtog pa'o//de'i chos nges par rtog pa de yang chos nges pa'i tshig des 'byung ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o//gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ni gang mdza'
395a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /mi mdza' ba rnams la ngag mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang //
395a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o//'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o//chos
395a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag med pa'o//myo ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa dang /sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /
395a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med pa dang /bdag dang bral ba'o zhes dag mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes ngag mnyam pa dang /rgyu ci 'dra
395a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'bras bu yang de 'dra ba'o zhes ngag mnyam pa'o//gzhan yang yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya ba ni gang sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang zag gzhan dag yang dag pa'i chos
395a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'dzud pa dang /byang chub kyang yang dag par rab tu 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te/'di ni yang dag pa'i dag ces bya'o//de la yang dag pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/dag
395a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang
395b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtha' glang zhe na/las gang las zad par 'gyur gyi las mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang /las gang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur gyi
395b2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'bar ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang /las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs po skye ba'i phyir ma yin pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes
395b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni grang chos 'di dag rab tu shes shing dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad mngon par 'du
395b4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang de mngon par 'du bya ba dag kyang gsob nyid du snang ba dang /gsog nyid dang /snying po med pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid du snang ba ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
395b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/'tshe ba gang
395b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/gzhan la yang gnod par mi 'gyur/gnyis ka la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o//gzhan
395b7(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'tsho ba gang nyon mongs pa thams cad mi sog pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes
396a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/'tsho ba yongs su dag pa de la ha cang 'dud par sang mi byed mi 'dud par yang mi
396a2(dkon brtsegs): byed la/'tsho ba gang gis bdag gi don dang /gzhan gyi don dang chos kyi don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o//
396a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/gang dge zhing zab pa'i chos de dag la yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin
396a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'dun pa dang /brtson pa dang /spro ba dang /rtsam pa dang /mi zhum pa dang /yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi mngon du byed pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o//gzhan
396a5(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni gang mnyam par rtsol gyi mi mnyam par ni ma yin no//ji ltar na mnyam par rtsol gyi mi mnyam par ma yin zhe na/gang chos rnams mnyam par
396a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi byed mi mnyam par yang mi byed la/byed pa med cing rnam par mi byed pa'o//chos de dag gi chos nyid dang chos gnas pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol lo//chos de dag gi
396a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rtsol lo//chos de dag gi mnyam pa nyid dang bye brag tu bya ba med pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol lo//yang dag pa'i rtsol ba de yang sems
396b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi log pa'i rtsol ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o//
396b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/gang byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang /sbyin pa dran pa dang /tshul khrims dran pa dang /bzod pa dran
396b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /brtson 'grus dran pa dang /bsam gtan dran pa dang /shes rab dran po dang /byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dran pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i
396b4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i dran po ni yang dag pa'i dran pa gang gis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang /
396b5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa gang gis bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang /dran pa gang gis lam grol ba dang lam ngan par mi ltung ba dang /dran pa bsgom pa lta bur gyur pa gang
396b6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos mi dge ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang
396b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa gang gis dran pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /skyon med pa'i rigs thob kyang 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
397a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ga wAn/gang 'phags pa'i rnam par gyur pa'i ting de 'dzin d+ha/
397a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa dang /mthun pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa spang ba dang /mthun pa 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon du bya ba dang /mthun pa lam gyi bdun
397a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa dang mthun pa ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//bdag mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /bdag rnam par dag pas ches
397a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /bdag stong pa nyid pas chos thams cod stong pa nyid du yang dag par snyoms par 'jug la/glang de ltar snyoms par 'jug cing yang dag
397a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la 'jug kyang nges par mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin grang gris sems kyi skad cig gcig dang
397a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i shes rab kyis thams cad mkhyen pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshung rgyu ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
397a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di
397b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa na lha dang mi srog chags nyan thos kyi theg pa can nges par gyur pa lam du zhugs pa khri drug stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do///
397b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na ran po che la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de la
397b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
397b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas snang ba thob pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no//phyogs bcu'i
397b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par lta bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no//sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba la yang dag par lta
397b6(dkon brtsegs): byas shin tu nges par brtags pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin no//phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba dang kha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs la yang dag par lta bas shin tu rgyan pa de ni
397b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i lha'i mig yin no//rang gi gzi brjid grub pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za thams cad dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
398a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spyi bor phyin pa de ni de'i lha'i mig yin te/rigs kyi bu rnam pa 'di lnga ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa
398a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o//de'i lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/gang gis mi'i sgra rnams thos
398a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang /mi ma yin pa'i sgra rnams thos par 'gyur ba dang /sems can dmyal ba pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sgra rnams
398a4(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba dang /phyogs bcu'i skad dang sgra thams cad thos par 'gyur ba ste/rigs
398a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o//de pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga
398a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin te/rnam pa lnga grang zhe na/gang gis lha dang mi dang sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sngon
398a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mthar sems skyes pa gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang /phyi ma'i mthar sems skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus na sems
398b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes pa dang /rgyu dang rkyen dang dmigs par ldan pa dang /nges pa dang ma nges pa dang log pa nyid du nges pa dang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems
398b2(dkon brtsegs): con rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa dang /'dod chags la spyod pa rnams dang zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams dang gti mug la spyod pa rnams dang cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i
398b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rab tu shes te/shes nas kyang de kho na bzhin du de dang mthun par chos ston pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol
398b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o//de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan
398b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/semaso gang 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /zhe sdang gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /
398b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su gzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang /sems gang sbyin pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /byams
398b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu las byung ba rnams dang /de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su gzung ba de dag kyang rjes su
399a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang /sems gang rgyu dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang /rkyen dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang /dmigs pa dang mi 'dra ba rnams dang /de dag gi lus ji 'dra ba rnam
399a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang /sems gang lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang /ma rig pa dang gti mug gis yang dag par
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa rnams dang /de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba yongs su bzung ba de dag kyang rjes su dran pa dang /de dag gis tshe dang /kha dog dang /gzugs dang /gzi brjid dang /g.yog
399a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /stobs dang /grags pa dang /brjod pa dang /dbang phyug ci 'dra bar gyur pa de ying rjes su dran pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su
399a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga'o//de rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon pade shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa yin te/rnam pa lnga grang
399a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen/'di lta ste lus dang gzugs kun du ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /tshig dang skad rnam par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /sems dang yid mngon par 'du byed pa'i
399a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang /sems can thams cad kyi skad du rnam par rig par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /mngon du mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/rdzu 'phrul bye bo'i mngon
399b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa
399b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shes rab kyi myig gos brtags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rnam par shes pa rab tu
399b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par rab tu gnas po ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'i
399b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//sngon gyi mtha' dang phye ma'i mtha' yongs su gcod par rab tu gnas pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o///
399b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed par rab tu gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o//rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams shes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i
399b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi tshikra blo dwags so//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par rtsen cing zag pa zad pa'i ye shos la'ang gnas so//
399b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod dgos pa na grong khyer chen po zhig yod de/grong khyer chen po de'i lam ni bgrod par dka' zhing ring la nyam nga
400a1(dkon brtsegs): ste 'jigs pa dang bcas pa zas dang skom dang bza' ba yang med pa zhig na grang grong khyer chen po der phyin pa de'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun
400a2(dkon brtsegs): chad par 'gyur ba zhig yod pa dang /de nas skyes bu la la zhig gis grong khyer chen po de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa thos nas skyes bu de la bu mthong na
400a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i bu gcig kyang yod pa las/nges bu gcig pa de bor nas grong khyer chen po de'i lam du zhugs te/de stobs kyi shugs/
400a4(dkon brtsegs): dang brtson 'grus thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad khyad du bsad de lam ring po de 'das nas rkang pa ya gcig ni grong /khyer chen po de'i sgo'i them pa la bzhag/rkang
400a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ya gcig ni phyi rol na 'dug pa las des bu gcig po de yid la dran par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te ma la skye ma'o//bdag gis bu gcig pa de 'dir khrid de ma
400a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa lta zhig snyam nas/bu gcig pa de sdug pas grong khyer chen po der ma zhugs kyi/phyir phyogs nas bu gcig pa de ga la 'dug par slar log pa de bzhin du
400a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'bad pa chen po dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i nan tan gyis
400b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga po rnams bskyed de/sems kyis bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de la zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du 'gyur ro//de stong
400b2(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po'i sems skyes nas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dris par byas pa las sems can rnams la lta bas phyir phyogs te/slar
400b3(dkon brtsegs): log nas so so'i skye bo'i sa na yang kun tu snang ngo //rigs kyi bu grong khyer zhes bya ba de ni zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so//dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bye ba bgrod
400b4(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig blo dgos so//bar du gnod pa mang po bgrod ces bya ba de ni bdud kyis 'dun pa bzlog pa'i bar chad kyi
400b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgras so//skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so//rkang pa yi gcig ni grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la bzhag/rkang pa ya gcig spro'i phyi rol du bzhag
400b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba ni 'di lhur byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas drang 'dus ma byas dang 'dres de'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'jug pa'o//bu gcig pa dran nas phreng khyor chen po da
400b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa las phyir phyogs te slar log ces bya bo ni 'di ltar byang chubo sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba'o//de zag pa
401a1(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'i spyi bor phyir kyang zag pa yang mi spong la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/phyir phyogs shing ldog par yang 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu byang chub
401a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams ci 'dra ba'i thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba la ltos/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug
401a3(dkon brtsegs): na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar byang chub lag 'thil du thob pa yang mi 'tshal bar 'khor ba
401a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rjes su 'jug cing /sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
401a5(dkon brtsegs): chos du zhig dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi shu dang ldan
401a6(dkon brtsegs): na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin te/chos nyi shu gang zhe na/'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par zin pa'i byams pa chen po dang /byams pa chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i///
401a7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang /snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems can yangs su smin par byed pa dang /sems can yangs su smin par byed pas yang dag par zin pa'i
401b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang /brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /lkug pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zin pa'i thabs dang /thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'o//
401b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang /shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i bsam gtan dang /bsam gtan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa
401b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang /ye shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i brtul ba dang /brtul bas yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa dang /dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i
401b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang /byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag nga'i dasrings yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par zin pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang /
401b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi sdom pas yang dag par zin pa'i nan tan dang /thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag par zin pa'i gzungs dang /gzungs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i spobs pa dang /skabs
401b6(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
401b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches yang 'di
402a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po/nye bar 'a
402a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bri bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bo na mdzes so//thos pas
402a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan po'i spobs pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
402a4(dkon brtsegs): bA ni mdzes so//lagan rin ngo cha myi dad pa'i longs spyod kyis ni/skye bo mang pa nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brag yod pas
402a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'khor ba na mdzes so//chos ston pas yongs su mi skyo ba ni skye ba mang po nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs
402a6(dkon brtsegs): par brgyan pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so//ye shes kyis brgyan pas ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de
402a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byed pas 'khor ba na mdzes so//de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyong skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yong bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong
402b1(dkon brtsegs): bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so//so so ci rigs par chos sbyin pas ni skye bo mad po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu
402b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so//thos pa yongs su dag pas ni skye ba mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu ji ltar bag yod pas byang chub sems
402b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs
402b4(dkon brtsegs): med pas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/bskal pa dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams lhas
402b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bltas pa zhes bya bar/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten
402b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig
402b7(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ngo //rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir bskal pa de dga' bar gyur pa zhes bya zhe na/rigs kyi bu bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te/de na gnas gtsang ma'i
403a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu lha dag gis kyi ma'o//grogs po dag 'dri ni bskal pa bzang po yin te/skal pa 'di la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes
403a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sgra bsgrags pa dang /de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos so//thos nas kyang dga' ba dang dad pa dang mos pa chen po skyes te/de nas lha
403a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi de dag gis kye ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad smras pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur pa zhes btags so//rigs kyi bu 'jig
403a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de lha thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang de ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de tsam du lta na sdug cing /de tsam du nyams dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
403a5(dkon brtsegs): de lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa de'i gzhi ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po shwa stag ste/stong gi 'jig rten gyi
403a6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi tsan dran sbrul gyi snying po de phye ma khal gcig gi rin du yang mi bzod do//'jig rten gyi khams de nas spros kyi nged langs pa'i dris ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
403a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa khyab po//tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying po las gyur pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+mo chen po sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur
403b1(dkon brtsegs): pad+mo de dag ga 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu snang bar gyur to//mi de dag kyang tsan dan gyi phye ma las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa pu shu dang sgo khang dang khyams dang nA babra/
403b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi legs par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams ngan grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal gnas pa med do//mi de dag thams cad kyang na mkha' la 'gro'o//de dge
403b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nas ni mkha'i dkyil na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag gi nang du 'jug cing nam mkha' la 'gro'o//'jig rten gyi khams de na mngal na gnas pa yang
403b4(dkon brtsegs): med de/mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skyes pa sha stag go//de ni bud med kyi ming yang mi grag go/ngan song rnams kyang med do//ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do//sdug bsngal yang med
403b5(dkon brtsegs): do/'jig rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa yang med do//mi de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang bsam gtan gyis dga' ba'i zas can no//mos pa rlabs po
403b6(dkon brtsegs): ches theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do//gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi cod pan thogs shing dpung rgyan dang rna
403b7(dkon brtsegs): chas brgyan pa lha'i kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stag go/gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de dag gi rab tu byung ba yin te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
404a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos ngur smrig tu bka' stsal pa yang med de 'di ltar sems la rnyog pa med pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin gshegs pade
404a2(dkon brtsegs): yang tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to//rigs kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag kyang
404a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la blta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par
404a4(dkon brtsegs): bltas pa der lhags te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo //rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
404a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston po de na/ta la brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/tshangs pa
404a6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos ston to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du myung du smos te rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam mi ston
404a7(dkon brtsegs): te/de bzhin gshegs pa de tshig dang yi ge nyung ngus chos kyi gtam mdor ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skyes bu dam pa de dag ni zur tsam gyis go ba sha stag ste/tshig gcig gis
404b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig brgya stong gi rjes su 'jug pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa
404b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /spyod pa yongs su dag po bzhi po de dag nyid byang
404b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dkon ma/tshig skar mnga' las brtsams te yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' bar
404b4(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mangs 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho
404b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhes gsol te/de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig de gnyis rgyas par rnam par phye ste bskrun nas de laM 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ye
404b6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa ni 'khor ba na mdzes so//ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa ni skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten
404b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bstan pa de lta bu bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug tu chos rnams la mthun po'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob po//rigs kyi bu de nas bcom
405a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dag pA de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog skar mda'angs//
405a2(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por mdzes par bgyid pa la byas/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
405a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog sgrar mnga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
405a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o//de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ji tsam du chos rnams bsgrub pa'o//chos rnams bsgrub
405a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang gang zhe na/'di lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni 'di lta ste sbyor ba tshad/
405a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongasu gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa tshad med pa dang /sems can tshad med pa sdud pas smin pa mi zad pa tshad med pa dang /mi lhod cing sangs rgyas kyi rigs/kyi rjes su/
405a7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba'i tshul khrims tshad med pa dang /sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang /skyes bu dam pa'i las kyis brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin tshad
405b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsgrub pas bsam gtan tshad med pa dang /chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi shes rab tshad med pa dang /sems can tshad med pas byams pa tshad med pa dang /phan pa'i dngos pos snying
405b2(dkon brtsegs): rjetshad med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos yang drug par sgrubs pas 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang /bdag bde ba la mi chags pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
405b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa dang /brtson 'grus brtan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang /yang dag par sbyor bas yon tan yang dag par bsgrub cing sogs pa tshad med pa dang /ye shes
405b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa tshad med pa dang /shes rab sbyong bas thos pa yongs su tshol ba tshad med pa dang /sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems
405b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa tshad med pa dang /byams pa nges pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa tshad med pa dang /sems 'dul bas dgon pa na gnas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa
405b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs tshad med pa ste/dkon mchog skar mnga' chos 'di dag ni bag yod pa
405b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bag yid pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu bag yod pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o//ngag
406a1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ni ye shes daslab pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas so//bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos bsngags shing bsags pa rnams su so yang dag par 'dzin pa'o//
406a2(dkon brtsegs): /bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i chom rnams rje mi gson pa'o//bag yod pa ni sdu bar bya ba'i chos rnams sdud pa'o//bag yod pa ni sgrub pa'i chos rnams mi sdud pa'o//bag yod
406a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sgrub par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o//bag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcig pa'o//bag yod pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'bar bar //
406a4(dkon brtsegs): byang ba'o//bag yod pa ni dbang po rnams sdom par byed pa'o//bag yod pa ni lam nyam ba las kun du dasrung ba'o//bag yod pa ni dus dang dus ma yin par spyod pa las
406a5(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba'o//byag yod pa ni stobs te stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//bkra yod pa ni khrel gyis mi gnon pa ste mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par
406a6(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro//bag yod pa ni yon tan dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'o 'byung gnas te sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//bag
406a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des
406b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'
406b2(dkon brtsegs): dkon na tshig skar mdar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na yang de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu khyod
406b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar mnga' zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu khyed rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
406b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po mdzes par byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyang bgra yod pas thob par rig
406b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu sems can gyi spyod pa tshad med mtha'
406b6(dkon brtsegs): yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yang mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab po//de la/
406b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de ltar sems can la la ni tshul
407a1(dkon brtsegs): khyams kyis yongs su sman par 'gyur/la la ni tshul khri nas spangs pas//sems can la la ni tshig bris shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin par 'gyur//
407a2(dkon brtsegs): la lA ni 'jam pos/la la ni tshig rtsub pos/la la ni de gnyis kas/la la ni 'jigs par byas pas/la la ni 'jigs pa la yongasu thar par byas pas/la la ni bslangs pas
407a3(dkon brtsegs): la la ni ma bslangs pas/la la ni gnod pas/la la ni mI gnod pas/la la ni zil gyis mnan pas/la la ni zil gyis ma mnan pas/la la ni sbyang bas/la la ni ma sbyangs pas
407a4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni tshar bcad pas/la li ni sbyin pa las phyir byin pas/la la nI bslangs pas/sems can la la ni gzugs yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin
407a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang rig pa dang chos yid du 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni gzugs yid du
407a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos yid du mi 'ong ba nye bar bslabs pas yongs su smin
407a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni rtag tu mthong bas/la la ni ma mthong bas//senaM lal ni sangs rgyas
407b1(dkon brtsegs): smras/san la la na chas kyi sgras/san la lan dge 'dun gyi sgras/la la ni mi rtag pa'i sgras/la la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras/la la ni bdag med pa'i sgras/la la ni zha ba'i skus/sems/
407b2(dkon brtsegs): can la la ni sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni sems can
407b3(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ro//la la ni lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongasu
407b4(dkon brtsegs): smon par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyis la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyis/la la ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gyis yongs smin
407b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/snyan par smra bas mo yin don spyod pas ma yin don mthun pas ma yin/sems can la la ni sngon
407b6(dkon brtsegs): par smra bas yongs su smin par 'gyu gyi/sbyin pas ma yin don spyad pas ma yin don mthun pas ma yin/sems can la la ni don spyad pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/sbyin
407b7(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin/snyan par smra bas ma yin/don 'thun pas ma yin/sems can la la ni don mthun pas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/sngon pos ma yin snyan par smra bas ma yin don spyong/
408a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ma yin/sems can la la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni nang //
408a2(dkon brtsegs): gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/lA la ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/la la ni phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/sems can pa la ni chung ma dang bu pho
408a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bu mo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems can la la ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang mgo bo kun tu gtong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//sems
408a4(dkon brtsegs): can la la ni rtsed mo dang dga' ba dang glu dang sil snyan gyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro//la la ni gcig tu sdug bsngal bas/la la ni de gnyis kas/la la ni gnyis ka ma yin//
408a5(dkon brtsegs): pas/sems can la la ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul bas/sems can la la ni dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen mar sprul pas 'dul ba/
408a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te/de dag la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku bstan pas 'dul bar 'gyur ro//rigs
408a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs byed par shes nas sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su shes pa la brtson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu nam
408b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa las nges par byung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang bsdus par gyur te/mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi
408b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la mkhas par gyur pa na de nas sems can yongs su smin par byed nus pa'i skal ba dang mthu yod par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems
408b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste yongs su mi skyo ba dang /bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang /dus dang dus ma yin par bskul ba dang /bsam pa
408b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
408b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed nus te/bzhi gang zhe na/bka' blo bde ba dang /snyan par smra ba dang /ngang tshul gyis 'jam pa dang /
408b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so//rigs kyi bu gzhan
408b7(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/bzhi gang zhe na/khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /snying rje chen po'i sems dang //
409a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dngos po'i sems dang /bdag shin tu dul ba'i sems te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'argyas ngan po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongasu//
409a2(dkon brtsegs): smon par byed nus so//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so//bzhi gang zhe na/bsam pa dge
409a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gam med cing sgra dang bral ba dang /brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /legs par byes pa dang /nyes par byas pa bzod pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
409a4(dkon brtsegs): bani po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar glang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skye
409a5(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus par reg par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pas kyang ches grangs med pa yangs pa
409a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa bsami gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/bskul pa dga' byeng le 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
409a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
409b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya bu 'jig du byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams ni ba nga 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba la legs pa nyams da nga
409b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mos rab tu gang bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par snang ba de'i nyan thos kyang nyan thos chen po bye ba
409b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'dus par gyur to//nga'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri bad+mo sbyong 'dus par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das
409b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo ba byed zhi ba ni stong thub par gyur to//rigs kyi bu do'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu nir dpal
409b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa bsta na sdug pa mdag bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/btsas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang /de gzugs bzang ba/longs
409b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang skyid pas dregs shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i kun du mi 'gro'o//bsten par mi byed bsnyen du
409b7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed rim gro mo byed do//rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la rgyal bu gzhan nu nod dpal 'di ni
410a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'o rtsa ba yongs smra smin te bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod na/de gzugs dang longs
410a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang skyid pas rgyags dregs te nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du yang mi 'ong na/gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bskul na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong yang
410a3(dkon brtsegs): srod snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so//bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi bu dag
410a4(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyi nang nas yid yongs su mi skyo bar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing bde ba thams cad ni spangs sdug bsngal thos cad ni dang
410a5(dkon brtsegs): du blangs te/de las tha na kun tu spro ba 'am yang dag par smra ba 'am stan tsam yang mi rnyed kyi steng du/gashre rgyu zhing tshig ngan pa rtsub mo mi snyan par zer yang spro bar 'gyur ba su
410a6(dkon brtsegs): yod ces tshul shing brims so//rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul shing brims kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' tsam yang sgra
410a7(dkon brtsegs): bar ma gyur to//bcom ldan 'das des tshul shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyang sus kyang ma blangs pa dang /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
410b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de spyan las langs nas/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
410b2(dkon brtsegs): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de
410b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yongs su mi skyo bar bde ba thams cad ni
410b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs sdug bsngal thams cad ni ji mi snyam par bgyis te/rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpral gyi khyim du mchi'o zhes rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
410b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bar gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos nas/lha'i bu brgyad stong gis kyang steng gi bar
410b6(dkon brtsegs): snang la kye ma 'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i so ma dgos pa 'di ni legaso legs so zhes bya ba byin no//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems
410b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar de rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du song ste/khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos mthong na ste ga sha rgyu zhing ngan pa
411a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsub pa sna tshogs kyang smras te de la sa dang rdul kyang gtar/de la lag pa dang dbyig pa dang bong byas kyang brdegs so//de nus mthong zhing thos tA lus la
411a2(dkon brtsegs): reg cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'khrug pa 'am gshe ba 'am khong khro ba 'am/phyir log par ma gyur gyi steng du brtson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs
411a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskyed nas stobs dang rab tu ldan pa dang snying rje chen po yang bskyed de/de lo stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te smad pa dang bsdigs pa dang
411a4(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi skyo bar de lo khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nang du zhugs so//de lo nyi khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi
411a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo khang gsum pa'i nang du zhugs pa nas/lo bdun khri lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang drug pa'i nang du zhugs so//lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon pa dang rgyal po'i pho
411a6(dkon brtsegs): blang gi sgo khang bdun pa'i nang du zhugs pa dang /de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal des tshig ster te/dge slong khyod ci 'dod ci zhig tshol khyod la ci dgos smros shig dang /
411a7(dkon brtsegs): ci nus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o//rgyal bu gzhon nu de dge slong de la ngo mtshar chen po'i 'du shes skyes nas ci tsam du dge slong des yongs su skyo ba mnags nus pa ni ngo
411b1(dkon brtsegs): mnur rno snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de soms rab tu drang bar shos nas//
411b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//zas dang sgom dang gos dang bza' ba rnams//gzhon nu bdug la dgos pa tsI yang med//zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag
411b3(dkon brtsegs): nas//bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'di 'ongs so//'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che byung ba//mi mchog dri ma med par snang zhes bya//da ni sdug bsngal mthur 'byin chos ston
411b4(dkon brtsegs): to/sems can gang gis thos pa mi 'chi thob//bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs med na//sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu lam 'byong bar 'gyur//da ltar 'jig rten mun gnag/
411b5(dkon brtsegs): smyon gyur pa//yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas//khyod ni 'di na 'dod pa'i yon tan chags//gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu myos//sgyid myos de bzhin rgyal
411b6(dkon brtsegs): sring myos pas na//chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro//longs spyod mi rtag de bzhin rgyal skyid srog/rtswa rtse'i zil thig sa 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs//gong phyir sangs
411b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba//de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi cha ma yin/go khyod ni 'di ni byang chub mchog zhugs la//sems can dag kyang gnyer te 'gro bar gyis//khyed bdag de
412a1(dkon brtsegs): //lhur 'dod pa'adran gyur na//ji ltar mos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur//da rgyal spongs te nyon mongs rnams sol la//da ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis//brdzun
412a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brus bskyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis//phyi ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re//rgyal bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas//nga rgyal spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas//brtson//
412a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus 'byor ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te//gang sngon bdag gis gnod bgyis bzod par gsol//bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spang bar bya//'dod dang de bzhin longs
412a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod kun mi tshol//nga rgyal za ba'i skyon dang dregs spangs te//myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro//de ni srog chags bye ba bdud cus bskor//me tog na bza'
412a5(dkon brtsegs): spos dang bdug pa thogs//dri me momed par snang ba skyes bu'i mchog/rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song //bde bar gshegs kyi gan du mchis nas kyang //zhabs la phyag 'tshal
412a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas mchod byas te//de bzhin gshegs pa de yi sbyin sngar 'dug/rgyal bu des ni tshog ni 'di smras so//gang phyir skyon med sems kyis bskul bas na//brtson 'grus
412a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bdag gis ston pa mgon//ji ltar de ni mched pe'i 'os lags na//de la lan du phan pa bya mi nus//bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod par gsol/
412b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal la bus pa gang ma bgyis//de dag thams cad du ring so sor bshags//bdag ni nongs pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod//sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su//
412b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te//byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar du ni//slan chad bag med spyod par mi bgyi'o//rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam spangs te//sems can bye
412b3(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor//byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing //sngon byung rgyal ba'i bston la rab tu byung //rgyal ba de dag gis ni bsam mkhyen nas//byang chub lam
412b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog rab tu bstan pas na//chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams//thams cad kyis kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob//rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las
412b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan
412b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de/gzhan dge yin pa snyam du dgas shing the tshom zla
412b7(dkon brtsegs): ngam yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba der gyur te//rigs kyi bu
413a1(dkon brtsegs): /tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tshom za 'am yang gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi lta'o//
413a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon byang chub
413a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo zhing /'di ltar shin tu stobs dang ldan te brtson 'grus nye bar ston to//rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems/
413a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed 'dod pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu
413a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no//rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las
413a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste bdud kyi las las shin tu 'das pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /sangs
413a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
413b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bsgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lus yin te/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
413b2(dkon brtsegs): cad bstod par 'gyur ba'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur
413b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang /nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i ye shes dang /
413b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin
413b5(dkon brtsegs): teta/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
413b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/gang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang byas kyang
413b7(dkon brtsegs): rin du mi bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che de/de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gtsug ni mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 'di/
414a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das bdag gi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba thob pa dang bdag sangs rgyas kyi yo
414a2(dkon brtsegs): shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum po mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
414a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid de/nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po
414a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas na/
414a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste/bcom ldan
414a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las
414a7(dkon brtsegs): langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzir nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngo sa la gtsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom
414b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so//mi mnyam mnyam pa'i dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog/shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po
414b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhing snying gsum dri ma spangs//mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal bar ri rab bzhin//ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol//
414b3(dkon brtsegs): gya gru mi mda' rab tu gnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung //skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs//bde gshegs mos pa'i mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bstad du gosol//stobs bcu'i stabs mnga' 'dom gang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od//'khor gyi nang du sade ge lta bur rab grags
414b5(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba bcom//thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa 'am lhag pa gang yang med//chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol//rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dges
414b6(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu dri med zhal//zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam me bar//mun pa be tsom zhing rdul bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pas//bde bar gshegs pa
414b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad phan par mdzad pas bka' stsal cig/gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nams ye shes 'phro//mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod
415a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'os//srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing //na mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shAkya seng gi 'dzum pa bstan//lha dang mis mchod khyod
415a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dras dang lha yul dag na'ang med//yid mnyam mos pa mnyam po khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu rgyas//yon tani brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa//bde
415a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/kun tu khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug/sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can
415a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa gang //sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen//mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs//na mkhar
415a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i lha mang yid kyang rab tu dga'//mi tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis//gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba//mi mchog gis ni
415a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka'
415a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po
415b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba mthong ngam//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
415b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/beste stang du byas btsun por byas/ri mor byas shing mchod nas thams cad du yang
415b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshangs par spyod pa spyad de sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'di bskal pa
415b4(dkon brtsegs): bragrangs med pa brgya stong na bskal pa dri ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
415b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung
415b6(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams do nas 'od gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i
415b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro//'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag 'od des reg par 'gyur ba de dag kyang /nyon mongs
416a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro//
416a2(dkon brtsegs): der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming ni rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o//byang chub
416a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//de dag gi longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur
416a4(dkon brtsegs): ro/rtagang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//de na mi khom pa dang ngan song
416a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro//de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung
416a6(dkon brtsegs): ber mi 'gyur ro//lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yang mod par 'gyur ro//
416a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams don sems can long ba 'am zhar ba 'am/zha bo 'am sgur po 'am/yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de/de dag thams cad kyang lus
416b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa bar ma bzhi
416b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/theg pa chen po
416b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' nga dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro//de dag kyang
416b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyasku thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs rab tu
416b5(dkon brtsegs): ston par 'gyur ro//de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o//tshig gcig po de yang gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshig ma zad
416b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o//tshig mi zad pa de yang ba zhe na/'di lta ste
416b7(dkon brtsegs): a zhes bya ba de ni mi zad pa ste/a zhes bya ba la zhugs na yig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro//de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/yig dbya gnyis sa
417a1(dkon brtsegs): med par thos par bya mi nus so//yig 'bru re ro nas brjod kyis yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no//de bas na tshig gcig pa de nyid rnam par
417a2(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i tshig ste/gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed rnam par rtog par mi byed de/de ltar tshig de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog par dgos
417a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byed de/rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o//de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba med de byang chub sems dpa' de
417a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags
417a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod
417a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yon tan yongs su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa brjod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems
417b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul
417b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//chos rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs//'khrul pa'i skyon rnams
417b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las//de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das//ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar//sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la//bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa//de dag thams
417b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon par mkhyen//'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang //de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi//bdag gis spyod dang de bzhin du//srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen//thub pa ci 'dra de 'dra
417b5(dkon brtsegs): bar/'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan//bdag ni the tshom yong ma mchis//sa rnams thams cad 'gags kyang gda'//
417b6(dkon brtsegs): nyi zla mkha' las ltung yang gda'//bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas//phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung //ye shes ldan la shes rab che//des ni bdag la bden tshig gis//byang //
417b7(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog tu lung bstan pas//sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur//thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na//bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang //sangs rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra ba//de 'dra nyid
418a1(dkon brtsegs): du kun bstan to//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas//the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim//sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyud//mchog gi spyod pa
418a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad par bgyi//bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba//sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa//de bas shin tu dpag yas par//bdag gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi//'di ni le los mi 'da' bas//
418a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di//zhum pa mi mchis sems kyis su//byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi//bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa//sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal//
418a4(dkon brtsegs): ji srid 'dren par ma gyur par//de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo //rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te//sems can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi//byang chub dam pa don du btsal//
418a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi//byang chub sems dpa' bcug na rin po ches tshigasu bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa
418a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te/tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin
418a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob por gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /de thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
418b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus kyi zhing deng skye bar lung bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dgra' bo la bka' stsal pa/sman dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig tshongs shig
418b2(dkon brtsegs): lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
418b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ngam klog pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to//kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
418b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhis ces sbyin pa byin pa das/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
418b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mos te 'chang ngam klog gam de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed ni/'di ni de bas/bsod nams ches mang ste tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
418b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dras la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags
418b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba
419a1(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang zung shig/gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/bcom ldan
419a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang /tshe dang
419a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
419a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/
419a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so////zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he d+harma shI las zhus te/skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa///
419a6(dkon brtsegs): shA lo ka dgu brgyu ste//bram po gsum mo//rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA shI mA la de bi sing hA nA da/nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/
419a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
419b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo//'di skyed bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshul mgon med rdzas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
419b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan maso lha mo drang lo phreng chos rtogs nas ring pa mo lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam
419b3(dkon brtsegs): glengs pa/rgyal po chen po kye ma khyod kyi sras mo lha mo dpal phreng ni mdzangs shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te/gal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshegs chung ngus
419b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rtogs la/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yang the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad
419b5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so//phreng ldan me'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus bshig btang gor ma chag go/de skad ces smras pa dang /btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi
419b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig de mnyan nas ko sa lnga'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang btsun mo phreng ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsdigs pa rnam pa du ma bris twe nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu
419b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de'i lag tu phrin yig bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas gtsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/lha mo dpal phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun
420a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i gtam byas te/lha mo dpal phreng gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no//de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis pha ma la gus pas 'phrin yig de lag pa
420a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo bo la gtugs te bdag nyid 'phrin yig bklags nas/'phrin yig gi don bzang po zhes nges par gzung ste don nges par bzung nas/mgo bo
420a3(dkon brtsegs): lcogs te ya mtshan du gzung nas lha mo dpal phreng gi nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni//'jig rten dag na shin tu
420a4(dkon brtsegs): dkon//grul te tshig 'di bden gyur na//bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin//gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de//'jig rten don du byung gyur na//de ni bdag la thugs rje yis//
