420a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i ched du 'dir sbron cig/de nas de yi skad cig la//mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs//bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku//'od zer 'gyed cing bzhugs
420a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong //de nas de'i tshe lha mo ni//gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang //spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas//sla ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni//mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs
420a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /dpal dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis//bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i//'jig mgon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang //ye shes la yang
420b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam+ba ma mchis//khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas//de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags//bsam yas rtswa ldan khyod kyis ni//sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal//nyams
420b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i sa brnyes pa//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen//ye shes skye yi dbang phyug ste//sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi//mthar
420b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo//bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshalo//mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal
420b4(dkon brtsegs): lo//bdag ni da ltar mgon pos skyabs//byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed//slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu//thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
420b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa//sngon tshe rnams su lha mo khyod//ngas ni byang chub sbyor bar byas//phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu//ngas ni rjes su bzung bar bya//lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa//bdag
420b6(dkon brtsegs): gos 'di dang gzhan dag tu//bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa//bsod namos de yis mgon po khyod//rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang lhan cig tu btsun
420b7(dkon brtsegs): mo kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal phreng bla na med pa yang dag
421a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ldum khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'o bsad/
421a2(dkon brtsegs): nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/lha ma khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid dun tshogs pa myang bar 'gyur te tshe rabs
421a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing //nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom
421a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das da pag tu med grangs med pa rnams la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//daphyin chad bskul ba bergyu spyong glungs med pa nyi shun+tu/khyad de bzhin gshegs pa
421a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang ngan song dag 'byung bar
421a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro//de'i tshe semAs can rnams kyang dge ba ban+de'iSh+Ti lus kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/sems can de dag la nad kyang med dga' ba yang med/yid du mi 'a
421a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnod pa yang med de mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yong mi grag par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang sems can gang dag byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan
421b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kya 'di ltar bde ba dang /gzugs dang /khru dog dang /dpal dang /gan bad dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang /r-i dang /reg bya dang /longs spyod
421b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing dar sems can gdo dag 'byung ba de dag
421b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro//lha mo de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar
421b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyo bar smon lam btab po//

428b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni dri dag gis de la spyos brgyad de gtses pa bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis
428b6(dkon brtsegs): shring sman par 'tshal ba dang /bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/thu nu bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongasu
428b7(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid de/de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das
429a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma mchis pa dang /'dun pa chen//
429a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin por bgyid de/tha na rang gi spyod lum bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sngams bsrung zhing yongasu smin par
429a3(dkon brtsegs): dgyid de/de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos lnga gnas par 'gyur po 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das
429a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang /yid phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang /dran pa 'khrul pa ma
429a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/tha na bgyis nas yun ring du lags/smras nas yun ring du legs pa mi bskyed pas kyang de dag gi
429a6(dkon brtsegs): sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur bu 'din de'i bsam gtan gyi
429a7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi nga'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la
429b1(dkon brtsegs): lo lo ma mchis par lung ston pa dang /bstan bcos thams cad dang /rig pa dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/tha na bzo gra'o/
429b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni

429b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don
429b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig/de nas
429b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi
429b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma legs te/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin
430a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so//dade ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des nI/bcom ldan 'das ngam
430a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'di ltar lus dang /srog dang /longs spyod rnams te/bcom ldan
430a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dras rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa rga ba dang na ba dang 'tsho ba dang bral ba/mi
430a4(dkon brtsegs): shigs pa rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba ther zug pa/'chi 'pho dang bral ba/mtha' yas pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das

430b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam ya mam thamamams sa mthamasamathams ma tha.a nathas mthamams kamam lam yas ma

430b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni yon tan shin tu rmad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par
430b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung bston par mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe dge slong

431a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan bskyed la smre sngags 'don por byed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang /de ltar mya ngan bskyed pa dang /de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed

431a7(dkon brtsegs): mnan te/mngon par brjod cing yang dag par mngon par brjod do//lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa yang chung ngu zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas
431b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rgyu chen pod rgyus pas nyan thos dang rang srung sa rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge nga'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnan to//l+h+wa mau dpor na r-ir-IN+Dal po ru rab kyis ni dra
431b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar mtho ba dang /rgya tsho bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon par lhag ger 'dug go//lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing phan
431b3(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang rgya chen por gyur pas/theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang /
431b4(dkon brtsegs): srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/lha mo de bas na seMn rnams dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du btu
431b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya/yang dag par bsten par bya/yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/bzung bar bya dgod par bya'o//lha mo dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin

432a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no//lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhed pa ngas ma bstan pa du

432a7(dkon brtsegs): lags pa dag dang rtswa dang shing gal pa dang sman dang /nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten cing sa chen po la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur//
432b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa drug dang /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa tha~Md

432b3(dkon brtsegs): po la gnas shing theg pa chen po yongs su gzung na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams

432b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul pa dang /rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing brtags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drag po de dag kyang theg

434b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa brnyes pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang ring sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lagaso///
435a1(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i ye shes mtha' dbus phyin pa rjes su dran bu bzhi po gang //
435a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang lhag ma dang bcas pa dang drang ba'i don dang rnam par bya ste lung bstan par bgyi ba legs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/
435a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ni 'di gnyis lags te/gnyis gang zhe na/rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ba lags//
435a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ni nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so//bcom ldan 'das yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis
435a5(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dang /yid kyi lus rnams lags te/
435a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du leg so//bcom ldan 'das de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba'i dbang du bgyis te/bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du/
435a7(dkon brtsegs): dgra btsam pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lagaso//bcom ldan 'das de ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brtan
435b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bdagags tshangs par spyad pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so//byis pa so so'i skye bo dang lha dang mi bgyi//
435b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang /slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyis pa de spangs po la brten nas bya ba
435b3(dkon brtsegs): byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung legs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba ni dgra

435b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan du mi shes so snyam pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad
435b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa yang ma lags/skye ba thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba las byung ba nga ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dgra btsam pa rnams dang rang sangs
435b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa dang /skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs

443b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang skyabasu mchi ste/bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad paso skyabs su mchi ba ni gnyis

443b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos 'di

450b6(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang /smon pa pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa drug po geng
450b7(dkon brtsegs): logs pa 'di dag dang /rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang skad cig pa dang sdug bsngal rnams rgyang
451a1(dkon brtsegs): /dam lags pas/chos de dag ni sdug bsngal lo skyo ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la dadad cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par mi rigs so//bcom ldan 'das/
451a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mther mchis pa dang mi skye ba dang mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba ma lags pas/bcom ldan 'das de
451a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par 'os so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
451a4(dkon brtsegs): snying po yang bdag ma lags/sems can ma lags/srog ma lags/gang zag ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta/
451a5(dkon brtsegs): bar lhung ba dag dang phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang /stong pa nyid las sems g.yeng ba rnams kyi spyod yul ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
451a6(dkon brtsegs): snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so//chos kyi sku'i snying po lagas+ho//'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po lag so//rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i
451a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi snying po lagaso//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa blo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin
451b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i yul yin te/bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam bdug bgyid do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i sems ni skad cig pa ste nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun
451b2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
451b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg/sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg pa'i chos
451b4(dkon brtsegs): can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mchis la sems nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas/bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis
451b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa legs te ye shes su gyur pa lags/
451b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag lugs/bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis
451b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog par dka' ba'i don bshad pa gsan nas rdzas su yi rang bar mdzad de/lha mo de de bzhin no//lha med de bzhin te/sems rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag gtogs par dka' ba dang /sems
452a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o//lha mo chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam byang chub sems dpa'i chos chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin
452a2(dkon brtsegs): lha mo nyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/lha mo nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag ni dad pa'i
452a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba la brten nas/chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro//lha mo chos dang 'thun par bsdud par shes pa zhes bya ba ni lha mo dbang po'i rnam par rig
452a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par lta ba dang /sems la dbang du gyur pa
452a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba ste/lha mo rnam par
452a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na lha mo da ltar dang nga 'das pa'i 'og/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa
452a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /sems kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa la nges par 'gyur ro//lha mo
452b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi su pA di nyid ni theg pa chen par lam du 'jug pa'in+d+ha 'gyur te/l+h+wa ma de wAr nA di lta ste/chos zab rtswa mi srung ba'i byir du zhin ga shegs pa pa dang basbru na du na//
452b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med po yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad kyis gsal to//ma ldan 'das 'di la smin pa mang ba'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
452b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthus bdage slongs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsal pa/lha mo khyod stobs par gyis shig//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal bying gis 'di/ces pasol to//
452b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ches zab mo dag la ma smras ma nyams par bdag nyid la bsrung ba dang /bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang /
452b5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par gyur pa lag so//gsum gang zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ljon pa dang /
452b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo glang dag rjes dang 'thun par snang ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo gang dag ches zab
452b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la dadag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas 'di bdag gis mi shes te/don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad de zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gartod
453a1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid de sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma nus zab mya dag lam
453a2(dkon brtsegs): smras ma nyams par bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang /theg pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba lag so//bcom ldan 'das
453a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu gzung nas go lob kyi sems
453a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te ston par bgyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /gzhan mu stegs can dang /
453a5(dkon brtsegs): sa bon rul pa lags te rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchil brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha mi yin du bcas pa'i
453a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar bcang por bgyi ba lags//de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis de snyed ces gsol nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
453a7(dkon brtsegs): gtugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs zhes bya ba byin te/lha mo khyad kyis dus dang skabs chos zab mo dag le bdag nyid yang dag par
453b1(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba'i thabs kyis ngan bstan pa bshad pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bcad pa bshad pa legs lagaso//lha mo khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
453b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad
453b3(dkon brtsegs): nas twa la bdun srid tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer ga la ba der gshegaso//de nas lha mo dpal phreng
453b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas blta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzum pas blte bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de
453b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi mig rgyang gis mi sleb par gyur po de'i tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu bo'i gzhin dang ldan pas/gcig gis gcig gi 'dun du de bzhin
453b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 'thub ming du dong ngo //de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis rang gi
453b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen theg po chen po la nges par bcug go/grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshigs bu mo lo bdun len pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud//
454a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/
454a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar grong khyer thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
454a3(dkon brtsegs): bo la yang bka' stsal cing lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskar te bcom ldan
454a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan
454a5(dkon brtsegs): te/kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig/kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la shod cig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi
454a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di zung shig/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig/de nas
454a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis
454b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/ko& shI ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par
454b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'am blta ba 'am nye bar brtag par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ko'u shi ka de de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas
454b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no//ko'u shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongasu brjod pa tsam zhig bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//
454b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
454b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to//ko'u shI ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par bstod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ko'u shi ka 'di ni yid dam chen po bsam gyis mi
454b6(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/skyon lam thams cad bsdud pa smon lam chen po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya
454b7(dkon brtsegs): bor yang zung shig/theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba bsten pa zhes bya bar yang zung shog/'phags pa'i bden pa brgyad bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/de bzhin gshegs pa
455a1(dkon brtsegs): snying po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/chos kyi sku bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/stong pa nyid kyi don gyi dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang
455a2(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/bden pa gcig bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/rtag pa dang brtan pa dang zhi ba dang /ther zug pa dang skyabs gcig tu gyur pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang rdung shig/
455a3(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems le dgongs pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras

455a5(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ni rgyu ba bcad pa dang /nges pa'i don dang ston pa gcig pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ko'u shi ka lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
455a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du yang dag par sgrogs shig ston shig/lha'i dbang po
455a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la logaso zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas nas/lha'i dbang po brgya
455b1(dkon brtsegs): byin dang /cha dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang /gzhan yang gang dang 'dus par gyur pa dag dang /sgyu dang mI dang lA ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rungs te/bcom ldan

456a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/zag pa zad pa/rdul zad pa/chos las mi bzlog pa/bsam gtan dang /kha tAn+da la gnas pa
456a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chag sa dang khri'i steng na 'dug pa/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar sa'i phyogs drir mdzes par byed pa sha stag la kha cig ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa/kha cig ni shing drung na gnas

456a4(dkon brtsegs): lo dang bral ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sbyin pa byin cig bya ba gang yin pa
456a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing dbang po sras la yid zhi bar gnas par gyis shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste tshe dang
456a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /'od srung chen po dang /shA ri'i bu dang /ba ku la dang /nam gru dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po
456a7(dkon brtsegs): she stag dang thabs gcig ste/yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam mdzad do//de'i tshe nub phyogs logs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba
456b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'diskad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs logs na 'byar zhing snang bzhugs kyi 'od zer lta ba

456b3(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/drang srong rnams kyi mchog drang srong rgyas pa zhes bya ste/drang srong dka' thub drag pa la gnas pa bsten par gnas pa brgyad stong gis dub pa/

456b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dbyung po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba byasam gtan gyi dben pa la dgyes pa/shing ljon pa stug po'i nang na du zhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong
456b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas kyi rgyas pa 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma 'o ma la ngo mtshar te 'di bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa phyin ci ma log pa gsung ba zhis 'jig rten du grags pa ni gnas
457a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no//ji ltar kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba'i gzugs rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa las na 'di gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs par
457a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gzugs rgya chen po 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi bdag po dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spangs te/bud med
457a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sa 'tsho ma la sogs pa bud med drug steng yang spangs nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi nang du gshegs te bzhugs pa 'di ni kye ma'o 'di ni 'jig rten na ngo mtshar rmad
457a4(dkon brtsegs): du byung ba'o snyam du sems so//de nas drang srong me sbyin gyi bus kyang rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga'
457a5(dkon brtsegs): ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//shing ljon dag gi khrod 'dug cing //gtso
457a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i gser ltar ser be ra snang //gzugs ni shin tu 'bar ba ste//skye bo kun gyi dga' ba bskyed//bai DUr+ya ni dri med brag/stug nang ri rabe rtse gcig 'phags//ston gyi nyi ma
457a7(dkon brtsegs): rab lhan ltar//dpal gzugs 'bar ba 'di su zhig/de nas drang srong chen po de dag thams cad dga' ste mig phye thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //de
457b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'dzam bu gling pa'i drang skyong me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba ral pa'i cod pan can rgas pa rab tu rkam pa/zas mi za
457b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing bsnyen par gnas pa/shing shun dang g.yang gzhi gyon pa/thal bas byugs pa/thang dang brag khrod na gnas pa/bkres bkres ltar 'dug pa/rlung 'gam pa/zla ba phyed bsnyen
457b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas byas pa/yan lag skem pas gcer pu pa dang /shing shun gyon pa/a ga tsom dang sen mo dang spu ring ba/bung ba'i kha dog lta bu/dka' thub can/bzlas brjod
457b4(dkon brtsegs): dang sbyin bsreg dang /bsrung ba dang /bkra shis pa byas pa/sa dang bla gab med pa dang shing drung na gnas pa/rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ba/tseg tsog por 'dug pa/chu'i nang du 'jug

464a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mi byin par len pa dang /'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun gyi tshig 'byin pa dang /phra ma dang /ngag rtsub po dang /tshig khyal pa 'byin par mi bya'o//brnab sems

464a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis kyang byas so snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro//de dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba rab
464a6(dkon brtsegs): tu bsrung zhing srog gcod pa la stsogs pa kun bsrung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro//gang dag rgyal po des
464a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan cing bsgo ba mi bsrung zhing mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal rjes su 'thob par 'gyur/'di nas shi
464b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byas nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//drang srong chen po de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa rnams rjes su mi bsrung ba de dag gis
464b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur zhe na/de dag gis log par lta ba bskyed nas lha sbyin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gang dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bslab pa

464b4(dkon brtsegs): shing /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la ming bsgrags pas kyang bslab pa phun sumi tshogs par bya'o//drang srong chen po gang la la zhig

464b7(dkon brtsegs): cher po'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de zhi bar 'gyur ro//dang srong chen po de bzhin du sbyin padas sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsdud par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i tshogs de ya
465a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud lnga dang pa'i char pa bab na sbyin pa nyid kyi rgyud la sogs par 'gyur mod kyi/sbyin pa byin pa de yang phung por gnas pa 'am spungs par

465a3(dkon brtsegs): des bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud do//drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na rgun rlon dang /bu ram shing ma btsir ba de lo khu ba
465a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs kyi/btsir nas dmigs te rgyun 'bru dang bu ram shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa 'am sbyangs par gnas pa 'am phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo //

465a7(dkon brtsegs): khu ba de dmigs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du sbyin bdag med na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/tshe'i 'du byed ma btang bar yang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa snang ba ma

466a2(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po grong khyer gyi dbus ni 'dug na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du 'ongs rko zhing rjes dang sman dang 'phong gi slob dpon

471a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /lhas gang yin pa ngas bshad do//drang srong chen po 'di la me tog dang spros dang phreng ba sbyin pa dang /bsten pa dang /bsgoms pa dang //
